1b1(mdo sde): rgyukAR+Sha s+yAd du/b+hUm+ba bA tu shA//'du skad du/
1b2(mdo sde): gang po la sogaso pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa/thams cad mkhyen pa
1b3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo//sdom ni gang po bzang dang grags ldan ma//lo lo can dang
1b4(mdo sde): tshong pa rnams//zla ba che ba pad+ma dang //pan tsa la dang bdug pa dang //rgyal
2a1(mdo sde): po 'jug tu smyos pa ste//'di ni sde tshon bsdus pa smon//ljongs shog tu bram zlo gang po zhes bya
2a2(mdo sde): TI r+dz+dza / rgyas ldan sa la/rnal ba rnams nga / tshon po rnams dang
2a3(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams
2a4(mdo sde): dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnam
2a5(mdo sde): dang /lto'i phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchid par byas te/lha dang /
2b1(mdo sde): dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing /shes pa'i sangs rgyas
2b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /smin
2b3(mdo sde): zong rnams brnyes pa/sangs rgyas gsar du byung ste/gsung rab kyi snying ku 'thung ba'i dus la bab cing /lha dang /mi min cad la yang dge
2b4(mdo sde): par rab tu ston pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshe la bya ka lan dA ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugaso//
2b5(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/byang chub mngon par rdzogs por sangs rgyas nas/ring po mi lon pare/'jig rten thams cad du grags
2b6(mdo sde): pas yongasu gang ngo //de nas lho phyogs kyi ri bo zhes bya ba'i ljongs no/dam ze che zhing mtho ba gang po zhes bya ba/phyug cing nor mang
3a1(mdo sde): la longs spyod che ba/yongasu 'dzin pA yangs shing rgyu che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran
3a2(mdo sde): pa zhig gnaso//de yang dad pa dang ldan la/dge zhing bsam pa bzang la/bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/snying
3a3(mdo sde): rje che ba/bdag nyid che ba/chos 'dod pa/gtong ba la sred pa/sbyin pa la dga' bas rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/gtong ba
3a4(mdo sde): chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/des re zhig na rab tu byung ba thams cad lo mchod sbyin byas na/der mu stegs can la sogs pa stong phyag du mas
3a5(mdo sde): zas zos so//gang gi tshe/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i khor dang bcas pa btul nas/de btul bas srog tshegs
3a6(mdo sde): 'bum phrag mang po dul bar gyur pa de'i tshe/rgyal po'i khab nas gang po'i nye du rnams lhags te gang po'i mdun du sangs rgyas dang /chos
3b1(mdo sde): dang /dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do//de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang pos/bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan thos nas/dga' ba chen po thob par gyur to//de nas
3b2(mdo sde): khang thog tu song nas rgyal po'i khab logasu kha ltas te 'dug nas/pus mo gnyis kyi lha nga sa la btsugs te/me tog kyang gtor/bdug pa dang chu yang phul nas/bcom
3b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchod sbyin la gshegasu gsol/mchod sprin gyi 'dun sa gzigasu gsol zhes byas so//de nas sangs
3b4(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang lha rnams kyi mthus me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du me tog gi khong par gyur te 'dug/bdug pa ni sprin gyi mgo lta bur gyur to//
3b5(mdo sde): chu ni bai DUr+ya'i sdong po lta bur gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar nas/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa spyan 'dren 'di ge las mchis lags//
3b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo lho phyogs kyi ri bo zhes bya ba'i ljongs na/bram ze che zhang mtho ba gang po zhes bya ba 'dug pa der/'u bu cag 'dod dgos kyis
3b7(mdo sde): dge slong dag chos shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gis zham 'bring byas nas/lho phyogs kyi ri bo'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po'i
4a1(mdo sde): @##//mchod sbyin gyi 'dun sa dang nye ba zhig tu gshegs nas/'di snyam du dgongs te/ngas bram ze gang po rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis dad par bya'o snya mo//de nas
4a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de dag mi snang bar mdzad de/nyag cig lhung zad dang chu snod phyag na bsnams nas/gong po dang nye ba zhig tu gshegaso//de nas bram ze
4a3(mdo sde): che zhing mtho ba gang pos/bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom
4a4(mdo sde): gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong //mthong nas kyang shin tu rengs par bcom ldan 'das kyi zad
4a5(mdo sde): du song ste/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa logaso//bcom ldan 'das bzhugasu gsol/bdag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bshos gsol
4a6(mdo sde): bar ci gnang zhes gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gal te khyod kyis yongs btang na lhung zed 'di'i nang du byin cig/de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po//dam
4a7(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u lnga brgyas g.yog byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas rnam pa sna tshogs khur ba dang /bai shos dang /'joms dang /bldag pa dang /bzhib pa la sogs pas//
4b1(mdo sde): lhung zed 'gengs par byed do//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ny-i kyi lhung zad kyi nang na/dge slong gi lhung zed dag gi nang du/zas de dag 'gro bar mdzad do//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong
4b2(mdo sde): steng gi lhung zed rnams gang bar thug su chub pa de'i tshe/nyid kyi lhung zed gang bar bstan te/de nis dge slong stong lhung zed dang / bzla dmos pa'i dbyings lta bur 'khod pa bstan to//namakha' la
4b3(mdo sde): gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang /bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong stong gi lhung zad rnams gang bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod//de nas cho 'phrul bstan la des bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po
4b4(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur nas/dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste/yid rangs shing dga' ba dang /yid bde bar gyur te/sdong po rtsed nas bcad pa bzhon du/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhangs la phyag
4b5(mdo sde): 'tshal nas/smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin pa bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis/bdag 'jig rten long ba/'dren pa med cing yongasu 'dren pa
4b6(mdo sde): med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /dbugs mi phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongasu
4b7(mdo sde): mya ngan las zla ba'i sangs rgyasu gyur cig ces byas//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /las gcig nas
5a1(mdo sde): gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas/'dzum pa mdzad//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid/de'i tshe zhul nas
5a2(mdo sde): 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams 'byung ba ni/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de
5a3(mdo sde): dag ni/sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bsdus 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu che dang /mnar med pa
5a4(mdo sde): dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer dang /a chu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gus pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas
5a5(mdo sde): pa chen por song nas/tsha bo'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dri bar gyur///
5a6(mdo sde): te 'bab bo//de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to//de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos
5a7(mdo sde): sam/'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyamo//de nas de dag dad pa skyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed pa mdzad//de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du
5b1(mdo sde): sems te/kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par kyang ma gyur la/gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/bdag cag
5b2(mdo sde): gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snya mo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las
5b3(mdo sde): de zad/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du/gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der/nying mtshams 'dzin par gyur to//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/rgyal
5b4(mdo sde): chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnaMs
5b5(mdo sde): dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od rnams dang /'od gsal rnams
5b6(mdo sde): dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge ba rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang /sprin med rnams dang /bstod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu che rnams dang /mi che ba rnams
5b7(mdo sde): dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa
6a1(mdo sde): dang /bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs//tshig su bcud bya gnyis kyang brjod pa byung/nges par 'byung bar brnam par gyis//sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar//
6a2(mdo sde): gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdagi ste ni gzhom par gyis//gang zhig chos 'du 'di nyid la//bkra yod spyod par byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor ba
6a3(mdo sde): rab spangs nas//sgrog bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur//zhes brjod par byed//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khoms bskur nas/
6a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brangs te/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis/'das pa'i las lung sten par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snum log su mi snang bar
6a5(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung sten par bzhed na ni/mdun log su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhid na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor
6a6(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyuraro//mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag
6a7(mdo sde): g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung stoni bar bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur//lhar skye bar lung
6b1(mdo sde): stan par bzhed na ni/lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na/
6b2(mdo sde): nI/smin 'tsham su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snod par 'gyur ro//de nas 'od zer de dag
6b3(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/
6b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/tshon sna stong gis sgrol ba sna tshogs can//mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar gyis//nyi ma shar bas ji
6b5(mdo sde): ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshigasu bcad de gsol pa//rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa/rgyal ba dgra
6b6(mdo sde): thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtan po nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba
6b7(mdo sde): rnams//thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bstsal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyalo lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs
7a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams byin 'da' 'dzum mi ston//gang gi don du dga' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//de ni khyod las skye bo phal cher nyan par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'dra
7a2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med par
7a3(mdo sde): 'dzum pa mi mdzad//kun dga' bo bram ze che zhing mthe ba 'dis nga lo 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lagaso//kun dga' bo bram ze che zhing mtho ba
7a4(mdo sde): 'di/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang
7a5(mdo sde): dag par bsgrubs te/snying rje chen pos yongasu bsgos po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byas nas/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dris pa'i dran pa nye bar
7a6(mdo sde): gzhag pa gsum dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po bzang zhes bya bar 'gyur te/'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de'i sbyin par
7a7(mdo sde): byas pa'i chos ni/gangang la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yino//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/bram ze che zhing mtho ba gang po bla na med pa yang dag pa ro rdzogs
7b1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de'i tshe gang pos/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du mchod sbyin gyi 'dun sar bshos gsol te/lhag par yang des
7b2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtse ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag yang dag par bskyed//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ston pa la bkur bsti bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//mchod par bya'o///
7b3(mdo sde): ston pa la bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byos/mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes/dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de
7b4(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////grags ldan ma zhes bya
7b5(mdo sde): ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon
7b6(mdo sde): rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /nam mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis/
7b7(mdo sde): bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin+na dang /na mkha' lnga ri dang /mi 'am tsa dang /lto 'phye chen po
8a1(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing /shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims chu dang /
8a2(mdo sde): gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/yangs pa can spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhu/
8a3(mdo sde): so//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang /chos gos gsol te/lhung zad bsnams nas/dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis
8a4(mdo sde): mdun du bdar nas/yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gsheg so//yangs pa can du mthar gyis bsod snyoms la gshegs nas/dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim ga la ba der gshe/
8a5(mdo sde): te byon nas/gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so//de nas dmag dpon seng ge'i gna'i ma grags ldan ma zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod pa des
8a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar ba dang ldan pa mthong nas/shin tu dga' ba thob par gyur to/des gyos po la dris paM/bdag kyang 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang
8a7(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur ba thabs 'ga' lta mchis sam/de nas dmag dpon seng ge 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma bu mo 'di ni rgya chen po la mos pa zhig ste/gal te 'di rkyen dang phrad
8b1(mdo sde): na ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyuraro snyam du rig nas smras pa/bu mo gal te rgyu yang dag par blangs te 'dug na ni/khyod kyang bcom
8b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das ci 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyuraro//de nas dmag dpon seng ge grags ldan ma'o dad pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir/dbyig dang /gser dang rin po che mang du byi no//de nas grags
8b3(mdo sde): ldan mas/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/phyid nyin khyim gyi nang du gdugs tshad lo spyan drang so//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la phan gdags pa'i phyir
8b4(mdo sde): gnang ngo //de nas bu mo grags ldan mas/gser dang /dngul dang /rin po che'i me tog rnams kyang byed du bcug/spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa mang po dag kyang
8b5(mdo sde): bsogs/zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa yang bshams nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul ba/btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos lags na/
8b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegasu gsol/zhes bskul to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshegs kyis zham ring byas te/dge slong gi dge/
8b7(mdo sde): 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/dmag dpon seng ge'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gud la gdan bshams pa lo bzhugaso//de nas bu
9a1(mdo sde): me grags ldan mas/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/rang gi lag nas zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim
9a2(mdo sde): par byas te/bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis gtor to//de nas me tog de dag 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus
9a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du rin po che'i khang pa dang /khang pa brtsegs pa/rin po che'i rgyal mtshon can/mgar ba 'am/mgar ba'i slob ma legs par lobs pas kyang byed
9a4(mdo sde): mi nus pa de lta bur gyur te 'dug/de nas bu mo grags ldan mas lha dang /mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul shin tu rmad du byung ba de mthong nas/sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin
9a5(mdo sde): du/lus thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong
9a6(mdo sde): bo 'dis/bdag 'jig rten long ba/'dren pa med cing yongasu 'dren pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /dbugs
9a7(mdo sde): ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongasasu mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyasu gyur cig ces byaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
9b1(mdo sde): bu mo grags ldan ma'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe
9b2(mdo sde): 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du
9b3(mdo sde): 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bsdus 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab
9b4(mdo sde): tu che ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer dang /a tsu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa
9b5(mdo sde): dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu bsil bar gyur te 'ba'o//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni
9b6(mdo sde): gro bar gyur te 'bab bo//des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to//de nas 'di dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos
9b7(mdo sde): sam/'on to gzhan du skyes snyamo//de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad//de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/
10a1(mdo sde): kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/bdag cag/
10a2(mdo sde): gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyamo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las zad//
10a3(mdo sde): lha dang /mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyuraro//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
10a4(mdo sde): rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris
10a5(mdo sde): dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'dron pa rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /
10a6(mdo sde): tshad med dge rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang /sprin med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu che rnams dang /mi che rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /
10a7(mdo sde): bya nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong ba rnams dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag
10b1(mdo sde): med pa'i sgra sgrogs//tshigasu bcud pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed//nges par 'byung bya ba rnam par gyis//sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/
10b2(mdo sde): 'ching dag sngoni gnom par gyis//gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid du la//bag yod spyod par byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur//zhes
10b3(mdo sde): brjod par byed//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/gal te bcom ldan 'das
10b4(mdo sde): kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logasu ma snang bar 'gyur ro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bdun log su mi snang bar
10b5(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rtid par mi snang
10b6(mdo sde): byara'igyur//yi dag pu skye bar lung ston par banid na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyuraro//mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyisu mi snang bar 'gyur/
10b7(mdo sde): skyobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung sbyin par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang por 'gyur//'khar los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung sbyin par bzhed na na/
11a1(mdo sde): phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur//lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhad na ni/lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na
11a2(mdo sde): ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/smin mtsham su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
11a3(mdo sde): tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
11a4(mdo sde): gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/tshon sna stong gisau spel ba sna tshogs can/mang po zhal
11a5(mdo sde): gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shor bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshig su bca de gsol pa/rgod dang bral zhing rgyags
11a6(mdo sde): dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis pa//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mo ston//
11a7(mdo sde): brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyin pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams//thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag
11b1(mdo sde): gis the tsom skyes pa bstsal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ra rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams rkyen 'dar 'dzum mi ston//glang gdon du dpa' bo 'dzum pa sta/
11b2(mdo sde): mdzad pa//de ni khyod las skye bo phal cher nyon par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin
11b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad//kun dga' bo bu mo grags ldan ma 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur
11b4(mdo sde): bsti byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong legaso//kun dga' bo bu mo grags ldan mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis//
11b5(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par dasgrubs te/snying rje chen pos yongasu bsgos po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par
11b6(mdo sde): byas nas/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
11b7(mdo sde): ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur te/'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
12a1(mdo sde): stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod///le lo can zhes bya ba ni/sangs
12a2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /dod dpon rnams
12a3(mdo sde): dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
12a4(mdo sde): bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mau 'am ci dang /lto 'phye
12a5(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ljon pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun
12a6(mdo sde): bsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/mnyan du yod pa na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tsha la/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
12a7(mdo sde): dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la/longs spyod che ba yongasu 'dzin pa yangs zhing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'o nor dang ldan
12b1(mdo sde): pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod//de rje zhing dga' la dga'
12b2(mdo sde): dgur spyod kyang /bu yang med/bu mo yang med nas/de lag pa skom tshugs btsas te/bdag gi khyim ner du ma dang ldan du zin kyang /bdag la bu ying med du la yang med pas/
12b3(mdo sde): bdag 'ongs pa'i 'og tu ni du med pa'i phyir/ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyu ro snyam ste/sems khongasu chud cing 'dug/de nas dge sbyong dang bram ze dang ltas mkhan
12b4(mdo sde): dang /'dza' bo dang /gnyen dang /rtsi lag gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thob cig ces de la bsgo'o//'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur
12b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/de yang de lta ni ma yin te/gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang /bu mor skyo bar 'gyur du zin na/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du/
12b6(mdo sde): re re l-i yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigaso//ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las/po dang du mo skye bar 'gyur te/gsum gang zhe na/pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad
12b7(mdo sde): pa dang /ma dus la bab cing zla na chen dang ldan pa dang /dri za 'ongs pa ste/gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las/bu dang 'u mo skye bar 'gyur na/'on kyang dge sbyong dang /bram ze
13a1(mdo sde): rnams dang /ltas mkhan rnams dang /mdza' bo dang /gnyen dang /rtsa lag rnams kyis de tho btsams nas/de bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir/gu lang dang /
13a2(mdo sde): chu lha dang /ku be ra dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/'di lta ste/kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /nags
13a3(mdo sde): tshal gyi lha dang /lam gyi bzhi maudo'i lha dang /sum mdo'i lha dang /gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /lhan cig skyes pa dang /chos 'thun pa dang /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha
13a4(mdo sde): rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs te/de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/sems can zhig kyang sems can gyi ris shig nas shi 'phos te/de'i chung ma'i
13a5(mdo sde): ltor zhugaso//bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig la ni/thun mong ma yin pa'i chos lnga yod de/lnga gang zhe na/skyes pa chags pa yang shes la/ma chags pa yang
13a6(mdo sde): shes pa dang /dus kyang shes la zla mtshan yang shes pa dang /bu chags pa shes pa dang /gang las bu chags pa shes pa dang /khye'u yang shes la bu mo yang shes pa ste/
13a7(mdo sde): gal te khye'u yin ne ni/lto g.yas logs na rten cing gnas//gal te bu mo yin na ni/lto g.yon phyogasu rten cing gnaso//de nas de dga' ches nas/khyim bdag la
13b1(mdo sde): sbran pa/jo bo bdag la sras chags te/bdag gi rum g.yas logs na rten cing gnas pa las na/khye'ur 'gyur bar nges kyis/dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas nas/
13b2(mdo sde): yang dga' ches ste ro bstod ni bteg/lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/bdag gis yun ring po nas smon smyon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong bar 'ong ngo //bdag gi bu rung bar shog shig/mi
13b3(mdo sde): rung bar ma gyur cag/bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog shig/gsos pa'i lan phyir gso bar shog shig/nor skal la spyod par shog shig/bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gang
13b4(mdo sde): par shog shig/bdag cag 'das te shi bo'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang yong rung /nyung yang rung ste/sbyin pa dag sbyin la/bsod nams rta bus nas/de gnyis
13b5(mdo sde): gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon sngo bar shog shig zhes dga' ba'i tshig brjod//des bu chagaso par rig nas bu'i rim gro phye ba'i phyir/khang bzangs
13b6(mdo sde): kyi steng du nyam rang su bzhag ste/grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang /tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams dang /sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang /ha tsang kha ba ma yin pa
13b7(mdo sde): rnams dang /ha cang sbyar ba ma yin pa rnams dang /ha tsong lan tsha che ba ma yin pa rnams dang /ha cang dang ra ba ma yin pa rnams dang /ha cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /ha
14a1(mdo sde): cang bska ba ma yin pa rnams te/kha ba dang /skyur ba dang /lan tshwa dang /dadar ba dang /tshwa ba dang /bska ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing /do shul dang /
14a2(mdo sde): se mo ngos lus rnam par klubs te/lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas/khri'i steng dang //dri'u steng nas/khri'u steng du rmya zhing 'og gi sa gzhi
14a3(mdo sde): la mi 'bab pa dang /des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byaso//de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang /bu byung ste/khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdze
14a4(mdo sde): ba zhig btsas nas/de bcas pa'i tshe/khyim gang gi mi dga' bar gyur te/de bcas pa'i bac+doMs ston byas nas/khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed/
14a5(mdo sde): nye du rnams na re 'dri btsas pa na/khyim gong gi mi thams cad dga' bar gyur pas na/de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dga' byed ces bdag so zhes zer nas/de'i ming dga' byed
14a6(mdo sde): ces btagaso//de nas khye'u dga' byed pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma snyan pa'i me ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ma ma
14a7(mdo sde): brgyad la gtad nas/de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mir dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang po cog gis bskyed
14b1(mdo sde): bsrings te/mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skyed cher dag par gyur to//du na sA ro gang gi mtshar skyes te/lo lnga 'am drug lon pa de'i tshe/lo po can mchog tu le lo che ba zhig tu gyur
14b2(mdo sde): to/mal dang stan las kyang ldang mi 'dod do//de blo rmi zhing gsale bas khyim gyi nang na 'dug bzhin du/bstan bcos rnams bslang so//de nas tshong dpon de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag
14b3(mdo sde): gis lha mnyes par byas nas/brgya lam lan cig na bu skyes pa de yang le lo can mchog tu le le che ba zhig tu gyur te/mal dang stan las kyang mi ldang na/'di ltar lus tha mal
14b4(mdo sde): bar gyur kyang grum po bzhin du lnga ro 'dug pa 'di 'dra ba'i bu lta ci dgos snyamo//tshong dpon de yang rdzogs rnyed la dka' ste/des mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug rang gi khyim du bos nas/
14b5(mdo sde): gal te khye'u 'dis de dag mthong na zhes skye de/mal nas ldang ba tsam yang byed srid dam snyam pa dang /de nas khye'u le lo can gyis ston pa de dag mthong na/mig gis kyang ma bltas
14b6(mdo sde): na/ldang ba 'am/gus par sla ba 'am/stan bstabs pa lta ci smos/de nas tshong dpon dus gnas skabs de mthong nas/ches rab tu gdung bar gyur te/lag pa la skom tshugs badz+ra
14b7(mdo sde): te/sems khongasu chud cing 'du'o//de'i skabasu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mi mkhyen pa 'am/mi gzigs pa'am/mi rtogs pa'am/thugasu mi chud pa ci yang med la/
15a1(mdo sde): /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/srung ba gcag dang ldan pa/gcig tu dngu' bru/zlu ma
15a2(mdo sde): pa/gnyisu mi gsung ba/zhi gnas dang /lhag mthong la gnas pa/rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/bsgrub pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/'dul ba'i gzhi gsum
15a3(mdo sde): la mkhas pa/chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/mi 'jigs pa
15a4(mdo sde): bzhis mi 'jigs pa/khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/yan lag lnga rnam par sbrengs pa/'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/yan lag drug dang
15a5(mdo sde): ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs pa/rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/lam yan lag brgyad pa
15a6(mdo sde): ston pa/mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/stobs bcu'i stongs dang ldan pa/phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas
15a7(mdo sde): kyang /ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshon dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi sprin gyis 'jig rten lo gzigs te/sun nud/sngon dang /su
15b1(mdo sde): ni 'phongs shing 'dug/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/su ni gnod pa dang ldan/su ni phongs pa dang /nyam nga ba dang /gnod pa dang ldan/su ni ngan song du gzhol/su ni ngan song du 'bab/su/
15b2(mdo sde): ni ngan song du bab/su ni ngan song nas phyung ste/mtho ris dang /thar pa dang /'bras bu la gzhag par bya/su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags
15b3(mdo sde): pa'i no//bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed
15b4(mdo sde): zin pa las yongasu smin par bya/su ni yongasu smin zan pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug/'dir smras pa/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlabs
15b5(mdo sde): yol bar 'gyur yang srid//gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//sangs rgyas dus las yal ba med//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u le lo can gyis nga mthong na brtson 'grus rtsom
15b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du sems yongasu 'gyur par 'ong snyam du gzigaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mu stegs can rnams kyi rgyags
15b7(mdo sde): pa dang /dregs pa gcad pa dang /khye'u'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir/'od zer gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od zer bas lhag pa dag bkye ste/de dag gis khyim de kun tu
16a1(mdo sde): snang bar byaso//bskal pa stong du yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/de dag gis de'i lus la phog ma thag tu rab tu sum par gyur nas/
16a2(mdo sde): su'i mthus bdag gi lus rab tu sim par byas snyam ste/nges phan tshun du bltaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham rang byas te/khyim de'i nang du gshegs
16a3(mdo sde): nas/khye'u le lo can gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu so mdzes par byas pa/
16a4(mdo sde): 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang mchog tu dga' bar gyur
16a5(mdo sde): te/'phral la rang nyid longs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan bshams te/bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legaso//bcom ldan
16a6(mdo sde): 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugasu gsol zhes de skad kyang smraso//de nas de'i pha ma dang nang ma rnams kyis sngon ma mthong ba'i gus par sgrim pa mthong nas/mchog tu ya
16a7(mdo sde): mtshan du gyur to//de nas khye'u le lo can dga' zhing mdangs phyung ba'i mig dang ldan pas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar
16b1(mdo sde): 'drug ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lo lo'u nyes pa dang /rtson 'grus rtsom pa'i phan yon rnam pa du ma bka' stsal nas/tsan dan gyi dbyug gu zhig kyang de la byin te/khye'u dbyug ku
16b2(mdo sde): 'di rdungs shig ces bka' stsal to//de nas ngos dbyug gu de brdungs pa dang sgra snyan pa thos par gyur la rin po che'i gter sna tshogs kyang mthong //de nas 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma tsun
16b3(mdo sde): 'grus rtsom pa la ni khyad par chen po de lta bu yod kyis bdag gis phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bya gor ma chag snyam nas/des mnyan du yod par drim gyi sgra bsgrags te/bdag
16b4(mdo sde): nyid kyis ded dpon bye bar bsgrags nas rgya mtsho chen po la lan drug rgal te/gru'i don grub pas rin po che bsdus te/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi
16b5(mdo sde): nang du bshos gsol nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam brta'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u la lo can gyi rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud po dang /
16b6(mdo sde): las gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe/'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i zhal nas 'odadi zer sngon
16b7(mdo sde): bo dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba
17a1(mdo sde): yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bsdus 'joms dang /ngu 'dod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /mu
17a2(mdo sde): bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer dang /a tsu ther dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/tsha ba'i
17a3(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu dro bar gyur tA 'ba'o//de nas sems can de dag
17a4(mdo sde): gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to//de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye tso bdag cag 'di nas sho 'phos sam 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyamo/de nas
17a5(mdo sde): de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos
17a6(mdo sde): par ma gyur la/gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di yi mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to//snyamo//de
17a7(mdo sde): nas de dag sprul pa de la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zadade/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi
17b1(mdo sde): snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyuraro//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal tshon bzhi'i ris rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral
17b2(mdo sde): rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /cho nges
17b3(mdo sde): ba chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang /sprin
17b4(mdo sde): med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu che rnams dang /mi che rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /
17b5(mdo sde): 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogaso//tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed/ngas
17b6(mdo sde): par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis/sangs rgyas ra stan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis//gang zhig chos 'dul 'di
17b7(mdo sde): nyid la//bag yod spyod par byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur//zhes brjod par byed//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum
18a1(mdo sde): gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams skor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par
18a2(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snam log su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun yod su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//sems can dmyal bar
18a3(mdo sde): skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rnying par mi snang bar 'gyuraro//yi dag su skye
18a4(mdo sde): bor lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyuraro//mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyisu mi snang bar 'gyuraro//stobs kyi 'khor los
18a5(mdo sde): sbyar ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na no/phyag g.yas pa'i
18a6(mdo sde): mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/lte bar mi snang bar 'gyuraro//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang bar
18a7(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/smin mtshams kyi mdzod bur mi snang bar 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston
18b1(mdo sde): par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyang ngu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur
18b2(mdo sde): to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas/thal mi sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/chen sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can//mang de nul gyi sgonas byu ra gyur//de yis phyin
18b3(mdo sde): rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar bas dzi g+hor bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshigasu bcad gsol pa//rgod deng bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro ba
18b4(mdo sde): dag gi dram pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//pad+ma'i rtswa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags
18b5(mdo sde): nAn/dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams//thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog bstan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the tsam skyes pa bstsal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni
18b6(mdo sde): ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams sbyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston//gang gi don du dpa'i ba 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//do ni khyod las skye bo phal cher nyan par 'tshal//
18b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhi no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni
19a1(mdo sde): rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo khye'u le lo can 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lag so//kun
19a2(mdo sde): dga' bo khye'u le lo can 'das/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis/bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par
19a3(mdo sde): bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/snying rje chen pos yongasu bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byas nas/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa
19a4(mdo sde): bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stobs dang /brtson 'grus dang /mthu rtsal
19a5(mdo sde): dang shin tu ldan pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gabang la mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin//bcom ldan 'das
19a6(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsol nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'odas kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod///ded dpon zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas
19a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la/rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang //
19b1(mdo sde): lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla bar
19b2(mdo sde): byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/lho dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sad+ma
19b3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge
19b4(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa gzhan du yod pa na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs//de'i tshe gnyen du yod pa na ded dpon chen po zhig rgya ma
19b5(mdo sde): chen po'i nang du gru bub ste phyir 'ongs nas/des lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du lha thams cad lo gsol ba btab ste/rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs na/'on kyang gru bu'i ste phyir 'ong so///
19b6(mdo sde): de nas de mi dge' ba chen po skyes nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis thabs gang gis nor bsdu bar bya ba'i thabs ci yod sa mo//yang de 'di snyam du sems te/sangs rgyas bcom
19b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di ni lha thams cod las kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa/bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/thugs rje can/bdag nyid chen po/chos la gus pa/skye
20a1(mdo sde): dgu la mnyes gshin pa yin gyis/da ni bdag gis 'di la brten te/yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs la/gru'i don legs par grub ste/phyir 'ongs nas/
20a2(mdo sde): nor phyed kyis 'di la mchod pa bya'o snyamo//des de ltar brtson 'grus byas te/yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi mthus rin po che'i gling du phyin nas/rin po
20a3(mdo sde): che tshon po bsdus te bde ba dang /nye zho med par bdag gi khyim du phyin to//de ngas bso nas/snod bzlugs na/des rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas/chags pa chen po skyes
20a4(mdo sde): te/bdag gis rin po che 'di lta bu dag/dge slong go'u ta ma lo phyed ji ltar sprin snyam du sems pa la zhugs te/ma la bdag gis 'di rnams bdag gi chung ma'i lag tu zho'i bzhi ci
20a5(mdo sde): gcig tu btsongs la/bcom ldan 'das la smosaM dbul bar ba/gor ma chag snyam mo//des zho'i bzhi cha gcig gis a ka ru'i spos nyos nas/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du songango //
20a6(mdo sde): de nas shin tu ngo tsha bzhin du sgo gang du 'dug nas/a ka rus bdug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis bdug pa de steng gi na mkha' la yang dag par 'phrogs te/mnyan
20a7(mdo sde): du yod pa thams cad khyab par gyur nas/sprin chen po'i mgo ltar 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mdzad//des lha dang mi dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul
20b1(mdo sde): shin tu rmad du byung ba de mthong nas/dga' ba chen po skyes te/bdag gi sems la brgyad bkag nas/gang bdag gis rin po che'i sgo nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dasu ba 'di ni bdag gi
20b2(mdo sde): cha ma yin no zhes bya'o//des ded dpon des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshos la spyan drangaso//de nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas/
20b3(mdo sde): rin po che chen po dag gis gtor to//de nas rin po che de dag 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i stong gi nam
20b4(mdo sde): mkha' la 'phags nas/rin po che'i khang pa dang /khang pa brtsegs pa/rin po che'i rgyal mtshan can/mgar ba'am/mgar ba'i slob ma legs par lobs pas kyang byed mi nus pa de lta
20b5(mdo sde): bur gyur te 'dug/de nas ded dpon des cho 'phrul de mthong nas/ched kyis dga' ba skyes te/sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshol nas/sman
20b6(mdo sde): lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis/bdag 'jig rten long ba/'dren pa med cing yong su 'dren pa med pa/sims
20b7(mdo sde): can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /ma grol po rnams 'grol ba dang /dbugs ma byin pa rnams dbugs 'byon pa dang /yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongasu mya ngan
21a1(mdo sde): las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas gyur cig ces byas//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ded dpon de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /lus gcig nas gcig tu
21a2(mdo sde): brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad//'di ni sangs rgya so bcom ldan 'das rnams gadrug tshe/'dzum pa mdzod pa'i chos nyid de/de tshe zhal nas 'od zer ldan pa dang /ser
21a3(mdo sde): dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/sems can dmyal ba yang sos
21a4(mdo sde): dang /thig nag dang /bsdus 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /che ba dang /rab tu tshab dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu ngur rdol dang /so thams
21a5(mdo sde): thams dang /kyi hud zer dang /a tsu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin
21a6(mdo sde): pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dri bar gyur te 'ba'o//des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i'o khyad par rnams
21a7(mdo sde): rtse zhal bar gyur to//de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sa me 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyamo//de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/
21b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad/de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'bas par ma gyur la/gzhan du yang ma skyes
21b2(mdo sde): mod kyi/'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/bdag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snya mo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon pa ro dga'
21b3(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba deng nying mtshams 'dzin par
21b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//steng du 'gro ba grang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams
21b5(mdo sde): dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od rnams
21b6(mdo sde): dang /'odags pa rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang /sbyin med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu che rnams
21b7(mdo sde): dang /mi che rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug
22a1(mdo sde): bskul pa dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogaso//tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed/sa par 'byung bar brtsam par gyis//sangs rgyas
22a2(mdo sde): bstan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdug sde ni gzhom par gyis//gang zhig tshos 'dul 'di nyid la//bag yod spyod par byed pa ni//skye
22a3(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur//zhes brjod par byed//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamos
22a4(mdo sde): bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi sgram logasu
22a5(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyuraro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun log su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mtho
22a6(mdo sde): du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyuraro//yi dwag su skye bor lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang
22a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro//mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyi su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon
22b1(mdo sde): pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur//star skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/
22b2(mdo sde): bar mi snang bar 'gyuraro//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang por 'gyuraro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung sbyin por bzhid na ni/sprin mtshams
22b3(mdo sde): mdzod bur mi snang bar 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom
22b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos zil mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la
22b5(mdo sde): zhus pa/tshon sna stong gis spel po sna tshogs can//mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shor bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//
22b6(mdo sde): yang tshig su bcad gsol pa/rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis
22b7(mdo sde): par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams//thub pa khyu
23a1(mdo sde): mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bskul bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sa/
23a2(mdo sde): rgyas rnams gyin 'da' 'dzum mi ston//gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//de ni khyod las ske bo phal cher nyon par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
23a3(mdo sde): kun dga' bo de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi
23a4(mdo sde): mdzad do//kun dga' bo ded dpon 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lagaso//kun dga' bo ded dpon 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed
23a5(mdo sde): pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis/bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyim yang dag par bsgrubs par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/snying rje chen pos
23a6(mdo sde): yongasu bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byas nas/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres po'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /snying rje chen
23a7(mdo sde): po dang ldan pa'i yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog ces bya bar 'gyur te/'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur//de sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon
23b1(mdo sde): par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yino//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod//
23b2(mdo sde): zla ba zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded
23b3(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur
23b4(mdo sde): bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri ma byas/mchod pa byas te/lce dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod/
23b5(mdo sde): cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bzo' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes
23b6(mdo sde): pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de nas mnyan du yod pa na/tha ga
23b7(mdo sde): pa zla ba zhes bya ba dngul zhing mchog tu dbul ba zhig gnaso//de yong los ji tsam zhig byed pa de tsam nye tshe'i zan rnyid par zad/des cung zad kyang gzhag tu med//de nas de 'di snyam du
24a1(mdo sde): sems te/bdag ni 'jig rten pha rol nas kyang bsod nams ma byas par 'dir 'ongs pa/'dir yang dag pa mi byed pas/'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu yang bsod nams kyang /
24a2(mdo sde): ma byas/dge ba yang ma byas/'jigs shing skrag pa'i mgon skyabs kyang ma byas par 'gro dgos srid kyi/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la sna 'ga' zhig gis mchod par bya gor mcha snyam mo//
24a3(mdo sde): de nas des khyim bdag gzhan zhig gi ras btags nas/des de las ras kyi tshor tshar khyer te srang du zhugs so//bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dr-i sham thabs dang /chos gos gsol te/lhung zed
24a4(mdo sde): bsnams naso//mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so//de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byung bzang po brgyad
24a5(mdo sde): nus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' bra//rin po che'i rib 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
24a6(mdo sde): la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la phan gdags pa'i phyir nyid kyi chos gos ral bar bstan to//de nas des ras kyi tshar tshar de dag bcom ldan 'das la
24a7(mdo sde): phul lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de'i modo la ches gos drubs par bstan to//de nas do rgya tshor dga' ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/
24b1(mdo sde): sbyin pa chung la zhing ni rgya che ste//mthu chen khyod nyid thugs su chud par byas//sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis ni//bdag ni sgra cher grags pa'i sangs rgyas shog/sbyin pa 'di ni chung ngu lags kyis
24b2(mdo sde): kyang //bdag gi sems ni reb yangs dpag yas te//mi dang lha mchog rgyal bas bzhed na ni//sbyin pa chung yang 'bras bu chen por 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//khyod ni phyi
24b3(mdo sde): mar zhi ba mthu che ba//sgra chen grags pa mi dang lhas mchod pa//rang byung 'jig rten phan pa snying bcer ldan//tshar tshwar da ma zhes bya rgyal bar 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tha grI pa zla ba'i
24b4(mdo sde): rgyu cig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas//'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe/'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid
24b5(mdo sde): do/de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dag byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/sems
24b6(mdo sde): /can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bsdus 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so
24b7(mdo sde): thams thams dang /kyi hud zer dang /a nu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma lta rigs pa dang /pad+ma g+har gas pa chen por song nas/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag
25a1(mdo sde): tu ni bsil bar gyur te/'bab bo//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te/'bab bo//des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par
25a2(mdo sde): rnams rtse zhal bar gyur to//de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag 'od nas shi 'phos sam/'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo//de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom
25a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/gzhan du yang ma skyes maud kyi/'on
25a4(mdo sde): kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtsi zhil bar gyur to snyam mo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur
25a5(mdo sde): nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyuraro//stong du 'gro ba
25a6(mdo sde): gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal tshon bzhi yi ris rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
25a7(mdo sde): rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang /dge
25b1(mdo sde): chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang /sprin mod rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu che rnams dang /mche ba rnams dang /mo gdung rnams dang /
25b2(mdo sde): nenom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogs so//tshigasu bcad
25b3(mdo sde): pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de//nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis//sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis//gang
25b4(mdo sde): zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la//bag yod spyod par byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur//zhes brjod par byed do//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum
25b5(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan
25b6(mdo sde): 'das kyi snam log su mi snang bar 'gyu ro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bdun logasu mi snang bar 'gyur ro//sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni//zhabs
25b7(mdo sde): kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyuraro//yi dag su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni//zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar
26a1(mdo sde): 'gyur//mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyi su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil
26a2(mdo sde): du mi snang bar 'gyu ro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/lto bar mi snang bar 'gyuraro//
26a3(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyuro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/smon 'tshams kyi mdzod dur mi snang bar 'gyu ro//bla na med pa
26a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan
26a5(mdo sde): 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can//mang po zhal
26a6(mdo sde): gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs nas kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshigasu bcad de gsol pa//rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes
26a7(mdo sde): spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis
26b1(mdo sde): dus drab mkhyen lags na//dge slong rgyu la dbyung nyan pa so ma tshul ba rnams//thub pa sgra chog gan gsung mchog gartan pa dang //nga po dag gi sa b+h+yotsom skyes pa stsal bar gsol//rgyu ma
26b2(mdo sde): dang ni ri rgyalo lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'da' 'dzum mo ston//gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//de ni khyod las skye bo phal cher nyan par 'tshal//
26b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med
26b4(mdo sde): rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo thag pa zla ba 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lag so//kun dga' bo thag pa zla ba 'di'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
26b5(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis/bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/snying rje chen pos
26b6(mdo sde): yongasu bzlas pa'i pha rol tu phyin po drug yongasu rdzogs par byas nas/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum dang /snying rje chen po ldan pa'i
26b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas cher tshar bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no//
27a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstong ngo //
27a2(mdo sde): che ba zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /dang
27a3(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /nA mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
27a4(mdo sde): bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri ma byas/mchod par byos te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams
27a5(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /srung gsos dang /sman zong rnams
27a6(mdo sde): brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/rgyal bu myab byed kyi tshal/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na
27a7(mdo sde): tshong dpon gyi bu che ba zhes bya ba zhig gnaso//de yang khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa las che ba dag ste/rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug la mchod pa byed do//de phyis nang tshabs chen po zhig
27b1(mdo sde): gis thabs te/de snyan pa dang /sman dang /nad g.yog med nga /shi la thug nas 'di snyam du bsams te/da ni bdag sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i skyabs byed pa/srog phangs pa sbyin par byed
27b2(mdo sde): pa/sangs rgyas ma yin pa gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo//de nas de ltar bsams nas/bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'deb so//de'i skabasu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni
27b3(mdo sde): mi mkhyen pa 'am/mi gzigs pa 'am/mi rtogs pa 'am/thugasu mi chud pa ci yang med la/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la
27b4(mdo sde): zhugs pa/srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/gcig tu dpa' ba/zla med pa/gnyi su mi gsung ba/zhi gnas dang lha mthong la gnas pa/rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/bslab pa gsum la
27b5(mdo sde): legs par bslabs pa/'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/chu bo bzhi las rgyal ba/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun
27b6(mdo sde): ring nas 'dris par byas pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/khyu mchog gi yang dag po'i seng gi'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa 'gro ba lnga las yang
27b7(mdo sde): dag par 'das pa yan lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs pa/rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/
28a1(mdo sde): lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/
28a2(mdo sde): brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas kyang /ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/su
28a3(mdo sde): ni der/su ni phongs shing 'dug/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/su ni gnod pa dang ldan/su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/su na ngan song du gzhol/su ni ngan song du bab/su
28a4(mdo sde): ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/mtho ris dang /thar pa dang /'bras bu la gzhag par bya/su ni 'dod pa'i 'jam du bying pa las lag nas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las
28a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongasu smin par
28a6(mdo sde): bya/su ni yongasu smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug/'dir smos pa/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid//
28a7(mdo sde): gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu che ba'i gnas skabs de gzigs nas/'od zer gser gyi
28b1(mdo sde): kha dog can/nyi ma stong gi 'ong pas lhag pa dag bkye ste/de dag gis khyim de kun tu snang bar byas so//bskal pa stong du yongasu bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od zer dag kyang bkye ste/de dag gas
28b2(mdo sde): de'i lus la phag ma thag tu rab tu sim par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i sgo khang du gshegs nas/ske srungs kyi mos bcom ldan 'das sgron bzhug so zhes de la sman to//de nas
28b3(mdo sde): tshong dpon gyi bu che ba dga' bar gyur te/dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs phyin par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa leg so//bcom ldan 'das nang du gshegasu gsol/bcom ldan 'das
28b4(mdo sde): kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshalo zhes gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das nang du gshegs nas/gdan bshams pa la bzhug so//bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis tsha ba la bka' stsal pa
28b5(mdo sde): tsha ba khyod la gnod pa ci zhig yod//che bas gsol ba/bdag la lus kyi gnod pa dang /sems kyi gnod pa mchis so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la sems can thams cad la
28b6(mdo sde): byams pa'i shad mas ngag bstan te/'di ni khyod kyi sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi gnyen po yin no zhes bka' stsal to//de nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed de/kye ma lha'i dbang po brgya byin
28b7(mdo sde): gyis re spos kyi ngad ldang las sman sha rare ke khyer te 'ongs na legs snyam du dgongs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyed pa'i mod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ro spos kyi ngad ldang 'os
29a1(mdo sde): sman shi ri ka blangs te/bcom ldan 'das la phul lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang nyid kyi phyag tu bzhes nas che ba la byin te/'di ni khyod kyi lus kyi sdug bsngal chab
29a2(mdo sde): zhi bar byed pa yin no zhes bka' stsal to//de nas des lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa'i bde ba thob nas/bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur to//sems dga' bar gyur nas/
29a3(mdo sde): rgyal po gsal rgyal la bsnyad de/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol nas/'bum ri ba'i na bza' phul te/me tog dang /spos dang /me tog 'phreng thams
29a4(mdo sde): cad kyis kyang mchod pa byas so//de nas sems la rtas par byas te/smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtang ba 'dis ji ltar
29a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal pos bdag gsos pa bzhin du bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med par sems can ma rgol ba rnams sgrol ba dang /ma
29a6(mdo sde): grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams 'byin pa dang /yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyasu gyur cig ces byas so//de nas bcom
29a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis che ba'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i tshe zhal
29b1(mdo sde): nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag na sems can dmyal ba
29b2(mdo sde): yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bsdus 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams
29b3(mdo sde): dang /kyi hud zer dang /a cu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu bsil bar
29b4(mdo sde): gyur te 'bab bo//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar 'bab bo//de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil por 'gyur ro//de nas de dag 'di snyam du
29b5(mdo sde): sems te/kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo//de nas de dag dang pa skyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa dgyed par mdzad de/de dag gis sprul
29b6(mdo sde): pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'ophos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyed mod kyi/'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di yi mthus bdag
29b7(mdo sde): cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las da zad de//
30a1(mdo sde): lha dang /mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba de nyid mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dang ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
30a2(mdo sde): rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs
30a3(mdo sde): pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang /dge rgyas
30a4(mdo sde): rnams dang /sprin med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu che rnams dang /mi che rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /
30a5(mdo sde): 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog so//tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/nges par 'byung ba
30a6(mdo sde): brtsam par gyis//sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la blang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sngon gzhom par gyis//gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la//bag yod spyod par
30a7(mdo sde): byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur//zhes rjod par byed do//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
30b1(mdo sde): bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam log su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//ma
30b2(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun log su mi snang bar 'gyur//sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//dud 'gror
30b3(mdo sde): skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyuraro//yi dag su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyuraro//mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed
30b4(mdo sde): na ni/pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur//stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil tu mi snang bar 'gyuraro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
30b5(mdo sde): por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed ni ni/lte bar mi snang bar 'gyuraro/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed
30b6(mdo sde): na ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
30b7(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor
31a1(mdo sde): du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar t+na/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/tshon sna stong gis sbrel pa sna tshogs can//mang po zhal
31a2(mdo sde): gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshig su bcad de gsol pa//rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang
31a3(mdo sde): mi dgyes spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyu lnga bdagra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis pa//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtan
31a4(mdo sde): pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyen par som nyi 'tshal ba rnams//thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the
31a5(mdo sde): tsom skyes pa gsal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ro rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'dra' 'dzum mi ston//gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa
31a6(mdo sde): ston mdzad pa//de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyen par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dgra'o de bzhin
31a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra btsom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo khyim bdag gi bu che ba 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i//
31b1(mdo sde): bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lagaso//kun dga' bo khyim bdag gi bu che ba 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba
31b2(mdo sde): 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/snying rje chen pos yongasu bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yangasu rdzogs
31b3(mdo sde): par byas nas/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /mi 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
31b4(mdo sde): thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang de la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
31b5(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la mngon par bstod do////pad+ma zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
31b6(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dben rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang //lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang //
31b7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur ngasti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod
33a1(mdo sde): pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
33a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ni bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
33a3(mdo sde): dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du ma byung ba'i snga rol na ni rgyal po
33a4(mdo sde): gsal rgyal lha gzhan dag la dus gsum du me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa rnams kyis rjed par byed do//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du
33a5(mdo sde): byung nas ni/gzhon nu lta ba'i mdo'i dpas rgyal po gsal rgyal btul nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/de'i tshe dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas/dus gsum
33a6(mdo sde): du bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du 'gro zhing mar me dang /gdug pa dang /me tog dang /spros dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa rnams kyis mchod pa byed do//de nas re shig na kun dga' ra ba'i
33a7(mdo sde): srungs ma zhig gis me tog pad+ma gsar du byung ba zhig khyer te/rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi thad du mnyan du yod par song ba dang /mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen zhig gis mthong nas/kye mi pha 'i
33b1(mdo sde): pad+ma'o ni 'tshong ngam zhes dris so//de na rwa 'tsho ngo zhes zer ro//de nyo 'dod pa las re shig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin der phyin te/des de las rin nyis sbyar du bskyed nas/de gnyis
