33b2(mdo sde): phapani chun snod de 'bum 'gyur gyi bar du bskyed do//de nas kun dka' ra ba'i srungs ma 'di snyam du sems te/khyim bdag mgon mod zos sbyin 'di ni rgod bag can ma yin te/sems can
33b3(mdo sde): brtan po yin pas na/'di la ni don zhig yod bor ma chag snyam nas/de the tsom skyes te/mu stegs can la dga' ba'i mi la dris pa/khyod kyis su'i don du 'di ltar skyed par byed/des smras
33b4(mdo sde): pa/nga ni bcom ldan 'das sred med kyi bu'i phyir skyid par byed do//mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/da ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi don tu skyed par byed do//kun dga' ra ba'i srungs
33b5(mdo sde): mas smras pa/sangs rgyas shes bya ba de su yin/de nas mgon med zas sbyin gyis de la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgyas par byed do//de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung sems/mgon med
33b6(mdo sde): zas sbyin la smras pa/khyim bdag nga nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das de la mchod par bya'o//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zla sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma do khrid de/bcom ldan
33b7(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der song nas/kun dga' ra ba'i srungs me des/bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad
34a1(mdo sde): nus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma sbyong pas lhag pa'i 'odu mnga' ba/rin pa che 'ar bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/mthong ma
34a2(mdo sde): thag tu kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma ngos pad+ma de bcom ldan 'das la bor ro//de nas bor ma thag tu pad+ma de shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi steng na 'dug/de nas
34a3(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des cho 'phruli de mthong nas/sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyas 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/sems la rtas par byas
34a4(mdo sde): nas smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis/bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa mod cing yongasu 'dron pa med par
34a5(mdo sde): sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongasu mya ngan
34a6(mdo sde): las 'da' ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma de rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /lhagacig na gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen
34a7(mdo sde): nas 'dzums mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar
34b1(mdo sde): po rnams byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bsdus 'joms dang /
34b2(mdo sde): 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi cud zer dang /anu zer dang /ud pa la ltar
34b3(mdo sde): gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gus pa chen por song nas/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab po//brang ba'i sems cad dmyal
34b4(mdo sde): ba brang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo//de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar 'gyuraro//de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag 'di na
34b5(mdo sde): shi 'phos sam/'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo//de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du
34b6(mdo sde): sems te/kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shrI 'phros par ma gyur la/gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/'on kyang sngon mi byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di yi mthus/bdag cag gi gnod pa'i
34b7(mdo sde): khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/lha dang mi rnams
35a1(mdo sde): kyi nang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /
35a2(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /
35a3(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med
35a4(mdo sde): dge rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang /sprin med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu che rnams dang /mi che rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang
35a5(mdo sde): rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog so//tshigasu bcid
35a6(mdo sde): pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis//sangs rgyas bston la sbyor bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'tsho bdag sde ni gzhom par
35a7(mdo sde): gyis//gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la//bag yod spyod par byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor po rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes rjod par byed do//de
35b1(mdo sde): nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las
35b2(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snam log su mi snang bar 'gyur ro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun logasu mi snang bar 'gyur ro//sems can dmyal bar skye
35b3(mdo sde): bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro//yi dwag su skye bar lung ston par bzhod
35b4(mdo sde): na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyuraro//mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed
35b5(mdo sde): na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil ru mi snang bar 'gyur ro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhad na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//lhar skye bar lung ston
35b6(mdo sde): par bzhod na ni/lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyu ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/smin
35b7(mdo sde): mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyu ro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis
36a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dag 'os thal mo
36a2(mdo sde): sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/tshon sna stong gi spel ba sna tshogs can//mang po zhal gyi sgro nas byung ba gyur//de yis phyogs nas kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar
36a3(mdo sde): bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshig su bcad de gsol ba//rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yis//sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//
36a4(mdo sde): rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan
36a5(mdo sde): pa sos nyi 'chal ba rnams//thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the tshom skyes pa bsngal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgya lo lta bur brtan pa
36a6(mdo sde): yi/mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin 'dur 'jum mi ston//gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/de ni khyod las skye bo phal cher nyan par 'tshal//bcom
36a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bod ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
36b1(mdo sde): nirgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i sbyangs ma 'das nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lags//kun dga'
36b2(mdo sde): bo kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par
36b3(mdo sde): bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/snying rje chen pos yongasu bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par byas nas/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i
36b4(mdo sde): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de'i sbyin par
36b5(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos ni gang du la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'dra yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis
36b6(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////pan tsa li zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho
36b7(mdo sde): brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams
37a1(mdo sde): dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bstir byas/bla mar byas//rim byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin
37a2(mdo sde): dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza'o dang /zhal zas dang //
37a3(mdo sde): gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas
37a4(mdo sde): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs//de'i tshe byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po lho phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po dang mi mthun par gyur to//de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal/bcom
37a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das
37a6(mdo sde): lako sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni chos kyi rgyal po bla na med pa sems can phongs pa rnams la yosu skyob pa/phan tshun
37a7(mdo sde): mkhon pa rnams kyi kho na byang bar mdzad pa lags na/byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po 'di/lho phyogs kyi pan tsa li'i rgyal po dang mi mthun te/de gnyis phan tshun du skye bo mang po kha 'deg
37b1(mdo sde): par bgyid na/bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du de gnyis yun ring po nas kho na byung ba zhi bar mdzad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
37b2(mdo sde): rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
37b3(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas stan las langs te song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i phyir nyin gyi snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/lhung zad bsnams nas/bA ra
37b4(mdo sde): na si phyogs kyi ka shi rnams kyi grong rdal gA la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te/mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshesas pa dang /bA ra na sir byon nas/bA ra na si na drang srong smra ba'i ri rigs kyi nags na
37b5(mdo sde): bzhug so//de nas re shig na de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi yul du gshegs par rig go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi/rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis dpung gi tshogs
37b6(mdo sde): yan lag bzhi pa sprul nas/byang phyogs pa na tsa la'i rgyal po skrag cing bred nas shing rta gcig zhon te/bcom ldan 'das kyi thed du song nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la kho na 'byang
37b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan to//des chos de thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad tu rab tu byung ste/des brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te//dgra
38a1(mdo sde): bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//lha phyogs kyi ban tsa la'i rgyal pos kyu bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du
38a2(mdo sde): spyan drangs te/zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas/'bum ri ba'i na bza' yang phul te smon lam bteb pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya bar
38a3(mdo sde): chos yong su gtong ba 'dis/bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yong su 'dren pa med pa sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /ma grol ba rnams 'grel bu dang /
38a4(mdo sde): dbugs mi phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so//de nas bcom ldan
38a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis lho phyogs kyi pan tsa lnga'i rgyal po de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas
38a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i tshe zhal nus 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas/kha cig ni
38a7(mdo sde): 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bsdus 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /
38b1(mdo sde): ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kye hud zer dang /a rbu zer dang /ud pa la
38b2(mdo sde): ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'babo//grang ba'i sems can dmyal
38b3(mdo sde): bgang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo//des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to//de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag 'od nas
38b4(mdo sde): shi 'phos sam/'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo//de nas de dag dad pa bskyes pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad do//de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam
38b5(mdo sde): du sems te/kye bdag cag ni 'od nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i
38b6(mdo sde): khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyalnga ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/lha dang mi rnams kyi
38b7(mdo sde): nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyuraro//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa
39a1(mdo sde): rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i
39a2(mdo sde): mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang //dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang /dge
39a3(mdo sde): rgyas rnams dang /sprin med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu che rnams dang /mi che rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang //
39a4(mdo sde): 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog so//tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de//nges par 'byung
39a5(mdo sde): pa brtsam par gyis//sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis/'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis//gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la//ngag yod
39a6(mdo sde): spyod par byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes brjod par byed do//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
39a7(mdo sde): khams bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis/'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logasum
39b1(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun logasu mi snang bar 'gyuraro//sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang
39b2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur//yi dag su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bong mi snang bar 'gyur//
39b3(mdo sde): skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyi su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//'khor
39b4(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/lte bar mi snang bar 'gyuraro//nyan thos kyi byang
39b5(mdo sde): chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar 'gyur//bla na med pa yang dag
39b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mo snang bar 'gyur//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan
39b7(mdo sde): 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/tshon sde stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can//mang
40a1(mdo sde): zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshig su bcad de gsol pa/rgod dang
40a2(mdo sde): bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spang ba yi//sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi
40a3(mdo sde): ston//brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams//thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po
40a4(mdo sde): dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams byin 'da' 'dzum mi ston//gang gi don du dpa'atha
40a5(mdo sde): 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de
40a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo pan tsa la'i rgyal po 'dis/nga la 'di lta bu'i
40a7(mdo sde): bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lag so//kun dga' bo pan tsa la'i rgyal po 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis/
40b1(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/snying rje chen pos yongasu bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byas nas/
40b2(mdo sde): stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos mchog ces bya bar
40b3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
40b4(mdo sde): dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////bdug pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /
40b5(mdo sde): blon po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma
40b6(mdo sde): yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dong /klu dang /gnod sbyin
40b7(mdo sde): dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'bye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza'o dang
41a1(mdo sde): zhal zas dang /gzims rgyu dang /gdan dang /snyun ga pa rnams nyes bya/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yang ban/
41a2(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/tshong dpon gnyis phan tshun mi mthun par gyur te/de gnyis las gcig/
41a3(mdo sde): ni rdzogs byed la dang /gcig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad do//de nas de gnyis phan tshun gtam du bya ba nges par byed de/rdzogs byed kyi dge bsnyen na re/sangs rgyas
41a4(mdo sde): pas chos rdzogs byed khyad par du 'phagaso zhes zer ro//sangs rgyas kyi dge bsnyen na re/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ches khyad par du 'phagaso zhes
41a5(mdo sde): zer ro//de nas de gnyis kyis 'dog pa thams cad yal bar bya ba'i sngags kyi gta' bzhag go//de nas re shig na rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas blon po rnams la de gnyis
41a6(mdo sde): kyide sbyong shig ces bsgo'o//de nas blon po de dag gis yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te/de ste zhag bdun na/sangs rgyas dang /mu stags can gyi dge bsnyen gnyis kyi sbyang bar
41a7(mdo sde): tshad kyis/su rmad du byung ba lta 'dod pa de dag gshegs shig/ces so//de nas zhag bdun lon pa na/sa phyogs go skabs yangs pa zhig tu mi 'bum phrag du ma 'dus po dang /
41b1(mdo sde): namakha' la lha 'bum phrag du ma 'dus pa'i nang du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/spos dang /me tog 'phreng thams cad bsdogs pa la/thog ma kho nar mu stegs can gyi dgra
41b2(mdo sde): bsnyen gyis/bden pas gsol ba gdab pa byas te/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug mchog yin pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des na/me tog
41b3(mdo sde): 'di dag dang bdug pa 'di dang chu 'di de rnams kyi thang du song shig ces byas so//de skad ces brjod pa'i mod la me tog de dag ni sa la lhag so//me ni shi'o//chu ni sa la thim zhing yongasu zad
41b4(mdo sde): de/yongasu gtugs par gyur to//de nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis ca co dang /gA zha bton te/skad po che phyung ngo //de nas mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen gyis de mthong nas/cang mi zer bar
41b5(mdo sde): 'dug la dpa' gong zhing phrag po bcu ma ste/mig phab nas/spobs pa med par gyur te/sems kho su chud la lag pa la skom tshugs bcad nas 'khums shing 'dug/de nas bcom ldan
41b6(mdo sde): 'das kyi slob ma dga' ches nas/dga' zhing mdangs phyung ba'i mig dang ldan pas/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs nas/bden pas gsol
41b7(mdo sde): gdab pa byas te/bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig gang gis/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi mchog yin pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des na/me tog 'di dag dang /bdug pa
42a1(mdo sde): 'di dang /chu 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi tha dad du song shig ces byas so//de skad ces brjod pa'i mod la me tog de dag ni ngang pa rgyus pa bzhin du na mkha' la 'phags
42a2(mdo sde): nus/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal log su kha ltas te song ngo //bdug pa ni sbyin gyi mdog lta bur gyur to//chu ni bai DUr+ya'i sdong bu lta bur gyur to//des skye ba'i tshogs phal po che de dag gis
42a3(mdo sde): cho 'phrul de mthong nas/ca co dang gzha bton te skad po che phyung nas de dag song ba'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ste dong ngo //de nas me tog de dag ni bcom ldan 'odas kyi steng na 'dug go//bdug pa
42a4(mdo sde): dbyang chu ni sbyin sngun 'dug go//de nas skye bo phul po che de dag dga' bar gyur te/prad+d+hom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khong
42a5(mdo sde): do//bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la mdo 'di bka' stsal to//bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams 'di gsum ni mchog tu gdags pa yin te/gsum gang zhe no//sangs
42a6(mdo sde): rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang /chos mchog tu gdags pa dang /dge 'dun mtshan tu gdogs pa'o//sas rgyas mnog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/bram ze dang /khyim
42a7(mdo sde): bdag rnams sems can rkang med rnams sam/rkang gnyis rnams sam/rgyur pa'i rnams sam/ga rgyal rnams sam/gzugs can rnams sam/gzugs can ma yin pa rnam
42b1(mdo sde): sam/'du shes can rnams sam/'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam/'du shes yod pa yang ma yin/'du shes med pa yin pa gang rung ste/de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
42b2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par bstan to//sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/
42b3(mdo sde): mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du lhar gyur pa rnams sam/mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' shig tu
42b4(mdo sde): 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams 'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o//chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos
42b5(mdo sde): rnams gang yang rung ste/de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin par bstan to//chos la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung bla de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te//
42b6(mdo sde): mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du ltar gyur pa rnams sam/mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' shig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya
42b7(mdo sde): ste/bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams 'di ni chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o//dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/'dus pa'am/tshogs sam/mang po 'am/'khor gang yang
43a1(mdo sde): rung ste/de dag gi nang na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog yin par bstan to//dge 'dun la mngon par dga' du su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog
43a2(mdo sde): la mngon par dga' ba yin te/mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du ltar gyur pa rnams sam/mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi
43a3(mdo sde): mchog 'ba' shig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di ni dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/bram ze dang //
43a4(mdo sde): khyim bdag de dag gi nang nas/kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun rnams la dad pa rnyed do//kha cig gis ni skyab su 'gro ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi blangaso//kha
43a5(mdo sde): cig gis ni rab tu byung nas po la mig lnga dang ldan pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig ste/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par
43a6(mdo sde): 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can du rtsad chod nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byas so//mu stegs can gyi ngage bsnyen des
43a7(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das la dad pa rnyed do//de nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin
43b1(mdo sde): par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba 'dron pa med cing yongasu 'dren pa med pa sems can mA rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /ma grol ba rnams 'grel pa dang /
43b2(mdo sde): dbugs ma byin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas//de nas bcom ldan 'das
43b3(mdo sde): kyis mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
43b4(mdo sde): 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid do//de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//
43b5(mdo sde): kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bsdus 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /
43b6(mdo sde): tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zir dang /a cu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /
43b7(mdo sde): pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'ba'o//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba
44a1(mdo sde): gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab po//des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar 'gyuro//de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems
44a2(mdo sde): te/kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam//'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo//de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad do//de dag
44a3(mdo sde): gis sprul pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems te/kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can
44a4(mdo sde): snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba
44a5(mdo sde): myong bar gyur pa'i las de zad de/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par gyur to//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa
44a6(mdo sde): de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul
44a7(mdo sde): dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od rnams dang //
44b1(mdo sde): 'od gsal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang /sprin med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu che rnams dang /mchi
44b2(mdo sde): rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag
44b3(mdo sde): med pa'i sgra sgrogaso//tshigasu bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de//nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis//sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//
44b4(mdo sde): 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis//gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la//bag yod spyod par byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes rjod
44b5(mdo sde): par byed do//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis
44b6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snum log su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun log su mi snang bar 'gyu ro//sems
44b7(mdo sde): can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyuraro//yi dag su
45a1(mdo sde): skye bar lung ston par bzhad na ni/zhabs kyi mtho bar mI snang bar 'gyur//mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyis mi snang bar 'gyur//stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur/
45a2(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur
45a3(mdo sde): ro//lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston
45a4(mdo sde): bapar bzhed na ni/smin mtshams kyi mdzod bur mi snang bar 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur//de nas
45a5(mdo sde): 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom
45a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la zhus pa/tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can//mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa
45a7(mdo sde): bzhin//yang tshig su bcad de gsol ba//rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro bdag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma
45b1(mdo sde): mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan bsom nyi 'tshal ba rnams//thub pa khyu mchog
45b2(mdo sde): gis ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag gi the tsom skyes pa bskul bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin 'dra'i 'dzum mi
45b3(mdo sde): ston//gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/
45b4(mdo sde): kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen 'dis nga la
45b5(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lag so//kun dga' bo mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong
45b6(mdo sde): bapa 'dis/bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/snying rje chen pos yongasu bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par
45b7(mdo sde): byas nas/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi g.yo ba zhes bya
46a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur//de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
46a2(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////rgyal po zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal
46a3(mdo sde): po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho blang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /dod dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin
46a4(mdo sde): narnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mI 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lho dang /
46a5(mdo sde): klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang
46a6(mdo sde): ldan pa na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/rgyal bu
46a7(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rang na bzhugaso//de'i tshe kaM sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /rgyal po ma skyes dgra gnyis phan tshun mi mthun par gyur
46b1(mdo sde): to/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/glang po che'i tshogs dang /rta'i tshogs dang /shing rta'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/ko sa la
46b2(mdo sde): rgyal po gsal rgyal dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangaso//ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang /rgyal po ma skyes dbras dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /rta'i
46b3(mdo sde): tshogs dang /shing rta'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas/bdag dang kayul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangs zhes thos so//thos nas des kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang
46b4(mdo sde): po che'i tshogs dang /rta pa'i tshogs dang /shing rta'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nus/rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drang mo//de nas rgyal po ma skyes
46b5(mdo sde): dgras/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi glang po che'i tshogs dang /rta pa'i tshogs dang /shing rta'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs thams cad phrogs te/ko sa la'i rgyal po gosal
46b6(mdo sde): rgyal pham zhing skrag la rdugs te/rab tu pham zhing rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur nas/shing rta gcig pus mnyan du yod par song ste/lan gsum gyi bar du yang de ltar gyur to//de nas ko sa
46b7(mdo sde): la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas/log pa la skom tshugs bcas te/sems khongasu chud cing 'dug go/de nas mnyan du yod pa de na tshangad dpon phyug cing nor mang la
47a1(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba/yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam zas kyi bu'i nar dang ldan pa/rnam thas kyi bu'i nar dang 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa des/ko sa la'i rgyal
47a2(mdo sde): bo gsal rgyal ji ltar pham zhing skrag la rdugs te/rab tu pham zhing rgya kyis phyogs par gyur nas/shing rta gcig pus mnyan du yod par song ngo zhes thos so//thos nas kyang kos
47a3(mdo sde): la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin pas/rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal bar gyur cig/sku tshe ring bar shog shig ces bstod nas/smras pa/lha ci'i slad du thugs
47a4(mdo sde): ngan mdzad/lha bdag gis ci tsam gyis na da dung yang lha ji ltar dgyes dgur mdzad par 'gyur ba de tsam gyi gser lha la 'bul bar 'tsha lo zhes byis sa//des de la gser
47a5(mdo sde): phung po chen po sbyangs te/der mi 'dug pas kyang mi 'greng pa mi mthong la/'greng bas kyang 'dug pa mi mthong ba zhig phul lo//de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bdag
47a6(mdo sde): nyid kyi yul du rtag chen gyi mi kun tu bkye ste/mi de dag ci zer ba nyon cig ces byas so//re shig na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na/dran po gnyis shig phan tshun gtam zer te/
47a7(mdo sde): pad+ma'i za ba zhes bya ba'i yul gyi dgra thabs yod de/de la mi sngar ma gang yin pa de dag ni g.yul gyi gdong zan du gtong ngo //'bring gang yin pa de dag ni bar tu gzhog go/rma
47b1(mdo sde): mchog tu dpa' ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyab du gzhog go zhes zer ro//de nas de dag gis rgyal po la bskyed de/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas/de bzhin du dpung po
47b2(mdo sde): tshegs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas/rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangaso//de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgro'i
47b3(mdo sde): glang po che'i tshogs thams cad kyang phrogs/rta pa'i tshogs dang /shing rta'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs kyang phrog so//lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang pham
47b4(mdo sde): zhing skrag la rdugs te/rab tu pham zhing rgyab kyis ltas par gyur nas/gson por bzung ste/shing rta gcig la bskyon nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nos/bcom ldan
47b5(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces
47b6(mdo sde): gsol to//btsun pa rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di ni yun ring po nas bdag gi kho na zla ma lags par khon du 'dzin pa dang /dgra zla ma lags par dgra bgyid pa la lags mod kyi/'di ni
47b7(mdo sde): bdag gi grogs po'i bu lags pa'i slad du/bdag ni 'di dgum par mi 'tshal te 'di gtang bar 'tshalo zhes gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rgyal po chen po thod shig/
48a1(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal nas/de'i tshe tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal pa/rgyal bar gyur na khon pa mang //pham par gyur na sdug bsngal gnas//rgyal dang pham pa
48a2(mdo sde): spangs na ni//nye bar zhi ste bde bar gnas//de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis rgyal srid thob pa 'di ni/tshong dpon 'di'i drin yin gyis
48a3(mdo sde): bdag gis 'di la ci 'dod pa'i bya dga' sbyin pa'i skabs dbye'o snyam mo//de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis tshong dpon de la ci 'dod pa'i bya dga' sbyin pa'i skabs phye na/
48a4(mdo sde): deni re bdag ci dga' ba'i bya dga' 'tshal gyis/bdag zhag bdun gyi bar du ci dga' dgur bgyid pa'i rgyal srid stsol cig ces byaso//de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bdag
48a5(mdo sde): gi yul thams du dril bsgrags te/nga'i rgyal srid zhag bdun gyi bar du tshong dpon la byin no zhes bsgo'o//re shig na tshong dpon des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
48a6(mdo sde): rnams dang /rgyal po gsal rgyal 'khor dang bcas pa zhag bdun gyi bar du gdugs tshod la spyan drangaso//yul ko shi dang /ko sa lan skye bo'i tshogs ji snyed 'khod pa de dag la
48a7(mdo sde): yang pho nya btang ste/zhag bdun gyi bar du khyed khral thud med par ci dga' dgur 'khod cig/bde ba la reg par gnas par gyis shig/'odir yang shes la/sangs rgyas dang /
48b1(mdo sde): chos dang dge 'dun la skyabasu song shig/nga'i ston mo yang tshol la/de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur gyis shig ces byas nas/des zhag bdun gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das
48b2(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dong bcas pa la bkur bsti chen pos bkur bsti byas so//mi 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bde ba la bcud do//zhag bdun lon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
48b3(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/sems la rtas par byas nas smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis/bdag 'jig
48b4(mdo sde): rten long ba 'dren pa med cing yongasu 'dren pa med par sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /dbugs mi phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /
48b5(mdo sde): yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las zlo ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyad
48b6(mdo sde): pa dang /las gcig pas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i tshe
48b7(mdo sde): zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni
49a1(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba yang ses dang /thig nag dang /bsdus 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar
49a2(mdo sde): med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer dang /a tsu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por
49a3(mdo sde): song nas/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab po//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo//des na sems
49a4(mdo sde): can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to//de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo//de
49a5(mdo sde): nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par
49a6(mdo sde): ma gyur la/gzhan du'ang ma skyes mod kyi/'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to//de nas de dag sprul
49a7(mdo sde): pa la sems mngon par dga'o bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung ba der nying mtshams
49b1(mdo sde): 'dzin par 'gyuraro//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab gral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga'
49b2(mdo sde): rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun pa rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od rnams dang //
49b3(mdo sde): 'od gsal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang /sprin med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu che rnams dang /mi che
49b4(mdo sde): rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/mo rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang bdag
49b5(mdo sde): med pa'i sgra sgrog so//tshigasu bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis//sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin///
49b6(mdo sde): 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis//gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la//bag yang spyod par byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes
49b7(mdo sde): brjod par byed do//de nas 'od zer de dag gis/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig stan gyi khams bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/gal te bcom ldan 'das
50a1(mdo sde): kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhin ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snam log su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun ldogs
50a2(mdo sde): su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//sems can dmyal bar skye ba re lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi
50a3(mdo sde): rtong par mi snang bar 'gyuraro//yi dag su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyuraro//mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyisu mi snang
50a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro//stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par
50a5(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni//
50a6(mdo sde): zhal du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/smin 'tshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
50a7(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan
50b1(mdo sde): 'dus kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ngos thul mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs cadra//mang
50b2(mdo sde): po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshigasu bcad de gsol pa//rgod dang bral zhing rgyags
50b3(mdo sde): dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//bstan pos nyid
50b4(mdo sde): kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams//thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal
50b5(mdo sde): bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyen 'da' 'dzum mi ston//gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//doni khyod las skye
50b6(mdo sde): bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
50b7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas
51a1(mdo sde): pa dang /skya bo phal po che dge ba la btsud pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lag so//kun dga' ba chang dpon 'di dag pa'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par du
51a2(mdo sde): ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/snying rje chen ngos yongasu bsgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin
51a3(mdo sde): pa drug yong su rdzogs par byas nas/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzag pa gsum dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
51a4(mdo sde): rgyas mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya bar 'gyur te/'jig rten du 'byung dar 'gyuraro//de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin//bcom ldan 'das kyis
51a5(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsol nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs parjod pa brgya pa
51a6(mdo sde): las//sdom gyi tshig su bcad pa dang po rdugs s+ho///sdom ni mnyan pa dang ni ka pa khrus//yams kyi nad dang cho 'phrul dang //lo lnga pa dang bstod mchog sbyin//kau shi
51a7(mdo sde): ka dang lha yi zas//mnyan pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong
51b1(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen pa
51b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis bkur bste byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams
51b3(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams
51b4(mdo sde): brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na chu klung khang ldan gyi 'jug mnyan pa'i grong na bzhugaso//de nas mnyan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhabs
51b5(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/phyogs gcig tu mkhod do//phyogs gcig tu mkhong nas mnyan pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam gyis
51b6(mdo sde): yang dag par bsten//yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do//chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/yang dag par
51b7(mdo sde): 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod pa yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/cang mi gsung bar bzhug so//de nas mnyan pa de dag stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
52a1(mdo sde): bzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyor ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/bcom
52a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram du bdag cag gi der sang gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /gru zam las kyang bsgral bar 'tshalo zhes gsol nas/
52a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /mnyan pa rnams la cang mo gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas mnyan pa de dag gis chu klung khang ldan gyi 'gram rdo dang gseg ma dang /gyo mo med par byas te/rgyal mtshan
52a4(mdo sde): dang /ba dan ni bsgreng me tog sna tshogs ni gtor/spos kyi snod dag gi nang nas ni 'dug pa gsol/zhal zas bzang po ni bshams me tog mang po ni sta gon byas so//klu zam gyi steng yang me tog
52a5(mdo sde): gi khang pa dag gis brgyan nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'grin gyis bdugs chod bskul ba/btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par
52a6(mdo sde): dgongs te gshegasu gsol zhes bskul to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham 'dring byas te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bdun du bdar nas/mnyan pa'i grong khyer ga la ba
52a7(mdo sde): der gshegs te byon nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhug so//de nas mnyan pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs
52b1(mdo sde): par rig nas/rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te/ci bzhed pa bstabaso//rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas
52b2(mdo sde): tshim par byas te/ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/gsang sder ni gyu/phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/stan ches dma' ba dag khyer te chos mnyan
52b3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan pa de dag gi bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugasu chud nas 'phags
52b4(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos pas mnyan pa du mas ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo//
52b5(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo//kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so//kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems
52b6(mdo sde): bskyed do//kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do//kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//'khor de dag thams cad kyang
52b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /chos la 'bab pa dang /dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do//de nas mnyan pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bkur
53a1(mdo sde): bsti chen po dang ldan pas glu zam las bsgral to//dge slong dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa mthong bas sems dga' bar gyur te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
53a2(mdo sde): la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gang du mdzad lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rangs
53a3(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags te/des na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di lta
53a4(mdo sde): bu'i mchod pa byas so//dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/bcom ldan 'das nyan par 'tshal lagaso//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus ni/de bzhin gshegs pa
53a5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha
53a6(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shing rta skal ldan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //de dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong gis zham ring byas te ljongs rgyu zhing
53a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa las/gang 'ga'i 'gram du byon nas/de'i tshe ded dpon zhig 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang gang+gA'i klung las 'dron po dag sgrol zhing 'dug go/phyogs de na tshom rkun gyi 'jigs pa
53b1(mdo sde): chen po yang yod do//de nas ded dpon gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shing rta skal ldan dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong gi zham ring byas pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang sems dga' bar
53b2(mdo sde): gyur te/sems dga' bar gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/bdag gis thog ma kho narare bcom ldan 'das bsgral bar 'tshal lo//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shing rta skal
53b3(mdo sde): ldan gyis kyang ded dpon la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas ded dpon des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shing rta skal ldan dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong gis zham ring byas pa 'byor pa
53b4(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa/gru zam las bsgral te/zhal zas bzang pos kyang tshim par byas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
53b5(mdo sde): pa/dge slong dag khyed ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na/ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shing rta skal ldan dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis
53b6(mdo sde): stong gis zham ring byas pa/gru zam las bsgral ba dang /zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas pa dang /smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ngas 'khor ba na bde ba chen po mtha' yas pa
53b7(mdo sde): nyam su myong la/da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar slab par bya ste/
54a1(mdo sde): ston pa la bkur bsti bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ram bya'o//mchod pa bya'o//ston pa la bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ra mo byas/mchod pa byas nas brten te/gnas par bya'o//
54a2(mdo sde): zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
54a3(mdo sde): bstod do//ka ba zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong
54a4(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen
54a5(mdo sde): bopo rnams kyis bkur bsti byas//bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po
54a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing shis pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman
54a7(mdo sde): zong rnams bsnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ku ru'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las ku ru'i grong khyer du byon te/ku ru'i skye bo'i tshogs de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar
54b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba sems rgya chen po dang ldan pa sbyin pa la srid pa sha stag go//de nas btsam lnga 'das 'di snyam du dgongs twa/ngas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i 'khor gyis bskonang dgug/'on tang
54b2(mdo sde): de mthong bas 'di rnams kyi dge ba 'phel bar 'gyur snyam du dgongaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa bskyed de/kye ma lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i tshogs kyis g.yog
54b3(mdo sde): byas pas tsan dan sa mchog pa'i ka ba khyer te 'ongs na legaso snyam du dgong nas dgro ba bskyed pa'i mod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i tshogs kyis g.yog byas pa/gang na las thams cad pa
54b4(mdo sde): dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /grul bum du mas g.yog byas pa dag lhags te/tsan dan sa mchog pa'i ka ba khyer te 'ongs nas ha ha zhes ca co dang
54b5(mdo sde): gzha bton te skad po che phyung nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir tsan danas mchog pa'i khang bzangs legs par byas so//de nas khang bzangs der lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
54b6(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha'i zhal zas dang /lha'i gzims cha dang /ba dan dang /lha'i spos dang /me tog gi phreng ba dag gis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod par byaso//
54b7(mdo sde): de nas ku ru'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis lha'i 'byor pa de dag mthong ba dang mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la dbang po dang bcas pa'i
55a1(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis mchod pa las na/'jig rten na mchog yin pa lta snyam ste/sems 'dun par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi
55a2(mdo sde): zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ku ru'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams khang bzang de la shin tu dga' ba skyes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das
55a3(mdo sde): kyis khang bzangs de mi snang bar mdzad nas/mi rtags pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos nas ku ru'i mi rnams las kha cig
55a4(mdo sde): gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo//kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo//kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams
55a5(mdo sde): cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do//kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do//kha cig gis ni
55a6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//'khor de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /chos la 'bab pa dang /dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do//dge
55a7(mdo sde): slong rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa mthong bas sems dga' bar gyur te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gang du mdzad
55b1(mdo sde): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs bzhin du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung
55b2(mdo sde): la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags te/des na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas//dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/bcom ldan 'das nyan
55b3(mdo sde): par 'tshal lagaso//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs
55b4(mdo sde): pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //de nas
55b5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong gis zham ring byas te/ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon nas/rgyal
55b6(mdo sde): rigs skyo bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis stong gis zham ring byas pa/ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las bdag
55b7(mdo sde): gi yul du byon to zhes thos so//thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang rgyal po'i mthu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa ga la ba der song ste/
56a1(mdo sde): phyin nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dud nas/rgyal
56a2(mdo sde): rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub 'thob par byed pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par btsud do//de nas rgyal po de dga' bar gyur nas/stan las
56a3(mdo sde): langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba bdud de/bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims
56a4(mdo sde): cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
56a5(mdo sde): 'dir zla ba gsum gyi bar du bzhugs par ci ga nang /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pas/rgyal po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo
56a6(mdo sde): nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal paM des/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir tsan danas mchog pa'i khang bzangs byed du bcug go//des de la na bza' dang /rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas/
56a7(mdo sde): me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/pog por dag gis ni gdugs te/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul nas/zla ba gsum gyi bar zhu zhal zas bzang
56b1(mdo sde): sa tshim par byas te/na ba za'i khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs phul nas/blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ra dun lam btab ga/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
56b2(mdo sde): dge slong dag /khyong de snyam du sems/de'i che de'i dusan/rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang 'askur ba'i rgyal por gyur po gang yin pa rdo ni ji yin te/ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya tshangs
56b3(mdo sde): la da lta bu'i mchod pa byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pangs na/ngas 'khor ba na bde bachen po mtha yas pa nyams myong la/da ltar blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
56b4(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas pa na yang 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bsgru ba da byAn+te/snron po la bkur b+h+rUM hU~M'o//bla mar du'o//rom bya'o//mchod par bya'o//ston pa
56b5(mdo sde): la bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dan slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces dka' stsal nas/
56b6(mdo sde): dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///khrus shes byi ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po
56b7(mdo sde): rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /ma bring 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong pon rnams dang /ded pa rnams dang /lharnams dang /klu rnams dang /gded sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnangs dang /nam
57a1(mdo sde): mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /
57a2(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /
57a3(mdo sde): gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
57a4(mdo sde): gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/tshong pa lnga brgya tsam dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa las de dag lam stor nas/bye stongs shig tu phyin te/de dag lam gyi ngal bas
57a5(mdo sde): dkos thag cing /rgyags zad la/nyi ma'i gung la nyi tshan gyis gdungs nas nya skam la bton pa bzhin du sa la 'gre ldog ste/sdug bsngal drag pa dang /mi bzad pa dang /tsha ba dang /yid du mi
57a6(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong nas/gu lang dang /chu lha dang /ku be ra dang /brgya byin la sogs pa lta stong snyed la so sor gsol ba 'debs kyang de las skyob par nus pa med do//de'i nang nas dge
57a7(mdo sde): bsnyen sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyus shes pa zhig yod de/des tshong pa de dag la smras pa/khyed sangs rgyas la skyabasu song shig/de nas thams cad kyis skad bsnyams te/skyabasu song
57b1(mdo sde): /de'i skabs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/mi gzigs pa 'am/mi rtogs pa'am/thug su mi chud pa ci yang med la/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
57b2(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la thogs pa/sbyang ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/gcig tu dpa' ga/zla med pa/gaN+DI su mi gsung ba/zhi gnas deng lhag mdzang
57b3(mdo sde): la gnas pa/rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/bsgrub pa gsum la legs par bsgrubs pa/'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/chu bo bzhi las rgal pa/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i
57b4(mdo sde): zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa mi 'dzegs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs
57b5(mdo sde): pa/yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/yan lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs pa/rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la
57b6(mdo sde): gnas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gos phyug pa/lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan
57b7(mdo sde): pa/phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rgyas pa brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang /ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/mtshan dus gsum dus ngas/
58a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/su ni chung /suni dang /sun pangs shing 'dug/sun nyams dbar gyur/su ni gnod pa dang ldan/sun 'angs pa dang /ma dub
58a2(mdo sde): da gnod pa dang ldan/su ni ngan song du gnol/su ni ngan song du 'bab/muni nga na song du bab/su ni ngas ngan seM nas phyung ste/mthangs dang /thar pa dang /'bras bu la gzhag par bya/sun
58a3(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las laganas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma
58a4(mdo sde): bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/su ni yongasu smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go//'dir
58a5(mdo sde): smras pa/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid//gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das
58a6(mdo sde): kyis tshor ba mang po phongs shing nyam nga bar gyur pa gzig so//de nas mig gis cer ces bltas pa tsam gyi yun gyis dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tsha le nas
58a7(mdo sde): mi snang bar gyur nas/phyogs der gsheg so//tshong ba de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang skad po tshuchung ngo //de nas bcom
58b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa bskyed de/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang chen gyi char phab la/ser bu gsil ba yang btang na legaso snyam du dgongs nas/bcom ldan 'das/
58b2(mdo sde): kyis dgongs pa bskyed pa'i mod la/brgya byin gyis dbang chen gyi char yang phab/ser bu bsil ba yang btang ste/des na tshong pa de dag mi skom par gyur la/tsha bas gdungs pa yang zhi bar
58b3(mdo sde): gyur to//de nas tshong ba de dag sems rtas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la lam yang bstan te/de nas mnyan du yod par phyin to//de nas de dag ngal bso nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi
58b4(mdo sde): thad du song ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te thos nas kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//kha cig gis ni lan
58b5(mdo sde): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob po//kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo//kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//kha
58b6(mdo sde): cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do//kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do//kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
58b7(mdo sde): bskyed do//'khor de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /chos la 'bab pa dang /dge 'dun la 'ab ba la bkod do//de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes nas/the tsom thams cad
59a1(mdo sde): gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa tshong pa 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar dgon pa'i shul nas bsgrubs pa dang /dgongs pa bsgyud
59a2(mdo sde): pa'i modo la dbang chen gyi char pab ste/ser bu bsil ba yang langs pa ngo mtshar lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon che
59a3(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag
59a4(mdo sde): gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur chu'i khams dang /me'i khams
59a5(mdo sde): dang /rlung gi khams la rnam por smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung ba dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam
59a6(mdo sde): par smin par 'gyuraro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi'o//tshogs shing dus la bab ba ni//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'a
59a7(mdo sde): pa'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo
59b1(mdo sde): /sgyur ba/blan med pa/lha dang ma rnams kyi sbyin pa/sangs rgyas btsun ldan 'das can dan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ba//de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas can dun ljongs rgya nang /
59b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon nas/rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bsgyur ba'i rgyal po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/yang
59b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po
59b4(mdo sde): debacom ldan 'das kyis byang chub thob par byed pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par btsud do//de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de stan los langs te/blo gos phrag pa
59b5(mdo sde): gcig tu bzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan go la bde log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang
59b6(mdo sde): rgyas tsan dan la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rgyal ba'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zla bo gsum gyi bar du bzhugs par cig nang /de nas
59b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyis rgyal po de la cang mi gsung bas gnang //de'i tshe than chen byung nas/des chu klung dang /khron pa rnams chu chung bar gyur la/shing rnams kyang
60a1(mdo sde): me tog dang 'bras bu med par gyur to//de nas rgyal pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan la gsol ba btab ste/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 'di'i nang du rdzing/
60a2(mdo sde): spos chab kyis bltam pa bgyid du stsal bar 'tshal na/der bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus mdzad par gsol/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis khrus mdzad na//
60a3(mdo sde): bdag gi yul 'dir dgung char 'bab du glo ba re lagaso zhes gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyis rgyal po de la cang mi gsung bas
60a4(mdo sde): gnang ngo //de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des blon po rnams la khyed kyis spos chab dang /rin po che'i bum pa dag sta gon gyis shig dang /de dag gis ngas bcom
60a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol bar bya'o zhes bsgo'o//de nas rgyal po de blon po'i 'khor dang bcas pas grong khyer de rdo dang gseg ma dang /gyo mo med par byas
60a6(mdo sde): te/rgyal mtshan dang ba dan ni bsgreng /me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/spos chab kyis ni chag chag btab/bdug pa sna tshogs kyis ni 'dugs/dbus su ni rdzing byed du bcug go/de nas
60a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyis sems can la phan gdags pa'i phyir khrus ras gsol te/rdzing gi nang du bzhug so//de nas rgyal po blon po 'khor dang
60b1(mdo sde): bcas pas/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas can dan nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa spos sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i chus khrus gsol to//bcom ldan 'das/
60b2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan khrus mdzad pa'i mod la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gang gis lo thog thams cad rgyal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dbang chen gyi char phab bo//gzhi de
60b3(mdo sde): las skye bo phal po che yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad pa rnyed nas/spos kyis byugs pa'i mchod rten du ma brtsigs te zhal bsgos so//der yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
60b4(mdo sde): tsan dan la sgrubasu song ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/de dag gi nang nam nga 'ba' shig lus so//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ston pa
60b5(mdo sde): la bkur bsti bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mo bya'o//mchod pa bya'o//ston pa la bdur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyi
60b6(mdo sde): de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
60b7(mdo sde): yams kyi nad ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pha brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /
61a1(mdo sde): ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye
61a2(mdo sde): chen po sems kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye
61a3(mdo sde): chen po sems kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang
61a4(mdo sde): sman zong rnams brnyed pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan 'da' ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugaso//de'i tshe yul 'dam bu tshal gyi skye bo mang
61a5(mdo sde): po la mi nad byung ste/der skye bo phal po che de dag nad kyis bkos thag nas/gu lang dang /chu lha dang /ku be ra dang /brgya byin la sogs pa/lha stong snyed la so sor gsol ba 'debs
61a6(mdo sde): kyang yams kyi nad de zhi bar ma gyur to//de nas yul 'dam bu tshal na dge bsnyen zhig gnas pa des 'dam bu'i tshal gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad ces smraso//khyed
61a7(mdo sde): tshur sheg/sangs rgyas la skyabasu song la/bcom ldan 'das da 'dir gshegs par gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas tshegs chung ngus yams kyi nad zhi bar mdzad du
61b1(mdo sde): gsol zhes kyang gsol ba thob shig gang nas 'dam bu'i tshal gyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab ste/bcom ldan 'das 'dir gshog//
61b2(mdo sde): la phongs shing nyams thag pa 'di la 'ang thar bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so//de'i skad su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/mi gzigs pa 'am/mi
61b3(mdo sde): rtogs pa 'am/thugasu mi chu nga ci yang med la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/srung ba gcig dang ldan
61b4(mdo sde): pa/gcig tu dpa' ba/zla med pa la gnyi su mi gsung ba/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/
61b5(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par
61b6(mdo sde): byas pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i mi 'jigs pa/khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/yan lag lnga rnam par sangs pa/'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa
61b7(mdo sde): yan lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs pa/rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/lam yan lag
62a1(mdo sde): brgyad pa ston pa/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rdzus
62a2(mdo sde): pa/brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa bas kyang /ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi skyon gyis 'jig rten la gzig
62a3(mdo sde): te/su ni rgud/su ni dar/su ni phongs shing 'dug/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/su ni gnod pa dang ldan/su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/su ni ngan song du gzhol/su
62a4(mdo sde): ni ngan song du 'bab/su ni ngan song du bab/su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/mtho ris dang /thar pa dang /'bras bu la gzhag par bya/su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas
62a5(mdo sde): drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par
62a6(mdo sde): byaHsu ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongasu smin par bya/su ni yongasu smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzegs pa 'jug go//'dir smras pa/
62a7(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang sred//gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro
62b1(mdo sde): sham thabs dang /chos gos gsol te/lhung zad bsnams nas/dge slong ga tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas 'dam bu tshul du gshegaso//
62b2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong khyer gyi mi de dag thams cad la byams pas khyab par mdzad de/nges na mi ma yin pa rnams dong ste/yams kyi nang zhi bar gyur to//de nas bram ze dang /
62b3(mdo sde): khyim bdag de rnams bcom ldan 'das mthong bas dga' ba chen po skyes so//dga' ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lan bza' dang /zhal zas dang
62b4(mdo sde): gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams los ci bzhed pa'i skabs phye'o//de nas de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba
62b5(mdo sde): de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de nas bram ze dang /khyim bdag du mas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo//kha cig gis ni phyir mi
62b6(mdo sde): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo//kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems
62b7(mdo sde): bskyed do//kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do//kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//grong khyer gyi mi de dag
63a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /chos la 'bab pa dang /dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do//de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/thetsom thams
