63a2(mdo sde): cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa sems can 'di dag 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skyes pas phongs pa las thar bar gyur pa ni ngo mtshar
63a3(mdo sde): lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgal
63a4(mdo sde): bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa
63a5(mdo sde): rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang /mi
63a6(mdo sde): dge ba bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal po brgyar
63a7(mdo sde): yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la ba ba na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
63b1(mdo sde): ra rdugs pa'i sbyangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jog rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul ba'o/ la sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi spyan pa/
63b2(mdo sde): sbyangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus zla ba zhes bya ba 'jog rten du byud ste de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs kyis rgyun ljongs rgyu nying kau shegs pa las rgyal po'i 'a bring 'khor zhig
63b3(mdo sde): byon nas/rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskor ba'i rgyal po ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zlab bdag gi yul du gron to zhes thos so//thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen
63b4(mdo sde): dang rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla bag la bder song ste phyin nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i zhabs la mgo bos phyaphyug
63b5(mdo sde): 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal pa de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zlabs byang chub thob par byed
63b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos rnams lnga yang dag par brjod do//de nas rgyal rigs skye bo nas dbang bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dadaga' bar gyur nas/stan las langs te thugs phrag po gcig tu bcur nas/
63b7(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lja nga sa la gtsugs te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba go la ba der logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rma
64a1(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams
64a2(mdo sde): kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu zla ba gsum gyi bar du 'dir bzhugs par ci ga nang /de nas yang dag par
64a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla bas rgyal po de la cang mo gsung bas gnang //de'i tshe rgyal po'i grong khyer de na skye bo mang po la mi nang byung ste/des skye bo phal po che de dag la shin tu
64a4(mdo sde): gnod par gyur to//de nas rgyal po des nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba la gsol ba btab te/bcom ldan 'das yams kyi nad 'di zhi bar 'gyur
64a5(mdo sde): ba'i thabs mdzad par ci gnang zhes gsol to//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla bas rgyal po de la bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po song la nga'i chos gos snam sbyar 'di
64a6(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la thogs la bkur bsti chen po dang ldan pas bdag gi yul skor du chug shig/'di la dga' ston chen po yang gyis shig/skye bo phal po che thams cad
64a7(mdo sde): kyang sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa yang dag par 'dzin du chug shig dang /des na khyed bde lagasu 'gyuraro//de nas rgyal pos kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du thams cad de kho na bzhin
64b1(mdo sde): du byas nas/de'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar gyur to//de nas skye bo'i tshogs de dag dga' bar gyur te/rgyal po dang /blon po dang /bo brang 'khor gyi mi
64b2(mdo sde): rnams sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la skyabasu song ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin
64b3(mdo sde): pa de ni nga yin te/ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba de la mchod pa chen po byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des na/ngas 'khor ba na lha dang /mir skye ba 'thob par 'gyur ba'i bde ba
64b4(mdo sde): chen po nyamasu myong la/da ltar yang nga de'i rgyu las byung ba'i 'byor pa dang ldan par gyur to//des na ngas ci bsams pa dang /ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad de bzhin du grub par gyur to//dge slong
64b5(mdo sde): dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ston pa la bkur bsti bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mor bya'o/mchod pa bya'o//ston pa la bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas mchod pa byas
64b6(mdo sde): nas/brtan te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis
64b7(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///cho 'phrul zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /
65a1(mdo sde): brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha'/
65a2(mdo sde): lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lho dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /
65a3(mdo sde): na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzi
65a4(mdo sde): cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshul bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhug so//
65a5(mdo sde): gang gi tshe lhas sbyin gyis bcugs byas te/rgyal po ma skyes dgras pa tshas can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po bsad nas/rang nyid rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe sum dad pa de dag ni mthu dang
65a6(mdo sde): ldan par gyur to//dad pa can rnams ni mthu chung bar gyur to//de nas re shig na blon po rgan po mdad pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan la snang ba zhig yod pa dus/bram ze rnams la mdzod
65a7(mdo sde): sbyin byas te/der bram ze 'bum phrag du ma 'dus nas/de dag gis su yang dge sbyong go'u ta ma la ltar mi 'gro bar nang khrims bca so//de nas bram ze rnams kyis khrims bcas te/
65b1(mdo sde): 'dus shing 'thun la kun dga' nas/srang gi dbus su rig byed las 'byung ba'i cho ga bzhin brgya byin la gsol ba btab te/rus med pa'i skyes bu gshegasu gsol gshegasu gsol zhes/
65b2(mdo sde): bya'o/de'i skabasu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/mi gzigs po 'am/mi rtogs pa 'am/thug su mi chud pa ci yang med la/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
65b3(mdo sde): 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/gcig tu dpa' ba/zla med pa/gnyi su mi gsung ba/zhi gnas dang lhag
65b4(mdo sde): mthong la gnas pa/rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i
65b5(mdo sde): zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po
65b6(mdo sde): sgrogs pa/yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/yan lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs pa/rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug
65b7(mdo sde): la gnas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/stobs bcu'i
66a1(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa/phyogs bcur grags pas kun tu rdzus pa/brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa ngas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum
66a2(mdo sde): mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi skyon gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/su ni chud/su ni der/su ni 'phongs shing 'dug/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/su ni gnod pa dang ldan/srin 'ongs pa
66a3(mdo sde): dnganyam nga bdang gnod pa dang ldan/suM ni ngan song du gzhol/su ni ngan song du 'bad//spyani ngan song du bab/su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/mtho ras dang /thar pa dang /'bras bu la gzhag
66a4(mdo sde): par bya/su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las/'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/su ni
66a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongasu smin par bya/su ni yongasu smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes
66a6(mdo sde): gzigs pa 'jug/'dir smras pa/rgyo mtsha chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid//gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//sangs rgyas dus las yal ba
66a7(mdo sde): med//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze sngon dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa thar pa'i skal pa can du gyur pa/btsal bar bye rnyed pa/mya ngan las 'das pa la nang du ltos pa/'khor ba
66b1(mdo sde): las phyi rol du ltas pa de dag gzigs nas da ltar gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bston pas/nga'i bstan pa la sdang bar gyur te/ngas 'di dag gdul ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o snyam du dgong//
66b2(mdo sde): so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin gyi cha lug su sprul te/mchod sbyin gyi 'dun khang de lha'i 'od kyis snang bar mdzad de/der gsheg so//de nas bram ze de dag dga' zhing 'gul
66b3(mdo sde): rab tu dga' ste/yid rangs nas dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur te/skad bsnyams nas smras pa/bcom ldan 'das gshegasu gsol gshegasu gsol//bcom ldan 'das gshegs
66b4(mdo sde): pa leg so zhes byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das brgya byin gyi cha lug su bzhugs pa/gdan bshams pa la bzhug so//de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer kun tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin
66b5(mdo sde): mchod sbyin la gsheg so zhes de skad kyi sgra yang grags par gyur te/de thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze rnams dad par gyur pa mkhyen
66b6(mdo sde): nas/brgya byin gyi cha lugs mi snang bar mdzad de/sangs rgyas kyi cha lugasu bzhugs nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos nas bram ze
66b7(mdo sde): drug khri nyis stong gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mngon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so//srog chags 'bum phrag du
67a1(mdo sde): mas kyang bcom ldan 'das la dad pa rnyed do//de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus
67a2(mdo sde): pad+mabatsun pa bram ze 'di rnams 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das deng mjal nas/bden pa mthong bar gyur pa dang /srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dga' ba chen po thob par gyur pa
67a3(mdo sde): nongo mtshar lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis ston cha rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan
67a4(mdo sde): te/dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas shIng bsags pas na/ngas las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong
67a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams/
67a6(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par
67a7(mdo sde): smin par 'gyuraro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni/bskal po brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung
67b1(mdo sde): ba 'das pa'i dus na//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes du 'dul/
67b2(mdo sde): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po 'dul zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa la so rgyal po'i
67b3(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon to//rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de yang mu stegs can gyi dbang du gyur to//de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
67b4(mdo sde): dbang po 'dul bdag gi yul du gshegasu zhes zos so//thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul
67b5(mdo sde): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu
67b6(mdo sde): 'dug nas/rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul gyis byang chub thob par byed pa'i chos rnams la btsud do//de nas rgyal
67b7(mdo sde): rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur po'i rgyal po de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar na/pus mo ga yA bI lta ngas la btsug te/yang dag par rdzogr-I bI sa d+yas dbang po 'dul ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba
68a1(mdo sde): #/btud nA/yang dag d+mo bIs ng+yas dbang po sub la 'di skad ces gsol to//bac+do~Ms la bdag gis na bza' dang /zhalaN+Das dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /spun zang
68a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu zla ba gsum gyi bar du 'dir bzhugs par ci gnang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
68a3(mdo sde): stsal pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul na dge slong blo bur du 'ong ba dang /'gro ba dag gan su rung ba'i gtsug lag khang 'ga' lta yod dam/rgyal pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das da ltar
68a4(mdo sde): ma mchis kyis kyang /bcom ldan 'das gzhesu gsol dang /bdag gis dge slong blo bur du 'ong ba dang /'gro ba dag gan su rung ba'i gtsug lag khang bgyid du sprul par 'tshalo zhes
68a5(mdo sde): gsol to//de nas rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir gtsug lag khang byed du bcug ste/rab dang rta babs dang /skar khung dang /sgo khang ni bcas/keg tse dang /zla ba chos pa
68a6(mdo sde): dang /lan kan gyis ni brgyan/gding ba dang ni ldan/rdzing bus ni kun tu gang /shing ljon pa me tog dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa mang pos ni bskor ba zhig byas so//byas nas kyang bcom
68a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la cho 'phrul chen po mdzad par gsol ba btab bo//de nas rgyal pos gsol ba btab nas//
68b1(mdo sde): btsam ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul gyis/sangs rgyas bal bcu rnam pa ma na rgya 'phrul tshon pa gsan to//ngos rgyal po dang /ston pa dang /grang
68b2(mdo sde): rdul gyi mi dang /yul mo dang /be brang 'khor gyi mo thams cad dga' bar gyur te/bston pasrung ba gces par 'dzin par gyur to//dge slong dag/ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal
68b3(mdo sde): bor gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po 'dul de la de lta bu'i mchod pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ngas 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' sa
68b4(mdo sde): pany+tsam su byung la/daltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa nA yang ba'i bstan pa 'di mas par gyur te//dge rlung dag de bas na 'di ltar bsgrub par m+b+ha/ston pa la bkur ba sti bya'o//blams
68b5(mdo sde): bya/ro ma bya'o//mchod ba bya'o//ston pa la 'gyur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ro mo byas/mchod 'byas nas brtan te gnas pa bya la zhes dge slong th+ya kyis da ltar bsgrub par bya'o//btsam
68b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstad do///lo lnga pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom
68b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /chang dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /
69a1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang /lham yin rnams dang //namakha' lding rnams dang /mo 'am ni rnams dang /blo 'phye chen po rnams sa bad+mar bsdu b+h+yas/bla mar byas/rim
69a2(mdo sde): byas/mchod pa byas te/lte dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
69a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /spyan gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/
69a4(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka gnas pa na rten cing bzugs//gang gi tshe mi blun po lhas sbyin gyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la gnod pa stong snyed byas kyang /bcom
69a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi ba spu bskyod par yang ma nus pa de'i tshe/rgyal po ma skyes dgra la smras pa/rgyal po chen po rgyal po'i khab nas su yang dge slong go'u ta ma'i thung du mi 'gro ba dang /kha zas mi sbyin
69a6(mdo sde): pa'i khrims chos shog/de ltar byas pa dang /di kha mi rnyed cing /brnyan bkur mi rnyed pas/gdon mi za bar yul gzhan du 'pho bar 'gyuraro zhes byas so//de nas rgyal pos de bzhin du byas
69a7(mdo sde): nas/de na dge bsnyen bden pa mthong ba de dag du ste/kyai drud 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba/u dum par 'i me tog ltar dkon pa dang phrad kyang /de bsten kyang ma nus pa la
69b1(mdo sde): na rgyal po'o/khab kyi grong khyer gyi mi rnams mgon med par gyur to zhes 'jar te/tshig de nyid tor dge slong dag gis thos so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ji skad thos pa bzhin du bcom ldan
69b2(mdo sde): 'das la gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dus mkhyen gyis khyod skying ma chung shig/gzhan yang nga'i bstan pa ji srid yod kyi bar
69b3(mdo sde): du yang nyan thos rnams kyi yo byad med par mi 'gyur na/de ltar lta ci smos/de'i sgrub su lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni 'og ma la shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug ste/des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa de lta bur
69b4(mdo sde): gyur pa mthong nas/mthong ba'i mod kho na la/sbyin bdag dang /sbyin pa pa rnams kyi smra ba bskyed pa dang /sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i che ba nyid yang dag par bstan pa dang /me skyes dgra dang /lha sbyin
69b5(mdo sde): rgyags shing dregs pa gcad pa dang /bdag nyid kyi dad pa bstan pa'i phyir/rgyal po'i khab ril gyis 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas skad po che phyung ste/bdag gis dang phan chad bcom ldan 'das
69b6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha'i na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes smras nas/bcom
69b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po
70a1(mdo sde): pakhyen a 'di skad rjes gas ma to//bdag gis ji 'tsho'i bar du rgyal po la ma grong khyer 'di nyid du bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la
70a2(mdo sde): lha'i na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /spyan gsos dang /sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi bar 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar
70a3(mdo sde): mdzad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ko'u shi ka 'jig rten na bsod nams 'dod pa mang gis 'di ltar nga la sems dad par byas pa nyid kyis chog go//brgya byin gyis
70a4(mdo sde): gsol pa/'o na de bzhin gshegs pa'i slad du/bdag gis dgung lo lnga'i bar du lo lnga pa'i dga' ston sbyar bar 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du
70a5(mdo sde): gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau'u shi ka 'jig rtenan bsod nams 'dod pa mang gis 'di ltar ngal sems dad par byas pa nyid kyis chog go/brgya byin gyis
70a6(mdo sde): gsol ba/'on zhag/lnga'i bar du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsom/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi bsod nams kyi stobs mngon sum du bstan pa
70a7(mdo sde): dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin la phan gdags pa dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus su zhag lnga po'i dga' ston rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir/cang mi gsung bas gnong //de nas sgra'i dbang po
70b1(mdo sde): byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/'od ma'i tshal de khang bzangs rnam par rgyal byed 'dra bar bstan te/lha'i gdan cha rnams dang /lha'i rdzing rnams dang //
70b2(mdo sde): lha'i bdud rtsi'i zhal zas dag kyang bstan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhug so//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge
70b3(mdo sde): 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/lha 'bum phrag du ma'i g.yog dang bcas pas/rang gi lag gis tshim par byed cing ci bzhed pa bstab so//rnam grangs du mar rang gi lag gis tshim par byas
70b4(mdo sde): shing ci bzhed pa bstabs te/bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin nas/gtsang sder gya/phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/stan ches dma' ba khyer te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das
70b5(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par
70b6(mdo sde): gzeng bstod/yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do//rgyal po ma skyes sgras khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pas kyang 'od ma'i tshal na bcom ldan 'das la de lta bur mchod pa byed pa mthong ngo //mthong nas
70b7(mdo sde): kyang 'gyod pa skyes te/dad pa chen po rnyed do//rgyal po'i khab na 'khod pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis kyang chos kyi shugs thob nas/rgyal po'i thang du dong ste 'di skad ces smras so//kye ma rgyal
71a1(mdo sde): po chen po 'di ltar lha rgyags shing bag ma mchis par gnas pa rnams kyis kyang /lha yul bor te bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa las na/rgyal po'i khab na gan+d+ha/
71a2(mdo sde): pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams sgor pham par 'gyur gyis/lha khrims de ni bshig na legs lag so zhes byas so///de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras khrims de bshig nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
71a3(mdo sde): gyi grong khyer du dril bsgrags te/bcom ldan 'das la bkur bsti ci dga' bar gyis ces byas so//de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dga'
71a4(mdo sde): zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste yid rangs nas/dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes te/me tog dang /spos dang /me tog 'phreng rnams khyer nas/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dong ngo //de nas
71a5(mdo sde): lha rnams dang /mi rnams kyis/bcom ldan 'das la bkur bsti chen po byaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhi de las lha dang mi rnams la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de
71a6(mdo sde): lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos nas lha dang mi du mas bden pa mthong bar gyur to//de nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa mthong nas the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod
71a7(mdo sde): pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la 'di lta bu'i dpa' ston bgyis pa ni ngo mtshar lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
71b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags las///
71b2(mdo sde): na nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyamasu myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par
71b3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba'
71b4(mdo sde): shig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang tshud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon
71b5(mdo sde): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha
71b6(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i ri bo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig
71b7(mdo sde): tu byon nas/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de na yams kyi nad byung ngo //de nas rgyal po des yams kyi nang zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du
72a1(mdo sde): gdugs tshod la spyan drang sa//zla ba gsum yin nas yams kyind de zhi bar gyur to//de nas rgyal po dang /grong khyer gyi mi sems dad par gyur pa rnams kyis na
72a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa nyan gyis kyi dge dun dang bzlas pa la lo lnga pa'i dga'i skyon byas so//'di sa sus pa/kun dga'ang ni rgyal gyur nas//rin chen ri bo 'di chen la//zhir
72a3(mdo sde): 'dod phyir gsol ba btug//mo lnga pa'i dga' ston byas//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshede'i dus na rgyam bor gyur pa gang yin padren nga yin d+he/ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa
72a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rin blo che'i ri bo de la lo lnga pa'i dga' ston byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ngas 'khor ba na bde ba chen po nyam su myong la/de ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa na yang
72a5(mdo sde): nga la 'di lta bu'i bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no//yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang nga'i bstan pa la lo lnga pa'i dga' ston brgya phrag du ma byed par 'gyuraro//dge slong dag de bas
72a6(mdo sde): na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ston pa la bkur bsti bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mo bya'o//mchod pa bya'o//ston pa la bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas nas brten
72a7(mdo sde): te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
72b1(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do////bstod pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang //phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi ma rnams
72b2(mdo sde): dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto
72b3(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto
72b4(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos
72b5(mdo sde): dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bi ni bzhug so///
72b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe minyan du yod pa na rol mo mkhan mnga' sde gcig pa la brgya tsam 'khod do//de'i tshe rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po rab dga' zhes bya ba zhig gsar du 'ongs pa de'i mthu ni 'di lta
72b7(mdo sde): bu yin te/rgyud gcig las skad sna bdun dang /khong du 'khyig pa sna nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung bar shes so//des grong khyer chen po drug yul po che ma yin par bsgrags te/mnyan
73a1(mdo sde): yod par gyus /mnan du 'ad na ma mamangan nas nan ma rgyal dul na///rgyam nas sgyu chu sa smra nA /
73a2(mdo sde): mchud shi//de na sa la ma mngon gyirgyal por dga' 'di snyam du sams te/la gsu na la ma mo la shin rgyu mdzes shing de skad drug gis/ dang 'byed pa
73a3(mdo sde): mo/de nas rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po rab dga' ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la bder stong ste/ke sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smraso//rgyal po khyod rim
73a4(mdo sde): mo shin tu mkhyen to zhes bdag gis thos ni/gal te khyod la gnod pa ma mchis na sad par 'gyi'o//de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de la bsrungs te smras pa/kye legs
73a5(mdo sde): panga'i mkhan pa rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po d+hA na med pa yod de/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshul na 'azhugs kyis tshur shog dang deng 'dong ngo zhes bya'o//de nas kI sa la'i rgyal
73a6(mdo sde): gsul rgyal rol ma mya ban lnga brgya tsam gyi ste kun nga byas pa dang /rol mo mngon gyi rgyal por ba dga' dang /mi 'gram phrag du ma rgyal po rgyal myed kyi tshal du dang ngo //
73a7(mdo sde): skabasu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa'am/mi gzigs pa'am/mi rtogs pa'am/thugasu mi chud pa ci yang med lo/sangs rgyas bcom
73b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/gcig tu dpa' ba/zla med pa/gnyi su mi gsung ba/zhi gnas
73b2(mdo sde): dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/bslab pa gsum la legs par bslab pa/'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/chu bo bani las rgal pa/rdzu 'phrul gyi
73b3(mdo sde): rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng go'i sgra chen
73b4(mdo sde): po sgrogs pa/yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/yan lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs pa/rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la
73b5(mdo sde): gnas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/stobs bcu'i stobs
73b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/phyogs bcur grags pas sman tu btsun paM/bcwa phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa pas rgyang ches khyud par du 'phags pa rnams na chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum
73b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sbyin gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/su ni chud/su ni dang /su ni bongs shing 'dug/sun nyi mang bar gyur/su ni gnod nga dang ldan/su ni 'ongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa
74a1(mdo sde): dang ldan/su ni ngan song du gzhol/su ni ngan song du 'bab/su ni ngan song du bab/su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/mtho ris dang /thar pa dang /'bras bu la
74a2(mdo sde): gzhag par bya/su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying pa las lag nas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par
74a3(mdo sde): bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma skyed pa las bskyed par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongasu smin par bya/su ni yongasu smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam
74a4(mdo sde): du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/'dir smras po/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid//gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//sangs rgyas
74a5(mdo sde): dus las yol ba med//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba'i skye bo la phan gdags pa'i phyir/'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa bskyed de/kye ma dri za'i bu zur phud lnga pa/dri za bdun
74a6(mdo sde): stong gis bskor ba/pi bang gi zhi bai DUr+ya las byas pa khyer te nga'i thad du 'ongs na legaso snyam du dgongaso//de nas dgongs pa bskyed pa'i mod la/dri za'i bu zur phud lnga la/dri za bdun
74a7(mdo sde): stong gis bskor bas/bcom ldan 'das la tshul bzhin du mchod pa byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la pi bang gzhi bai DUr+ya las byis pa phul lo//de nas rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po rab
74b1(mdo sde): dgas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pi bang blangs te/de las rgyud gcig las kyang skad sna bdun dang /khong nas 'khyig pa sna nyi shu rtsa gcig 'byung ba bstan te/de thos pas rgyal po
74b2(mdo sde): gsal rgyal dang /skye bo phal po che gzhan dag kyang mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang pi bang gzhi bai DUr+ya las byas pa sbrengs te/de las rgyud gcig las
74b3(mdo sde): kyang skad kyi khyad par sna du ma dang /khong du 'khyig pa'i sna grangs du ma 'byung bar bstan to//de dag kyang stong pa'i rnam pa dang /bdag med pa'i rnam par grag go/lus 'di yang pi bang dang 'dra
74b4(mdo sde): bar bstan to//skad rnams ni dbang po dang 'dra bar bstan to//khong du 'khyig pa rnams ni sems kyi khams dang 'dra bar bstan te/de thos pas rol mo mkhan gyi rgyal po rab dga' dad pa skyes nas
74b5(mdo sde): pi bang dri gtsang khang du phul te/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung nas/des brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan
74b6(mdo sde): par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom
74b7(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan
75a1(mdo sde): dan spangs pa lta bur gsol bar gyur pa rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /
75a2(mdo sde): chags pa dang /bkur bsgril rgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang ba dang /nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gan su gyur to//de nas lha dang /klu dang /
75a3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams dad par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa bsrung ba dang /bsgrub pa dang /smra bar bya
75a4(mdo sde): babacom so//rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po rnams kyang dga' zhing yid bde bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag ni lase ngan pa byed cing 'dug ste//dka' bso 'tsho ba yin gyis
75a5(mdo sde): bdag cag gis rgyal po la gsol te/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa grong khyer du gshegs par spyan drang gor ma chag snyam mo//re shig na rol mo mkhan de dag
75a6(mdo sde): gis gnang ba'i lung thob nas/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa grong khyer du gshegs par spyan drangs//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rol mo mkhan de dag la na
75a7(mdo sde): mi gsung bas gnang //de nas rol mo me khan de dag dang /rgyal po dang /blon po dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /yul mi rnams bsdongs nas/mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer
75b1(mdo sde): thams cad rdo dang gsag ma dang gyo ma med par byas nas/spos chab kyis chag chag ni btab/me tog sna tshogs ni gat+tor/bdug pa sna tshogs kyis ni 'dugs/me tog gi bla rang rna
75b2(mdo sde): brgyan to//rol mo mkhan de dag gis kyang rang rang gi pi dang khyer te/rdu rnga dang /gling bu dang /rnga zlu ma dang /rol mo'i sgra'i khyad par dag gis bsnyen bkur byas so//zhal zas bzang po
75b3(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa tshim par byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe 'dzum pa
75b4(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu
75b5(mdo sde): 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang //thig nag dang /bsdus 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med
75b6(mdo sde): pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer dang /a chu zer dang /ud pal ltar gas pa dang pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por
75b7(mdo sde): song nas/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab po//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo//des na sems
76a1(mdo sde): can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rje zhil bar gyur to//de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam 'on to gzhan du
76a2(mdo sde): skyes sam snyam mo//de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed pa mdzad de/de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/kye bdag cag
76a3(mdo sde): ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtsa zhil
76a4(mdo sde): par gyur to snyam mo//de nas de dag stsal pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur pa'i las de thad de/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du
76a5(mdo sde): bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyuraro//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /
76a6(mdo sde): 'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs
76a7(mdo sde): bachen po rnams dang /bod chung rnams dang /tshad meng 'od rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang /sprin med
76b1(mdo sde): rnams dang /sod rnams smras rnams dang /'bras bu myas dang /mamarnams dang /myo rgyu dang /mam stong rnams dang/shin tu mad rnams dang /ga min gyi spyanan/
76b2(mdo sde): gyi song nas/seM ga pa dang /sdug pasngal dang /spyong pa dang /bdage byed pa //sgru /gas shrI hrIN+Dis nga ba myed do//y-i byung ba brnam pa
76b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam du'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi dag sngoni gnom par gyis//nang zhig cho su yul ti la//shAg mod sbyong bar byed pa ni//skye ba'i
76b4(mdo sde): 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes brjod par byed do//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/bcom ldan
76b5(mdo sde): 'das nyid kyi bzhin 'byung hU~M/gul te bcom ldan nas kyis 'das pa'i las lung sbyin par bzhe na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyis ma log su mi snang por 'gyur//mdzangs pa'i las lung rten
76b6(mdo sde): par bzhin na na/mdun log su mi snang bar 'gyur//sems can dmyal bar skye 'a tshun gyon par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthi la du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//dud 'gro skye bar lung ston par gnang na
76b7(mdo sde): zhangs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur//yi dges skye bar lung ston par bzhed ni/zhums kyi mtho bor mi snang bar 'gyur//mir skyed re lung ston par banod na ni/rjes mo gti'u mi snang bar 'gyur//
77a1(mdo sde): stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par
77a2(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/lte bar mi snang bar 'gyuraro//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal
77a3(mdo sde): du mi snang bar 'gyu'o//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhad na ni/smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar 'gyuraro//bla na mang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
77a4(mdo sde): ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams
77a5(mdo sde): kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/tshon sna stong gis spel pa sna tshogs can//mang po zhal gyi
77a6(mdo sde): sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshig su bcad de gsol pa//rgod dang bral zhing rgyags
77a7(mdo sde): dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston///
77b1(mdo sde): brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams//thub pa khyu mchog gi na gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the tsom
77b2(mdo sde): skyes pa bsal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgya lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyi nad 'dzum mi ston//gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//de ni khyod
77b3(mdo sde): las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
77b4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo rol mo mkhan 'di dag gis nga la bkur bsti 'di lta bu byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa
77b5(mdo sde): mthong lagaso//kun dga' bo rol mo mkhan 'di dag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis dus ji lta ba bzhin du/rang sangs rgyas
77b6(mdo sde): kyi byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs nas/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skad snyan zhes bya ba'i rang sangs rgyas shwa stag tu 'gyur te/sdug cing phongs pa rnams la snying 'arje ba/bas mtha'i gnas
77b7(mdo sde): mal gyis 'tsho ba/'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pur 'gyur//de dag gi sbyin par bya nga'i chos ni gang nga la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no//de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes
78a1(mdo sde): to/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gi mthu 'ad 'dra bar 'gyur ba de dag gang du
78a2(mdo sde): mdzad lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis/sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa'
78a3(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/
78a4(mdo sde): dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin
78a5(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur///
78a6(mdo sde): lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chung mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
78a7(mdo sde): dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i
78b1(mdo sde): kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtogs mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa lta rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byan
78b2(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po'i bskyed mos tshal dus tshigs thams cad du 'bras bu phun su tshogs pa dang ldan pa zhig yod/skyed mos tshal dor bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas/rgyal po de la phan gdags
78b3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/shing ljon pa zhig gi drung na rten cing bzhug so//de nas gdan bting ba la bzhug te me'i khams la snyoms par zhug so//de nas rgyal riDa spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de bud med kyi sil
78b4(mdo sde): snyan dang /rol mo'i sgra sgrogs pa dag dang /bskyed mos tshal du song //de nas rgyal po de bskyed mos tshal don 'khyam zhing 'gro bas/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas rtogs mdzad
78b5(mdo sde): mdzes shing dga' bar mdzad pa/dbang po zhi ba/thugs zhi ba/thugs mchog tu dul zhing rnam por zhi ba dang ldan pa/gser gyi mchod ljong ltar dpal 'ber ba mthong //mthong nas kyang rgyal po de dga' bar
78b6(mdo sde): gyur nas/btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrags te/bcom ldan 'das ting 'dzin de las bzhengasu gsol zhal zas bzang po yang gsol nas/bla na med pa yang dag par
78b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam bto'o//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtogs mdzad de/
79a1(mdo sde): la mchod pa byas pa de nyid kyi rgyus/dU ltar dul rom mo ma thun nams kyis 'di lta bu'i bsnun ra byas so//dge slong dag de bsan 'di ltar bsgyud
79a2(mdo sde): par bya ste/ston pa la bkur bsti bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mo bya'o//mchod pa bya'o//ston pa la bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas nas/brten te gan
79a3(mdo sde): par bya'o zhes dge sbyong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
79a4(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do///mchog sbyin zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /
79a5(mdo sde): po brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding
79a6(mdo sde): rnams dang /mi 'am n+di rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha me
79a7(mdo sde): yin dang /namakha' lding dang /mi'amaci dong /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shos pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /
79b1(mdo sde): zhal bas dang /gzims r+b+ba dang /gdan dang /spyan gsos dang /sman zang rnams brnyas pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod spya na/rgyal bu rgyal byed rgyal ma/
79b2(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban bzhug so//de nas mnyan du yod pa na/gzhan gyi chung ma la bya ba byed pa las dri ma can la gnas pa zhig yod de/de rgyal po'i mis bzung
79b3(mdo sde): nas rgyal po la phul lo//de nas de nyes pa byed pa'i phyir/rgyal pos gshing ma la gtad do//de nas de rgyal po'i mi gos sngon po bgos pa/mtshon cha thogs bkar bi ri'i me tog
79b4(mdo sde): 'phreng ba mgul na thogs pa rnams kyis/lam po che dang /srang dang /bzhi mdo dang /sum mdo nam su 'do ngos nas/grong khyer gyi lho sgor khrid do//de'i skabasu sangs rgyas bcom ldan
79b5(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/mi gzigs pa 'am/mi rtogs pa'am/thugasu mi chud pa ci yang med la/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/'jig
79b6(mdo sde): rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/gcig tu dpa' ba/zla med pa/gnyisu mi gsung ba/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/rig pa gsum
79b7(mdo sde): sdang bar mdzad pa/bslab pa gsum la legs par bslangs pa/'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu
80a1(mdo sde): brtan pa/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra
80a2(mdo sde): chen po sgrogs pa/yon lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/yan lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin drug yongasu rdzogs pa/rtag tu gnas
80a3(mdo sde): par bya ba drug la gnas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu lam tha
80a4(mdo sde): ba/stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/phyogs bcur grags pas kun d+hu rgyas pa/bad+ma phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni/chos
80a5(mdo sde): nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jog rten la gzigs te/su ni rgud/su ni dar/su ni 'bongs shing 'dug/su ni nyam nga bar gyur/
80a6(mdo sde): su ni gnod pa dang ldan/su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/su ni ngan song du gzhol/su ni ngan song du 'bab/su ni ngan song du bab/su ni ngas ngan song nas byung
80a7(mdo sde): ste/mtho ras dang zer pa dang /'bras bu la gzhag par bya/su ni 'ded pa'i 'dam du bying ba las laganas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i
80b1(mdo sde): nor dun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongasu spyan par bya/su na
80b2(mdo sde): yongasu smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug/'dir smras pa/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid//gdul bar
80b3(mdo sde): bya ba'i skyes rnams la//sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/lhung zed bsnams nas/mnyan du yod
80b4(mdo sde): par bsod snyoms la gsheg so//de nas mi des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes
80b5(mdo sde): par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stod pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
80b6(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dam pa stsal ba'i 'os lags kyis/bdag la srog phangs pa stsal du gsol/de nas
80b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod song la rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad du/rgyal po mi 'di nga la byin cig dang rab tu dbyung bar
81a1(mdo sde): bya'o zhes kyis shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba mnyan nas/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la 'der song //
81a2(mdo sde): ste phyin nas/ko so la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la/bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' phrin 'di skad du/rgyal po chen po mi 'di bcom ldan 'das la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar gyis
81a3(mdo sde): shog ces byas so//ko sa lI rgyal po gsal gyis kyang shin tu 'os par rig nas gnang ste/de bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu phyung nas/bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/des brtson pa dang //
81a4(mdo sde): bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas phol mig lnga pI la Sho 'i blo lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /
81a5(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par chad chod de nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang
81a6(mdo sde): bral bar gyur nas/gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/rig pas sgo lnga'i sbubs bcom
81a7(mdo sde): pa/rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang /bkur bsti la rgyab kyi sa phyogs pa/dbang po dang /nye dbang dang bcas
81b1(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjes pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to//de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus
81b2(mdo sde): ba/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa tsam gyis thams cad grub pa de ni ngo mtshar lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis
81b3(mdo sde): sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags
81b4(mdo sde): pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams
81b5(mdo sde): dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par
81b6(mdo sde): smin par 'gyuraro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i
81b7(mdo sde): dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla
82a1(mdo sde): na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/rgyal po
82a2(mdo sde): bo brang 'khor zhig tu byon te/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de na bram ze rig byed dang /rig byed kyi yan lag gi mthar phyin pa/rgyal po'i gong na 'dug pa zhig yod do//de nas yang dag par rdzogs
82a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/lhung bzed bsnams nas pho brang 'khor der bsod snyoms la gshegs//de nas bram ze des yang
82a4(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'jom
82a5(mdo sde): gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mda'i bo/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang sdong po r+N+Na ba nas bcad pa bzhin du/bcom ldan
82a6(mdo sde): 'das kyi zharas la phyag 'tshal nas/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dam pa stsal ba'i 'os lag so//bde bar gshegs pa bdag ni dam pa stsal pa'i 'os lags kyis/bcom
82a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das gong du bzhug su gsol/de nas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gong du bzhug so//yang dag par
82b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bzhugs nas/bram ze des tshig brgyas bstod de/zhal zas bzang po yang gsol nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam
82b2(mdo sde): btab bo//gzhi do las rgyal po dang /blon po dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dad pa skyes so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na bram zer gyur pa de ni nga yin te/ngas yang
82b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal mtshan la mchod pa byas pa de'i rgyus na/ngas 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas pa nyam su myong la da ltar yang ngas ci bsams pa dang /ci 'dod pa de
82b4(mdo sde): dag thams cad 'grub pa yin no//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ston pa la dkur bsti bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mo bya'o//mchod pa bya'o//ston pa la bkur bsti byas/bla
82b5(mdo sde): mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas nas/brten te gnas par bya'o//zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar slob par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag
82b6(mdo sde): yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////ka shi ka'i gos shes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po
82b7(mdo sde): rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /dad dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /
83a1(mdo sde): na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsngo byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/ma chad pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /
83a2(mdo sde): lta ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas
83a3(mdo sde): dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal/bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhug so///
83a4(mdo sde): gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po g.yog 'khor mi 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pas bden pa mthong bar gyur pa de'i tshe des phan btags pa la drin bsab par bstan pa dang /sangs rgyas
83a5(mdo sde): kyi mchod pa lugasu gzhug pa dang /khyim yangs par bstan pa dang /sangs rgyas 'byung ba gces par bstan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i
83a6(mdo sde): pho brang du gdugs tshod la spyan drangaso//de nas ma ga d+ha'i pha brang 'khor gyi mi rnams la bsgo ba/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa la me tog dang /me tog 'phreng dang /spos dang /
83a7(mdo sde): byudrug pa rnams kyis mchod pagyis shig/rgyal po'o khab kyi grong khyer thams cad kyang rdo dang gseg ma dang /gyo mo med par gyis shig/me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor la/rgyal mtshan dang
83b1(mdo sde): ba dan sgreng shig/'od ma'i tshal nas rgyal ba'i khab kyi las kyi lam thams cad kyang ras kyis khebs par gis shig ces byas so//blon po rnams kyis kyang thams cad nyam su blangaso//de nas
83b2(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can snying pos rang gi lag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng du gdugs rtsibs brgya pa bzung //pho brang 'khor gyi mi gzhan dag gis ni dge slong stong gi gdugs thog so//de nas
83b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang la 'khor yang dul ba dang /zhi la 'khor yang zhi ba dang /grol la 'khor yang grol ba dang /dbugs phyin la 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang /byang la 'khor yang byang ba
83b4(mdo sde): dang /dgra bcom par gyur la 'khor yang dgra bcom par gyur pa dang /'dod chags dang bral la 'khor yang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang /mdzes la 'khor yang mdzes pa ste/khyu mchog
83b5(mdo sde): ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor pa lta bu dang /glang po che glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /song ga gcan zan gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i
83b6(mdo sde): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /na mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /dpa' bod mag ma'i tshogs kyis bskor
83b7(mdo sde): ba lta bu dang /sa mkhan 'dron po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /tshong dpon grong khyer gyi mis bskor ba lta bu dang /rgyal phran blon po'i
84a1(mdo sde): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu dang /zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /nyim 'od zer stong gis/
84a2(mdo sde): bskor ba lta bu dang /yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor bo lta bu dang /'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba
84a3(mdo sde): lta bu dang /nor sbyin gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /thag zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i tshogs kyis
84a4(mdo sde): bskor ba lta bu dang /tshangs pa tshangs ris kyis bskor ba lta bu dang /rgya mtsho ltar ltem me 'dug pa dang /sprin rlan dang ldan pa lta bu dang /glang po che'i rgyal po rgyags pa med pa lta bur
84a5(mdo sde): dbang po shin tu dang tha dang /spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'tshal ba dang //sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa du mas brgyan pa'i bcom ldan 'das grong khyer der gshegs te/gang gi tshe bcom ldan
84a6(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs sgo'i them pa la bzhag pa de'i tshes chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe/rmad du byung ba de lta bu dag byung /gzhan
84a7(mdo sde): yang 'di lta ste sgo dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to//dma' ba rnams ni mthon por gyur to//glang po che rnams kyang skad 'byin to rta rnams kyang skad 'byin to//khyu mchog rnams kyang
84b1(mdo sde): skad 'byin to//rol mo'i che byad rnam pa sna tshogs khyim khyim ni 'dug pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin to//long ba rnams kyang mig gi mthong bar gyur to//'on pa rnams kyang rna ba thos par gyur to//skyug
84b2(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang smra shes par gyur to//dbang po lhag ma mo tshang ba rnams kyang dbang po tshang ba thob par gyur to//chang gis ra ro ba rnams kyang sangs par gyur to//dug 'thungs pa rnams kyang dug med
84b3(mdo sde): par gyur to//phan tshun 'khon pa rnams kyang byams pa'i sems thob par gyur to//sbrum ma rnams kyang bde bar btsa' bar gyur to//bcings pa rnams kyang grol bar gyur to//nor med pa rnams
84b4(mdo sde): kyang nor rnyed par gyur to//bar snang la gnas pa'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang lha'i me tog gi char
84b5(mdo sde): 'beb so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i 'byor pas rgyal po'i pho brang du gsheg so//rgyal po gzugs can snying po yang bdag nyid lag dar te phyi rol gyi sgo gang du zhabs bsil ba'i tsan
84b6(mdo sde): danas mchog pa'i chu thogs te/bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs gsil to//de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/
84b7(mdo sde): ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zhal zas gsol to//gshos gsol nas/ka shi ka'i na bza' yang phul lo//rgyu des na ma ga d+ha'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dad par gyur to//de nas dge slong dag tha
85a1(mdo sde): tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa dge ba'i rna ba gang gis bcom ldan 'das dang /dge slong gi dge
85a2(mdo sde): 'dun gyis 'di lta bu'i mchod pa brnyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gang du mdzad lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa
85a3(mdo sde): nyid kyis/sngon tshe rab gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/nga nyid kyis las
85a4(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur//
85a5(mdo sde): chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye
85a6(mdo sde): mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par
85a7(mdo sde): 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig
85b1(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bde mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //de ljongs rgyu shing
85b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa las rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon te/rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde mdzad ljongs rgyu shing gshegs pa
85b3(mdo sde): las/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor der byon to zhes thos so//thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
85b4(mdo sde): rgyas bde mdzad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde mdzad kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/
85b5(mdo sde): rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde mdzad kyis/byang chub thob par byed pa'i chos rnams yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go/de nas rgyal
85b6(mdo sde): po dga' bar gyur nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde mdzad rgyal po'i pho brang du spyan drangs nas/zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol to//'bum ri ba'i na bza' yang phul lo//
85b7(mdo sde): yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten yang khor ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig/'bong du rgyang grags gcig yod pa brtsig so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na/
86a1(mdo sde): rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pad ni nga yin to//ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde mdzad la/de lta bu'i mchod pa byas te/des na ngas 'khor ba na bde ba mtha'
86a2(mdo sde): yas pa nyam su myong la rgyu de nyid kyis da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur na yang rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di lta bu'i mchod pa byas so//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par
86a3(mdo sde): bya ste/ston pa la bkur bsti bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mo bya'o//mchod pa bya'o//ston pa la bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o/
86a4(mdo sde): zhes dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa ba nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
86a5(mdo sde): par bstod do////lha'i zas shes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /
86a6(mdo sde): tshod dben rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /
86a7(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi'am ci dang /lha
86b1(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman
86b2(mdo sde): zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka len da ka gnas pa na bzhug so//de na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/yong su
86b3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa/mu stegs can la dga' ba zhig gnas pa de tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos dad par
86b4(mdo sde): byas te bstan pa la btsud nas/bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to//khyim bdag de yang rgya chen po la mos pa zhig ste/des tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la smras pa/
86b5(mdo sde): bdag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal gyis grogs mdzod cig/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos kyang khyim bdag de la cang mi smra bas khas blangaso//de nas tshe dang ldan
86b6(mdo sde): pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos khyim bdag de khrid nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//
86b7(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa khyim bdag 'di ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
87a1(mdo sde): bcas pa gdugs tshod gsol par 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnang bar mdzad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das
87a2(mdo sde): kyis kyang khyim bdag de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zhal zas dang /
87a3(mdo sde): me tog dang /spos dang /me tog 'phreng dang /byug pa dgu bsham so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bskul to//khyim bdag
87a4(mdo sde): 'di'i grogs gyis shig ces byas so//de nas lto'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa dga' byed tshal du sprul to//sa srung gi bu dang /rab brtan
87a5(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba'i glang po che stong phrag mang po dag kyang khrid de 'ongs te/de dag ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi steng du gdugs rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa 'dzin to//de dag
87a6(mdo sde): la sogs pa lha'i bu mo stong phrag du ma yang khrid te 'ongs te/de dag ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can gyis g.yeb par byed do//rab
87a7(mdo sde): dga' dang /zur pung lnga pa dang /tum bu ru la sogs pa dri za stong phrag du ma yang khrid de 'ongs te/de dag ni rol mo'i sgra khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs len par byed do//lha'i 'du
87b1(mdo sde): ci'i zhal zas dag kyang sbyar to//de nas khyim bdag des lha dang mi'i yo byad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas nas lus thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
87b2(mdo sde): 'tshal te/smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yong su gtong ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten long ba/'dren pa med cing yongasu 'dren pa med par
87b3(mdo sde): sems can margal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /ma grol ba rnams 'grol ba dang /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /yongasu mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las zla
87b4(mdo sde): ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de'i rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad/
87b5(mdo sde): do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i zhal nas 'od gzer sngon pa dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas
87b6(mdo sde): cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /'dus 'jom dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen
87b7(mdo sde): po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer dang /a cu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar
88a1(mdo sde): gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsal bar gyur te 'bab bo//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba
88a2(mdo sde): gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo//des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar 'gyuraro//de nas de dge 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag 'di nas
88a3(mdo sde): shi 'phos sam/'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo//de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du
88a4(mdo sde): sems te/kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phros par ma gyur la/gzhan du yang ma skyes mod kyi/'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad
88a5(mdo sde): par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga'o bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang
88a6(mdo sde): du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang //
88a7(mdo sde): 'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs pa
88b1(mdo sde): tshon de rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /chad med 'od rnams dang /'od gasngal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dag rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang /sprin med rnams dang /
88b2(mdo sde): bsod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu che rnams dang /mi che rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gyi nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song
88b3(mdo sde): nas/mi rtag po dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i sgra smrog so//tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis//sangs rgyas bstan
88b4(mdo sde): la sbyor bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la glang tshon bzhin//'chi bdag sdeni gzhim par gyis//gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid pa//bag yod spyod par byed dang ni//skye ba'i 'khor b.rab sbyangs
88b5(mdo sde): nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur//zhes rjod par byed do//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi
88b6(mdo sde): bzhin 'brang ste/gel te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'ad kyi sna los su'i rnang bar 'gyuraro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun logasu
88b7(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyuraro//sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar
89a1(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//yi dag su skye bar lung ston par bzhad na ni/zhabs kyi mtha bor mi snang bar 'gyuro//mar skye bar lung ston par bzhad na ni/pus mo gnyi su mi snang bar 'gyur//
89a2(mdo sde): stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal poraro lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na na/phyag g.yas/
89a3(mdo sde): pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//ltar skye bar lung ston par bzhad na ni/lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur//
89a4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/smin mtshams kyi mdzod bur mi snang bar 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni//
89a5(mdo sde): dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyu ro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar gyur
89a6(mdo sde): to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can//mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byang bar gyur//de yis
89a7(mdo sde): phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshig su bcad de gsol pa//rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes rab spangs pa'i//sangs
89b1(mdo sde): rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus byab mkhyen lags na//
89b2(mdo sde): dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams//thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur//
89b3(mdo sde): brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyi na du 'dzum mi ston//gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das/
89b4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum
89b5(mdo sde): ba mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lagaso//kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed
89b6(mdo sde): pa dang /sbyin par byas pa'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis bskal pa grangs meng ba gsum gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub te/snying rje chen pos yongasu bsgos
89b7(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par byas nas/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i yang dag
90a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha'i zas sbyin zhes bya bar 'gyur te/'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems mngon par dga'//
90a2(mdo sde): bar gyur pa 'di yin no//skabs 'di ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang /g.yog 'khor rnams kyis thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur to//de nas dge slong dag the tsom
90a3(mdo sde): skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag 'dis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
90a4(mdo sde): la lha dang mi'i 'byor pa dag gis mchod pa bgyis pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan
90a5(mdo sde): dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bstsags pas na/nga nyid kyis las byas shing
90a6(mdo sde): bstsags pa 'di dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bstsags pa rnams ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur
90a7(mdo sde): chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bskyugs pa rnams ni/zin pa'i phung po dang //
90b1(mdo sde): khams dang /skye mchod rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du
90b2(mdo sde): smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig
90b3(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //de nas yang dag par rdzogs
90b4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas gang po ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhig tu byon te/rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
90b5(mdo sde): gang po ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor der byon to zhes thos so//thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa cher po dang /rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang ldan pas yang dag par
90b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang pog la ba der song ste phyin nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs
90b7(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug nas/rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glang pos byang chub thob par byed pa'i chos rnams yang dag par 'dzin du bcug go//
91a1(mdo sde): de nas rgyal rigs spyir nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glang po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum gyi bar/
91a2(mdo sde): dun bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams la spyan drang so//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang pos kyang cang
91a3(mdo sde): mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang pos cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/zla ba
91a4(mdo sde): gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so//bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs
91a5(mdo sde): kyang rin po che las byas so//sangs rgyas kyi dga' ston byas nas/der srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dad pa chen po skyes te/rgyu de dang rkyen des de dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das
91a6(mdo sde): so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus ni rgyal por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang po la de lta bu'i mchod pa byas
91a7(mdo sde): pa des na/ngas 'khor ba na bde ba mtha' yas pa nyam su myong ste/de nyid kyi rgyus da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa na yang ngal tshong dpon dang /brgya byin gyis 'di lta bu'i mchod
91b1(mdo sde): bapabyas so//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ston pa la bkur bstir bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ram byed//mchod pa bya'o//ston pa la bkur bstar byas/bla mar byas/
91b2(mdo sde): mo byas/mchod pa byas nas/brten te gnas par bya'o//zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/
91b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs po la mngon par bstod do//gang po la sogs pa rtogs brjod pa las sdom gyi tshig su bcad pa gnyis pa rdzogs so////sdom ni tsan dan dang ni pad+ma
91b4(mdo sde): dang /de bzhin 'khor lo mgo bcu pa//mdog 'jam dang ni 'od bsal dang //mnyan pa dang ni spos dang ldeng //dri med gdangs snyan zhes bya ba//sde tshan dag tu bstan pa yin//tsan dan zhes bya
91b5(mdo sde): ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug pa rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams
91b6(mdo sde): dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /nam mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas//
91b7(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
92a1(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge
92a2(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa/yul ma ga d+ha na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to//de'i tshe gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram nas thig mi ring ba zhig na mchod rten zhig ral
92a3(mdo sde): du gyur pa/rlung dang nyi tshan gyis bshig pa grag 'dug pa de dag dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das mchod rten 'di su'i lags//
92a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rang sangs rgyas tsan dan zhes bya ba zhig byung ste de'i yin no//dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas tsan
92a5(mdo sde): dan ga las byung lags/ming ni tsi las btags lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed rang sangs rgyas tsan dan ga las byung ba dang /ming ci las
92a6(mdo sde): btags pa nyan par 'dod dam/gsol pa/btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lagaso//bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do//
92a7(mdo sde): dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/grong khyer bA ra na sin/rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de//de'i ringal 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo
