92b1(mdo sde): legs pa dang /skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang ba dang /cod pa dang /'thab pa zhi ba dang /'khrug pa dang /nang 'khrugs dang /chom rkun dang /mu ge dang /nad rnams med pa dang /
92b2(mdo sde): 'bras sa lu dang /bu ram shing dang /ba lang dang /ma he dang ldan par 'dug/rgyal ba de yang chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do//de bu med nas bu 'dod de/
92b3(mdo sde): bu lang dang /chu lha dang /ku be ra dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/'di lta ste/thun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /nags
92b4(mdo sde): tshal gyi lha dang /lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang /sum mdo'i lha dang /gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang /chos 'thun pa dang /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams
92b5(mdo sde): la yang gsol ba 'debaso//'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skyes par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/de yang de lta ni ma yin te/gal te gsol ba
92b6(mdo sde): gtab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/'khor los sgyur po'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigaso//ye ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang
92b7(mdo sde): bu mo skye bar 'gyur te gsum gang zhe na/pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang /na dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /dri za 'ongs pa ste/gnas 'di gsum tshogs
93a1(mdo sde): pA las du dang bu mo skye bar 'gyuraro//de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la da' bskyed mos tshal gyi rdzing chen po zhig yod pa de'i nang nas kyang pad+ma chad las
93a2(mdo sde): 'das par che ba zhig skyes te/de nyid ni cig bzhin du cher skye la/kha ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do//de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas rgyal po la gsol to//de nas rgyal pos kyang
93a3(mdo sde): bad+yAd legs par skyongs shig ces pa sgyur//byis re shig na nyi ma 'char kar 'ad+ma kha byenas/pad+ma de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes pa mdog
93a4(mdo sde): bzung ba gser gyi kha dag can mgo ba gdugs ltar 'dug pa/lag pa ring gi/bral po'i das tshig sku mthog/sna lags pa/smin ma stug /lhas skyes burgyan
93a5(mdo sde): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mis lus legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byis pa zhig skyil mo krung bcas shing drug ste/de'i kha nas ni pad+ma'i na
93a6(mdo sde): 'byung la/lus las ni tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ngo //de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas kyang rgyal po la gsol to//de nas rgyal po blon po dang /btsun mo dang bcas pa/bskyed mas
93a7(mdo sde): tshal du dong nas/khye'u des mthong ma thag tu rgyal po la smras pa/yab chung gshegs bdag ni khyod sras mi mngal ba'i sras lagaso//de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgul mo rangs na/
93b1(mdo sde): smras pa/bud ni khyod ji skad bar ba bzhin no//de nas rgyal po rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas/pad+ma'i snying po las khye'u blangs te/lug par gzhag ste//de nas khye'u ngas gang dang gang du rkang pa
93b2(mdo sde): bzhag pa de dang der pad+ma dag byung ngo //de nas de'i ming tsan ngan zhes btag so//gang gi tshe khye'i tsan dan khad kyis cher skyes pa de'i tshe/grong khyer gyi mi rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol pa/
93b3(mdo sde): bdag cag gi grong khyer 'dir dus ston byung na/lha sras tsan dan btang ba'i rig so//'on tang bdag cag dang lhan cig tu dus ston myong bar 'gyur la/gnas thams cad kyang pad+mas brgya
93b4(mdo sde): pabapar 'gyur lag so//rgyal pos smras pa de ltar bya'o//de nas tsan ngan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/blon po'i bu rnams kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa/rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs
93b5(mdo sde): byed cing /grong khyer gyi dus ston myong bar bya ba'i phyir/rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyi rol tu byung ngo //de nas de der 'gro ba na gom pa re re la pad+ma lda na sdug cing yid 'phrog pa dag byung ste/de dag nyi ma'i
93b6(mdo sde): 'od zer gyis phog ma thag tu rnyes shing skam mo//de nas sems can dag pa/bsam pa dge ba/sngon sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba sgyid skyed pa des de mthong nas/tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa
93b7(mdo sde): skyes te/ji ltar pad+ma 'di dag skyes pa'i mod la ni mdzes pas 'dug la/nyi ma'i 'od gzer gyis gdungs pas ni rnyas shing skam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/lus 'di yang de dang 'dra'o snyam mo//
94a1(mdo sde): de de ltar sems shing 'jal la nye bar rtog pa na/byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/des skye bo'i tshogs kyi nang na 'dug bzhin du rang sangs
94a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so//de nas re shig na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de la gos tshon can dag phul te/de dag bgos nas na mkha' la 'phags te/cho 'phrul rnam
94a3(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs byas nas/de mthong bas rgyal po dang /blon po dang /grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang bcas par dga' ba chen po thob ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bskyed do//bcom ldan 'das
94a4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag rang sangs rgyas tsan dan ni de las byung ste ming yang de las btag so//dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa rang sangs
94a5(mdo sde): rgyas tsan dan gyis las gang dag bgyis shing bstsags na des de'i lus kyang dri gda' la dbang po yang rno bar gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bcom ldan 'das 'od srung
94a6(mdo sde): gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/des der dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la spos chu'i dbang bskur ba yang phul/me tog dag kyang btags te/der rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam yang bsgoms//
94a7(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ston pa la bkur bste bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mo bya'o//mchod pa bya'o//ston pa la bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ro mo byas/mchod pa
94b1(mdo sde): byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis
94b2(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////pad+ma zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams
94b3(mdo sde): dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
94b4(mdo sde): bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
94b5(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams
94b6(mdo sde): brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe yul dbus na 'khod
94b7(mdo sde): brnams kyi lugs kyis na/kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma rnams kyis pad+ma dag blangs te/srang du song zhing 'tshong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/lhung
95a1(mdo sde): bzed bsnams nas/mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegaso//bud med zhig kyang khye'u zhig pang na thogs te/srang du song ba las khye'u des sangs rgyas bcom/
95a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag
95a3(mdo sde): pa'i 'od mnga' bor rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dga' ba skyes te/glo bur tu lago pa brkyang nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma las pad+ma blangs te/
95a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbul bor ro//de nas pad+ma de shing rta'i phang lo tsam du gyur te/steng gi na mkha'o lo 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la/bzhes na ni sdod do//de
95a5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i 'od zer dag bkye nas/des mnyen du yod pa ril gyis snang bar byas so//rgyu ngas na rgyal po dang /blon pa dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi
95a6(mdo sde): rnams dad par byas so//de nis bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan lus rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i tshe zhal nas
95a7(mdo sde): 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can
95b1(mdo sde): dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bdud 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /
95b2(mdo sde): so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer dang /a tsu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/cha bo'i sems can dmyal ba gang
95b3(mdo sde): yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab de//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo//de nas sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnam
95b4(mdo sde): rtse zhil bar gyur to//de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo//de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir//
95b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems te/kye bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/gzhon du yang ma
95b6(mdo sde): skyes mod kyi/'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mithus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon
95b7(mdo sde): por dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin
96a1(mdo sde): par 'gyuraro//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang //
96a2(mdo sde): 'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad
96a3(mdo sde): med 'od rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang /sprin med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu
96a4(mdo sde): che rnams dang /mi che rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /
96a5(mdo sde): stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogaso//tshigasu bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de//nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis//sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la
96a6(mdo sde): glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis//gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la//bag yod spyod par byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par
96a7(mdo sde): 'gyur//zhes brjod par byed do//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/gal te bcom
96b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snum log su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun lcog su mi snang bar
96b2(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyuraro//
96b3(mdo sde): yi dag su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyuraro//mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//stobs kyi 'khor
96b4(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil
96b5(mdo sde): du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//ltar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//rang sadra
96b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston pararo bzhed na ni/smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug
96b7(mdo sde): tor du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar gyur to//
97a1(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/tshon sna stong gis sbrel bsna chags can//mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung /
97a2(mdo sde): bar gyur//de yis phyo rnam kun tu snang bar brgya /nyi ma shar pos ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshig su bcad de gsol ba/rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes sbyangs
97a3(mdo sde): pa yi/sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal nga dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtan ngos nyid
97a4(mdo sde): ci blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams//thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the tsom
97a5(mdo sde): skyes pa bstsal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang nir rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams byin 'da' 'dzum mi ston//gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston
97a6(mdo sde): mdzad pa//de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs
97a7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dad pa skyes pas/de bzhin gshegs pa la da
97b1(mdo sde): 'thor ba mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lagasaso//kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis/bskal pa bco
97b2(mdo sde): lnga'i bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/lha dang mi'i bde ba nyam su myong nas/rang sangs rgyas pad+ma'i blo ma zhes bya bar 'gyur te/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems
97b3(mdo sde): dge' bar gyur pa 'di yin no//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/sangs rgyas dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /nyan thos rnams la bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong
97b4(mdo sde): khyed kyis de ltar bsgrub par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
97b5(mdo sde): 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /
97b6(mdo sde): tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams
97b7(mdo sde): dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha me yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /
98a1(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phyo chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /
98a2(mdo sde): gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lAn dka gnas pa na bzhug
98a3(mdo sde): so//de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab nas ded dpon zhig rgyu mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs nas/de'i chung ma lang tsho la bab pa de khyim thab la gdung zhing yongasu yi chad la/smre sngags
98a4(mdo sde): 'don kyang /de'i khyim thab ma 'ongs nas des sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal te/dam bcas pa gal te bdag gi khyim thob myur du 'ongs ni bdag gis khyod la gser gyi 'khor
98a5(mdo sde): lo dbul lo zhes byas so//de nas de'i khyim thab rgya mtsho'i nang nas myur du phyir 'khor te/nye zho med par bde bar 'ongaso//de nas des gser gyi 'khor lo byed du bcug ste/
98a6(mdo sde): de 'bran po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba pa/'khor lo dang /spos dang /gdug pa dang /me tog khyer te lha khang du chas so//de'i skabasu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
98a7(mdo sde): ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/mi gzigs pa 'am/mi rtogs pa 'am/thugasu mi chud pa ci yang med la/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/'jig rten la
98b1(mdo sde): na 'dogs pa la zhus pa/srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/gaN+DIg tu dpa' ga/zla med pa/gar+b+hasu ma gsung ba/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad/
98b2(mdo sde): pa/bsgrub pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la ma nges pa/chub bzhi las rgal brdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi'i zhangs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/bsdu ba
98b3(mdo sde): dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/
98b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/yon lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs pa/rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
98b5(mdo sde): gyi me tog gis phyug pa/lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas po stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/phyogs bcur grags pas kun
98b6(mdo sde): tu rgyus pa/brgya phrag bcu la dbang byed pa byas kyang chos khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la
98b7(mdo sde): gzigs te/su ni chud/su ni dar/su ni phongs shing 'dug/suni nyam nga bar gyur/su ni gnod pa dang ldan/sun mongs pa dang nyams ba deng gnod pa dang ljon/su ni ngan sang du
99a1(mdo sde): gzhol/su ni ngan song du 'bab/su ni ngan song du bab/su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/mtho ris dang /thar pa dang /'bras bu la gzhag par bya/su ni 'dod
99a2(mdo sde): pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
99a3(mdo sde): ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongasu smin par bya/su ni yongasu smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug/
99a4(mdo sde): 'dir smos pa/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid//gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med//de nas bcom
99a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi bu mo des mthong na//rang byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyuro snyam du gzig so//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang /chos gos gsol te/
99a6(mdo sde): lhung bzed bsnams nas/dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la gshegaso//de nas
99a7(mdo sde): bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshon sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/
99b1(mdo sde): nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //de nas mthong ba'i mod la dga' ba thob ste/bcom ldan 'das la gser gyi 'khor lo da
99b2(mdo sde): bar byas so//de nas bran mos bkag ste/'di sred med kyi bu ma yin zhes byas so//'on kyang de bkug bzhin du dad pa drag pos yid 'dun par gyur nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
99b3(mdo sde): sbyong du gser gyi 'khor lo bo ra//sras dang /gdug pa dang /me tog rdul lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzub pa mdzad de//'od ni sa su rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ka
99b4(mdo sde): gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer ston po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas//kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'grog
99b5(mdo sde): 'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bdud 'jom dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med pa
99b6(mdo sde): dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer dang /a tsu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/
99b7(mdo sde): che ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te bang po//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo//de nas sems can de dag gi
100a1(mdo sde): gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to//de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo//
100a2(mdo sde): de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad do//de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/kye bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos par ma
100a3(mdo sde): gyur la/gzhan du yong ma skyes mod kyi//'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo//de nas de dag
100a4(mdo sde): sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/lha dang /mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur
100a5(mdo sde): bder nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur ro//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan
100a6(mdo sde): rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ros rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung
100a7(mdo sde): rnams dang /tshad meng 'od rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang //dge rgyas rnams dang /sprin med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang
100b1(mdo sde): 'bras bu che rnams dang /mi che rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug
100b2(mdo sde): bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog so//tshigasu bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis//sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam
100b3(mdo sde): bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis//gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid lo//bag yod spyod par byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal zad par
100b4(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur//zhes brjed par byed do//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/gal te
100b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snam log su mi snang bar 'gyur ro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhin ni/mdun logasu mi
100b6(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro//sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rting par mi snang
100b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//yi dag su skye bar lung ston pa ro bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyuraro//mir skye bar lung ston par bzhod na ni/pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro//stobs
101a1(mdo sde): kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i 'thil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na
101a2(mdo sde): ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi 'gyuraro//ltar skye bar lung ston par bzhad na ni/lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang ba
101a3(mdo sde): 'gyu ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston por bzhed na ni/smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par
101a4(mdo sde): bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod bur
101a5(mdo sde): mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/chan sna stong gis sbrel ba sna tshogs ce na//mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar
101a6(mdo sde): gyur//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma sha ro bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa
101a7(mdo sde): yi/sangs rgyas 'gro bdag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtan pos nyid kyi bla
101b1(mdo sde): yos dus bab ma byon lags na//dge slong rgyal dang nyan thos som nyi 'chal ba rnams/thub pa khyu mchog gni gsung mchog brtan pa dang /bzang po bdag gis thotsom smos pa
101b2(mdo sde): bstsal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams ldan 'da' 'dzum mi ston//gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//
101b3(mdo sde): khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
101b4(mdo sde): yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo bu mo 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la gser gyi 'khor lo bor ba mthong ngam/btsun
101b5(mdo sde): pa mthong lagaso//kun dga' bo bu mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis bskal pa bco lnga'i bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur
101b6(mdo sde): te/lha dang mi'i bde ba nyam su myong nas/rang sangs rgyas 'khor lo bla mo zhes bya bar 'gyur te/de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang du la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no//dge slong
101b7(mdo sde): dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab bor bya ste/sangs rgyas dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /nyan thos rnams lo bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan
102a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///
102a2(mdo sde): mgo bcu pa zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tsheng
102a3(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /nam mkha' lding rnams dang /mi'am ci rnams dang /
102a4(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/rim byas/mchod pa byos te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am
102a5(mdo sde): tsa dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /
102a6(mdo sde): gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/yul me ga d+ha na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon
102a7(mdo sde): to//de nas dge slong rnams kyis thig ring po zhig nas mchod rten rnying pa rlung dang nyi chen gyis gshig pa zhig 'dug pa de mthong ngo //mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun
102b1(mdo sde): pa mchod rten 'di su'i lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa'i yin no//dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas mgo/
102b2(mdo sde): bcu pa ga las byung lags/ming ni ci las btabs lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa ga las byung ba dang /ming tse las
102b3(mdo sde): btags pa nyan par 'dod dam/gsol pa/btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lagaso//bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do//dge
102b4(mdo sde): slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/grong khyer bA ra na si na/rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa dang /
102b5(mdo sde): skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang ba dang /rtsod pa dang /'thab pa zhi ba dang /'khrug pa dang /nang 'khrug dang /chom rkun dang /mu ge dang /nad rnams med pa dang /'bras sa lu dang /bu ram shing
102b6(mdo sde): dang /ba lang dang /ma he dang ldan par 'dug go/rgyal po de yang chos can chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhig te/chos bzhin du rgyal po byed do//de nas rgyal po de'u med nas bu 'dod de/gu lang
102b7(mdo sde): dang /chu lha dang /ku be ra dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/'di lta ste/kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /nags tshal
103a1(mdo sde): gyi lha dang /lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang /sum mdo'i lha dang /gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /lhan cig skyes pa dang /chos 'thun pa dang /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang
103a2(mdo sde): ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debaso//'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus/bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyuraro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod med kyi/de yang de lta ma yin te//
103a3(mdo sde): gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na ni/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigaso//ye ni gnas
103a4(mdo sde): gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/gsum gang zhe na/pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang /ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /dri za 'ongs
103a5(mdo sde): pa ste/gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro//de yang gsol ba 'debs pa lhur byed cing 'dug la/de'i skyed mos tshil gyi rdzing chen po ud pa la dang /
103a6(mdo sde): pad+ma dang /ku mud dang /pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/'gramadong pa dang /ngur ba dang /zil mo la sogs pa bya sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig yod pa de'i nang nas kyang pad+ma tshad
103a7(mdo sde): las 'das par che ba zhig glo tor du skyes te/de nyin cig bzhin du cher skye la/kha ni mi 'bye ba zhig yod do//de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas rgyal po la gsol to//de nas rgyal pos
103b1(mdo sde): kyang pad+ma de legs par srungs shig ces bsgo'o//phyis re shig na nyi ma 'char kar pad+ma de kha bye nas/pad+ma de'i snying po la khye'u gzugs bzang zhing dalta na sdug la mdzes pa/mdog bzang ba/gser gyi
103b2(mdo sde): kha dog can/mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/log pa ring ba/dral ba'i dbyes che ba/sna mtho ba/sna legs pa/smin ma stug pa/lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs
103b3(mdo sde): bar brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa zhig skyil mo krung bcas shing 'dug ste/kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas kyang rgyal po la gsol to//de nas rgyal pos thos nas/blon
103b4(mdo sde): po dang /btsun mo dang bcas pa bskyed mos tshal du dong ste/pad+ma'i snying po la ge lta bur mdzes shig 'dug pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ste/yi rangs nas dga'
103b5(mdo sde): ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/rdzing gi nang du zhugs nas khye'u blangs te bkur bsti chen po dang ldan pas rang gi pho brang du khyer nas/dge sbyong dang bram ze dang /mtshan mkhan dag la bsnyad de/zhag
103b6(mdo sde): bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bcas ston rgyas par byas nas/mgo bcu pa zhes ming btag so//de nas khye'u mgo bcu pa pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis
103b7(mdo sde): dang /dri ma 'khru bo rim ma gnyis dang /brtse ba'i mi ma gnyis te/ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/de ma ma brgyad kyi sa 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying ku dang /gzhan
104a1(mdo sde): yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur te/khye'u de yang dad pa dang ldan la/bsam pa bzang zhing
104a2(mdo sde): dge ba bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/snying rje che ba/bdag nyid che ba/chos 'dod pa/skye dgu la byams po zhig ste/des yab rgyal sa na 'dug pa na/kha na ma
104a3(mdo sde): tho ba dang bcas pa dang /kha na ma tho ba'i las dag byed pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang khye'u de mi dga' nas yab la gsol pa/yab bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
104a4(mdo sde): ba la rab tu 'byung bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes byas so//yab kyis kyang gnang ste/de skra dang kha spu bregs nas/gos tshon can bgos te/yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim
104a5(mdo sde): nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de nas des lung mnos pa med par byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon du gyur te/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon
104a6(mdo sde): sum du byas nas/na mkha' la 'phags te yab la cho 'phrul rnam po sna tshogs bstan to//de nas yab kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du bshos la spyan drangaso//de nas de'i lus
104a7(mdo sde): thogs pas yongasu skyo nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan te/shing zad pa'i me bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par song ste/de'i mchod rten 'di yin no//de nas dge slong rnams
104b1(mdo sde): the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa rang sangs rgyas mgo btsu pas las gang dag gyis na/ma'i mngal du skyes te//
104b2(mdo sde): pad+ma las skyes lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag mgo bcu pa nyid sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgalo bzhin
104b3(mdo sde): du 'byung lo/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/mgo bcu pa nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyamasu myong bar 'gyur te/
104b4(mdo sde): dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khar ma ma rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par
104b5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams byas shing bsags sna rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//lus
104b6(mdo sde): can dag gi las rnams ni//bsgral pa brgyar yang chud mi za//tshigs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal
104b7(mdo sde): pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes
105a1(mdo sde): bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //de
105a2(mdo sde): nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de/rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan zhes bya ba na rten cing bzhug so//de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
105a3(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs sde dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/lhung bzed bsnams nas/dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas/rgyal po'i
105a4(mdo sde): pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la gsheg so//ded dpon zhig kyang pad+ma khyer te srang du zhug so//de nas des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sku skyes bu chen
105a5(mdo sde): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/
105a6(mdo sde): rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/mthong ma thag tu pad+ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du bor te/bor ma thag tu pad+ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du shing rta'i phang
105a7(mdo sde): lo tsam du gyur te/bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro la/gzhes na ni sdod do//de nas re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis ded dpon de rang
105b1(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung bstan to//de nas dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas rang gi khyim du song ba dang /de'i skabasu de'i chung ma bu btsa' zhing 'dug ste/skrad ngan mthon nas/des bran mo la de
105b2(mdo sde): ci zhig ces dris so//des kyang de bzhin du bsnyad do//de nas dad dpon de mi dga' bar gyur nas smon lam btab pa/bdag nams kyang 'khor ba na ma'i mngal du skye bar ma gyur cig byas so//
105b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas mgo bcu pa de yin to/dge ba'i rtsa ba des bskal
105b4(mdo sde): pa dbu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du nams kyang ma'i mngal du ma skyes la/srid pa tha ma la yang de'i 'byor po de 'dra bar gyur to//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/sangs rgyas
105b5(mdo sde): dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /nyan thos rnams la bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs
105b6(mdo sde): te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///mdog 'jam zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po dang /phyug po
105b7(mdo sde): rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /de dadon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang
106a1(mdo sde): mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin
106a2(mdo sde): dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ni bza' dang /zhal
106a3(mdo sde): zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag
106a4(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/tshong dpon phyag cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/nor dang yo byad mang ba/bdag dbang ba mang ba/mdza'
106a5(mdo sde): bo dang /blon po dang /nye du dang /rgan rabs mang ba zhig yod de/khyim bdag de yang dad pa dang ldan pa/dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/
106a6(mdo sde): snying rje che ba/bdag nyid che ba/chos 'dod pa zhig go/de nas 'di snyam du sems te/longs spyod 'di dag ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin can/smig rgyu dang 'dra ba/mi rtag pa/mi brtan pa//
106a7(mdo sde): ther zug pa ma yin pa/yid brtan du mi rung ba 'gyur ba'i chos can/gnod pa chen po lnga dang thun mong du 'dug pa yin gyis/bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
106b1(mdo sde): bdun dang bcas pa la cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus gsol la/zhal zas bzang pos tshim par bya gor mchag snyam mo//de nas des bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khrus gsol/
106b2(mdo sde): pa dang /gdugs chod gsol bar spyan drang so//de nas de la phan gdags pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/dge
106b3(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'dun du bdar nas tshig dang ldan pa'i khrus la gsheg so//de nas tshong dpon de til mar spos can khyed te bsr-i gang du song nas/bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
106b4(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas so//de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas po khrus gsol zin pa de'i tshe//khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das nyan
106b5(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la rang gi lag nas/bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang pos tshim par byas te/ci bzhed pa bstab so//rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma
106b6(mdo sde): bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te/ci bzhed pa bstabs nas/bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/gsang sngor ni rgyu/phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/stan ches dma' ba
106b7(mdo sde): zhig khyer te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/de la bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan//yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag
107a1(mdo sde): par gzeng bstod/yang dag par dga' bar mdzad do//chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par dadu //
107a2(mdo sde): bstod/yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhug so//de nas tshong dpon de dad pa rnyed nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcas pa bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
107a3(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te/sems la rtas par byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i
107a4(mdo sde): chas nyid de/de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro
107a5(mdo sde): ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bdud 'jom dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu che ba dang /mnar med pa
107a6(mdo sde): dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer dang /a tsu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen
107a7(mdo sde): por song nas/che ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo//
107b1(mdo sde): dosan sems can dag gi gnang pa'i khyung pa rnams kyi la bar 'gyur//denas de dag 'ad snyam du semasate/ gabus 'dre 'das sran/na tu ga
107b2(mdo sde): sam snyam mo//de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/kye bdog cag ni
107b3(mdo sde): nas kyang shi 'bos par ma gyur la/gzhon du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngan ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/bdag cag gi banod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur
107b4(mdo sde): to snyam mo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa
107b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyuraro//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /
107b6(mdo sde): 'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang //
107b7(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang //
108a1(mdo sde): sprin med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang 'bras bu che rnams dang /mi che rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong
108a2(mdo sde): rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogaso//tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed
108a3(mdo sde): de/nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis//sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis//gang zhig chos 'dul
108a4(mdo sde): 'di nyid la//bag yod spyod par byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor pa rab spongs nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes brjod par byed do//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum
108a5(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan
108a6(mdo sde): 'das kyi snam log su mi snang bar 'gyur ro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun log su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//se ni dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs
108a7(mdo sde): kyi thil du mi snang bar 'gyur//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi snying par mi snang bar 'gyuraro//yi dag su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang
108b1(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro//mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyis mi snang bar 'gyur//stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du ma
108b2(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/lte bar mi snang bar
108b3(mdo sde): 'gyuraro/nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston por bzhed na ni/smin 'tshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang
108b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan
108b5(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/tshonas
108b6(mdo sde): stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can//mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshigasu bcad de
108b7(mdo sde): gsol pa/rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro bdag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung
109a1(mdo sde): mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtan po nyid kyis blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//dge slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams//thub pa khyu mchog gi ni
109a2(mdo sde): gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the tsam skyes pa bsal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyin da 'dzum
109a3(mdo sde): mi ston//gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni
109a4(mdo sde): de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo tshang dpon 'dis nga
109a5(mdo sde): la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lagaso//kun dga' bo tshong dpon 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba
109a6(mdo sde): 'dis/rang sangs rgyas mdog 'jam zhes bya bar 'gyuraro//de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang du la sems dga' bar gyur pa 'di yin no//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya
109a7(mdo sde): ste/sangs rgyas dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /nyan thos rnams la bkur posti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal naso//
109b1(mdo sde): dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////'od bsil zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po
109b2(mdo sde): chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma
109b3(mdo sde): yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mI 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /
109b4(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan
109b5(mdo sde): pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyan gsos dang /skran zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/rgyal bu
109b6(mdo sde): rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe minyan du yod pa na/khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/yongasu 'dzin pa
109b7(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/de yang dad pa dang ldan la/dge zhing bsam pa pothang la bdag la phan pa dang /
110a1(mdo sde): gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/snying rje che ba/bdag nyid che ba/chos 'dod pa/skye dgu la byams pa zhig go/de nas 'di snyam du sems te/longs spyod 'di
110a2(mdo sde): dag ni chu zla lta bu'i rang bzhin can/glang po che'i rna ba ltar g.yo ba/brtan pa/ther zug pa ma yin pa/yid bton du mi rung ba/'gyur ba'i chos can/gnod pa chen po lnga dang
110a3(mdo sde): thun mang du 'dug pa yin gyis/bdag gis lings spyod snying po med pa las snying ba drung bar bya gar ma chags snyam mo//des sos ka'i dus la bab pa na/bcom ldan 'das nyan
110a4(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshed du la spyan drangs nas/khyim yang rdo dang giseg mo dang /gyo ma med par byas te/tsun dan gyi chus ni chug chag btab/spris sna tshogs
110a5(mdo sde): kyi snod ni dkra ma/dri zhim po'i bdug pas ni bdugs/me tog sna tshogs kyis ni gtor/me tog gi gdan rnams ni bsham so//de nas khu ba bsil ba'i btung ba rnams dang /khur
110a6(mdo sde): bdang bshos rnams sta gon byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs ched bskul ba/btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste/bshos lags na/bcom ldan 'dra
110a7(mdo sde): kyis da de'i dus la bab pa dgongs te/gshegasu ges la zhes bskul to//de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/lhung bzed bsnams nas///
110b1(mdo sde): slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas/khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan
110b2(mdo sde): bshams pa la bzhug so//de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/rong gi lag nas bza' ba dang /bca' ba gtsa
110b3(mdo sde): ma bzang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa blta ba so//rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang /bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po rnam grangs du mas tshim par byas te/ci bzhed pa bstabs nas//
110b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/gsang sngor ni gyu/phyag ni bcabs par rig nas/stan ches dma' ba zhag khyer te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
110b5(mdo sde): sngar 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par
110b6(mdo sde): dga' bar mdzad do//chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mas yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugaso//
110b7(mdo sde): de nas khyim bdag de dad pa rnyed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/sems la rtas par byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs
111a1(mdo sde): rdzas bcom ldan 'das rnams glang gi tshe 'dzum par mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams
111a2(mdo sde): byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bdud 'joms dang /
111a3(mdo sde): ngu 'dod dang /ngu 'a'od chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kye hud zer dang /a cu zer dang /
111a4(mdo sde): ud pa la dang /gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab pa//grang ba'i
111a5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo//de na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur te/de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/
111a6(mdo sde): kye ci bdag cago 'di nas shi 'phos sam/'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyim mo//de nas de dag dad pa bskyod pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/de dag gi
111a7(mdo sde): sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/kye bdag cag ni 'od nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/gzhon du yang ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i
111b1(mdo sde): mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i
111b2(mdo sde): las de zad de/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par gyur to//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris
111b3(mdo sde): rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams
111b4(mdo sde): rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad
111b5(mdo sde): med dge rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang /sprin med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu che rnams dang /mi che rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang rnams
111b6(mdo sde): dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog so//tshigasu bcad pa gnyis
111b7(mdo sde): kyang rjod par byed de/nges par 'byung ba brtsams par gyis//sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis//gang
112a1(mdo sde): zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la//bag yod spyod par byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur//zhes rjod par byed do//
112a2(mdo sde): de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'breng ste/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i
112a3(mdo sde): las lung ston par bzhed na na/bcom ldan 'das kyi sna ma logasu mi snang bar 'gyuraro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun logasu mi snang bar 'gyur ro//sems can
112a4(mdo sde): dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na na/zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyuraro//yi dag su skye
112a5(mdo sde): bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur//mir skye bar lung ston par ro bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyisu mi snang bar 'gyur ro//stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i
112a6(mdo sde): rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi
112a7(mdo sde): d+harma bar 'gyu ro//ltar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/lte bor me snang bar 'gyuraro//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung stan par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//rang sadra
112b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/smin 'tshams kyi mdzod pur ma snang bar 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor
112b2(mdo sde): du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi smin motshams kyi mdzad spur mi snang bar gyur to//de nas
112b3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can//mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs rnams
112b4(mdo sde): kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgas spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi
112b5(mdo sde): dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dag thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//dge
112b6(mdo sde): slong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams//thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal
112b7(mdo sde): lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyi nad 'dzum mi ston/gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal//bcom
113a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
113a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams ni//rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo khyim bdag 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lag so//kun
113a3(mdo sde): dga' bo khyim bdag 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtang ba 'dis/rang sangs rgyas 'od bsal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//de'i sbyin par
113a4(mdo sde): bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/sangs rgyas dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /nyan thos rnams la bkur
113a5(mdo sde): bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
113a6(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do////mnyan pa zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang
113a7(mdo sde): 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am
113b1(mdo sde): rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi
113b2(mdo sde): 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shis pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod na mos chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /
113b3(mdo sde): snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/yul ma ga d+ha na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las gang+gA'i klung gi 'gram du byon to//de nas bcom ldan
113b4(mdo sde): 'das dge slong gi tshegs kyis zham ring byas te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas/mnyan pa rnams ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/mnyan pa rnams la 'di skad ces bka'
113b5(mdo sde): stsal to//kye chu klung 'di las nga sgrol cig/mnyan pa rnams kyis gsol pa/gru bcos stsol cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to///
113b6(mdo sde): nga yang sngon mnyan pa byed byed de/ngas dga' bo ni 'dod chags kyi chu klung du lhung ba las bskul/sor 'phreng ni zhe sdang gi rgya mtshor lhung ba las bsgral/bram ze'i bu nga rgyal gyis khengs
113b7(mdo sde): pa ni/nga rgyal gyi mtshor lhung ba las bsgral/lteng rgyas 'od srung ni gti mug gi rgya mtshor lhung ba las bsgral te/'on kyang nges gru btsas ma blangs//de skad ces bka' stsal kyang
114a1(mdo sde): bsgral bar khas ma blangaso//de nas mnyan pa zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yang thos/gzugs phun sum tshogs pa
114a2(mdo sde): de yang mthong nas dad pa skyes te/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bsgral bar 'tshalo zhes gsol to//de nas dge slong rnams grur zhugs
114a3(mdo sde): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis mnyan pa de bas kyang chas sngar pha rol gyi 'gram du zhugs par gyur to//de nas mnyan pa des rdzu 'phrul de mthong nas/sems dga'
114a4(mdo sde): bar gyur te zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/mnyan pa des de thos nas 'jig
114a5(mdo sde): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so//des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan
114a6(mdo sde): gsum du brjod de btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /rus pa'i ro la bsgral ba dang /ngan song gi sgo thams cad bcad pa
114a7(mdo sde): dang /mtho ris dang /thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /bdag lte dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang
114b1(mdo sde): ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi mtshon rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis
114b2(mdo sde): lag so//yang gsol pa/nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam//shin tu mi bzang khyod kyis mthu yis bcad//bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye//mya ngan 'das pa'i lam
114b3(mdo sde): yang bdag gis thob//bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob//bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal//'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i
114b4(mdo sde): go 'phang thob//mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa//skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa//srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba las//thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod//de'i
114b5(mdo sde): nang nas mnyan pa cig cig 'gyod pa chen po skyes nas/des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te nyes pa bshags nas/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
114b6(mdo sde): bshos gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer
114b7(mdo sde): sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni/sems can dmyal ba
115a1(mdo sde): yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bdud 'jom dang /ngu 'bod dang /du 'bod chen po dang /cha ba dang /ra d+hA rmya ba dang /mnar med pa dang /rgyu bur can dang /chu
115a2(mdo sde): bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer dang /a tsu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltarags pa chen por song nas/che ba'i sems
115a3(mdo sde): can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab po//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo//des na sems can de dag gi gnod/
115a4(mdo sde): pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur ro//de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas shi 'phos sam/'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo//de nas de dag dad pa
115a5(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la//
115a6(mdo sde): gzhan du yong ma skyes mod kyi/'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to//snyam mo//de nas de
115a7(mdo sde): dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems cani dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du
115b1(mdo sde): rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyuraro//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga'
115b2(mdo sde): ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung
115b3(mdo sde): rnams dang /tshad med 'di rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang /den rgyas rnams dang /sprin med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang //
115b4(mdo sde): 'bras bu che rnams dang /mi che rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/mi rtag po dang /sdug
115b5(mdo sde): bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogaso//tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis//sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam
115b6(mdo sde): bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis//gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la//bag yod spyod par byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs naso//sdug bsngal
115b7(mdo sde): zad par byed par 'gyur zhes rjod par byed de//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/
116a1(mdo sde): gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhud nan/bcom ldan 'das kyi snam log su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung
116a2(mdo sde): stospyon par bzhed na ni/mdun log su mi snang bar 'gyu ro//sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//dud 'gror skye bar lung
116a3(mdo sde): sbyin par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi skying bar myi snang bar 'gyur//yi dgasu skyo bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur//mi skye bar lung sbyin par bzhed na ni/
116a4(mdo sde): dus mo gnyi su mi snang bar 'gyur//stobs kyi 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgya
116a5(mdo sde): bopor lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mo snang bar 'gyuraro//lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/lte bar mi snang bar 'gyuraro//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston
116a6(mdo sde): byar bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung sbyin por bzhed na ni/sbyin mtshams kyi mdzod spu mi snang bar 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag pa
116a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhad na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom
116b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod bur mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/tshon sna stong gas spel ba sna tshogs//
116b2(mdo sde): can/mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/rgod dang bral
116b3(mdo sde): zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston///
116b4(mdo sde): brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'tshal ba rnams//thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the tsam
116b5(mdo sde): skyes pa bsal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyin da 'dzum mi ston//gang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//de ni
116b6(mdo sde): khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
116b7(mdo sde): yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo mnyan pa 'dis rnga la sems dga' ba bskyed pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lag so///
117a1(mdo sde): kun dga' bo mnyan pa di dag pa'i rtsa bdud/sems baspyad pa/sbyin par byu yongasag ba 'dis/ma'ongs du 'dus na rangs sargyas 'dod
117a2(mdo sde): ces bya bar 'gyur//de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos na gang du la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no//dge sbyong dag de bas na 'di ltar bsgrub par bya ste/sbyangs rgyas dang /rang sa sa rgyas dang /
117a3(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams la bkur ba skye bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bsgrub par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan
117a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///spos kyi dang ljang zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /byegan
117a5(mdo sde): rnams dang /pi brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dben rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klurna mes dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha'
117a6(mdo sde): ldelding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas ri mor byis/mched pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnad sbyin dang /lham
117a7(mdo sde): yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal
117b1(mdo sde): zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /spyan gsos dang /sman blong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na/'od ma'i chal byA ka lan dka gnas pa na
117b2(mdo sde): rten cing bzhug so//de'i tshe yul dbus na 'khod pa'i yul me rnams kyi lugs kyis na/phal cher byug pa sna tshogs kyis lus bzud par byed do//de nas re zhig na khyim bdag gi bu shig
117b3(mdo sde): yid pa de'i bran mo dad pa dang ldan pa la/dge zhing ngasam pa bzang ba zhig yod bcan dan dmar po 'ang shing 'du'o/bcom ldan 'das kyang sngo dri sha mthabs dang /chos gos gsol te/srung
117b4(mdo sde): bzed bsnams nas/dge slong gi tshogs kyi zham ring byas te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la gsheg so//de nas bu mo des sangs rgyas
117b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis bcad pa/nyi ma stong pas
117b6(mdo sde): lhag pa'i 'od mnga' bo/rini ngo che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bu mo de dad pa chen po skyes so//de nas de dupa rnyed nas 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis
117b7(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i zhing rnyed kyang dbul ba'i nyes pas/bcom ldan 'das la bkur bsti byed mi nus na/bdag gis 'tshe ba 'di 'dra ba ci dgos snyam mo//de nas des rang gi srog la yang ma bltas
118a1(mdo sde): te/lag pa gnyi ga can dan dmar pos byugs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la bsku so//bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis//
118a2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer ril gyis tsan dan gyi dris gang bar mdzad do//de nas bu mo des cho 'phrul de mthong nas/sems dga' bar gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
118a3(mdo sde): 'tshal nas/sems la rtas par byas te/bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon
118a4(mdo sde): sunA du byed par gyur cig ces byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/
118a5(mdo sde): de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas//kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de
118a6(mdo sde): dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bdud 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu che ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur
118a7(mdo sde): can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer dang /a chu zer dang /ud pa la lha rags pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/
118b1(mdo sde): ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bad po//blang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab bo//des na sems can de dag gis
118b2(mdo sde): gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to//de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo//de nas de dag dad pa
118b3(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad do//de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/gzhan
118b4(mdo sde): du yong ma skyes mod kyi 'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/bdag cag gis gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to snyam mo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems
118b5(mdo sde): mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du 'das pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin
118b6(mdo sde): par 'gyuraro//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga'
118b7(mdo sde): rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od
119a1(mdo sde): rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang /dag chung rnams dang /chad med dge rnams dang /dad rgyus rnams dang /sprin med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams
119a2(mdo sde): dang /'bras bu che rnams dang /mi che rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/mi
119a3(mdo sde): rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i sgra sgrog so//tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de/nges par 'byung ba brtsam par gyis//sangs rgyas
119a4(mdo sde): bstan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis//gang zhig chos 'dul 'di nyid la//bag yod spyod par byed pa ni//skye
119a5(mdo sde): ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur/zhes rjod par byed do//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
119a6(mdo sde): bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snum logasu mi
119a7(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyuraro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun logasu mi snang bar 'gyuraro//sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhad na ni/zhabs kyi
119b1(mdo sde): mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyuraro//yi dwags su skye bar lung snyan par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi
119b2(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro//mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro//stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon
119b3(mdo sde): pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro//lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni//
119b4(mdo sde): lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung snyan par bzhed na ni/smin mtshams kyi mdzad
119b5(mdo sde): pur mi snang bar 'gyur//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'dra
119b6(mdo sde): la la ni gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi smin 'tshams kyi mdzad pur mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus
119b7(mdo sde): pa tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can//mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar ngos ji ltar bgyis pa bzhin//yang
120a1(mdo sde): tshigasu bcad de gsol ba//rgod dang bral zhing rgyugs dang mi dgyes spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu//
120a2(mdo sde): rkyen ma mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtun pos nyid kyi blo yis dus byab mkhyen lags na//dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'chel ba rnams//
120a3(mdo sde): thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal par gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lto bur brtan pa yi//mgon po rdzogs sangs
120a4(mdo sde): rgyas rnams myi nad 'dzum mi ston//gang gi don tu dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad po//de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun
120a5(mdo sde): dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi
120a6(mdo sde): mdzad do/kun dga' bo bu mo 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lag so//kun dga' bo bu mo 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /
120a7(mdo sde): sbyin par bya ba'i chos yong su gtong ba 'dis/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rang sangs rgyas spos kyi ngang ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur//de'i sbyin par bye ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dad par byas
120b1(mdo sde): 'di yan//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bstsu bar smyos sa r+b+bas dpya/rangasas rgyas dang /nyan sa rnams la nga zhes dge slong khyed kyis du ltar bslab par bya//6
120b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sang m+b+ha s+yA /da /slong de dag \u0f7fsa/ma ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mengon par bskyed do//dri ma med pa zhes bya na/seM sa rgyas bcom ldan pa
120b3(mdo sde): mi rgyal po rnams dang /blon pa rnams dang /byug pa rnams dang /bidrang khor gyi mirna mes dpe tshong ba rnams dang /ded dananarnaM sa dang /spyarna mas dang /rnams dang /gnod ston rnams dpe/
120b4(mdo sde): yAn rnams dang /rnam pa'i lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang / 'argya chenu ba rnams kyis bkung bsti byas/rtswa mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnad sbyin dang /snyam
120b5(mdo sde): yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /me 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po non gyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'du bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa na bza dang /zhal zas dang /gzims kyi dang /gdan
120b6(mdo sde): dang sman gsos dpe/sbyin po rnams skyes hU~M nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dadu bcas pa mnyan du ya pa na/rgyal bu rgya ma byed kyi tshal khyim dag ni gon med nas sbyin gyi kun dga' ban bcug so//
120b7(mdo sde): gyig kun dge' tsho'i sras mnag yo risas shi shig kyi te mnyan du med pa ris //sa maben nig tsa zlokan 'jug /den sa zhing ni 'i 'i ma rdzas rang byu ldan pa
121a1(mdo sde): 'gyuraro zhes zer ro//de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs mas tshig de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/so shing 'di gang la byin na/de'i rgyus bdag cher bkur ba 'gyur zhig gu
121a2(mdo sde): snyam mo//yang de 'di snyam du sems te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyu ba dang /mi rgyu ba'i 'jig rten na/bsod nams kyi zhing 'gro ba 'bras bu yod pa yin gyi/bdag gis
121a3(mdo sde): 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo snyam mo//de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des so shing de khyer nas/bcom ldan 'das ga le ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan
121a4(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
121a5(mdo sde): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i skad du tshems shing 'dis pazhes su gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma la phan gdag
121a6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/phyag gser gyi kha dog can/glang po che'i sna ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas bzhes so//bzhis nas kyang de kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma'i mdun du gsol to//gsol nas kyang
121a7(mdo sde): so shing des la btsug so//de nas btsugs pa'i mo de kho na'i skad cig la yal ga dang lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i shing n+ya grod chen po chu zhengs
121b1(mdo sde): gab pa zhig tu gyur te/de'i grib ma la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas/lha dang mi dum la chos bstan to//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa
121b2(mdo sde): gsol to//de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul gyis sems dad par byas nas/sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/smon lam
121b3(mdo sde): btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
121b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu
121b5(mdo sde): 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du 'gro'o//'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bdud 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po
121b6(mdo sde): dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu che ba dang /mnur med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi hud zer dang /a cu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gus pa dang /
121b7(mdo sde): pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/tsha ba'i sa ni dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab po//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te/
122a1(mdo sde): 'bab bo//des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to//de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/
122a2(mdo sde): 'on te gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo//de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems te/kye
