122a3(mdo sde): bdag cag ni 'di nas kya shrI 'phros par mgyur la/gzhan du yang ma smos mod kyi/'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'di'i mthus/bdag cag gi gnod pa'i 'a par rnams
122a4(mdo sde): cizil bar gyur to snyam mo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad de/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du
122a5(mdo sde): bden pa rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyuraro//steng du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /sum curtsagasum pa rnams dang /
122a6(mdo sde): 'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang /
122a7(mdo sde): tshangs chen po rnams dang /'di chung rnams dang /tshad med 'od rnams dang /'od gsol rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang /dge rgyas rnams dang /
122b1(mdo sde): sprin med rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu che rnams dang /mi che rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams dang /'og min
122b2(mdo sde): gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i sgra sgrogaso//tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyang rjod par byed de//nges par 'byung ba brtsam par
122b3(mdo sde): gyisasangs rgyas bstan la sbyar bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par gyis//gang zhig ches 'dul 'di nyid la//bag yod spyod par byed pa
122b4(mdo sde): ni/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur zhes rjod par byed do//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas//
122b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phye bzhin 'brang ste/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snam log su mi snang bar 'gyur ro//ma 'ongs
122b6(mdo sde): pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun logasu mi snang bar 'gyuraro//sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mithil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//dud 'gror skye bar
122b7(mdo sde): lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyuraro//yi dag su skye bar lung ston por bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur//mir skye bar lung ston par bzhad
123a1(mdo sde): nAni/pus mo gnyi su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//stobs kyi 'khar los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur/
123a2(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//lhor skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur/
123a3(mdo sde): thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhad na ni/smin mtshams kyi mdzod bur mi snang bar 'gyuraro//
123a4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyur//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsu
123a5(mdo sde): bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi smini mtshams kyi mdzod bur mi snang bar gyur te//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus
123a6(mdo sde): pa/tshon sna skyong gis spel ba sna tshogs cin//mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa
123a7(mdo sde): bzhin/yang tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgyes spangs pa yis//sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub
123b1(mdo sde): rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtan pos nyid kyi blo yis dus bab mkhyen lags na//dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som 'tshal
123b2(mdo sde): bya rnams/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog bstan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa yi//mgon po
123b3(mdo sde): rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams gyen du 'dzum mi ston//glang gi don du dpa' bo 'dzum pa skyon mdzad do//de ni khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan par 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis
123b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dog bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med
123b5(mdo sde): rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do//kun dga' bo kun dga' ra ba'i srungs ma 'dis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur bste byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lagaso//kun daglo kun dag bo ra ba'i
123b6(mdo sde): srungs ma 'dis dge ba'i rtsab dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum gyi bar du log par ltung bar mi 'gyur te/srid pa tha ma dang /
123b7(mdo sde): gnas tha ma dang /lus tha ma dang /bdag gi ngo bo tha ma thob po ni rang sangs rgyas dri ma med pa zhes bya bar 'gyuraro//de'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nga la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no//
124a1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/sangs rgyas dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /nyan thos rnams la bkur bsti bya'o//zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar
124a2(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs po la mngon par bstod do///
124a3(mdo sde): gdangs snyan ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams
124a4(mdo sde): dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /nam mkha' lding rnams dang /mI 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po
124a5(mdo sde): rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mi byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi'am ci dang /lho 'phye chen
124a6(mdo sde): po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/ni bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos
124a7(mdo sde): dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de nas bcom
124b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan du yod pa bsod snyoms la gshegaso//mdza' sde bo mang po zhig kyang chang gi ra ro zhing myos nas//
124b2(mdo sde): pi bang dang /gling bu dang /rdza rnga dang /rta zlum rnams dang /rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs byed de/gar byed glu len la/me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /
124b3(mdo sde): par shi ka la sogs pa me tog gi 'phreng ba mang po yang mgul du btags nas/gos khyad par du 'phags pa dag bgos te/mnyan du yod pa'i phyi rol du byung ngo //de nas mdza' sngo bo
124b4(mdo sde): de dag gis/bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa//
124b5(mdo sde): nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' bo/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/mthong ma thag tu de dag chang gis re ro ba de las songs par gyur to//de nas ra ro ba las
124b6(mdo sde): spangs nas sems dga' zhing dad par gyur te/gar dang glu dang /rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas so//ud pa la sngon po rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi
124b7(mdo sde): steng du gtor te/de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du khang pa brtsegs pa sngon po dang //khang pa sngon po dang /gdugs sngon po lta bur gyur te 'dug nas/de dag bcom ldan 'das gshegs
125a1(mdo sde): na ni 'gro la gzhes na ni sdod do//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'od sngon po dag bkye ste/'od de dag gis mnyan du yod pa nor bu and rnyil gyi mdog 'dra bar 'dug/
125a2(mdo sde): par byas so//de nas mdza' sde po de dag bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te/sems la rtas par byas nas/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos 'dis
125a3(mdo sde): bdag cag rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi
125a4(mdo sde): 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po rnams byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro'o//kha cig ni steng du
125a5(mdo sde): 'gro'o/'og tu 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /thig nan dang /bdud 'jom dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu
125a6(mdo sde): bdang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /so thams thams dang /kyi dud zer dang /arbu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /
125a7(mdo sde): pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song nas/tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa tu ni bsil bar gyur te 'bab bo//grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar
125b1(mdo sde): gyur te 'bab bo//des na sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar gyur to//de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos nas/'on te
125b2(mdo sde): gzhan du skyes sam snyam mo//de nas de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das sprul pa 'gyed par mdzad de/de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/kye ci bdag
125b3(mdo sde): ni 'di nas kyang shi 'phos par ma gyur la/gzhan du yod ma skyes mod kyi/'on kyang sngon ma byung ba'i sems can snang ba 'da'i mthus bdag cag gi gnod pa'i khyad par rnams rtse zhil bar
125b4(mdo sde): gyur to snyam mo//de nas de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dga' bar gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur bu'i las de zad de/lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du gang du bden pa
125b5(mdo sde): rnams kyi snod du rung bar 'gyur ba der nying mtshams 'dzin par 'gyur//sdong du 'gro ba gang yin pa de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang /suma~M cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang /'thab
125b6(mdo sde): bral rnams dang /dga'u sngon rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /tshangs ris rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun no 'don pa rnams dang /tshangs
125b7(mdo sde): po chen po rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshang med 'od rnams dang /'od gsal rnams dang /dge chung rnams dang /tshad med dge rnams dang /dag rgyas rnams dang /sbyin pa
126a1(mdo sde): rnams dang /bsod nams skyes rnams dang /'bras bu che rnams dang /mi tshe rnams dang /mi gdung rnams dang /gya nom snang ba rnams dang /shin tu mthong rnams
126a2(mdo sde): dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa'i skye sgrog so//tshig su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod par byed de/nges
126a3(mdo sde): bapar 'byung ba brtsam par gyis//sangs rgyas bstan la sbyor bar gyis//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag snga ni gzhom par gyis//gang zhog chos 'dul 'di nyid la//
126a4(mdo sde): bag yod spyod par byed pa ni//skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal zad par byed par 'gyur//zhes rjod par byed do//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
126a5(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ste/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi
126a6(mdo sde): snam log su mi snang bar 'gyur//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun log su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//sems can dmyal bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil
126a7(mdo sde): du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyu ro//yi dag su skye bar lung ston por bzhed na no/zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar
126b1(mdo sde): 'gyu'o//mir skyo bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/pus mo gnyi su mi snang bar 'gyuraro//stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du ma
126b2(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur//'khor lhos sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur//ltar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/lte bar
126b3(mdo sde): mi snang bar 'gyuraro//nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du mi snang bar 'gyuraro//rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/smin mtshams kyi
126b4(mdo sde): mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyuraro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/dbu'i gtsug tor du mi snang bar 'gyu ro//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom
126b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod pur mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan
126b6(mdo sde): 'dres la zhus pa/tshon sna stong gis spel ba sna tshogs can//mang po zhal gyi sgo nas byung bar gyur//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//nyi ma shar bas ji ltar bgyis pa
126b7(mdo sde): bzhin/yang tshig su bcad de gsol pa/rgod dang bral zhing rgyags dang mi dgos spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro ba dag gi dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thub rnams ni rgyu rkyen ma
127a1(mdo sde): mchis par//pad+ma'i rtsa dang dung mdog lta bu'i 'dzum mi ston//brtan pos nyid kyi blo yas dus pab mkhyen lags na//dge sbyong rgyal dbang nyan pa som nyi 'chal
127a2(mdo sde): ba rnams/thub pa khyu mchog gi ni gsung mchog brtan pa dang //bzang po dag gis the tsom skyes pa bsal bar gsol//rgya mtsho dang ni ri rgyal lta bur brtan+da pa yi//mgon po rdzogs
127a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams gyen 'dzum mi ston//gang gi don tu dpa' bo 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa/don khyod las skye bo phal chen nyan por 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
127a4(mdo sde): kun dga' bo de ni de bzhin no//de ni de bzhin te/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi
127a5(mdo sde): mdzad do//kun dga' bo mdza' sde bo 'di rnams kyis nga la 'di lta bu'i bkur bsti byas pa mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lagaso//kun dga' bo mdza' sde po 'di rnams dag pa'i rtsa ba
127a6(mdo sde): dang /sems bskyed pa dang sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis bskal pa nyi shu'i bar du log par lhung bar mi 'gyur te/srid pa tha ma dang /gnas tha ma dang /lus tha ma dang /
127a7(mdo sde): bdag gi ngo bo tha mi thob pa ni/rang sangs rgyas gdangs snyan zhes bya bar sha stag du 'gyur//de dag gi sbyin par bya ba'i chos ni gang nge la sems dad par byas pa 'di yin no//dge slong
127b1(mdo sde): dka da bas na 'di ltar slab par bya ste/sangs rgyas dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /nyan thos rnams la bkur bsti bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis
127b2(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///gang po la sogs pa'i rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las
127b3(mdo sde): sdom gyi tshig su bcad pa gsum pa rdzogs s+ho////sdom ni pad+ma dang ni kham re dang /chos skyong de bzhin zhi ldan dang //gzugs bzang mdza' bo'i bu mo dang //ri bong dang ni chos tshol
127b4(mdo sde): dang /mgon chad zas sbyin dab bzang ba//sna chen dag tu bstan pa yin//pad+me zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po rnams dang /byug po rnams dang /
127b5(mdo sde): pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dponi rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin nam dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /
127b6(mdo sde): mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/lho dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha'
127b7(mdo sde): lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims
128a1(mdo sde): cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/rgyu la bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/khyim
128a2(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de nas ston gyi dus kyi tshe/dge slong dag skya drang ser po'i nad kyis thibs te/lus rid cing /lus nyams chung bar
128a3(mdo sde): gyur to//bcom ldan 'das ni spyan mi mnga' zhing gnad pa med le/spyan gyis btab pa med de/stobs dang ldan no//de nas dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das
128a4(mdo sde): la zhus pa/btsun pa dge slong kha cig ni sngon gyi nad skya rba ba ser pos thebs te/lus rid cing /lus nyam chung bar gyur/bcom ldan 'das ni snyun mi mnga' zhing /gnod pa
128a5(mdo sde): ma mchis te/stabs dang ldan zhing rang bzhin gyis sbyin mi mnga' la/pho ba'i drod snyoms shig/'ju ba dang ldan pa la gzigs/bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin
128a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa nyid kyis/sngon tshe 'bras gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing
128a7(mdo sde): bsags pas na/nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhog gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i
128b1(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni//
128b2(mdo sde): zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la ngab
128b3(mdo sde): pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyuraro//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na//grong khyer bA ra na si na/rgyal po pad+ma zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa
128b4(mdo sde): dang /bde ba dang /le legs pa dang /skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /'thab pa dang /rtsod pa/zhi ba dang /'khrug pa dang /nang 'khrug pa dang /chom rkun dang /mu ge dang /nad rnams
128b5(mdo sde): med pa dang /'bras sa lu dang /bu ram shing dang /ba lang dang /me he dang ldan par 'dug ste/gnod pa med cing tsher ma bkrugs la bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bstangaso//rgyal
128b6(mdo sde): po de yang dad pa dang ldan la/dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba dang /bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje che ba/bdag nyid che ba/chos 'dod pa/skye dgu lo byams pa/thams
128b7(mdo sde): cad yongasu gtong ba/chags pa med par yongasu gtong ba/gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/de'i tshe bA ra na sir dus tshigs ma snyoms pa las mi nad chen po byung ste/sems can phal
129a1(mdo sde): che ny+tsa rbab kyi nad kyis btab bo//de nas rgyal pos de dag mthang nas snying rje bskyed de/bdag gis 'di dag yongasu bskyab par bya zhing gasko' bar bya'o snyam mo//
129a2(mdo sde): nas yul thams cad no sman pa 'khod pa rnams bsdus te/bsgo nas sems can de dag gi nad kyi gzhi dang /gnas dang snga nas gzhi yod pa rtogs nas/de'i 'og tu bdag nyid kyis
129a3(mdo sde): gso ba dang /sman thams cad bsdus par byas so//de nas gsas te/nor dang /spyan dang /nad g.yog dang /ldan par byas kyang yun ring po zhig lon gyi bar du sems can de dag gas
129a4(mdo sde): ma nus so//de nis rgyal pos sman pa thams cad bkug ste/gus par byas nas/kye ci'i phyir sems can 'di dag giso dka' bar gyur ces smras//de nas sman pa rnams kyis dpyad
129a5(mdo sde): de/yon tan dang nyes par gros 'thun par gsol pa/lta dus ma snyoms pa dang /khams ma snyoms pa las gyur pa lags pas/legs par ma rtogs mod kyi/'on kyang sman sna
129a6(mdo sde): cig mchis te/nya ro hI ta zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis la/gal te rnyed na ni des gso bar nus lag so//de nas rgyal po nya ro hi ti kun tu tshol ba la zhugs te/des tshol ba'i mi mang po
129a7(mdo sde): bkye nas btsal kyang ma rnyed do//de nas de dag gis rgyal po la gsol to//de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po 'chag du gshegs pa dang /nad pa de dag kyang gcig tu 'dus te 'khod nas/rgyal
129b1(mdo sde): po la gsol pa/rgyal po chen po bdag cag nad 'di las yongasu bskyab cing srog stsal du gsol/de nas rgyal pos nad pa rnams kyi tshig snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la gti zhing smra
129b2(mdo sde): ba'i tshig thos nas/snying rjes su snying bskyod de 'chi ma 'dzag cing ngu bzhon du phyung nas bsams pa/bdag gis gzhan sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams zhi bar byed kyang mi nus na/bdag gi 'chi ba 'di
129b3(mdo sde): lta bu dang /rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'di 'dra ba ci dgos snyam mo//de snyam du bsams nas/rgyal pos nor phal po che yongasu gtong ba byas te/bu thu bo rgyal por bcug nas/nyi du dang skye bo rnams
129b4(mdo sde): la nyes pa bshags te/pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /blon po rnams la bstod nas/nad pa sdug pa rnams dbugs phyung ste/brtul zhugs yan lag brgyad pa yang dag par blangs nas/khang bzangs kyi
129b5(mdo sde): steng du song ste/bdug pa dang /me tog dang /spos dang /me tog 'phreng dang /byug pa rnams gtor nas/shar phyogasu kha bltas te smon lam btab pa/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis
129b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams shin tu phongs par gyur te/nad kyis yongasu zin pa mthong nas/bdag gis rang gi srog pangs po yongasu btang ba'i bden pa dang /bden pa'i tshig 'dis bdag chu klung zlog byed
129b7(mdo sde): 'di'i nang du nya re hi tar skye bar shog shig ces smras nas//khang bzangs kyi steng nas bdag nyid kyis mchongaso//der lhung ba'i mod la shi nas/chu klung zlog byed kyi nang du nya bo che ro hi ta zhes bya bar
130a1(mdo sde): skyes so//de nas lha rnams kyis yul thams cad du/chu rlung zlog byed kyi nang du tu cher hu~M ti zhes bya ba skyes pa de ni nad tshabs po ches gzir nas/yun ring du lon pa rnams
130a2(mdo sde): kyi bdud rtsi dang 'dra'o zhes sgra smrag so//de nas thos ma thag tu skye bo phal po ches log nas mtshon cha thogs nas skon po khyer te dong nas/nya de gson por mtshon marnon po rnam pa sna tshogs
130a3(mdo sde): kyi sha rnams gcod pa la zhug so//byang chub sems dpa' de yang de ltar lus gcod pa na/sems can de dag la byams pas khyab par byas nas gdong mchi ma dron po 'dzag ste/des
130a4(mdo sde): bsams pa/bdag gis sha khrag gis sems can 'di dag bde drir 'gyur ba 'di ni/bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam nas/de lta bu'i tshul gyis lo bcu gnyis kyi
130a5(mdo sde): du rang gi shu khrag gis sems can de dag tshim par byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang sems ma log go/gang gi cha sems can de dag gi nad de zhi bar
130a6(mdo sde): gyur pa de'i tshe/nya bo che ro hi ta des sgra sgrags pa/kye sems can khyed nyon cig/nga ni rgyal po pad+me zhes bya ba de yin te/ngas khyed kyi don du rang gi srog yongasu btang nas lus 'di
130a7(mdo sde): lta bu blangs pa yin gyis/nga la sems dga' bar gyis shig dang gang gi tshed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe yang
130b1(mdo sde): khyed nad las gtan du yongasu thar par bya ste/mya ngan las 'das pa/gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa/grub pa dang bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes byas so//de skad thos nas ske ngo ga
130b2(mdo sde): de dag dang /rgyal po dang /blon po dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis dad pa rnyed de/me tog dang /me tog 'phreng dang /byug pa dag gis mchod nas smon lam btab pa/shin tu dka'
130b3(mdo sde): ba byed pa/khyod gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/bdag cag khyed kyi nyan thos su gyur cig ces byas so//bcom ldan 'das
130b4(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus ni/rgyal po pad+ma zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ngas de lta bu'i yongasu gtong ba byas pa des na/nga 'khor ba
130b5(mdo sde): na 'khor ba'i tshe/bde ba mtha' yas pa nyam su myong bar gyur la/de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang /pho ba'i drod
130b6(mdo sde): snyoms shing 'ju ba dang ldan te/des na ngas zos pa dang 'thungs pa dang /'chos pa dang /myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar zhu bar 'gyur te/nga nad med cing gnod pa med rnyed pa'i
130b7(mdo sde): rang bzhin can du gyur to//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/sems can thams cad la snying rje bsgom par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan
131a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///kham ro zhes
131a2(mdo sde): byab ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha
131a3(mdo sde): rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /me'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar
131a4(mdo sde): byas/ri mo byas/mchod par byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs
131a5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dong /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /ba dan dang snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge
131a6(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas spyan gyi kun dgabar ba na bzhugs so//der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong rnams la bka'
131a7(mdo sde): sprul pa/dge slong dag gal te ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang shes la/sbyin pa'i bgo bai sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes pa bzhin du sems can rnams kyis kyang sbyin pa'i
131b1(mdo sde): 'bras bu yang shes la/sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang shes su zin na ni/de lta na kham gyi tha ma dang //bam gyi mjug lus pa gang yin pa de las kyang /gal
131b2(mdo sde): te yin gnas len pa po snyed do/de la ma byin nam/bgo bsha' ma byas kyi bar du za bar mi byed la/de dag gi sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kus nas dkris cing 'dug par mi 'gyur ba
131b3(mdo sde): zhig na/ji ltar ngas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yong shes la/sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa shes pa bzhin du sems can rnams kyis/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yang mi shes la
131b4(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang mi shes pas na/de'i phyir de dag ni kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ma byin pa 'am bgo bsha' mo byas par za bar byed la de dag gi
131b5(mdo sde): sems kyang ser sna skyes pas kun nas dkris shing 'dug/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas/gzhan yang ston
131b6(mdo sde): pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bgro bsha' dag gi rnam par smin//ji ltar don chen 'gyur ba de//drang srong chen pos gsungs pa bzhin//sems can rnams kyis shes na ni//
131b7(mdo sde): ma byin bar du mi za zhing //ser sna can du mi 'gyur la//de dag kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems//nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur na//gang phyir byis pa gti mug gis//bsgribs pa rnams kyis
132a1(mdo sde): ma shes pa//de phyir kun tu 'dzin sems kyis//rtag tu ma byin za bar byed//de dag ser sna skyes nas kyang //sems ni kun nas dkris shing 'dug/dang
132a2(mdo sde): tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo 'di bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom
132a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa'i bsngags pa yang bka' stsal la/sbyin pa'i bgo ba shA'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang bka' stsal pa ni ngo mtshar lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
132a4(mdo sde): stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas sbyin pa'i bsngags pa yang brjod la/sbyin pa'i bgro bi sha'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang brjod pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod//
132a5(mdo sde): ngas 'das pa'i dus na slong ba'i phyir/bdag za bo'i kham khar 'ongs zin pa kyang yongasu btang ba de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /ngas bshad do//dge slong dag sngon
132a6(mdo sde): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/grong khyer bA ra na sa na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /lo legs pa dang /skye bo dang /mi mdo
132a7(mdo sde): pos gang ba dang /rtsod pa dang /'thab pa dang /rtsod pa zhi ba dang /'khrug pa dang /nere 'khrug dang /chom rkun dang /mu ge dang /nad rnams med pa dang /'bras so lu dang /bur ma
132b1(mdo sde): shing dang /ba lang dang /ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/gnod pa med cing tshor ma bkrugs la/bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskang so//rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la/dge zhing
132b2(mdo sde): bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa snying rje che ba/bdag nyid che ba/ches 'dod po/skye dgu la byams pa/thams cad sbyin pa thams cad yongasu gtong ba chags
132b3(mdo sde): pa med par yongasu gtong ba btong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go/phyis re shig na mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang 'dra bar mu ge chen po byung ngo //de nas skye bo'i tshogs mu ge yis dus
132b4(mdo sde): ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa/bkres shing lkog ma dang 'gram pa zhom pa/yi dgas lus 'dra ba de dag 'dus shing tshogs la/gcig tu 'phungs te rgyal po'i thad du dong na//
132b5(mdo sde): rgyal bar gyur cig/sku tshe ring bar shog shig ces bstod de smras pa/lha bdag cag mu ge'i 'jigs pa 'di las yongasu bskyab cing srog stsal du gsol zhes byas so//de nas rgyal pos
132b6(mdo sde): mdzod pa la bos te/kwa'i mdzod pa mdzod na zas dang skom bdag cag dang skye bo'i tshogs 'di rnams kyi chog par yod dam zhes byas so//de thos nas mdzod srungs ni re brtsis te/lha la gsol
132b7(mdo sde): bar 'tshalo zhes byas so//de nas rtsis mkhas pa rnams kyis brtsis na 'di srid cig gi bar du yul na 'khod pa thams cad ni nyin cig bzhin kham re re 'tshal la/rgyal po ni zhal khom gnyis
133a1(mdo sde): gsol ba mchis so zhes gsol to//de nas rgyal pos skye bo'i tshigs la bos te/bsgob/'o na khyed nyin cig bzhin du/rgyal po'i pho byang du shog la/kha mar re zos
133a2(mdo sde): nas deng shig ces byas so//de nas de dag nyin cig bzhin du lhags te/mi ros kham re zos nas gar dga' bar 'dong bar byed do//de nas bram ze gzhan zhig rtsis de'i nang du ma zhen te/gzhan
133a3(mdo sde): las gtam thos nas rgyal po la smras pa/lha rtsis mdzad par yul mi'i nang du bdag gis thos kyis/bdag kyang khams cig po de stsol cig ces bya'o//de nas rgyal pos bdan nyid kham gnyis tha ba la
133a4(mdo sde): cig bram ze la byin nas/kham cig ni yul mi dang thad mnyam par za bar byed do//lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni 'og ma la shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug ste/de 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma yul
133a5(mdo sde): b+hA ra na sin/rgyal po byed pa de ni shin tu dka' ba byed cing 'dug gis de bdag gis bgam par bya'o snyam mo//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid bram ze'i cha lug su sprul te/
133a6(mdo sde): dril bab pa'i tshe/rgyal po'i thad du song nas/rgyal bar gyur cig/sku tshe ring bar shog shig/ces bstod nas smras pa/lha bdag bkros kyis lha nyid kyi zhal kham cig pa das bdag la
133a7(mdo sde): phan gdags par gsol/de nas rgyal pos rang gi srog yongasu gting bar chad nas snying rjes bdag gi kham cig po de bram ze la byin nas sbyang bar 'dug ste/de lta bu'i tshul gyis zhag
133b1(mdo sde): drug gi bar du zan bcad do//'on kyang skye bo phal po che de dag zan za ba mthong na mchog tu dga' bar semaso//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po de shin tu dka' ba byed pa mthong nas/bum
133b2(mdo sde): ze'i cha lugs mi snang bar byas te/rang gi gzugasu 'dug nas rgyal po la bstod pa/rgyal po chen po legs so ma nyes so khyod dka' ba la zhugs pa 'dis bdag dga' bar gyur to//skye dgu skyong
133b3(mdo sde): ba 'di lta bu yod pa las na/skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag ni mgon yod pa yin no//de sa bon thams cad thob shig ces yul phyogasu sgo shig dang /bdag gis zhag bdun na gang gis 'bru rnams rgyal
133b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dbang chen gyi char dbab par bya'o zhes byas so//rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du byed du bcug go/brgya byin gyis kyang de lta bu'i dbang chen gyi char phab ste/des na mu ge bzlog ste/
133b5(mdo sde): lo legs par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na/rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin te/ngas
133b6(mdo sde): de lta bu'i mu ge byung ba na/yang rang gi srog yongasu btang ste/de lta bu'i sbyin pa dag byin no//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/sbyin pa dag sbyin no//bsod nams dag bya'o zhes
133b7(mdo sde): dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///
134a1(mdo sde): chos skyong zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon pa chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khar gyi ma rnams dang /tshong
134a2(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnames dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /nA mkha' lding rnams dang /me 'am ci rnams dang /lto' phye
134a3(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /ne mkha' lding dang /me 'am ci dang /lto'i phyi chen
134a4(mdo sde): bo rnams kyis mchod cing shes de'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /spyan gsos dang /sman//
134a5(mdo sde): zong+ge rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na/'od ma'i tshal bye ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhug so//gang ki tshe mi blun po lha sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das/
134a6(mdo sde): dbyings pa'i phyir glang po chenar snod yang tang /dug gi phye mas kyang gtor/gshed ma'i mo yang brtse ste/de bcom ldan 'das la yun ring byo nas gshed ma dang dag mi mdza' bar gyur la/
134a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das na de la byams pa'i dgongs pa dang /ngon pa'i dgongs pa dang /thugs brtsa ba'i dgangs pas nye bar gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
134b1(mdo sde): zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar lha sbyin 'di ni/bcom ldan 'das dgrongs pa'i slad du brtson par bgyid la/bcom ldan 'das ni 'di la byams pa'i dgongs pa dang /phan pa'i///
134b2(mdo sde): dgongs pa dang /thugs brtse ba'i dgongs pas nye bar gnas pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags
134b3(mdo sde): dang bral ba zhe sdang dang bral ba/gti mug dang bral ba/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde
134b4(mdo sde): ba dang /'khrug pa rnams las yongasu grol ba/thams cad mkhyen pa/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes dang /shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes zin pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar
134b5(mdo sde): tsha ba ci yod/'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa/zhe sdang dang bcas pa/gti mug dang bcas pa nas gzhon po'i tshe gsod du 'ongs pa na yang ngas 'di la sems sdang
134b6(mdo sde): ba ma byas pa de/legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /ngas bshad do//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/grong khyer bA ra na sa ni/rgyal po tshangs pas
134b7(mdo sde): byin zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/de'i rang la 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa dang /skye bo dang /mi mang pos yongasu gang ba/'thab pa dang /rtsod pa zhi ba dang /
135a1(mdo sde): 'khrug pa dang /nang 'khrug pa dang /chomarkun dang /mu ge dang /nad rnams med pa dang /'bras sa lu dang /bu ram shing dang /ba lang dang /ma he dang ldan par//
135a2(mdo sde): 'dug ste/gnod pa med cing tsher ma bkrugs la/bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangaso//rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la rgya dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/bdag la
135a3(mdo sde): pan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/snying rje che ba/bdag nyid che /chos 'dod pa/skye dbu la byams pa/thams cad yongasu gtong ba/chags pa med par yongasu
135a4(mdo sde): gtong ba zhig ste/gtong ba chen po la gnaso//rgyal po de la btsun mo blo ngan ma zhes bya ba gtum zhing khro lo gzu lums can zhig yod de/bu cig pa chos skyong zhes bya ba yang
135a5(mdo sde): blo ngan ma de nyid las btsas so//gzhon nu chos skyong de yang dad pa dang ldan pa/dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/snying rje che
135a6(mdo sde): ba/bdag nyid che ba/chos 'dod pa/skye dgu la byams pa zhig te de yang bA ra na si na gnas pa'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong na/sdug cing phangs la snying du
135a7(mdo sde): sdug cing yid du 'ong bar bya ba yin no//de nas de mkhan po'i thad du song nas/byis pa dag dang lhan cig tu yi ge slob bo//phyis re shig na rgyal po dpyid kyi tshe/shing rnams
135b1(mdo sde): me tog rgyas pa dang /dang pa dang /khrung khrud dang /rma byA dang /nI tsi dang /re skags dang /khu byug dang /shAng shang tAT rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod du/btsun mo dam pa dang bcas//
135b2(mdo sde): pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyis zham ring byas te/bskyed mos tshal gyi sar song ste/bskyed mos tshal de na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khar dang lhan cig rtse ba las btsun mo blo ngan ma phrag dog dang /
135b3(mdo sde): khro bas non te 'khrug so//rgyal pos ni de la skom 'thungs pa'i phyed bskur ba dang /de 'khrugs pas rgyal po la phrin spring ba/gal te bdag khyod kyis 'thungs pa'i phyed 'thungs par gyur
135b4(mdo sde): na bdag bu'i khrag 'thung bar gyur cig ces byas so//'dod pa ston pa la ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med de/de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin chos can yin mod kyi/'dod pa'i 'dod
135b5(mdo sde): chags kyi kun nas dkris pa med par gyur nas/btsun mo'i 'khor gyis phi'u btab kyang khro ba'i me 'bar te/de ci thur khros nas/khyed deng la khye'u chos skyong gi mgul pa chod de/de la
135b6(mdo sde): khrag lung cig ces bsgo'o//de nas khye'u chos skyong byis pa'i grwa gang na 'dug pas thos nas ngus te 'di skad du/'khor ba na sems can mi mthun pa na tha chad yin te/'di ltar khro ba'i dbang
135b7(mdo sde): gis rang gi lus las byung ba'i bu yang gsod par byed do//zhes smras so//de nas khye'u chos skyong rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/yab kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/yab cig
136a1(mdo sde): pha'o 'tshal la ni bu sdug la/bdag gis kyang nongs pa ma bgyis na/bdag mi dgum par ci gnang /rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/bu sdug gal te khyod kyi mas bzed na ni/
136a2(mdo sde): ngas kyang bzod par bya'o//de nas chos skyong ngu zhing ma'i thad du song ste/rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/yum bzod pa mdzod la bdag gisod du ma stsal cig ces smras so//
136a3(mdo sde): de skad du snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdug sdug skad zer la/gti zhing skye ba'i tshig thos kyang /des bzod pa ma byas so//de nas gshed na rnams kyis mtshon rnon pos khye'u chos skyong gi
136a4(mdo sde): mgul pa bcad de/btsun mo blo ngani ma la khrag blung na 'on kyang blo ngan ma 'gyod pa yang med do//khye'u chos skyong ni pha ma dang /gshed ma rnams la sems dga' ba bskyed nas shi'o//
136a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chos skyong zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no//btsun mo blo ngan ma ni lha sbyin
136a6(mdo sde): dri kho na yin te/de'i tsheng gshed ma'i lag tu stong ba na yang 'di la byams pa'i sems bskyed la/da ltar nga la bsung brtson pa na yang nga 'di la byams par sems/phan par sems//
136a7(mdo sde): snying brtse bar semaso//dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//
136b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////zhi ldan zhes bya ba ni sangs
136b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug pa rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lho rnams dang /
136b3(mdo sde): klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod
136b4(mdo sde): pi byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod
136b5(mdo sde): nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du
136b6(mdo sde): yod pa na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na dge slong dag 'dus pa chen po gnyisu gyur te/gcig ni dbyar
136b7(mdo sde): zla 'bring po la dbyar gnas par dam 'cha' bya'o//gcig ni ston zla tha chungs nya'i bar du dbyar gnas par dam 'cha' ba ste/der dge slong dag lhung bzed rnams kha dog sbyar bar byed de/chos
137a1(mdo sde): gos rnams 'khru zhing brtso bslag byed/tshem bu rnams 'drub par byed do//de nas re shig na dge slong zhig chos gros 'drub par 'dod na/khyab kyi mig tu skud pa gzhugs
137a2(mdo sde): ba nus nas/snying rje rje skad zer zhing /sdug sdug skad zer la/gti zhing smras ste/'jig rten bsod nams 'dod pa su yod/'jig rten ni bsod nams 'dod pa su yod ces zer ro//
137a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyang de dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'chags na 'chag cing bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis glang po che'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyang nas/gdangs zab cing snyan
137a4(mdo sde): la/zur phyin pa dang /bya ka la bing ka'i skad lta bur yid du 'ong ba/rnga bo che'i sgra ltar snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/dge slong nga ni 'jig rten bsod nams 'dod pa'o//de nas
137a5(mdo sde): dge slong des bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa/thos nas/gus par bsgrims pas la gor du/bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag nas bzung ste/rang gi mgo bo
137a6(mdo sde): la bzhag nas smras pa/bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi phyag 'dis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang /bsam
137a7(mdo sde): gtan dang /shes rab bsags na/'on kyang de dung bcom ldan 'das 'di skad du/dge slong nga ni 'jig rten ni bsod nams 'dod pa'o zhes gsung ngam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
137b1(mdo sde): stsal pa/dge slong nga ni bsod nams kyis chog mi shes te/dge slong ngas ni bsod nams kyi ro myong bas na de'i phyir nga bsod nams kyi chog mi shes so//de nas dge slong dag dri nam skyes te/
137b2(mdo sde): the tsam thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams kyis chog mi mkhyen pa ni ngo mtshar lag so//bcom ldan 'das
137b3(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba/zhe sdang dang bral ba/gti mug dang bral ba/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /
137b4(mdo sde): ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa las yongasu grol ba/thams cad mkhyen pa/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ye shes dang shes bya
137b5(mdo sde): thams cad la mnga' brnyes zin pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/'das pa'i dus na 'dod chags dang bcas pa/zhe sdang dang bcas pa/gti mug dang bcas pa/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /nu bo
137b6(mdo sde): dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi 'dre ba dang /'khrug pa rnams las yongasu ma grol ba'i tshe/nga bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams kyis
137b7(mdo sde): cho ga mi shes pa de/legs par rib rje nyon la yid la zung shig dang /ngas bshad do//dge slong dag sngon rkyong ba 'das pa'i dus na/rgyal po'i pho brang zhi nga'i sgra zhes bya ba na/rgyal po zhi ldan
138a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/de'i ringal 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa dang /skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang ba dang /rtsod pa dang /'thab pazhi pa dang /
138a2(mdo sde): 'khrug pa dang /nang 'khrug pa dang /chom rkun dang /mu ge dang /nad rnams med pa dang /'bras sa lu dang /bu ram shing dang /ba lang dang /ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/gnod pa med cing
138a3(mdo sde): tsher ma bkrugs la bu cig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangaso//rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la/dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/snying
138a4(mdo sde): rje che ba/bdag nyid che ba/chos 'dod pa/skye dgu la byams pa/thams cad sbyin pa/thams cad yongasu gtong ba/chags pa med par yongasu gtong ba/gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig
138a5(mdo sde): go/de nas de nang par sngar langs te/mchod sbyin gyi 'dun khang du song nas/zos 'dod pa rnams la ni zas sbyin par byed/skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom sbyin par byed/gos 'dod pa rnams
138a6(mdo sde): la ni gos sbyin par byed cing /nor dang 'bru dang /'gron bu dang /gser dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /dung dang /man shel dang /byi ru rnams yongasu gtong bar byed do///
138a7(mdo sde): 'on kyang de'i bsod nams kyi 'du byed rnams kyis chog me shes so//de btsun mo'i 'khor du song nas/btsun mo'i 'khor la zas dang /skom sbyin par byed do//bu rnams dang /blon po
138b1(mdo sde): rnams dang /dpa' bo dang /ru mchog dang /grong rdal gyi mi rnams dang /yul gyi mi rnams la zas dang gos sbyin par byed do//de nas rgyal bzhi ldan 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis mi
138b2(mdo sde): rnams ni tshim par byas na/srog chags phra mo rnams lus pa de dag ci zhig gis tshim par bya snyam mo//des bdag pa thams cad yongasu btang bas gos ya cig tsam gyon par zad de/lus
138b3(mdo sde): tshe las par gyur nas bsams pa/srog chags phra mo rnams la ni rang gi lus sbyin par bya'o snyam mo//des lus bzhogs nas gang na sha sbrang dang /sbrang bu mchu rings la sogs pa yod pa der
138b4(mdo sde): lus bor te 'dug nas/bu cig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du/khrag gis tshim par byas so//lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni 'og ma la shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug ste/de'adi snyam du sems te/ji rgyal
138b5(mdo sde): bobazhi ldan 'di sems can rnams kyi don tu 'di ltar byed dam/'on te snying rjes byed zhig gu snyam nas/bdag gis 'od bsam par bya'o snyam mo//de nas bya rgod stang zil bcag pa'i 'phro lta bu dang /
138b6(mdo sde): snagasa'i mdog can lta bur bdag nyid sprul to/rgyal po zhi ldan gyi thad du song nas/mtshus mis bu bar gzas na yang rgyal po de skrag par ni ma gyur gyi/byams pa'i mig chen pos bya rgod de
138b7(mdo sde): la bltas nas/smras pa/bu nga'i lus las gang 'dod pa las ci dga' dgur gyis shig ces byas so//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dga' bar gyur te/bram ze'i tshe lug su sprul naso//rgyal
139a1(mdo sde): bozhi ldan gyi mdun du 'greng ste smras pa/rgyal po legs kyis khyed kyi mig gnyis da la byin cig/rgyal pos smras pa/kye bram mo nga'i 'di la 'gog pa su yang med kyis/
139a2(mdo sde): ci 'dod pa khyed cig ces byas so//de nas lce'i dbang po brgya byin lhag par dga' bar gyur nas/bram ze'i tshe lugs mi snang bar byas te/rang gi gzugasu 'dug nas/rgyal po spro ba bskyed
139a3(mdo sde): de/smras pa/kye rgyal po legs so legs//khyod kyi blo shin tu nges so//khyod kyi smon lam bskyod du med do//sems can rnams la khyod kyi snying rje chen po'i rgyun 'bab par gyur to//khyod
139a4(mdo sde): 'jigs par bya ba'i chos rnams la 'di ltar 'jigs pa med pa las na/khyod ring po mi thog so par brtson pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
139a5(mdo sde): bar 'chang rgya bor 'gyuraro zhes byas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po zhi ldan du gyur pa de rlung yin te/
139a6(mdo sde): yang nga bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa rnams kyis chog ma shes na/da ltar lta ci smos/dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/sbyin pa dag sbyin no//bsod nams dag
139a7(mdo sde): bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
139b1(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do////gzugs bzang zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang
139b2(mdo sde): 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin nams dang /na mkha' lding rnams
139b3(mdo sde): dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mi byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /nam
139b4(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang //
139b5(mdo sde): gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon
139b6(mdo sde): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ni bzhug so//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i sbrang rtse ma bskol ba dang 'dra
139b7(mdo sde): ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cog bshad do//'khor brgya phrag du mas kyang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das la chos ro dang ldan no cog mnyan pa de'i tshe/dge slong dag the tsom
140a1(mdo sde): skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa sems can 'di rnams chos rin po che'i snod du yang 'gyur te/gus
140a2(mdo sde): par mnyan par sems pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar gus pa bskyed de/chos mnyan pa dang /bzung ba du legs
140a3(mdo sde): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/grong khyer bA ra na sin rgyal po gzugs bzong zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/de'i ring
140a4(mdo sde): la 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa dang /skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang ba dang /'thab pa dang /rtsod pa zhi ba dang /'khrug pa dang /nang 'khrug dang /chom rkun dang /
140a5(mdo sde): mu go dang /nad rnams med pa dang /'bras sa lu dang /bu ram shing dang /ba lang dang /ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/gnod pa med cing tsher ma bkrogs la bu cig pa 'i bya ba bzhin du rgyal
140a6(mdo sde): srid paskyang so//rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la/dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/snying rje che ba/bdag nyid che ba/chos 'dod pa/skye dgu
140a7(mdo sde): le byams pa thams cad sbyin pa/thams cad yongasu gtong ba/chags pa med par yongasu gtong ba/gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go//de nas rgyal po de la btsud mo mdzes ldan ma zhes bya
140b1(mdo sde): pa gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig yod do//bu cig pa mdzes ldan zhes bya ba sdug cing phangs la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba
140b2(mdo sde): bzod pa dang ldan pa/mi mthun pa med pa zhig kyang yod do//de nas phyi zhig na/rgyal po gzugs bzang chos 'dod par gyur nas/des blon po thams cad gsags te smras pa/yul gyi gtso bo
140b3(mdo sde): dag nga chos 'dod kyis nga'i chos tshol cig ces bsgo'o//de nas blon po de dag gis thal mo sbyar te gsol pa/rgyal po chen po chos ni dkon te/sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na gdod
140b4(mdo sde): chos 'byung zhes gda'o//de nas rgyal pos gser 'bum yod pa'i snod/rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/yul thams cad du dril bsgrags nas/nga'i yul na chos smra ba gang
140b5(mdo sde): yin pa de la gser 'bum yod pa'i snod 'di sbyin no//dkur bsti chen pos kyang bkur zhing bstod par bya'o zhes kyang byas so//de nas yun ring mo zhig lon kyang chos smra ba su yang mi snang ngo //
140b6(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po chos kyi phyir gdung zhing yi chad//lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni 'og ma la shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug ste/des rgyal po chos kyi phyir phongs shing 'dug pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems
140b7(mdo sde): te/bdag gis rgyal po gzugs bzang bgam par bya'o snyam mo//de nas bdag nyid gnod sbyin na lag dang mig mi sdug pa zhig du sprul nas/rgyal po 'khor du ma'i nang na 'dug pa yi 'di skad ces
141a1(mdo sde): smras so//ci khyod chos 'dod ce na/ngas khyod la chos bstan to//de nas rgyal pos chos kyi sgra thos pas dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas gnod sbyin la 'di skad
141a2(mdo sde): ces smras so//gsang ba pa chos smros shig smros shig/ngas mnyan par bya'o//gnod sbyin gyis smras pa/kye me rgyal po chen po bde zhing 'khod pa ni chos smra bar byed kyi nga ni bkras kyis je zan
141a3(mdo sde): byin cig/de nas rgyal pos de thos nas zho shas 'tshe ba rnams la 'di'i bza' ba dang /btsa' ba'i rnam par dag 'on cig ces bsgo'o//gnod sbyin gyis smras pa/nga ni 'phral la bsad pa'i
141a4(mdo sde): sha dang khrag za zhing 'thung ba yin gyis/bu cig pa mdzes ldan 'di nga la byin cig/de nas rgyal pos de thos nas mchog tu mi dga' bar gyur te borgya lam na lan cig deng lta zhig chos kyi sgra dang
141a5(mdo sde): phrad na/de yang rin thang gdab du med pas nyo dgos so snyam mo//de nas gzhon nu mdzes ldan gyis de thos nas yab kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/lha bzod pa mdzad de/lha'i
141a6(mdo sde): dgongs pa rdzogs par mdzad la/bdag gsang ba pa'i zas su stsal bar gsol zhes byas so//de nas rgyal pos bu cig pa sdug cing phangs la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba/bzod pa dang
141a7(mdo sde): ldan pa/mi mthun pa med pa de chos kyi don tu gnod sbyin la byin no//de nas gnod sbyin gyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rgyal po dang 'khor rnams la khye'u yan lag dang nying lag rnam
141b1(mdo sde): so sor bcad cing bcad cing zos pa dang /khrag kyang 'thungs par bstan to//rgyal po des de mthong na/chos 'dod pa'i phyir mi dga' bar ma gyur to//de nas gnod sbyin gyis rgyal po la smras pa//
141b2(mdo sde): rgyal po nga ma 'drangs kyis yang byin cig ces byas so//rgyal pos de la snying du sdug pa'i chung ma yang sbyin no//de nas de yang thabs de kho na ltar zos par bstan to//de nas yang rgyal po la smras
141b3(mdo sde): pab/kye rgyal po da dung ma 'drangaso//de nas rgyal pos gnod sbyin la smras pa/bu ngas bu cig pa dang sdug pa'i chung ma yang byin zin na/yang ci 'dod gnod sbyin gyis smras pa/rang gi lus ngo la
141b4(mdo sde): byin cig dang /des nang 'drangs par 'gyur ro//rgyal pos smras pa/gal te rang gi lus khyod la byin na/ngas ji ltar chos mnyan gyis/sngar ngal chos dza ston dang /ngas chos thos pa'i 'og
141b5(mdo sde): tu rang gi lus yongasu gtang bar bya'o zhes byas so//de nas gnod sbyin gyis rgyal po dam gyi 'og tu bcug nas/'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun du chos bstan pa/sdug pa dag las mya ngan skye//
141b6(mdo sde): sdug pa dag las 'jigs pa skyo//'jigs pa dag las rnam grol rnams//mya ngan med na ga la 'jigs//de nas rgyal pos tshigasu bcad pa 'di thos ma thag tu yid rab tu sim par gyur
141b7(mdo sde): te/dbang po dga' zhing yid 'do ba skyes nas/gnod sbyin la smras pa/gnod sbyin nga'i lus 'di ji dga' bar gyis shig ces byas so//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/rgyal po de bla na
142a1(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo bar dzag nas/gnod sbyin gyi gzugs mi snang bar byas te/rang gi gzugasu 'dug nas dga'/
142a2(mdo sde): zhing mdangs phyung ba'i mig dang ldan pas lag pa ya cig gis ni bu bzung /ya cig gis ni chung ma bzung nas/rgyal po spro ba bskyed de smras pa/skyes bu dam pa leg so legs//khyod kyi grwa
142a3(mdo sde): cha brtan gyis/brtson pa 'dis ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur//khyad kyi sdug pa'i mi dang phrad pa yang 'di
142a4(mdo sde): yin no zhes so//de nas rgyal pos lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//ko'u shi ka bdag gi chos kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byas pa lig so leg so//bcom ldan
142a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzugs bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no//gzhon nu 'dzes ldan ni kun dga'
142a6(mdo sde): bopo yin no//mdzes ldan ma ni grags 'dzin ma yin no//dge slong dag de'i tshe yang ngas chos kyi phyir gnyen sdug pa yongasu gtong ba dang /rang gi srog yongasu gtong ba byas na/da ltar lha
142a7(mdo sde): smos/dge slong dag di bas na/'di ltar bslab par bya ste/chos la bkur bsti bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mi bya'o//mchod pa bya'o//chos la bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/
142b1(mdo sde): mchod pa byas nas/brten te gnas par bya'o dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan
142b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////mdza' bo'i bu mo zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po
142b3(mdo sde): rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha'
142b4(mdo sde): lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /nam
142b5(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims
142b6(mdo sde): cha dang /gdan dang /spyan gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi
142b7(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyim gang dag na pha ma gnyis la legs par ri mo byed pa dang /legs par
143a1(mdo sde): mchod pa byed pa dang /legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim de dag ni tshangs pa dang ldan pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag rigs kyi bu'i pham gnyis ni rigs
143a2(mdo sde): pa'i sgo nas tshangs pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro//dge slong dag khyim gang dag na pha ma gnyis la legs par ri mo byed pa dang /legs par mchod pa byed pa dang /legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim
143a3(mdo sde): dedag ni slob dpon dang ldan pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu'i pha ma gnyis ni rigs pa'i sgo nas slob dpon dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro//dge slong dag khyim gang dag na pha ma gnyis la legs
143a4(mdo sde): par ri mo byed pa dang /legs par mchod pa byed pa dang /legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim de dag ni kun tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa dang ldan pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag
143a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu'i pha ma gnyis ni rigs pa'i sgo nas kun tu sbyin pa'i 'os su gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro//dge slong dag khyim gang dag nA pha ma gnyis la legs par ri mo byed pa dang /legs
143a6(mdo sde): par mchod pa byed pa dang /legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim de dag ni me dang ldan pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag rigs kyi bu'i pha ma gnyis ni rigs pa'i sgo nas me dang 'dra
143a7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir ro//dge slong dag khyim gang dag na pha ma gnyis lo legs par ri mo byed pa dang /legs par mi chod pa byed pa dang /legs par g.yog byed pa'i khyim de dag ni lha dang ldan pa
143b1(mdo sde): yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag rigs kyi bu'i pha ma gnyis ni rigs pa'i sgo nas lha dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/bde bar gshegs pas
143b2(mdo sde): de skad ces gsungs nas/gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//pha ma gnyis ni tshangs pa ste//de bzhin dang po'i slob dpon yin//bu yi kun sbyin 'os gyur pa//mi yang yin
143b3(mdo sde): la lha yang yin//de phyir de gnyis phyag gi gnas//dril ba dang ni khrus rnams dang //rkang pa dag kyang bkru ba dang //yang na zas dang sgom rnams dang //gos dong mal cha stan rnams kyis//
143b4(mdo sde): mkhas pa dag gis bkur bsti bya//phra ma dag la bkur byas pa//des na mkhas pade dag ni//'dir yang smad pa med gyur la//shi na'ang mtho ris dga' bar 'gyur//gang go cha bcom ldan
143b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis mdo 'di bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pha ma la
143b6(mdo sde): sri zhu che ba'i bsngags pa gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba/zhe sdang dang bral ba/
143b7(mdo sde): gti mug dang bral ba/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang //yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams las yongasu
144a1(mdo sde): grol ba thams cad mkhyen pa/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ye shes dang shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes zin pa na pha ma la sri zhu che ba'i bsngags pa brjod pa 'di lta la
144a2(mdo sde): ngo mtshar che ba ci yod/'das pa'i dus nang 'dod chags dang bcas pa/zho sdang dang bcas pa/gti mug dang bcas pa/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags
144a3(mdo sde): 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams las yongasu ma grol ba'i tshe/ma la gnod po chungangu byas pas kyang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar gyur la/bkun
144a4(mdo sde): bsti chu ngu byas pas kyang bde ba chen po myong bar gyur pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zin shig dang ngas bshad do//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer bA ra na si na ded
144a5(mdo sde): dpon mdza' bo zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang la/longs spyod che ba/yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas
144a6(mdo sde): pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dgu' dgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga' lnga dga'i dgur spyod pa las bu dag byung yang shi bar gyur te/de
144a7(mdo sde): lag pa la skom tshugs bcas nas/bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang /bdag la bu yang med/bu mo yang med pas/bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog
144b1(mdo sde): pathams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur sgyum ste/sems khong su chud cing 'dug/de nas de la kha cig gos gdams ngag bstan pa/gal te khyod kyi bu byung bar gyur na/de la bu ma
