181a7(mdo sde): las de lta bu byas nas/de phyin chad rtag tu sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas rnamasu skyes ste/rtag tu zasu phyi za bar gyur to//mo'u dgal gyi bu de bas na ser
181b1(mdo sde): sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ci nas yi dgas mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod lim bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
181b2(mdo sde): cis bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu dang /lha dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tsi dang /lto 'phye tshon po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid
181b3(mdo sde): rangs ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////mo'u dgal gyi bu zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po
181b4(mdo sde): rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lho rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma
181b5(mdo sde): yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byis/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /
181b6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan
181b7(mdo sde): pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun go sos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/rgyal po'i khab na 'od
182a1(mdo sde): ma'i tshal byA ka lan da ka gnas pa nA rten cing bzhug so//de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi ni pha rol/'od ma'i tshul gyi ni tshul da'i bar skabs na/yi dgas spong
182a2(mdo sde): dum me reg ma 'dra la/gtsirA ngur 'dug cing rang gi sgras yog pa/b+h+yo na ri tsam la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/kun tu rab tu 'bar ste/me lce
182a3(mdo sde): gcig tu 'bar nas/tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin la/sdug bsngal drag pa dang /mi bzad pa dang /tsha ba dang /yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyam su myong ba lnga
182a4(mdo sde): brgya khA khyus lding ba bzhin du na mkha' la 'khor te/gong du yang 'dug sa mi rnyed do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu snga dro sham thabs dang /chos gos bgos te/
182a5(mdo sde): lhung bzed thogs nas/rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la song ba dang /des yi dwags de dag mthong ngo //yi dgras de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen
182a6(mdo sde): pa mthong ngo //de nas de dag gcig tu 'dril nas/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i thung du dong ste/phyi nas snying rje rje skad zer zhing sdig sdug skad zer la gaN+DI
182a7(mdo sde): zhing smra bas tshig 'thun par smras pa/btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu bdag cag ni rgyal po'i khab tu tshong dpon lnga brgyar gyur te/bdag cag ser sna can 'jungs pa yo byad
182b1(mdo sde): rnams la kun tu 'dzin par gyur nas/bdag cag nyid kyis kyang sbyin pa ma byin la/gzhan dag sbyin pa byed pa la yang bgegs byaso//sbyin pa'i glanas rnams la yang yi dgus kyi
182b2(mdo sde): tshig lta bus mang du spyos te/khyod ni yi dag su skyes pa bzhin du gzhan gyi khyim phyi nyug pa'o zhes pas so//des na bdag cag shi ba 'og tu 'di lta bu'i yi dag su skyes so//btsun
182b3(mdo sde): ba mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dbus na/bdag cag go nye du rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa de dag la bdag cag gi las kyi rnam pa shes par mdzod la dad pa dris te/sangs rgyas la sogs
182b4(mdo sde): pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol nas/bdag cag gi slad du yon gyi rabs 'dron par gsol cig/'on tang bdag cag yi dgas kyi skye gnas nas thur kyang srid do zhes
182b5(mdo sde): gsungs shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bus kyang yi dwags rnams la cang mi smra bas khas blangaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi pus de dag gi nye du rnams kyi khyim
182b6(mdo sde): khyim du dad pa dris nas phyid nyid sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangaso//yi dgas rnams la yang sbran te/sang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun
182b7(mdo sde): dang bcas pa bshos la spyan drangs kyis khyed kyang der sheg shig ces byas so//de dag gi nye du rnams la yang khyod kyang sheg shig dang /nye du'i mchod ston byed pa der yi dgas de
183a1(mdo sde): dag mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes byas so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu nyid mchod ston gyi zhal ta byed pa la zhug so//de nas nam nangs nas zhal
183a2(mdo sde): zas bshams te/gdugs tshod la bab nu yi dwags de dag mi snang ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos lha'i mig gis ya dgas de dag bsams na/yul ma
183a3(mdo sde): gad+ha thog tag na yang mi snang la/mthar gyis gling bzhi'i bar du bltas na yang de na yang mi snang ngo //de nas ji srid du de'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa de srid du bltas kyang de na yang mi
183a4(mdo sde): snang ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po mi dga' bar gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi sbyin bdag de rnams mi gda' lagaso///
183a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu thong la/khyod mi dgar ma byed cig/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa las 'das pa'i 'jig rten
183a6(mdo sde): gyi khams tshad med pa dag yod de/de dag tu las kyi rlung gis 'phangs mod kyi/'on kyang mo'u dgal gyi bu deng de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la ltos shig/thams cad
183a7(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mngon par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang bstan gyis 'gaN+DI brdungs shig/de nas 'gaN+De brdungs pa dang /dge
183b1(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyang 'dus/yi dgas kyi nye du rnams dang yi dgas mthong bar 'dod pa'i sems can gzhan dag kyang ltad mo la lhags te 'duso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas
183b2(mdo sde): yi dgas rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ba mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /bdag cag gi phyir nye du rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong
183b3(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun rnams bshos gsol zhing 'khod do snyam du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul bstan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pas yon gyi rabs gsungs
183b4(mdo sde): pa/sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang //de ni yi dgas phyi bzhin sngo//yi dgas 'jig rten rab 'jigs las//de dag myur du thar gyur cig/rtse gsungaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
183b5(mdo sde): gzhi do las brten te/de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/de thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas ser sna'i dri ma spangs te/bden pa mthong bar gyur to//yi dgas de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das
183b6(mdo sde): la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so//lha'i bu 'am/lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar
183b7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/gang nas shi 'phos/gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo//de nas yi dkas las shi 'phos pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang /bcom ldan
184a1(mdo sde): /'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo //de nas sngon yi dag su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag zhag lon te gzod bcom ldan 'das
184a2(mdo sde): blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo//de nas sngon yi dag su gyur pa'i lha'i bu na cha gdub
184a3(mdo sde): kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i cod pan can/lus gur gum dang /ta ma le'i lo ma dang /spri ka la sogs pas byug
184a4(mdo sde): pa de rnams kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu de dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /man da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa khor
184a5(mdo sde): khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi
184a6(mdo sde): dag su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang /bge la nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/de thos nas sngon yi dgasu gyur pa'i lha'i
184a7(mdo sde): bu de dag gis khyad par chen po thob po//de dag tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa bzhin du gyur te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//der bcom ldan
184b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis yi dgas mang po dag lha'i nang du bkod nas de dag kyang mdang sum nga'i thang du 'ongs te/de dag la ngas
184b2(mdo sde): chos bstan nas/de dag gis rnyed par bya ba rnyed de mtho bar 'gyur ba rnyed nas dong ba da ni khyod kyis zhal ta byas pa 'bras bu yod par gyur te/legaso leg so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma'u dgal gyi bu
184b3(mdo sde): chen pos de dag gA nyi du rnams la yang shes par byas te/de dag gis thos nas mchog tu ma mtshan du gyur te/bcom ldan 'das la sems dka' bar gyur nas bkur bsti byas so//mo ru dgal
184b4(mdo sde): bu de bas na khyod kyis ci nas yi dgas de dag gnyis pa de lta bu dag mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir serasna sbyong ba la btsun par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u
184b5(mdo sde): dgal gyi bu chen po dang /lha dang /lha ma yin dang /rnamapa' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lte 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
184b6(mdo sde): bstod do///chu smad zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi me rnams dang /chang dpon rnams dang /
184b7(mdo sde): dad pon rnams dang /ldan mos dang /rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /rnamakha' lding rnams dang /me'am rnams dang /lha' phye chen po rnams kyis 'a bste byas/
185a1(mdo sde): bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /namakha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing
185a2(mdo sde): shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan
185a3(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugaso//de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/
185a4(mdo sde): yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig tu rtse
185a5(mdo sde): zhing 'ga' la dga' dgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang /bu byung ste khye'u zhig btsas nas de
185a6(mdo sde): btsas pa'i btsas ston byas te/khye'u 'di'i ming je skad bdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/de nye du rnams na re khye'u 'ang rgyu skar chu slad la btsas pas na/de'i phyir ming chu smad ces gdagra
185a7(mdo sde): so zhes zer nas/de'i ming chu smad ces btag so//de nas khye'u chu smad bskyed ngasrings te cher skyes nas/de'i pha shi ba dang /rang gi khyim gyi bdag por gyur to//de nas des tshong dus bkram
185b1(mdo sde): nas nyo tshong byed cing nyo tshong gis 'tsho bar byed pa las de'i nyon cig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/des bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang /dam pa'i chos thos pas/bcom
185b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par gyur nas/de rab tu 'byung ba'i sems skyes te/des ma la gsol ba btab pa/yum bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis
185b3(mdo sde): gnang bar mdzod cig/de nas de'i mas smras pa/bu khyod ni bu gcig pa yin gyis/bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rab tu ma 'byung shig/bdag shi ba'i 'og tu ci bya ba byos shig ces zer ro///
185b4(mdo sde): chu smad des kyang ci skyed pa de dag thams cad ma la byin te/yum 'dis dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /sdug cing phongs pa dang /bkren pa rnams la sbyin pa dag gyis shig ces byas so//de'i ma
185b5(mdo sde): de rkam chags can 'jungs pa yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa zhig ste/kar sha pa ni de dag sbas nas/dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag zas 'dod de/khyim der 'ongs pa de dag la rgya zhing khyed ni yi
185b6(mdo sde): dang su skyes pa bzhin du khyim phyi nyug cing slong ngo zhes zer ro//bu de la yang sla bar byed de bdag gis nyin cig bzhin du/dge slong 'di snyed 'di snyed cig la zan byin no zhes zer ro//phyis re
185b7(mdo sde): shig ni de shi ba dang /de yi dgasu skyes nas/bu chu smad ma dang bral ba'i mya ngan byed de/sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo ///
186a1(mdo sde): des brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang /'ad pas pam mug lnga pa'i 'dzer ba'i 'khor lo 'ang dag ma ning mi brtan par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnam
186a2(mdo sde): dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas
186a3(mdo sde): te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas//gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/namakha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/can
186a4(mdo sde): dan spangs pa bzhin du bsil bar gyur pa/reg pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /
186a5(mdo sde): chags pa dang /bkur bsti la mi lta ba dang /dbang po dang /nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyi mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur nas/des chu klung
186a6(mdo sde): gang+gA'i 'gram du lo ma'i skyil po byas te/bsam gtan byed do//de'i ma yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa de yang sdong dum me reg ma 'dra la/gcer bur 'dug cing rang gi skyes
186a7(mdo sde): yog pa/ ni ri tsam lo//kho ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/'ber shing rab tu 'bar la kun tu 'bar ti/me lce gcig tu 'bar nas tshig cing nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/tshe
186b1(mdo sde): ldan chu smad kyi thad du song nas/re shig na tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yi dgas mo de mthong nas dris pa/'di kho na 'dra ba khyod su zhig/yi dgas mos smras pa/du cig gang las bcas
186b2(mdo sde): pa yi byams pa'o ma ni bdag yin te//zas deng skams dang bral ba yi//yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skyes//bdag ni shi ba'i dus 'das nas//lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon te//chu
186b3(mdo sde): yi dag kyang ma mthong na//kha zas lta zhig ga la mthong //'bras bu ldan pa'i shing rnams kyi//drang srong de dag 'bras med 'gyur//gang ba'i mtsho 'gram bdag song yang //de dag kyang
186b4(mdo sde): ni skam par 'gyur//btsun pa'i shing drung bde ba lags//khyod kyi snod nang chu yang bsil//bkren pa bdag la thugs rje skyed//skom gyis gdungs kyis chab stsol cig/de nas chu smad kyis
186b5(mdo sde): ma la smras pa/yum khyod mar gyur pa'i tshe/bdag gis sbyin pa dge sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed du ma bcug gam/yo dgas mos smras pa/bu cig bdag ni ser snas non pas sbyin pa dag
186b6(mdo sde): kyang mi byin bsod nams dag kyang ma byas te/nor rnyed pa de dag thams cad sdig pa'i sems kyis dong du sbaso//bu cig de bas na dad pa dris la bdag gi phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge
186b7(mdo sde): 'dun bshos gsol nas yon gyi rabs 'don par gsol cig/'on ting bdag yi dgas kyi skye gnas nas thar kyang srid do//chu smad kyis smras pa/de ltar bgyis khyod kyang bral dpon gyi mdun du
187a1(mdo sde): 'dug shig/yi dgas mos smras pa/bu gcig bdag ni gcer bur 'dug pas ngo tsha ste ngo mi thub bo//chu smad kyis smras pa/yul khyod gang gi tshe sdig pa byed pa de'i tshe ngo mi tsha na//
187a2(mdo sde): da ltar 'bras bu myong ba'i tshe ci'i phyir ngo che/yi dgas mos smras pa/'o na de bzhin du 'ong bar bya'o//de nas chu smad kyis nye du rnams kyi khyim khyim du dad pa dris nas/phyid nyin sangs rgyas la sog
187a3(mdo sde): ba dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos la spyan drangs nas/gdugs chod la bad pa na/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dag kyang 'dus/yi dgas mo de yang gral dpon gyi mdun du
187a4(mdo sde): 'dug ste/srog chags 'bum phrag du ma 'dus pa rnams kyis yi dgas mo de mthong ngo //de dag gis yi dgas mo de'i lus mi sdug pa mthong nas/shin tu skyo ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das la
187a5(mdo sde): sems dga' bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas/yi dgas mo'i phyir yon gyi rabs
187a6(mdo sde): gdon par gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pas sbyin pa'i rabs gsungs pa/sbyin pa 'di yi bsod nams gang //do ni yi dgas phyi bzhin
187a7(mdo sde): song //yi dgas 'jig rten rab 'jigs las//de ni myur du thar gyur cig ces gsung so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa gzhi de las brten nas yi dgas mo de dang /skye bo mang
187b1(mdo sde): po la de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/srog chags 'bum phrag du mas de thos nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to//yi dwags mo de yang sems dga' bar 'gyur te/shi nas yi dgra
187b2(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes so//tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yang yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mor skyes par shes so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis smras pa/yum da ni mthu yod
187b3(mdo sde): kyis sbyin pa yongasu gtang ba dag gyis shig/yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mos smras pa/bu cig bdag ni sbyin pa la dga' ba med de mi nus so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis yi
187b4(mdo sde): dgas rdzu 'phrul chen mo la smras pa/chags pa'i mun pas mig ni rab bsgyings te//khyod kyis yi dgaso 'jig rten bsgrubs pa yi//khyod kyi rus bu chen po sha mid pa//rus
187b5(mdo sde): pa lpags pa skye rnams da dung 'dug/ces byas so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis lanA mang du spyos te smras nas/de'i tshe 'og tu de la sra ras zung cig thob bo//de nas chu
187b6(mdo sde): smad kyis dge 'dun la phul nas/gang gis dge 'dun la ras zung cig po nyes pa'i dge slong des gos kyis ga dang la bzhag go/de nas yi dgas mo de mtshan mo 'ongs nas
187b7(mdo sde): brkus so//de nas dge slong des tshe dang ldan pa chu smad la bsnyad nas/chu smad song ste yi dgas mo spros nas phyir bkug ste byin no//de bzhin du lan gsum gyi bar du dge slong de las
188a1(mdo sde): brkus nas/tshe dang ldan pa chu smad kyis phyir bkug ste byin pa dang /dge slong des kyang de gshegs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stan la klan to//de nas/
188a2(mdo sde): de phyin chad ma brkus so//de bas na sems can rnams la de ltar ser sna 'tho 'tsham par byed pa mthong nas/ci nas yi dogs mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung ba mi 'gyur ba bya'i phyir/ser sna
188a3(mdo sde): spang ba la brtson par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag dang /lha dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye
188a4(mdo sde): chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///dmus long zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
188a5(mdo sde): 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang //
188a6(mdo sde): klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri
188a7(mdo sde): mi byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs
188b1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /skyon gses dang /sman zong rnams bskyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge
188b2(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa/mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' can bzhugaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byang sdong sham thabs dang /chos
188b3(mdo sde): gos bgos te/lhung bzed thigs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ngo //mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms byas nas than zos te/zas phyis len pa spangs nas/lhung bzed
188b4(mdo sde): dang /chos gos bzhag yi dgas kyi yul rgyu zhing song ba las tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis yi dgas mo snong dum me rag ma 'ad la/dmus long du 'dug pa rang gi sgras yog pa/wA na ri tsam
188b5(mdo sde): la kha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/dur khrod bzhin du dring ba/khwa dang /bya rgod dang /khyi dang /wa rnams kyis bskor nas/phyogs kun nas sha bcad cing bcad cing za ba dang /de gnad la
188b6(mdo sde): bab ste/dkos thag nas ny+tsAm thag pa'i skad 'byin te/sdug bsngal drag pa dang /mi bzad pa dang /tsha ba dang /yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa dgar
188b7(mdo sde): byed mi dga' bar gyur nas dris pa/sring mo khyed kyis sngon sdig pa'i las ci zhig bas nas/des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myang zhig 'dug/yi dgas mes smras pa/nyi ma shar ba na sgren ma me dgos
189a1(mdo sde): kyis/bcom ldan 'das la don 'di zhus shig dang /de khyod la bdag gi las kyi rnam pa lung ston par 'gyur te/de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa spong bar
189a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga'i byed bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo //de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/'khor bzhi po rnams la sbrang bu'i
189a3(mdo sde): sna rtsi ma bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos ro dang ldan no cig ston to//'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams mi g.yo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no cog nyan par byed de//de
189a4(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gsong por gsung ba/snyan par gsung ba/tshur shog 'ongs pa leg so zhes gsungs pa sngar 'dzum pa yin te/der bcom ldan 'das kyis
189a5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dga' byed tshur shog/khyod 'ongs pa legaso//khyod de gzod ga las 'ongs dga' byed kyis gsol pa/btsun pa bdag ni yi dgas
189a6(mdo sde): rgyu ba'i nang nas mchis te/der bdag gis yi dgas ma sdong dum mi rig ma 'dra la/dmus long du mchis pa/rang gi sgras yog pa/lto ni ri tsam la Sha ni khab kyi mig tsam ste/dur khrod bzhin du dring
189a7(mdo sde): baM/khwa dang /bya rgod dang /khyi dang /wa rnams kyis bskor nas/phyogs kun+da nas sha bkum zhing bkum ming 'tshal ba dang /de gnad la bab ste/dkos thag nas nyam thag pa'i skad 'byin te/
189b1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal drag pa dang /mi bzad pa dang /tsha ba dang /yid du mi 'ong ba myong zhing mchis pa zhig mthong lag so//yang gsol pa/lus chen ri bo mthon po 'dra ba la//mchu dang tog ma skam zhing shin
189b2(mdo sde): tu sdug/rang gi sgras ni gdong yog cer bar mchis//mchu sgo phra khab mig 'dra rab tu ring//de ltar gcer bu sgras yog pa//rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgreng ba bzhin//thod pa thogs shing me bzang la/
189b3(mdo sde): dudri zhing kun tu rgyugs par bgyid//bkres pa dang ni skom pa yis//dubacing sdug bsngal dag gis nyen//nyam thag skad kyang 'byin par bgyid//sdug bsngal tshor ba nyamasu myong //de
189b4(mdo sde): yis mi yi 'jig rten du//rab 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na//des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba//'jig su rung ba myong bar gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dga' byed yi
189b5(mdo sde): dgas mo de ni sdig pa'i las byed byed pa yin no//de'i las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lagaso//dga' byed 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig
189b6(mdo sde): dang /ngas bshad do//dga' byed sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
189b7(mdo sde): ba'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhang su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom
190a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de grong khyer bA ra na sin drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhug so//de nas grong khyer bA ra na side na/tshong
190a2(mdo sde): dpon gyi bu mo zhig 'dug pa de chos 'dod de/des chos thos nas 'khor ba la nyes par lta ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar gyur te/des pha ma la gsol nas/bcom
190a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //de nas de'i phyir nye du rnams kyis dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang byas nas de de na slob pa dang /mi slob pa'i dge slong ma dag dang lhan cig tu gnas/
190a4(mdo sde): pa las re shig ni des bag med pa'i dbang gis bslab pa'i gzhi la lhod par byas so//de nas dge slong mo rnams kyis tshul khrims 'chal pa'i phyir bskrad do//de nas des sbyin bdag
190a5(mdo sde): khyim bdag rnams dad pas nges par 'bul ba yang gcod du bcug/slob pa dang mi slob pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyi bsdigs pa ma yin pa yang brjod/dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan
190a6(mdo sde): po gang yin pa de dag mthong na yang mig btsums te 'dug go/dga' byed ji snyam du sems/tshong dpon gyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni yi dgas mo 'di yin te/des gtsug lag khang la
190a7(mdo sde): ser sna byas pa des ni yi dag su skyes so//des nar ma bcad pa des ni khwa dang /bya rgod dang /byi dang /wa rnams kyis bskor to//de slob pa dang mi slob pa dge slong rnams kyi bsdug
190b1(mdo sde): pa ma yin pa brjod pas na de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to//dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams mthong na/mig btsums pas ni dmus long du gyur to//dga' byed de ltar na las gcig tu nges
190b2(mdo sde): ngapar gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag par 'gyur ro//las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur//las 'dren ma
190b3(mdo sde): rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro//dga' byed de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /'dren ma rnams spangs la/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
190b4(mdo sde): 'ba' shig la bting bar bya ste/dga' byed khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/srog chags sa yas bden pa mthong bar gyur to//der bcom ldan
190b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ser sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'i nyes dmigs de dag dang gzhan dag kyang rtogs nas ser sna dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa spang ba'i
190b6(mdo sde): phyir brtson par bya ste/dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag dang /lha dang lha ma yin dang /nam khi' lding dang /
190b7(mdo sde): mi'amachi dang /lte 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yang rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo do///tshong dpon zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas pa
191a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams
191a2(mdo sde): dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/rlu mar byas/ri
191a3(mdo sde): mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lho dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i bcom ldan 'das
191a4(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zos dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan
191a5(mdo sde): du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs//de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/yongasu
191a6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya tsho ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas te/de phyi zhig na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo //de na songs sangs rgyas
191a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu na gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas
191b1(mdo sde): lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das
191b2(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'khor ba las skyo bar 'gyur ba'i chos bstan te/de thos nas 'khor ba las nyes par lta ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la yon tan du lta bar 'gyur
191b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/kun la grags pa dang /bsod nams tshon pa dang ldan par gyur te/gos dang /zas dang /malo cha dang /snun dang /nad gas so dang /sman
191b4(mdo sde): zong rnams rnyed par gyur to//des yongasu bzung ba'i yo byad rnyed do cag stsogs par byed do//des tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la bgo bsha' ma byas so//de nas ser sna kun tu bsten cing
191b5(mdo sde): bsgoms te/mang du byas pa des na/rang gi yo byad la lhag par zhen bzhin du shi nas rang gi gnas khang du yi dag su skyes so//de nas de'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis 'gan de mjug
191b6(mdo sde): med pa brdungs nas rus bu phyir phyung ngo //de nas de'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa byas nas/phyir gtsug lag khang du lhog so//de nas gnas gi sgo phye ste tshos gos dang /lhung bzed g.yar snga 'drim
191b7(mdo sde): bal zhugs pa dang /re shig na yi dgas rkang lag dang /mig mi sdug la lus mchog tu 'jigs la chos gos dang /lhung bzed zin cing 'dug pa de mthong ngo //de ltar mi sdug pa de mthong nas/dge
192a1(mdo sde): slong dag mi dga' bar gyur te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de la phan gradags pa dang /slob ma'i tshogs rnams
192a2(mdo sde): skyob bskyed pa dang /ser sna'i rnam par smin pa mi sdug pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar te/gnas der
192a3(mdo sde): gshegs//de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byud bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od
192a4(mdo sde): 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'di mnga' ba/rin po che'i ro bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sems
192a5(mdo sde): dga' bskyes te/dring che bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis char smin gyi 'drug sgra bu zab pa dang /rnga sgra lta bu'i gsung gis yi dgas de spros te/bzhin bzangs
192a6(mdo sde): khyod nyid kyis bdag nyid phung po'i phyir chos gos dang lhung bzed 'di bsgrubs te/des ni yod gsu skyes pa yin gyis/de yang nga la sems dga' bar gyis la yo byad 'di la yang
192a7(mdo sde): sems ma chags par byas dang log so//'di las kying shi nas sems can dmyal ba rnams skye ba ro//de nas yi dgas des chos gos dang /lhung bzed dge 'dun lo phul nas/
192b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/nyes pa gshegaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yi dgas kyi phyir yon gyi rangs gsungs pa/sbyin pa 'dri yi bsod nams
192b2(mdo sde): gang /de ni yi dgas phyi bzhin song //yi dgas 'jig rten rab 'jigs las//de ni myur du thar gyur cig/de nas yi dgas de bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar
192b3(mdo sde): gyur te/shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes so//de nas yi dgras rdzu 'phrul chen po rna cha gdub 'khor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/nor bu sna
192b4(mdo sde): chags kyis spras pa'i cod pan lus gur kum dang /ta ma la'i lo ma dang s+thi ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan ma lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar
192b5(mdo sde): po dang /mnad ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkang ste/'od ma'i tshal d+ya ka lan da ka gnas pa kho ra khor yug 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor ste/chos
192b6(mdo sde): mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/de thos nas dga' ba skyes te song ngo //de'i tshe dge
192b7(mdo sde): slong srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo //de mthong nas the tsomo skyes te/sangs rgyas
193a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang gsum mi mjed kyi bdag pa tshangs pa'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba dan/
193a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po 'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nom/'jig
193a3(mdo sde): rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi//yi dgas de shi nas yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen por skyes te/de mdangs sum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas/ngas de la chos bstan te//
193a4(mdo sde): dga' bskyes nas song ngo //dge slong dag de bas na ci nas tshong dpon las yi dag su gyur pa de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag byung bar mi 'gyur bar ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya ste/dge slong
193a5(mdo sde): khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag dang /lha dang lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye
193a6(mdo sde): chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////bu zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po
193a7(mdo sde): rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod
193b1(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod
193b2(mdo sde): par byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tsi dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod tsong shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
193b3(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /spyan gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/rgyal
193b4(mdo sde): po'i kha ba na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka la na dka gnas pa na rten cing bzhug so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu snga dro sham zings dang /chos gos bgos te/lhung bzed thogs nas/rgyal
193b5(mdo sde): po'i khab du bsod snyoms la song ngo //rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms byas nas zan zos te/zas phyos len pa spangs nas/chos gos dang /lhung bzed bzhag ste/yi dgas kyi yul
193b6(mdo sde): rgyu zhing song ba dang /des bya rgod kyi phung po'i re'i nyin gor du yi dgas mo gaushin rje'i srin mo 'dra la lus khrag gis gshos pa/dur khrod na 'dug bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba/nyin mo dang maN+Da
193b7(mdo sde): mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong la/bu la byams pa yod bzhin du de bkres pas nyen nas de dag za zhing 'dug pa zhig mthong ngo //de nas gnas brtan 'dam bu sbyin gyi bus de la
194a1(mdo sde): dris pa/khyod kyis ston las ci zhig byas na/des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug/yi dgas mos smras pa/nyi ma shar ba na sgron ma mi dgos kyis/btsam//
194a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la don 'di skyes shig dang /de khyed la bdag gi los kyi rnam pa lung sten par 'gyur te/de thos na sems can gzhan dag kyang sdig pa'i las spong bar 'igyuraro//de nas tshe dang ldan
194a3(mdo sde): pa'adas bu sbyin gyi bu bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ngo //de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jig las bzhes nas/'khor ban po rnams la sbreng rtsim bskol ba dang 'dra ba'i chos
194a4(mdo sde): ro dang ldan no cog ston te/'khor brgya phrag du ma yang dbang po rnams migayo bar bcom ldan 'das las chos ro dang ldan no coganyan par byed do//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
194a5(mdo sde): ni gsongad por gsung ba/skrun par gsung ba tshur shog 'ongs pa leg so zhes gsung bsngar 'dzum pa yin te/der bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/'dam
194a6(mdo sde): bu sbyin gyi bu tshur shog khyod 'dres pa lagaso//khyod du gdod ga las 'ongs/'dum bu sbyin gyisra gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yi dgas kyi nang du mchi mche ba las slar
194a7(mdo sde): mtshos te/der bdag gis yi dgas mo gshin rje'i srin mo 'dra la/lus khrag gis bshes pa/dur khrod na 'dug pa bzhin du keng rus kyis bskor ba zhig mthong lags//yang gsol pa/
194b1(mdo sde): bdag ni nyin bzhin bu lnga btsa'//mtshan yang de bzhin lnga btsa' ste//btsas nas de dag zos na yang //'drangs par mi 'gyur zhes mchin//de yis mi yi 'jig rten du//rab
194b2(mdo sde): 'jigs sdig pa ci bgyis na/des na sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba//'jig su rung ba myong bar 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dam bu sbyin gyi bu yi dgas mo de ni sdig
194b3(mdo sde): pa'i las byed byed pa yin no//de las kyi rnam pa nyan par 'dod dam/btsun pa mnyan par 'tshal lagaso//'dam bu sbyin gyi bu'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang nges
194b4(mdo sde): bshad do//'dam bu sbyin gyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer b+hA ra na sa na tshong dpon phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i
194b5(mdo sde): nor dang ldan pa/rnam thas kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga'
194b6(mdo sde): la dga' dgur spyod kyang bu yang med bu mo yang med de/de lag pa la skom tshugs bcas nas/bdag gi khyim nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang bu yang med/bu mo yang med pas/bdag 'das
194b7(mdo sde): ba'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thams cad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyur snyam ste/sems khongasu chud cing 'dug go//de nas de bu med de bu 'dod pa'i phyir gu lang dang /chu lha dang /
195a1(mdo sde): ku ber dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'dengs te/'di lta ste/kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /
195a2(mdo sde): nags tshal gyi lha dang /lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang /sum mdo'i lha dang /gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /lhan cig skyes pa dang /chos 'thun pa pa dang /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i
195a3(mdo sde): lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'debs la/'jig rten yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i gtam de yod mod kyi/de yang de lta ni ma yin te/gal te gsol
195a4(mdo sde): ba btab pa'i rgyas bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur du zin na/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re lo yang bu steng stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rigaso//e ni gnas gsum tshogs pa las
195a5(mdo sde): bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/gsum gang zhe na/pha ma gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrad pa dang /ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /dri za 'ongs pa ste/gnas gsum
195a6(mdo sde): tshogs pa los bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur te/des lha mnyes par byas kyang bu yang ma byung /bu mo yang ma byung nas/de'i blo 'di lta bu zhig skyes te/me la bdag gis chun ma zhig blangs
195a7(mdo sde): na/brgya la bu yod par gyur lta srid dam snyam ste/des rigs mnyam pa las chun ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga' la dga'
195b1(mdo sde): dgur spyod pa las bya zhig na bu chags par gyur nas/de dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/khyim thab la snyan pa/rdob bdag la skyes chags te/bdag gi/rum g.yas logs na
195b2(mdo sde): rten cing gnas pa las na/khye'ur 'gyur ba ringes kyis/dgyes pa bskyed du gsol zhes byas so//de yang dga' ches te/ro gtod ni bteg/lag pa g.yas pa ni brkyang nas/bdag
195b3(mdo sde): gis yun ring po nas smon smon pa'i bu'i ngo mthong ngar 'ong ngo //bdag gis bu rung bar shog shig/mi rung bar ma gyur cig/bdag gi bya ba dag byed par shog shig/gsos pa'i
195b4(mdo sde): lan phyir gso bar shog shig/nor skal la spyod par shog shig/bdag gi rigs rgyud ring du gnas par shog shig/bdag cag 'das te shi bo'i 'og tu yang bdag cag gi phyir mang
195b5(mdo sde): yang rung /nyung yang rung ste/sbyin pa dag byin la/bsod nams dag byas nas de gnyis gang dang gang du skyes shing 'gro ba der 'di song shig ces yon sngo bar shog shig ces dga' ba'i tshig
195b6(mdo sde): brjod do//de nas des bu chagaso par rig nas bu'i rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzangs kyi steng du nyam rang su bzhog ste/grang ba'i tshe grang ba'i yo byad rnams dang /tsha ba'i tshe tsha ba'i yo byad rnams
195b7(mdo sde): dang /sman pas bstan pa'i zas rnams dang /ha cang kha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /ha cang sbyar ba ma yin pa rnams dang /ha cang lan tsa che ba ma yin pa rnams dang /ha cang dang rang ma yin
196a1(mdo sde): pa rnams dang /hA cang ro tsha ba ma yin pa rnams dang /ha cang bskab ma yin pa rnams dang /khu ba dang /sbyar ba dang /lan tsa dang /dang ra ba dang /che ba dang /
196a2(mdo sde): bsgre ba med pa'i zas rnams kyis bsten cing /do shal dang /se mo dos lus rnam par klubs te/lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par rgyu ba bzhin du khri'i steng nas khri'i steng dang /khri'u'i
196a3(mdo sde): steng nas khri'u'i steng du rgyu zhing 'og gi sa gzhi la mi 'bab pa dang /des yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra skad ci yang mi thos par byas so//de nas chung ma snga ma des de bkur zhing gces par byed pa mthong
196a4(mdo sde): nas phrag dog skyes te bsams pa/gal te 'di las bu bcas par gyur na ni/bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/ci nas de'i thabs shig bya dgos snyam mo//'dod pa la yongasu
196a5(mdo sde): bsten pa la ni sdig pa'i las mi bya ba'i bag ci yang med de/mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba'i g.yang sar kha ltas pa/des yid rton du bcug nas gang 'thungs pa tsam gyis nyon mongs ma de'i bu 'phyil
196a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngal rlug pa'i rtsi byin no//de nas chung ma phyi ma des nye du thams cad bsdus nas chung ma lnga ma de zhal lce la bkug ste/khyod kyis bdag yid rton du bcug pas
196a7(mdo sde): mnga' rlug pa'i rtsi byin te/des bdag gi bu 'phyil to zhes byas so//de nas chung ma snga ma des nyi du rnams kyi nang du mna'abor to//gal te bdag gis khyod la mngal drug pa'i rtsi byin par
196b1(mdo sde): gyur na bdag yi dgas mor gyur te/bu byung ngo cog za bar shog shig byas so//'dam bu sbyin gyi bu ji snyam du sems/tshong dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni yi dgas mo de yin te/
196b2(mdo sde): des sngon phrag dog byas pa des na yi dgas mor skyes so//des brdzun byas te mna' bor ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des ni nyin mo dang nub mo bu lnga lnga btsa' zhing za bar gyur to//'dam bu sbyin gyi bu
196b3(mdo sde): de bas na khyod kyis ngag gi nyes pa spang ba la brtson par bya ste/ci nas yo dgas mo de'i nyes pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu khyod kyis bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan
196b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'dam bu sbyin gyi bu dang /lha dang lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang
196b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////phyi sa khung zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po
196b6(mdo sde): rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /nam
196b7(mdo sde): mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mor byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha
197a1(mdo sde): ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang
197a2(mdo sde): ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yangs pa can na//
197a3(mdo sde): spre'u rdzing gi 'gram gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na rten cing bzhug so//de'i tshe yangs pa can na grong khyer gyi 'obs shig gi nang na/yi dgas zas su skyugs pa za ba/bor ba za ba/
197a4(mdo sde): ngar snabs dang /gAcin gyis 'tsho ba/rnag dang /khrag dang phyis za ba/mi bzad pa/rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba lnga brgya gnaso//yang smras pa/skyugs pa za zhing bor ba
197a5(mdo sde): za//ngar snabs gcin gyis 'tsho ba dang //rnag khrag dang ni phyis za//mi bzad rang bzhin sdug cing 'dug/yangs pa can don bram ze zhig kyang 'dug ste/des rigs mnyam pa
197a6(mdo sde): las chung mi blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' la dga' dgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/chung ma la bu chags nas de'i lus dri nga bar gyur to///
197a7(mdo sde): de nas bram ze des mtshan mkhan rnams bkug ste dris na/de dag na re 'di ni lto na khye'u 'dug pa de'i mthu yin no zhes zor ro//re shig na de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/
197b1(mdo sde): khye'u mdog dran cing bldan mi sdug la byad ngan po lus mi gtsang bas bsgos pa dri nga ba zhig bcas so//de mchog tu mi sdug mod kyi/byams pa'i dbang gis 'brel bas pa ma gnyis/
197b2(mdo sde): kyis gsos so//de mi gtsang ba'i gan rnam 'ba' shig tu dga' la phyag dar gyi phung po dang /phyis khung du skra 'bal zhing khar mi gtsang ba 'dzud nas/de'i ming phyis khung zhes bya bar
197b3(mdo sde): gyur to//re shig na de phan tshun du 'khyim pa las 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/'di de lta bu'i gnas rnamasu dga' ba las 'di ni gor ma chag par
197b4(mdo sde): grub pa'i skyes bu zhig yin gyis bdag gis 'dir rab tu dbyung snyam mo//des de rab tu phyung nas gcer bur 'khyam zhing 'dug la/legs pa byed pa la yang gnaso//de nas de 'khyam
197b5(mdo sde): zhing song po las yangs pa can gyi 'obs kyi nang na yi dgas lnga brgya 'khod pa rnams mthong nas de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'brel bas grong khyer gyi 'obs de'i nang du song nas de
197b6(mdo sde): dag dang lhan cig 'dus shing phrad de/dga' bar gyur nas grogs por gyur to//phyis re shig na khye'u phyi sa khung don zhig la brel te yangs pa can du song ngo //bcom ldan 'das
197b7(mdo sde): kyang grong khyer gyi 'obs der byon nas yi dgas de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad
198a1(mdo sde): bcus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //
198a2(mdo sde): mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyed cis 'phongs yi dgas rnams kyis smras pa/bcom ldan 'das
198a3(mdo sde): bdag cag ni skom lag so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag sor lnga las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun lnga phab ste/des yi dgas lnga brgya po de dag tshim par mdzad de//de nas
198a4(mdo sde): dedag bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/shi nas sum cu zla gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so//lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas/ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis
198a5(mdo sde): sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/gang nas shi 'phos/gang du skyes/las gang gis skyes snyam mo//de nas yi dgas las shi 'phos pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i yul
198a6(mdo sde): bzang por skyes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par de dag gis mthong ngo //de nas sngon yi dag su gyur pa'i lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag zhag
198a7(mdo sde): lon te/gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir/'gro ba ni bdag cag gis cha ma yin gyis/bdag cag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo snyam mo//de
198b1(mdo sde): nas ston yi dgasu gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna tshig dubakor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa/lus do shal dang sa mo des brgyan pa/nor bu sna tshogs kyis smras pa 'atsad pan can lus gur gum dang /
198b2(mdo sde): mal lo lo ma dang /sdig ka la sogs pas byugs pa de rnams kyi mtshan mo lha'i matog ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mud dang /d+ma dkar po dang /man dar rnams kyis grung bA/ /
198b3(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas thams cad 'od chen pos snad byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'kho //de nas
198b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon yi dag su gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang /rang banan thug su chud nas 'phags pa'i bden po bzhi rtogs par 'gyur
198b5(mdo sde): bde lta bu'i chos bstan pa de thos nas/lha'i bu lnga brgyas 'jig tshegs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/de dag gis
198b6(mdo sde): bden pa mthong nas tshong pa khe sgrogs phyin pa dang /zhing ba 'bru rgyal bar byed pa dang /dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang /nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du sbyor ba gang gis bcom
198b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rang gi gnasu dong ngo //de nas khye'u phyes khung grong khyer gyi 'osasu 'ongs pa dang /yi dgas
199a1(mdo sde): de dag ma mthong ngo //de nas tshol ba la zhugs te de dag yongasu tshol bas skyo bar 'gyur la de dag ni ma rnyed do//de'i skabasu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
199a2(mdo sde): ni mi mkhyen pa'am/mi gzigs pa 'am/mi rtogs pa 'am/thugasu mi chud pa zhig ci yang med la/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/'jig rten la phan
199a3(mdo sde): 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/srung ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/gcig tu dpa' ba/zla med pa/gnyi su mi gsung ba/zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/
199a4(mdo sde): bslab pa gsum la legs par bsgrubs pa/'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa/bsdu ba'i
199a5(mdo sde): dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas 'dres par byas pa/mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrags pa/yan lag lnga rnam par
199a6(mdo sde): spangs pa/'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/yan lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasasu rdzogs pa/rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/byang chub kyi
199a7(mdo sde): yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas ma/stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/phyogs bcu
199b1(mdo sde): grags pas kun tu rgyas pa/brgya phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
199b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten la gzigs te/su ni rlung /su ni dar /su ni phongs shing 'dug/su ni nyi ma nga bar 'gyur/su ni gnod pa dang ldan/su ni phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan//
199b3(mdo sde): su ni ngan song du gzhol/su ni ngan song du 'bad/su ni ngan song du bab/su ni ngas ngan song las phyung ste/mtho ris dang /thar pa dang /'bras bu la gzhag par bya/su ni 'dod pa'i
199b4(mdo sde): 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma
199b5(mdo sde): bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongasu smin par bya/su ni yongasu smin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go//'dir
199b6(mdo sde): smos pa/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlab sa yol bar 'gyur yang srid//gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//sangs rgyas dus lus yol ba med//de nas bcom
199b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu phyi sa khung la phan gdags pa'i phyir snga do sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/lhung bzed bsnams nas/dge slong gi tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/dge slong
200a1(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas yangs pa can du bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang /ro shig na mthar gyis bsod snyoms bskor te srang du gshegs na/
200a2(mdo sde): sa khung yang phan tshun 'khor te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'greng ngo //de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par
200a3(mdo sde): brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ra bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzung
200a4(mdo sde): ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de'i mod la des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar byas so//de dga' ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/thal mo
200a5(mdo sde): sbyar nas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can bdag cag lta bu yang logs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu 'byung ba mchis te/chud par gyur na bdag
200a6(mdo sde): kyang rab tu 'byung bar 'tshalo//de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang /bag la nyal mkhyen pas/de shin tu skal ba dang
200a7(mdo sde): ldan par thug su chud nas phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dge slong chur shog/tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/bcom
200b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la/skra dang kha spu ni bregs nas/zhag bdun lon pa tsam du gyur/spyod lam ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa lta bur
200b2(mdo sde): 'dug par gyur pa/lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to//'dir smras pa/de bzhin gshegs pas tshu zhes bka' stsal pas/de ni mgo bregs lus la
200b3(mdo sde): snam sbyar gyon//sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas go bgos nas//mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yid la byed pa'i lung phog ste//
200b4(mdo sde): ris brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /ltung
200b5(mdo sde): ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra ba
200b6(mdo sde): pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan dan spangs pa lta
200b7(mdo sde): bur bsil bar gyur pa/rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang bkur
201a1(mdo sde): bstil rgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to//de dgra bcom pa
201a2(mdo sde): nyid thob zin na yang ngan pa la dga' bar gyur nas/der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di lta ste/nga'i dge slong phyis khung 'di ni nyan
201a3(mdo sde): thos kyi dge slong ngan ngon la mos pa rnams kyi mchog yin no//de na dge slong dag the tsom skyes te the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun
201a4(mdo sde): paganas brtan phyis khung gis las ci bgyis na des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur logs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag phyis khung nyid kyis sbyin
201a5(mdo sde): tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pa na/phyi sa khung nyid kyis las
201a6(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur//
201a7(mdo sde): chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsogs pa rnams ni/zin pa'i phung ba dang /khams dang
201b1(mdo sde): skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la smin par 'gyur//lus can dag gis las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du sbyin
201b2(mdo sde): por 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na//bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
201b3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul bya'i khwa lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
201b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ljon zhes bya ba ni rten cing bzhug so//de'i tshe'i rgyal po'i pho brang dor khyim bdag gcig
201b5(mdo sde): gis gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te/der phyogs dang yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong dag 'ongs pa dang /'gro ba dang gnas par sems so//gtsug lag khang de ni so
201b6(mdo sde): so'i skye bo'i dge slong zhig gnas te/de yang gnas la shin tu ser sna che ba zhig ste/dge slong gsar du 'ong ba rnams mthong na/tshig pa za zhing 'khrug la gnod sems byed de/zhul zhul
201b7(mdo sde): bor 'drog cing 'khrug pa skyed par byed do//dge slong gang dag gtsug khang de nas gung du 'gro ba de dag mthong na ni/shas cher dga' zhing mchog tu dga' la skyel zhing smra bar byed do//phyis ro shog/
202a1(mdo sde): nag zhig gi yul nas dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig 'ong so//gtsug lag khang gi bdag po de yang phyir mi 'ong ba yin te/des spyod lam gyi sgo nas dgra bcom pa yin
202a2(mdo sde): par shes so//de nas dga' ba skyes te/phyid nyon dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus dang bshos la spyan drangs//dge slong gzhi ba de ni de na med pa las ra
202a3(mdo sde): shig na phyid nyin cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus kyang phul/bshos kyang bshams pa dang /dge slong gzhi ba de yang 'ongs te/de yang cho ga dang ldan pa'i khrus sar song nas/gtsug lag khang
202a4(mdo sde): gi bdag po khyed rengasu byung ste/dge slong gsar du 'ongs pa'i byi dor byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo //de nas de phrag dog skyes nas/des sdang ba'i sems kyis ngag gi las rtsub po smras te/
202a5(mdo sde): dge slong khyed ni lus mi gtsang bas byugs kyang bri'i/sbyin bdag 'di lta bu'i bsnyen bkur len pa ni de lta ma yin no zhes byas so//de nas dgra bcom pa des nyon mongs 'di las ches mi
202a6(mdo sde): bzad pa skol ba can du 'gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/cang mo zer bar dang du blangaso//re shig na tshogs par gyur te dro la bab pa na dge slong gzhi pa nges dgra bcom pa la khyod kyis sdang ba'i
202a7(mdo sde): sems bskyed do zhes zer ba thos so//thos nas kyang de 'gyod pa skyes so//de nas dge slong dgra bcom pa de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/'phags pa bdag gis khyod la tshig rtsub po
202b1(mdo sde): smras pa de bzod pa gsol lo zhes byas so//de nas dgra bcom pa des de'i dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/nam mkha' la 'phags nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to//de nas lhag par
202b2(mdo sde): yang 'gyod pa skyes te/des de'i mdun du las kyi nyes pa de mthol zhing bshags to shad kyis sbyar so//'on kyang des mthar thug pa'i ye shes bskyed ni ma nus so//de nas re shig na
202b3(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i dus lo bab pa dang /rjes smon lam btab pa/bdag gis dgra bcom pa la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /ngag gi las rtsub po smras pa gang yin pa de'i las de'i rnam pa
202b4(mdo sde): smin pa ni bdag gis myo shA 'gyur ci //bdag gis bslags pa dang /kha ton byas pa dang /sbyin pa dong sbyin pa chen po dag byin pa dang /dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i las
202b5(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyes por byed par shog shig/ces byas so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i cha
202b6(mdo sde): de'i dus na dge slong gzhi bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni phyis khung 'di nyid yin te/des dgra bcom pa la ngag gi las rngub po smras pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des na 'khor ba na sdug bsngal
202b7(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa myong bar gyur to/las de nyid kyi lhag ma lus pas/de ltar srid pa tha ma la bab pa'i tshe yang 'di ltar drong zhing mchog tu dri nga bar gyur la/mi gtsang ba dang /snyeg snyeg
203a1(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur to//de nas kha ton byas pa dang /phung por mkhas pa dang /khams la mkhas pa dang /skye mched la mkhas pa dang /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
203a2(mdo sde): ba la mkhas pa dang /gnas dang gnas ma yon pa la mkhas par byas pa des ni nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas
203a3(mdo sde): so//dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ser sna spang ba la brtson par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/phyis khung so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de dag 'byung
203a4(mdo sde): bar mi 'gyur ba dang /des dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bur 'gyur ba'i phyir te/dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de
203a5(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag dang lha dang lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang yid rangs te/bcom
203a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/sdom gyi tshig su bcad pa lnga pa rdzogs s+ho////sdom ni/sprul
203a7(mdo sde): nazhe dang ni zla ba dang //sA la dang ni dpal ldan ma//gos dang ne tso pho nya dang //ma he dang ni gso sbyor dang //ngang pa tha mar brjod pa yin//sbrul nag po zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas
203b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /
203b2(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor
203b3(mdo sde): byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs
203b4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan
203b5(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugaso//de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mngal
203b6(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba/yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig yod de/de yang ser sna can 'jungs pa yo
203b7(mdo sde): byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa/khwa la yang gtor ma mi ster ba zhig ste/des dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /sdug cing phongs pa dang /bkren pa dag mthong ni sems sdang bar byed do///
204a1(mdo sde): de nas des rang gi bskyed myos tshul du gser dngul gyi phung po chen po smras te bzhag nas/de de la chags te/lhag par zhen bzhin du shi'o//de shi nas
204a2(mdo sde): de nyid kyi steng du sbrul gdug pa sbrul nog po chen po mi gdug pa zhig tu skyes so//de nas bskyed mos tshal der skye bo'i tshogs gang song ba de dag bltas pa tsam gyis gsod
204a3(mdo sde): par byed do//rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thog rtag tu yang che ge mo'i bskyod mos tshal du song po de dag thams cad bsgrag par 'gyu ro zhes sla grag par gyur to//skye bo'i
204a4(mdo sde): tshogs kyis kyang rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol to//de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di snyam du sems te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogaso par de
204a5(mdo sde): 'dul nus par gzhan su zhig yod snyam mo//de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po skye bo mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin na bcom ldan
204a6(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la chos
204a7(mdo sde): kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par dge' bar mdzad do//chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du
204b1(mdo sde): mas yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhug so//de nas rgyal po
204b2(mdo sde): gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log pu thal mo sbyar ba
204b3(mdo sde): btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na bskyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig na sbrul gdug pa sbrul nag po chen po chen po
204b4(mdo sde): mig gdug pa zhig mchis te/skye bo mang po brlag par bgyid lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du/de gdul bar gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das
204b5(mdo sde): kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying pa la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po/bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/bcom
204b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/stan las langs nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos
204b7(mdo sde): gsol te/lhung bzed bsnams nas bskyed mos 'tshal ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gzer gser gyi kha dog can nyi ma stong gi 'od pas
205a1(mdo sde): lhag pa dag bkye ste/de dag gis bskyed mos 'tshal de dag thams cad snang bar byas so//bskal pa stong gi bar du yongasu bsgoms pa'i byams pa'i 'od
205a2(mdo sde): zer dag kyang bkye ste/de dag gis de'i lus la 'og ma thog tu rab tu sim par gyur to//de nas sbrul gdug pa nges phani tshun du bltas te/suM'i mthus bdag gi lus sim par gyur
205a3(mdo sde): cig gu snyam pa dang /des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgya ni pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/
205a4(mdo sde): 'od 'dam gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'di mnga' ba rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i
205a5(mdo sde): sems bskyed de/dad pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang 'thun pa'i chos bstan te/bzhin bzang khyod nyid kyis rdzas 'di bsgrubs pa des na khyod
205a6(mdo sde): sbrul gdug par ltung bar byas so//da yang ngal dad pa'i sems skyed la gter 'di la yang sems ma chags par byas dang lag so//'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang sems can
205a7(mdo sde): dmyal bar skye 'ari/de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de tshe rabs dran par mdzad pa de'i tshe de ngus so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/
205b1(mdo sde): khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la//de ni nga l+r-i tso byar med/mau khom par ni skyes zin gyis//don mod ngus pas co la phan//'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can//nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la//
205b2(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skye gnos spangs na legs//'on tang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur//de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das kyis sbrul de lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/'od ma'i tshal du po snams
205b3(mdo sde): de'i skabasu rgyal po dang yul ma ga d+hA'i skye bo'i chags kyis sbrul gdug pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar btulnga ba thos so//de nas sbrul gdug pa de rang gi lus la smad de kha 'chis
205b4(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te/shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so//lha'i bu 'am/lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po mi lon pa ni chos
205b5(mdo sde): nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/gang nas shi 'phos gang du skyes las gang gis skyes snyam mo//de nas sbrul gdug pa las shi 'phos po dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
205b6(mdo sde): yul bzang por skyes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo //de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/bdag zhag lon nas
205b7(mdo sde): bzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam ma//de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i
206a1(mdo sde): lha'i burna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/nor bu sna tshogs kyis smras pa'i cod pan can/lus gur gum dang
206a2(mdo sde): twatra ma la'i lo ma dang /smrig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang pad+ma dang ku mu dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /mnAd rab rnams kyis thub bkang
206a3(mdo sde): ste/'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi
206a4(mdo sde): spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang /khams dang rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/'phags pa'i
206a5(mdo sde): bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos nas sngon skul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bci
206a6(mdo sde): nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig tu brjod pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang /mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams
206a7(mdo sde): pa dang /rus pa'i ri las bsgral ba dang /ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni
206b1(mdo sde): bdag snangs kyang ma lda/mas rgyu sargyal sno sa/lha rnams kyis rnam gyis/na ma nyan chags kyis sna ma sa/na man
206b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang /blam+ba ze rnams kyis kyang ma gyis lag so//yang smras pa/nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/ tu mi bzod
206b3(mdo sde): nim+bu yis bcad//bsod nams rlob ldan ma'i ris 'phyo ba phye//mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag byis thob//bdag gis de ring nyes pa sbyangs pa'i mig/shin tu rnam dag
206b4(mdo sde): khyod las brten nas thob//bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal//'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'bang thob//mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa//skye dang rga dang
206b5(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa//srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi//thub pa khyod ni dang mthong 'bras bu yod//de nas do shal 'phyang ba dgar gyur te//btud cing zhabs gnyis la
206b6(mdo sde): ni phyag 'tshal nas//dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang //lha yi 'jig rten bltas lha yul song //de nas sngon stsa lo gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bu de cheng pa khe spogs phyin
206b7(mdo sde): pa dang /zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang /dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang /nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs
207a1(mdo sde): pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis/de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i thad du song nas/rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas
207a2(mdo sde): te/rgyal po bslang nas 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal po chen po longs nyal te ci bya/de nas rgyal po sad de 'od chen po de dang lha'i bu de mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dga' zhing
207a3(mdo sde): mgu ste khyod su zhig ces dris so//de ni re bdag ni bskyed mos tshal der bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrol gdug pa btul te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa
207a4(mdo sde): yin te/bcom ldan 'das la yang bdag gis bsnyen bkur byas nas bden pa mthong bar gyur to//de bdag gis khyod la bstan kyis khyod song la/bskyed mos tshal de'i phyogs ga
207a5(mdo sde): ge mo zhig nas gter chen po phyung la/bdag gi phyir bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol te/yon gyi rabs kyang gdon par gsol cig/de nas
207a6(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lha'i bu la cang mi zer bar khas blangaso//de nas sngon sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus rgyal pos cang mi zer bas khas blangs par rig nas de nyid du
207a7(mdo sde): mi snang bar gyur to//de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de nyid kyi mtshan mo yul maM ga d+ha'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /yul mi rnams la bsgo nas bskyed mos tshal der song ste
207b1(mdo sde): gter phyung nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum gyi bar du gshos gsol te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das sngon sprul
207b2(mdo sde): gdug par gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na des sbrul gdug par skyes lags/las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes nas bden pa mthong bar gyur lags/
207b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de shas cher chags pa bskyed de/dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /sdug cing phongs pa dang /bkren po rnams la sdang ba'i sems bskyed pa des ni
207b4(mdo sde): sbrul gdug par skyes so//nga la sems dga' bar byas po des ni lha'i nong du skyes so//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ring la dge bsnyen du gyur to//skyabasu
207b5(mdo sde): song ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur to//rgyal po chen po de bas na ser sna spang ba'i phyir brtson par bya ste/ci nas sbrul gdug par gyur pa'i nyes pa
207b6(mdo sde): de lta bu dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /de nyid lha'i bur gyur pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs de dag lta bur 'gyur bar rgyal po khyod kyis bslob par bya'o//de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying
207b7(mdo sde): po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ste/stan las langs nas song ngo //bcom
208a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
208a2(mdo sde): zla ba zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /byug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnam
208a3(mdo sde): dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur
208a4(mdo sde): sri byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' ldeng dang /mi 'am tsi dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams
208a5(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa ni bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman
208a6(mdo sde): zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs//de'i tshe mnyan
208a7(mdo sde): du yod pa na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rig ma nyi pa las chung ma blangs te/de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu
208b1(mdo sde): lon pa dang bu byung ste/khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa skye bo thams cad kyi mgri sim par byed pa zhig btsas so//de yang bram ze des dka' bas rnyes pa yin te/de
208b2(mdo sde): la bu dang bu mo gzhan yang meng nas de bskyed bsrings te phyir skyes nas/de 'jog rten thams cad sim par byed pa'i phyir bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis khye'u de'i ming zla ba zhes btag so//
208b3(mdo sde): de nas bram ze'i khye'u zla ba grong khyer thams cad du brgyud de bskor bas bram ze de yang khye'u de la lhag par byams par gyur te/'chag pa dang /'dug pa dang /nyal ba dag gi tshe yang
208b4(mdo sde): rtag tu legs par bsrung ba lhur byed cing 'dug go/bram ze de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang nye ba zhig na 'dug go//de nas bram ze'i khye'u de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
208b5(mdo sde): dang bsten nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol du song ste/sangs rgyas kyi gsung thos nas/des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de/de yang tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum
208b6(mdo sde): ba'i lha yul bzang por skyes so//lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam gsum skye bar 'gyur te/gang nas shi 'phos/gang du skyes/las
208b7(mdo sde): gang gis skyes snyam mo//de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur por des
209a1(mdo sde): mthong ngo //de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni dag
209a2(mdo sde): gis cha ma yin gyis/bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo//de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa
209a3(mdo sde): thogs pa lus do shal dang /se mo dos brgyan pa/nor bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur kum dang /ta ma la'i lo ma dang /sgrig ka la sogs pas byugs pa
209a4(mdo sde): des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mud dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /man da ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams
209a5(mdo sde): cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das
209a6(mdo sde): kyis sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
209a7(mdo sde): chos bstan te/de thos nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste//
209b1(mdo sde): des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod do/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mtsho ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /rus bI ri lA bsgral ba
209b2(mdo sde): dang /ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /mthi sa dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas
209b3(mdo sde): kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/
209b4(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lag so//yang smras pa/nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam//shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcad//bsod nams rab
209b5(mdo sde): ldan mtho ris 'gro ba 'phye//mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob//bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/shin tu rnam dag khyod las brten nas thob//bdag ni
209b6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal//'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob//mi mchog dbang po lha dang mis mchod pa//skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa//srid pa stong du
209b7(mdo sde): mthong bar dka' ba yis//thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod//de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' 'gyur te//btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas//dgra thub la ni bskom
210a1(mdo sde): ba byas nas kyang //lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul mthong //de nas sngon bram zer gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang /zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar
210a2(mdo sde): gyur pa dang /dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang /nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi
210a3(mdo sde): gan su song ngo //dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed la gnas te/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen pos 'byung ba mthong //mthogs
210a4(mdo sde): tsom skyes te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig
210a5(mdo sde): rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/lha'i
210a6(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi bram ze'i bu cig pa de tshe thung ste shi nas de nga las sems dga' bar gyur te/sum cu rtsa gsuM
210a7(mdo sde): pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/de mdangs sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ngas de la chos bstan nas/bden pa mthong bar gyur te/rang gi gnasu song ngo //de'i skabasu bram ze des
210b1(mdo sde): bu gcig pa sdug cig phangs la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang /bzod pa dang ldan pa dang /mi mthun pa med pa de dur khrod du khyer nas pang bar bzhag ste/kye hud bu/kyi hud bu thu
210b2(mdo sde): //kyi hud bu gcig pa zhes zer zhing 'bod de/de'i nye du rnams kyis de ltar bcugs kyang bsrung ma nus nas/de khwa dang chun log dang /bya rgod dang /wa rnams kyis ni bskor/
210b3(mdo sde): bud med skra bshig pa dag dang ni 'grogs/skye bo mang pos ni blta zhing 'dug go//de nas de'i bu lhar skyes pas/pha smre sngags 'don pa mthong nas/snying rjes snying bskyod de/pha'i
210b4(mdo sde): mya ngan bsel ba'i phyir bdag nyid drang srong gi tshe lugasu sprul nas/dur khrod kyi 'dab du dka' thub lnga byed cing 'dug go//de nas bram ze des drang srong de dris pa/kye drang srong chen po khyod
210b5(mdo sde): dka' thub 'dis ci zhig sgrub/drang srong gis smras pa/nga ni rgyal srid sgrub ste/nga'i gser gyi shing rta rin po che sna tshogs kyis skyes pa/nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyis shing rta'i 'khor
210b6(mdo sde): lo byas la/'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni mdun nas 'dren te/shing rtade la non zhing sa chen po 'di bskor bar 'did do//bram zes smras pa/gal te lo brgya thams 'o bar rgyun tu
210b7(mdo sde): dka' thub spyad byas te//dka' thub mchog gis spyad byas kyang //gnas de khyod kyis re mi 'thob//drang srong gis skyes pa/khyod kyang shi ba'i khog pa mchog tu gnam zhing mi gtsang
211a1(mdo sde): 2/shong 'dubar/ nan mnan nadram sa smras pa/sdug pa cwochog can sna smra na/ nas smras pa da
