211a2(mdo sde): tham pa'i bar//rgyun tu ngu ba'i las byas kyang //bu de khyod kyis rimi thob//khyod ni dus kyang ci la phan//de nas bram ze de drang srong gi tshig bden nosnyam nis dad pa skyes so//dad
211a3(mdo sde): pa skyes nas khyod su zhig ces bya'o//de nas drang srong gi cha lugs de mi snang bar byas nas/rang gi cha lug su 'dug ste pha la smras pa/bdag ni khyod kyi bu cig pa de yin te/bco
211a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur nas shi ste/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/khyod kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir 'dir 'ongs//yab khyod tshur spyon//bcom
211a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la skyabasu bzhud cig dang /khyod kyang 'khor ba las 'da' bar 'gyur yang srid do//de nas bram ze des shi ba'i rus bu bor nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la bo drir song ste
211a6(mdo sde): byiphyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'phags pa'i bden pa
211a7(mdo sde): bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/de thos nas bram ze des 'jig tshogs lo lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs
211b1(mdo sde): ba'i 'bras bu thob bo//des mtho bar gyur pa thob cing rnyed pa thob nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/lan gsum bskor ba byas te song ngo //de nas
211b2(mdo sde): dge slong the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'dis 'di ltar pha mya ngan bsal nas bden pa mthong
211b3(mdo sde): ba la yang bzhag po gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar 'dis bden pa mthong nas/pha yongasu bskyabs pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod//
211b4(mdo sde): 'dis ni 'das pa'i dus na so so'i skye bor 'dug pa'i tshe yang pha bsod pa la thug pa las lan gsum skyabs byas te/de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad
211b5(mdo sde): do//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/grong khyer bA ra na si na gzhan gyi chung ma la phyi ba byed pa zhig yod de/de'i bu ni dad pa dang ldan pa dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba mi
211b6(mdo sde): rnams shin tu 'drang ba zhig go/de nas re shig na de'i phas rkun po byas nas rgyal pos gshed ma rnams la sod cig ce su bsgo'o//de nas bus lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal po la
211b7(mdo sde): gsol nas srog phangs pa byin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhan gyi chung ma la bya ba byed pa gang yin pa
212a1(mdo sde): de ni bram ze 'di yin no//byi ba byed pa'i bu de ni bram ze'i khye'u 'odadi yin no//dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das las ci zhig bgyis/
212a2(mdo sde): na des pha dang bu gnyis ga bden pa mthong bar gyur logs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi ri re la gnyi ga dge bsnyen
212a3(mdo sde): du gyur te/skyabasu song ba dang /bslab pa'i gzhi blangs pas na de'i phyir de ltar bden pa mthong bar gyur to//dge slong dag de bas na 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang /chos thams
212a4(mdo sde): cad bdag med pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o snyam du mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bad par bya ste/dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis
212a5(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag dang /lha dang mo lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa gan+d+ha dag kyang yid rangs te/
212a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////sA la zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po
212a7(mdo sde): rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /
212b1(mdo sde): lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /
212b2(mdo sde): klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams
212b3(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/mnyan du
212b4(mdo sde): yod pa na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe mnyan du yod par sA la gcog pa zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/der srog chags
212b5(mdo sde): 'bum phrag du ma 'dus nas/shing sA la'i me tog blangs te/rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spod ngo do//de nas re shig na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis sA la'i me tog blangs te/mnyan du yod pa'i
212b6(mdo sde): nang du song ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs kyi zham ring byas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms mdzad de slar gshegs nas/
212b7(mdo sde): bu mo des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/
213a1(mdo sde): nyam stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ri'u 'gro de lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dga' bsgres te/bcom ldan 'das
213a2(mdo sde): la sA la'i me tog gis gtor to//de nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/phyir lag nas khyim du dgos pa'i phyir yang gzhan dag blang ngo snyam pa dang /re shig ne de sA la'i
213a3(mdo sde): shing la mdzegs pa las lhung ste shi nas/bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas pas/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lho yul bzang por skyes so//de nas re shig na lus dang gzhal
213a4(mdo sde): med khang sA la'i me tog gis brgyan te/lha'i mdun sa'i nang du song ngo //nga'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i mdun sa chos bzang na lha'i tshogs kyi nang na sangs rgyas dang /
213a5(mdo sde): chos dang /dge 'dun gyi sngags pa brjod cing 'dug pa las lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/lha'i bu mau lus dang gzhal med khang sA la'i me tog gis brgyan pa/dge ba'irtsa
213a6(mdo sde): ba 'bar ba de mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de la tshigasu bcad de smras pa/ci'i phyir/khyod kyis lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad+ma ud pa la lta bur gyur//'di na lus
213a7(mdo sde): dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur//ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad+ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur//las rnams gang gis 'bras
213b1(mdo sde): bri myong gyur 'dri na lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smros/lha mos smras pa/mtshan mchog dag gis rgyas pa yi//mo yi nyi ma nyan thos bcas//sA la'i me tig rdal med pa/
213b2(mdo sde): bzod po dag gis legs par gtor//las dag de 'dra byis pa'i phyir//bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes//bzhin mdog pad+ma zla ba ltar//rnam dag 'od ldan bltan stug/
213b3(mdo sde): brgya byin gyis smras pa/kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing //nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa//mthor mi sdug par skye ba'i phyir//de la khyod kyis sa bon btab//bzhin mdze
213b4(mdo sde): pad+ma'i 'dab ma yongs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma//bud med mchog rnams kyis nI gang la bkur bsti byas pa yi//sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i mang ba yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mabyu ba/
213b5(mdo sde): gser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod//lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring ngo ma lon pa na chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/gang nas shi
213b6(mdo sde): 'bras/gang du skyes/las gdagos skyes snyam mo//de nas ma las shrI 'bas pa dang /sum du rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la sems
213b7(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur pa ngos mthong ngo //de nas lho'i bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshi ma yin gyis/
214a1(mdo sde): bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo//de nas lha'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul pa thogs pa lus dro shal dang so mo
214a2(mdo sde): dongos brgyan pa/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i rjod pan tsa na/lus gur kum dang /ta ma la'i lo ma dang /sprig ka la sogs byugs pa de lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag
214a3(mdo sde): du mas g.yog byas nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo sA la'i me tog gi gzhal med khang de nyid dang bcas pas bocom ldan 'das kyi thang du song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog
214a4(mdo sde): gis gtor te//chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang //
214a5(mdo sde): rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs pa 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos nas lha'i bu mo des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po
214a6(mdo sde): nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/nges bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis
214a7(mdo sde): bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mdze bskems pa dang /rus pa'i ri las bsgral ba dang /ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phyi ba dang /bdag
214b1(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon
214b2(mdo sde): gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lag so//yang smras pa/nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam/shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi
214b3(mdo sde): mthu yis bcad//bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye//mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob//bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/shin tu rnam dag
214b4(mdo sde): khyod la brten nas thob/bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal//'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob/mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa//skye dang rga dang
214b5(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i nod spangs na//srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis//thub pa khyod ni de mthong 'bras bu yod/de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' 'gyur te//btud cing zhu bos gnyis
214b6(mdo sde): la ni phyag 'tshal nas//dgra thung la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang //lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song /de nas lha'i bu mo de tshong pa kho spogs phyin pa dang /zhing pa 'bru
214b7(mdo sde): rgyal bar gyur pa dang /dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang /nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis
215a1(mdo sde): rang gi gan su song ngo //dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba
215a2(mdo sde): mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang gsum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/
215a3(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du/mchis lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi mjed kyi bdag
215a4(mdo sde): po tshangs pa 'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nom/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no//bu mo gang gis lam+b+ha khar me tog gis gtor ba de khyod kyis mthong
215a5(mdo sde): ngam btsun pa mthong lag so//de ni nga la sems dga' ba bskyed nas shi ste/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas de nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ngas de la chos bstan
215a6(mdo sde): nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/rang gi gnasu song ngo //dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ston pa la bkur bsti bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mo bya'o//mchod
215a7(mdo sde): pa bya'o//ston pa la bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o//zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis
215b1(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///bam po bcu gsum pa//dpal ldan ma
215b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /
215b3(mdo sde): dad dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po
215b4(mdo sde): rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha me yin dang /na mkha' ldeng dang /me 'am ci dang /lto 'phye
215b5(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bzo' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims che dang /gdan dang /snyun bya so so
215b6(mdo sde): drang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhugaso//de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
215b7(mdo sde): khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po byed de/de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa dang /skye bo dang ma mang pos gang ba dang /rtsod pa dang /
216a1(mdo sde): 'thab pa zhi ba dang /'khrug pa dang /nang 'khrug dang /chom rkun dang /mu ge dang /nad rnams med pa dang /'bras sA lu dang /bu ram shing dang /ba lang
216a2(mdo sde): dang /ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la/bu cig pa la bya babazhin du rgyal srid bskyangaso//de nas gang gi tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom
216a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das las bden pa mthong ba de'i tshe/btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro'o//de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po phyi zhig na dpyid kyi
216a4(mdo sde): dus la bab pa'i tshe shing ljon pa rnams me tog rgyas la ngang pa dang /khrung khrung dang /rma bya dang /ne co dang /ri skegs dang /khu byug dang /shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i
216a5(mdo sde): nags khrod na skyed mos tshal gyi ser btsun mo dam pa dang /btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te dong nas/der btsun mo'i 'khor gyis rgyal po la gsol pa/lha bdag cag ni gdugs
216a6(mdo sde): cig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchi ba'i rngo ma thog na lha btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsro bar
216a7(mdo sde): cig nang /'on tang bdag cag gis de la rgyun tu mar me dang /bdug pa dang /me tog dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
216b1(mdo sde): ngan dag gis bkur ba sti bad+ma'o zhes gsol to//de nas re shig na rgyal po gzugs can snying chos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag la dbu sgra dang /
216b2(mdo sde): sen mo stsal du gsol/'on dang bdag gis mchis blang 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsgo bar bgyi'o zhes gsol to//de nas re shig ni bcom
216b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis dbu sgra dang /sen mo byin nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po btsun ma 'khor dang bcas pas bdun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du ba//rabasti chen po dang ldan paste/de bzhin gsheg
216b4(mdo sde): pa'i dbu sgra dang /seMn ma'i mchod rten brtsigs te zhal bsres nas de la btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mar me dang /gdug pa dang /me ti ga dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug
216b5(mdo sde): dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba don dag gis kyang mchod pa byed do//de nas glang gi cha rgyal po ma skyes dgra lhas sbyin gyis skad de/yab chos dang ldan pa chos bzhin
216b6(mdo sde): du rgyal po byed pa bsad nas rang rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sbyin 'a bya ba'i chos thams cad pacing /sru sa dade bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten da
216b7(mdo sde): bkur bsti ma byed cig ces khrims kyang bca so//de nas gang gi tshechis bco lnga la skabs 'dod pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe/dbu sgra dang sen ma'i mchos rten de la su yang phyag dang byed
217a1(mdo sde): pa 'am/mar mo dang /gdug pa dang /me tog 'bul ba med do//de nas btsun mo'i 'khor gyis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten de de lta bur gyur pa yang ma
217a2(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can snying po yang dran nas snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing kyi hud chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dang bral bas bdag cag bsod nams las 'grib so zhes 'dzer te//de'i nang nas btsun
217a3(mdo sde): mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba des rang gi srog dang bsngos te sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjesu dran nas/dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la phyag dar byas te/mar me'i phreng ba dngar to//de nas re
217a4(mdo sde): shig na rgyal po ma skyes dgra khang pa brtsigs pa'i steng du byung ste/snang ba chen po de mthong nas 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang /re shog na gzhan zhig gis dpal ldan mas dbu skra dang sen
217a5(mdo sde): mo'i mchod rten la mor me'i 'phreng ba dang ra ba lags zhes byas so//de nas dpal ldan ma bkug ste ci'i phyir khyod kyis rgyal po'i bka' bcag ces smras na/de na ri bdag gis khyod kyi bka'
217a6(mdo sde): bcag du lags kyang /bdag gis chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i bka' ma bcago zhes zer ro//de nas de khros nas 'khor lo 'phangs te bsad do//de nas bcom
217a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur te shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so//de'i tshe lha'i mdun ma zhig kyang 'dus nas/lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi
217b1(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor snang ba khor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod pa dang ldan pa de lha'i mdun ma'i nang du song ngo //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis snang ba chen po de dang lha'i 'od dpag tshad gcig
217b2(mdo sde): pa mthong nas dris pa/ci'i phyir khyod kyi lus mdog dag pa'i gser 'dra pad+ma ud pa la lta bur gyur//'di na lus dpal mtshungs med khyod kyi lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur//
217b3(mdo sde): ci yi phyir na khyod kyis lus las 'od 'byung 'di dag ci las gyur//ci yi phyir na khyod kyi bzhin mdog pad+ma rgyas 'dra gser mdog lta bur gyur//las rnams gang gi 'bras bu myong gyur
217b4(mdo sde): 'di ni lha mo khyod kyis bdag la smros/lha mos smras pa/'jig rten gsum mgon 'gro ba'i skyon cig pa//mtshan mchog rnams kyis phyug pa'i sangs rgyas mthong /sgyu mchog nyon
217b5(mdo sde): mongs mun pa sel ba la//mun pa sel ba'i mar me yon du phul//zla ba'i 'od zer mchog dang 'dra ba'i 'od//mthong nas thub la snying nas dad pa bskyed//'od zer mthong nas dga'
217b6(mdo sde): bar gyur pa yis//ston pa smra ba'i mchog la phyag kyang bgyis//ngas dge de 'dra byas pa'i phyir//bdag ni lhag par mngon du mdzes//bzhin mdag pad+ma zla ba ltar//rnam dag
217b7(mdo sde): 'od ldan blta na sdug/brgya byin gyis smras pa/kye ma yon tan nyid kyi zhing //nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa//mtho ris sdug par skye ba'i phyir//de la khyod kyis sa bon btag
218a1(mdo sde): bzhin mdzes pad+ma'i mad ba ma yangs pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan ma//bud med mchog rnams kyis ni gang la bkur bsti byas pa ni//sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa
218a2(mdo sde): mdab yangs 'dra ba'i spyan mnga' ba//giser mchog phung po lta bur mdangs dkar de la su mi mchod//lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems
218a3(mdo sde): rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/gang nas shi 'phos/gang du skyes/las gang gis skyes snyam mo//de nas mi las shi 'phos pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul
218a4(mdo sde): bzang por skyes po dang /bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur par des mthong ngo //de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma 'di snyam du sems te/bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom
218a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi chu ma yin gyis/bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo//de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma lha'i 'od kyi
218a6(mdo sde): snang bas gang bdes de nyid kyi mtshan mo me tog mud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mud ta dang /pad+mo dkar po dang /man dar ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/rgyal po'i khabe bya ka lan da ka gan+da
218a7(mdo sde): ba thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das
218b1(mdo sde): kyis lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma'i bsam pa dang /bag la ny+dzal bu dang //khyams dang rang bzhin thug su chung nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba da lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos
218b2(mdo sde): nas lce'i bu mo dpa la ldan mas/'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rje sde btso mnas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/nges bden pa mthong nas/dga' ba'i
218b3(mdo sde): tshatshig lan gsum brjod de//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mcho bskams pa dang /rus pa'i la bsgral pa dang /ngan song ga sgo rnams bcad pa dang /
218b4(mdo sde): mtho sa dang thar pa'i sgo rnams bye ba dang /bya dge sgra dang mi rnams sbyinang du bzhag pa'i sgra thu ni bdag la bas kyang mu bgyis/mas kyang mi bgyis/rgyal pos kyang mi bgyis/lhun ma
218b5(mdo sde): kyis kyang ma bgyis/rlung mi dong gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi mtshan rnams byas kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang /bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags//yang
218b6(mdo sde): smras pa/nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam//shin tu mi bzang khyod kyis mthu yis pa dang //bsod nams rab ldan motho ngas 'gro ba phye//mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag
218b7(mdo sde): gis thob//bdag gis de ri nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/shin tu rnam dog khyod las brten nas 'dzin//bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgyal//'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i
219a1(mdo sde): go 'phang 'thob//mi mchog dbang po me dang lhas mchod pa//skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa//srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi//thub pa khyod ni dang mdza/
219a2(mdo sde): 'bras bu yod//de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te//btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas//dgra rngub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang //lha yi 'jig rten/ltas lha yul
219a3(mdo sde): so//de nas lha'i bu mo dpal ldan ma tshang ba khe spags phyin pa dang /zhing pa 'bru rgyas bar gyur pa dang /dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang /nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor
219a4(mdo sde): pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu song ngo //dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/de dag gis/
219a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ma dang sum mi
219a6(mdo sde): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong po bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
219a7(mdo sde): pa/dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/rgyal po gzugs can
219b1(mdo sde): snying po'i btsun mo dpal ldan ma zhes bya bas rang gi srog dang sngos te/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la mar me'i phreng
219b2(mdo sde): ba dang ra nas/rgyal po ma skyes dgra khros pas bsad de//de nga la dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas she ste/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs
219b3(mdo sde): te ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/rang gi gnasu song ngo //dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ston pa la bkur bsti bya'o//bla mar bya'o//ri mo bya'o///
219b4(mdo sde): mchod pa bya'o//ston pa la bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri ma byas/mchod pa byas nas brten te gnas par bya'o zhes dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das
219b5(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////gos shes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
219b6(mdo sde): la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /
219b7(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mcho
220a1(mdo sde): pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes par
220a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan
220a3(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs//de nas gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas
220a4(mdo sde): sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tsha' phul te/mthar kyis gser bye ba phrag brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la phul ba de'i tshe/de'i
220a5(mdo sde): blo skyes pa ma la bdag smin pa dag sprin zhing /bsod nams dag byed pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba ci yod kyis bdag gis ske bo dbul po rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir mnyan du yod pa
220a6(mdo sde): na gnas pa'i skye bo rnams dad pa bsngos te/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la snyen bkur bya'o//de ltar byas pa dang bdag gis skye bo mang po la yang phan btags
220a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur la/bsod nams mang po yang bskyed par 'gyur//snyam mo//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ji ltar bsams pa de rgyal po lo gsol nas/rgyal pos kyang
220b1(mdo sde): mnyan du yod pa thams cad du dril bsgrags te mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi khyed rnams nyon cig/deng nas zhag bdun khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de
220b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir glang po che la zhon te dad pa sdud par 'dod kyis khyed gong gis ji tsam yongasu gtang bar bya ba de yongasu gtang bar gyis shig chos bsgo'o//
220b3(mdo sde): de nas re shig na zhag bdun lon pa dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin glang po che la zhon te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi phyir dad pa sdud pa la zhugs te/der grang
220b4(mdo sde): dag la ji tsam bdog pa de dag de tsam sbyin par byed do//kha cig ni 'gul gyi do shal sbyin par byed/kha cig ni gdub bu sbyin par byed de/kha cig ni dpung rgyan sbyin par byed/kha cig
220b5(mdo sde): ni gser gyi 'phreng ba sbyin par byed/kha cig ni sa rngub kyi rgyun sbyin par byed/kha cig ni mu tig gi do shal sbyin par byed/kho cig ni gser sbyin par byed/kha cig nod du po sbyin par byed/
220b6(mdo sde): kha cig ni tha na zho'i brgyud che tsa mo yang sbyin par byed do//khyim bdog de yang gzhan la phan gdags par phyir lon par byed do//de nas re shig ni bud mod shin tu dbul mo zhig ge sha tha~Mng
220b7(mdo sde): ste/zla ba gsum gyis ras yug cig rnyed nas/des ras de gyon te/srang du zhugs pa dang /des khyim bdag mgon mod zas sbyin dung 'bud cing rnga ldum rdung bzhin du rgyang nas 'ong ba mthong
221a1(mdo sde): nas/des dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa/ji ste khyim bdag 'di phyug cing nor mang la ljongs spyod che ste/gter sa'i 'og tu smras pa rnams kyang mthong na/ci'i phyir//
221a2(mdo sde): 'di gzhan gyi khyim nas slong zhing bskor bar byed ces byas pa dang /dge bsnyen de na ri gzhan la phan gdags pa'i phyir to/gang dag bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
221a3(mdo sde): bshos gsol mi nus pa de dag gi don tu phan 'dogs par byed de/ci nas mang po bsdongs te/bcom ldan 'das la dbul du bcu go zhes zer ro//de nas bu mo de'i blo skyes pa 'o na
221a4(mdo sde): bdag ni bsod nams ma byas pa yin la bdag gcig pus bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bshos gsol ba'i mthu bdag la med kyis/bdag gis 'di la
221a5(mdo sde): cung zad dbul bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo//de nas bdag nyid la ci bdog ces bltas na ras yug cig ma gtogs pa gzhan ci yang ma mthong ste/des bsams pa gal te bdag
221a6(mdo sde): 'di na 'dug bzhin du ras 'di phul na ni bdag gcer bur 'byung gis bdag khang thog tu song la ras dor ro snyam mo//de nas de khang thog tu song nas rang gi lus las ras phud de/khyim
221a7(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi steng du bor ba dang /khyim bdag des kyang 'phrigs te/'dis kha thog nas bor ba las na 'di la nor de las med gor ma chag snyam nas/rang gi
221b1(mdo sde): g.yog rnams la sgo ba khyed dong la ras 'di sus bor ba ltos shig ces byas nas/de dag gis bltas pa dang /re shig na bu modo tso gtsog por 'dug pa mthong ngo //de nas de dag gis
221b2(mdo sde): dris pa dang /de na re bcom ldan 'das kyis yon tan brjod pa/bdag gis thos nas dbul ba'i 'jigs pas skrag ste/bdag gis rnyed pa de de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dge slong
221b3(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun la phul lo zhes zer ro//de nas de dag gis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la byas so//de nas khyim bdag mgron med zas sbyin mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/bu mo de
221b4(mdo sde): la gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs bskon to//de nas de tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/skyes ma thag tu lha'i bu mo gzhan su lnga'ang med pa de lta bu'i
221b5(mdo sde): gros dag de la byung ngo //lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skyo bar 'gyur te/gang nas shi 'phos/gang du skyes/las gang
221b6(mdo sde): gis skyes snyam mo//de nas mi lus shi 'phos pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum lha yul bzang po skyes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la ras phul byar des mthong ngo //de nas sngon ras 'bul
221b7(mdo sde): ba'i lho'i bu mo rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/lus do shal dang /se mo dos brgyan po/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang /ta ma
222a1(mdo sde): la'i lo ma dang /smyig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu ta dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /man da rab
222a2(mdo sde): rnams kyis thub bkang ste/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
222a3(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ston ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo'i bsame pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thug su chung
222a4(mdo sde): nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mos 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu
222a5(mdo sde): ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang
222a6(mdo sde): mchim bskams pa dang /rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /ngan seng gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams bye ba dang /bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi rlung du bzhag pa 'di lta
222a7(mdo sde): bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang mes bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi mthun
222b1(mdo sde): nams kyis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lagaso//yang smras pa/nyes pa mang po ldan pa'i ngan song lam//shin tu mi bzad khyod kyi mthu yis bcang //
222b2(mdo sde): bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro po phye//mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob//bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob//bdag ni
222b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal//'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob//mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa//skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa//srid pa stong du mthong
222b4(mdo sde): bar bka' ba yi//thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod//de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te//btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas//dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang //
222b5(mdo sde): lha yi 'jig rten kha ltas lha yul song //de nas sngon ras 'bul 'bul ba'i lha'i bu mo de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang /zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang /dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba
222b6(mdo sde): dang /nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu song ngo //dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar
222b7(mdo sde): brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen pos byung ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
223a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/na drang sum mi mjed kyi bdagu po tshangs pa 'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta bar
223a2(mdo sde): slad du mchis lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi pa la
223a3(mdo sde): blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin te/ras 'bul 'bul ba'i bud med de/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dad pa sdud par byed pa la ras phul nas shi ste/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul
223a4(mdo sde): bzang por skyes nas/de ma dang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te rang gi gnas song ngo //dge slong dag de bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/
223a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang /chos dang dge 'dun rnams la bkur bsti bya'o//bkur bsti med par mi bya'o//dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
223a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////ne tso zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
223a7(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams
223b1(mdo sde): dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lho 'bye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas//
223b2(mdo sde): mchod nga byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
223b3(mdo sde): bsod namos chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gaspos dang /sman zong rnams brnyed pa/nyan thos kyi dpe 'dun dang bcas
223b4(mdo sde): pa mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na rgyal po gzugs can snying nge rgyal po
223b5(mdo sde): byed de/de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /rgyus pa dang /bde ba dang /lo logs pa dang /skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang ba dang /rtsod pa dang /'thab pa zhi ba dang /'khrug pa dang /
223b6(mdo sde): nang 'khrug dang /chom rkun dang /mu ge dang /nad rnams med pa dang /'bras sA lu dang /bu ram shring dang /ba lang dang /ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/gnod pa med cing tsher ma
223b7(mdo sde): dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid bskyangaso//rgyal po de yang dad pa dang ldan la dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba dang /bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs
224a1(mdo sde): te/snying rje che ba/bdag nyid che ba/tshos 'dod pa ched /skye dgu la byams pa zhig go/de nas re shig na bcom ldan 'das mthong bar smin te/lag pa la oM/
224a2(mdo sde): tshugs bcas nas/sems khongasu chud cing 'dug go/de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ci slad du thugs ngan mdzad/rgyal pos skyes pa/ngas bcom ldan 'das ring zhig ma
224a3(mdo sde): mthong ngo //ngas bde bar gshegs pa ring zhig ma mthong ngo //nga ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'dod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das sbyin par gnas pa la zhugs pas/lha
224a4(mdo sde): spyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po smon pa gsan to//de'i skabasu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/mi gzigs pa
224a5(mdo sde): 'am/mi rtogs pa 'am/thug su mi chud pa zhig ci yang med la/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa la zhugs pa/srung
224a6(mdo sde): ba gcig pa dang ldan pa/gcig tu dpa'i bri/zla med pa/gnyi su mi gsung ba zhig nas dang lhag mthong la gnas pa/rig pa gsum snang bar mdzad pa/bslab pa gsum
224a7(mdo sde): legs par bslabs pa/'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil shin tu brtan pa//bsdu ba'i dngos po pan
224b1(mdo sde): la yun ring po nas 'dris par byas pa dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/khyu mchog gi yang dag pa'i seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/'gro ba
224b2(mdo sde): lnga las yang dag par 'das po/yan lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs pa/rtag tu gnas par bya ba drug la gnas pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gi
224b3(mdo sde): phyug pa/lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa/stobs bcu'i stabs dang ldan pa phyogs bcur grags pas kun rgyas pa/brgya
224b4(mdo sde): phrag bcu pa la dbang byed pa bas kyang chos khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/su ni rgud//
224b5(mdo sde): su ni dar/su ni phongs shing 'dug/su ni nyams nga bar gyur/su ni gnod pa dang nyams nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/su ni ngan song du gzhol/su ni ngan song du 'bab/su ni ngan song du
224b6(mdo sde): bab/su ni ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag pa bya/su ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las sdug nas drang bar bya/su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med
224b7(mdo sde): pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed nga sla bskyed pa bya su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongasu smin par
225a1(mdo sde): bya/su ni yongasu smin zin pa las rnam par grol bar bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug/'dir smras pa/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas//dus rlabs yol
225a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur yang srid//gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la//sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med//de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phan gdags pa'i phyir dbyar
225a3(mdo sde): zla gsum 'das nas/chos gos mdzad/chos gos zin nas chos gos gsol te/lhung bzed bsnams nas ljongs rgyu zhing mthar kyis gshegs pa las nags khrod cig tu byon pa
225a4(mdo sde): dang /nags khrod de na ne co mi skad shes pa zhig gnas te/des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo //de nas shin tu rings par song ste/bcom ldan 'das la gsol
225a5(mdo sde): pa/bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs/bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa leg so leg so//bdag la phan gdag su gsol/nags khrod 'di kho nar gshegs dgongs gdab
225a6(mdo sde): par gsol zhes byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das ne tso de la phan gdags pa'i phyir shing gang la ne co gnas pa de'i drung dun+d+ha'i gdan bting nas skyil krung bcas te bzhug so//nyan
225a7(mdo sde): thos chen po rnams ni shing gzhan dag gi drung du 'khod do//de nas ne ces bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos rnams la me 'am mi ma yin pa 'am/gnod sbyin nam/srin po 'am/yi
225b1(mdo sde): dgas sam/gcan zan gnod pa byed du dogs te/mtshan phog thag nags khrod de na phan tshun bskor ba byed do//de nas nam nangs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
225b2(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas bzod pa gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa la gros pas/bdag la bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i rgyu ci yang ma mchis
225b3(mdo sde): na bzod pa mdzad du gsol/de lta lags kyis kyang bdag sngon du mchis te/rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bcom ldan 'das gshegaso zhes sbran par 'tshalo//bcom
225b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ltar gyis shig/de nas re shig na de bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon du chas te/mthar gyis rgyal po'i thad du phyin te//de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs
225b5(mdo sde): can snying po khang bzangs kyi steng na bud med 'ba' shig dang sil snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do//de nas ne tso mi skad shes pa des rgyal po la smras pa/kye rgyal po
225b6(mdo sde): khyed mkhyen par mdzod cig/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyod kyi yul du gshegs lags kyis/lha khyed kyis bshos lha gin mdzad pa'i rig so//
225b7(mdo sde): zhes byas so//de nas rgyal po shin tu rings par khang bzad kyi steng nas babs nas blon po chen po'i tshogs kyis zham ring byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan rnams bsham+ba
226a1(mdo sde): nas/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan rnams dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsu'o//de nas bcom
226a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bkur sti chen po dang ldan pas nang du spyan drangs nas zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas//de nas ne tso de 'di snyam du sems te/
226a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'byor pa 'di dag thams cad ni bdag ga yon tan yin no snyam du rig nas dga' zhing mgu yid rangs te/rab tu dga' zhing
226a4(mdo sde): dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas rgyal po'i mdun log su phan tshun du lding ba las khras khyer te bsad do//bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed de shi bas ni
226a5(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so//lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/gang nas shi 'phos//
226a6(mdo sde): gang du skyes/las gang gis skyes mnyam mo//de nas dud 'gro lus shi 'phos pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzong por skyes pa dang /bcom ldan
226a7(mdo sde): 'das lo sems dga' bar gyur po des mthong ngo //de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i
226b1(mdo sde): phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi/bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o//snyam mo//de nas sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing
226b2(mdo sde): 'gul pa thegs pa lus do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyan po'i cod pan can lus gur gum dang /te ma la'i lo ma dang /smyig kA la sogs pas
226b3(mdo sde): byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /man dar rnams kyis thub bkang ste/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad
226b4(mdo sde): 'di chen pos snang bar byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon ne cor gyur
226b5(mdo sde): pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam po dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang rang bzhin thug su chud nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos nas sngon
226b6(mdo sde): nano tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/des bden pa mthong nas/dga' ba'i tshig
226b7(mdo sde): lan gsum brjod de/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /rus pa'i la bsgral pa dang /ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /mtho ris
227a1(mdo sde): dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis//
227a2(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi mtshon rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lagaso//yang smras pa/nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan
227a3(mdo sde): song lam/shin tu mi bzang khyod kyis thu yis bcad//bsod nams rab ldan ma tho ris 'gro ba phye//mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thog/bdag gis de ring nyes pa spungs
227a4(mdo sde): ba'i mig/shin tu rnam dag khyod la rten nas thob//bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rga le//'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob//me mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod
227a5(mdo sde): pa//skye dang rga dang mchi ba'i nod spangs pa//srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yis//thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod//de nas do shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te//btud cing
227a6(mdo sde): zhabs gonyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas//dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang //lha yi 'jig rten khas ltas lha yul song /de nas sngon ne tse gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong po khe spogs byin
227a7(mdo sde): pa dang /zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang /dpa' bo g.yul los rgyal ba dang /nad pa nang thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i
227b1(mdo sde): 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu song ngo //dge slong dag ni srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po
227b2(mdo sde): byung ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/lha'i dbang
227b3(mdo sde): po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag mi mjed kyi ngag gas/
227b4(mdo sde): bdag po tshangs pa 'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi pa la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no//ne tso gang gis nga nags khrod der nub mo'i dgod
227b5(mdo sde): mal la spyan drangs pa de khyed kyis de mthong ngam/dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/dge slong
227b6(mdo sde): dag ne tso de nyid shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa yin no//dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa/btsun pa sngon ne tsor gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag
227b7(mdo sde): bgyis na des ni cir skyes legs/las gang dag bgyis na des lho'i nang du skyes te/mthong bar gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sngon ne tsor byur
228a1(mdo sde): pa'i lha'i bus tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/sngon
228a2(mdo sde): neni cir gyur pa'i lha'i bus las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i
228a3(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsogs pa rnams
228a4(mdo sde): ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro//lus can dag gis las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyur yang chud mi za//
228a5(mdo sde): tshegs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na//bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na//
228a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo
228a7(mdo sde): sbyar ba/bla na me dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'ad srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de grang khyer bA ra na son rten cang bzhug so//
228b1(mdo sde): de nas re shig na de na dge bsnyen cig 'dug pa des bslab pa lhod par byas te/las de'i rnam par smin pas ni ne tsor skyeso//nga la sems dga' bar byas pa des ni lhar skyes so//des bslab
228b2(mdo sde): pa'i bzhi lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des na bden pa mthong bar gyur to//dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par
228b3(mdo sde): 'gyuraro//las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro//las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro//dge slong
228b4(mdo sde): dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /los 'dren ma rnams spangs la/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/dge slong dag
228b5(mdo sde): khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
228b6(mdo sde): pho nya zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon
228b7(mdo sde): rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur
229a1(mdo sde): bsti b+h+yas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /namakha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /
229a2(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/no bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun
229a3(mdo sde): gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka gnas par dbyar gnas par bcas so//de nas
229a4(mdo sde): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ge la ba der song ste phyin nas/rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig/sku tshe ring bar shog shig/ces stod nas gsol
229a5(mdo sde): ba btab pa/lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring mo zhig tu ma mthong ngo //bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lagaso//
229a6(mdo sde): bdag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshalo zhes byas so//de nas rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang du dbyar
229a7(mdo sde): gnas par bzhed pa khyod kyis ci thos/mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/lha bdag gi bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab du dbyar gnas par dam bzhes so zhes thos legs
229b1(mdo sde): so//de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas byin la sogs pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /blon po rnams kyis mo zhig pho nyas bkug ste/kye mi khyod
229b2(mdo sde): tshur shog/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la der phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal la bdag cag gi mchid nas bcom ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/
229b3(mdo sde): nyam nga ba nyung ngam/bskyod pa yang ngam/'tsho 'am/stobs dang ldan nam/bde ba dang ldan nam/mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol la/'di skad du
229b4(mdo sde): btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po dang mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong bar 'tshal te/bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yun ring po zhig tu ma
229b5(mdo sde): mthong bas/bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lag so//bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na/thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mnyan du
229b6(mdo sde): yod par gshegasu gsol zhes mchi'o zhes gsol cig ces bsgo'o//de nas mi des ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /blon po dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /yul mi rnams kyis bsgo
229b7(mdo sde): ba bzhin du mnyan te/rgyal po'i khab du song nas/mthar gyis song song ba las/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du phyin to//de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer thams cad du bltas nas/bcom
230a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa mkhyen/
230a2(mdo sde): par mdzad du gsol/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i pho byung 'khor gyi mi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom
230a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das gnod pa chung ngam/nyam nga ba chung ngam/bskyod pa yang ngam/'tsho 'am/stobs dang ldan nam/bde ba dang ldan nam mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/bde ba la reg par
230a4(mdo sde): gnas sam zhes mchi'o//'di skad du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ring mo zhig du ma mthong ste/bdage cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal bas skom lag so//bdug
230a5(mdo sde): cag ni bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'tshal na/thugs rtse ba'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegasu gsol zhes kyang mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis
230a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/kye gal te nga rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'gror ster na 'gro bar bya'o//de nas pha nya des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das
230a7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gshegs par rgyal po gzugs can snying pos dad pa stsol lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par
230b1(mdo sde): dgongs te/gshegasu gsol zhes bskul to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das dbyar zla gsum zlas nas/chos
230b2(mdo sde): gos mdzad de/chos gos zin nas chos gis gsol te/lhung bzed bsnams nas/zham ring 'khor mang po dag dang mnyan du yod pa log su chasas te gshegaso//pho nya yang
230b3(mdo sde): shing rta la zhon te cha so//de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhabs kyis gshegs pa mthong nas/shing rta las babs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo
230b4(mdo sde): sbar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag gi shing rta bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhesu gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis
230b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shing rta dang //yang dag rtsol la ngag gnas nas//nyon mongs tshe rams ma snang bar//sa steng kun tu rgyu bar byed//pho nyas smras pa/bcom
230b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das ni rdzu 'phrul gyi zhabs kyis gshegs pa lags kyis kyang bdag la phan gdags pa dang /thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcingasu gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das pho nya la phan
230b7(mdo sde): gdags pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis shing rta'i steng du bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bcibs bzhin du/mnyan du yod par byon nas/pho nyas kyang rgyal po la sbran to//
231a1(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po dang /blon po dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /yul mi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bsu nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mtshan mo rgyal bu rgyal
231a2(mdo sde): byed kyi tshal de nyid du 'khod de/pho nya de ni tshe thung ste/chos thos pa'i 'og tu de nyid kyi mtshan mo shi ste/de shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes so//lha'i bu 'am lha'i
231a3(mdo sde): bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/gang nas shi 'phos/gang du skyes/las gang gis skyes snyam mo//de nas mi las shi 'phos
231a4(mdo sde): pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo //de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sem
231a5(mdo sde): te/bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das lo blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni cha ma yin gyis/bdag zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo//de nas sngon
231a6(mdo sde): pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dge cing 'gul ba thigs pa/lus de shal dang /se mo dos brgyan pa/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can lus gur kum/
231a7(mdo sde): dang /ta ma la'i lo ma dang /sdig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /ku mud dang /pad+ma dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /mnang rab rnams
231b1(mdo sde): kyis thub bkang te/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gi gtor te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
231b2(mdo sde): 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsim pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugs chud nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtog
231b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
231b4(mdo sde): buthob ste/des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum du brjod de/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskums pa dang /rus pa'i la
231b5(mdo sde): bsgral ba dang /ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'od lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/
231b6(mdo sde): mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/nang mi dang mnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi mtshan rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis//dge
231b7(mdo sde): spyo dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lagaso//yang smras pa/nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam//shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yos bcid//bsod nams rab ldan mtha
232a1(mdo sde): ris 'gro ba phye//mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob//bdag gis da ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob//bdag ni/
232a2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol rgal//'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob//mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa//skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa//srid pa stong du
232a3(mdo sde): mthong bar dka' ba yi//thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod//de nas do shal 'byung ba dga' gyur te//btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas//dgra thub la ni bskor ba byas
232a4(mdo sde): nas kyang //lha yi 'jig rten khos ltas lha yul song //de nas sngon pho nyar gyur pa'i lha'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang /zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang /dpa' bo g.yul las
232a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba dang /nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu song ngo //de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
232a6(mdo sde): rgyal khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pas/snang ba chen po de mthong nas nam nangs pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
232a7(mdo sde): 'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po mi mjed
232b1(mdo sde): kyi dag po tshangs pa 'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhing la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/khyod kyi pho nyi nga la sems dga' bar gyur nas/shi ti sum cu rtsa gsum
232b2(mdo sde): ba'i lha yul bzang por skyes nas/de mdang sum nga'i thad du 'ongs te/ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/rang gi gnasu song ngo //de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas/
232b3(mdo sde): kye ma sangs rgyas kye ma chos/kye ma dge 'dun/'di dag la ni chung ngu zhig byas nas kyang rnam par smin pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes smras so//de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das
232b4(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rje su yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/stan las langs te song ngo //der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
232b5(mdo sde): slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di gsum ni mchog tu gdags pa yin te/gsum gang zhe na/sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa dang /chos mchog tu gdags pa dang /
232b6(mdo sde): dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa'o//sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/sems can rkang med rnams sam/rkang gnyis rnams sam/rkang bzhi rnams sam/rkang mang rnams
232b7(mdo sde): sam/gzugs can rnams sam/gzugs can ma yin pa rnams sam/'du shes can rnams sam/'du shes can ma yin pa rnams sam/'du shes yod pa yang ma yin 'du
233a1(mdo sde): shes med pa yang ma yin pa gang yang rung ste//de dag gi nang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog yin par
233a2(mdo sde): bstan to//sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang
233a3(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi nang du ltar gyur pa rnams sam/mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' shig tu gyur par shes par bya ste/'di ni sangs rgyas mchog tu gdags pa zhes
233a4(mdo sde): bya'o//chos mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/'du byas sam/'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang yang rung ste/de dag gi nang na ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog yin
233a5(mdo sde): bar bstan to//chos la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/mchog la mngon par dga' ba de dag gi rnam par smin pa yang lha rnam
233a6(mdo sde): kyi nang du ltar gyur pa rnams sam/mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyi mchog 'ba' shig tu 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/'di ni chos mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o//
233a7(mdo sde): dge 'dun mchog tu gdags pa gang zhe na/tshogs sam/'dus pa 'am/mang po 'am/'khor gang yang rung ste/de dag gi nAn ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'i
233b1(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la mchog yin par bstan ste/dge 'dun la mngon par dga' ba su yang rung ba de dag ni mchog la mngon par dga' ba yin te/mchog la mngon par dga' ba
233b2(mdo sde): de dag gi ni rnam par smin pa yang lha rnams kyi nang du ltar gyur pa rnams sam/mi rnams kyi nang du mir gyur pa rnams kyis mchog 'ba' shig tu gyur par shes par bya ste/'di ni dge 'dun
233b3(mdo sde): mchog tu gdags pa zhes bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
233b4(mdo sde): bam po bcu bzhi pa//ma hi zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon
233b5(mdo sde): rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /nam mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur
233b6(mdo sde): bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /namakha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams
233b7(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gau sos dang /
234a1(mdo sde): sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las nags khrod cig tu byon pa dang /nags khrod de na
234a2(mdo sde): ma he khyu chen po dang /ma he'i rdzi lnga brgya 'khod do//de nas re shig ni de'i nang na ma he stobs dang ldan zhing stobs kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/de mo gzhan dag gi dri tsher na phyi bzhin
234a3(mdo sde): rgyug par byed do//bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegaso//de nas ma he'i rdzi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa thag ring po zhig nas mthong ngo //
234a4(mdo sde): de nas de dag gis skad chen por bos te/bcom ldan 'das 'di na ma he ma rungs pa mchis kyis/shul 'dir mi gshegasu gsol zhes byas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
234a5(mdo sde): stsal pa/kye ras 'dir dus la bab par shes kyis khyed snying ma chung shing //de nas ma he des bcom ldan 'das thag ring po zhig nas mthong ba dang /rnga ma ldang du gzar nas bcom ldan
234a6(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der brgyagaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun log su seng ge ral pa can ral pa g.yengs pa lnga sbal de glo g.yas g.yon du me chen po lnga spel to//steng du ni lcags
234a7(mdo sde): kyi pha 'ongs chen po zhig sprul to//de nas ma he des phyogs kun tu 'jigs pa chen po mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung du song ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lces
234b1(mdo sde): bldags nas/zhum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la bltas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la des brda phrad pa'i slad du bzhin bzangs 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ma
234b2(mdo sde): rtag pa'o//chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o//mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes chos tshig gsum bstan nas/tshe rabs kyang dran par mdzad de de thos nas dus so//de nas
234b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad de bka' stsal nas/khyod ni dud 'gror skyes pa la//da ni nga yis ci byar yod//mi khom par ni skyes zin gyis//don med ngus pas
234b4(mdo sde): ci la phani//'dir ni rgyal ba snying rje can//nga la dad pa'i sems bskyed la//dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs na legs//'on tang mtho ris 'gro bar 'gyur//de nas ma he ma rungs
234b5(mdo sde): pa des rang gi lus la smad de/kha 'chos nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas smyos pa'i srog chags rnams ni me'i drod che bas de skye nad par shi ste/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por
234b6(mdo sde): skyes so//lha'i bu 'am/lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur to/gang nas sha 'phos/gang du skyes/las gang gis skyes
234b7(mdo sde): snyom mo//de nas dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bar gyur pa des mthong ngo //de nas
235a1(mdo sde): sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/bdag zhag lon nas gzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi bdag zhag ma lon
235a2(mdo sde): bar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o//de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/lus do shal drang se mo dos brgyan pa/nor bu rin po che
235a3(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan tsan lus gur kum dang /tA ma la'i lo ma dang /sprig ka la sogs pas byugs pa des de nyid mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu
235a4(mdo sde): de dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /mnad ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/nags khrod de dag thams cad 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te chos mnyan
235a5(mdo sde): pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugasu
235a6(mdo sde): chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes
235a7(mdo sde): rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya
235b1(mdo sde): mtsho bskams pa dang /rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni
235b2(mdo sde): bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang mi bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi mtshun
235b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/dge slong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lag so//yang smras pa/nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam//shin tu mi gzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad//
235b4(mdo sde): bsod nams rab ldan mtho ris 'gro ba phye//mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob//bdag gis de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob//bdag
235b5(mdo sde): ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal//'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob//mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa//skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa//srid pa
235b6(mdo sde): stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi//thub pa khyod kyi deng mthong 'bras bu yod//de nas ngo shal 'phyang ba dga' gyur te//btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas//dgra
235b7(mdo sde): thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang //lha'i 'jig rten khas ltas lha yul song //de nas sngon ma her gyur pa'i lho'i bu de tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang /zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar
236a1(mdo sde): gyur pa dang /dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang /nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'ongs pa'i
236a2(mdo sde): 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu song ngo //de nas mA ho rje de dgu gis snang ba chen po de mthong ngo //de mthong nus the tsom skyes te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus
236a3(mdo sde): pa/bcom ldan 'das mdang sum bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du mchis te/lha'i 'od kyi snang bar bgyid pa de bu zhig lags/bcom ldan 'ongs kyis bka' stsal pa/khyed kyi
236a4(mdo sde): mahe de nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/she nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes ste/de ma dang gsum nga'i thad du 'ongs nas/ngas de la chos bstun to//
236a5(mdo sde): bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gan su song ngo //de nas mo te rdzi de dag gis mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te ngo mtshar to//dud 'gro'i skye gnasu skyes pa 'di yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen
236a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dang phyad nas lha'i nang du skyes te/bden pa mthong bar gyur na/bdag cag gis co ste/khyad par thob par mi 'gyur snyam mo//de nas de dag gis sangs rgyas
236a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang btsas pa zhal zas bzang pos tshim par byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/de dag gis brtson pa dang bsgrub pa dang /'bad
236b1(mdo sde): pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
236b2(mdo sde): zhus pa/btsun pa sngon ma her gyur pa'i lha'i bus las gang dag bgyis na des ma her skyes lags/las gang dag bgyis na des lha'i nang du skyes te/bden pa mthong bar gyur lags//
236b3(mdo sde): ma he NI 'di rnams kyis ni las ci bgyis na des ma he rdzir gyur lags/las gang bgyis ni rab tu byang nas dag bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
236b4(mdo sde): pa/dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa'i rgal bzhin du byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing spags pas na//
236b5(mdo sde): de dag nyid kyi las byas shing spags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyamasu myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing stsogs pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur
236b6(mdo sde): chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing /bsogs pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams
236b7(mdo sde): dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro//lus can dag gis las rnams ni//bskal pa ngo rgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu
237a1(mdo sde): nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshal nyi khri thub pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
237a2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes gdul bya'aM kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams
237a3(mdo sde): kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de grong khyer bar na sen drang srong smra ba ri dgos kyi na gson rten cing bzhun so//de'i tshe dge slong dag gtan
237a4(mdo sde): la 'bebs par byed pan/dge slong ste snod gsum ngo zhig 'khor ldi ba rgya dang gtan la 'bib pa'i nang na 'dug/de'i nang na slob pa dang mi smod pa'i dge slong dag kyang med do//rdorje
237a5(mdo sde): gsum pa la 'dri bar byed la/de la ni len ma thobs pa dang /de khros nas ngag gi las nub po phyung ste/nags kyi ma he dang 'dri ba 'di dag ci shes shes bya'o//de'i slong ma rnamasakyi
237a6(mdo sde): k+Shu mi he rje dang 'dre ba 'di dag cing shes shes smra so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/dge slong sde snod gsum pa gang yin pa de nyid ma he dza
237a7(mdo sde): yin no//slob ma de dag ni ma he rdzi 'di dag yin te/las des na tshe rabs lnga brgyar ma hir skyes so//slob ma rnams kyang mahe rdzi lnga 'argyar gyur te//ngal sems dga' bar gyur pa des
237b1(mdo sde): lhar skyes so//dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/tshul khrims bsrungs pas ni bden pa mthong ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//dge slong dag de bas na ngag gi nyes pa
237b2(mdo sde): spangs pa'i phyir 'bad par bya ste/ci nas ma hi dang ma hA rdzi rnams kyi nyes pa de lta bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /lha'i bu de'i yon tan gyi tshogs de lta bu thob par gyur par dge slong khyed kyis de
237b3(mdo sde): ltar bslab por bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////bsnyen
237b4(mdo sde): gnas zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /dod
237b5(mdo sde): dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /nam mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
237b6(mdo sde): bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byis/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
237b7(mdo sde): mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams
238a1(mdo sde): brnas panyan pos kyi dge 'dun dang cos pa mnyan du mad na/rgyal bu rgya la rgyad rgyu rgyal mgon mang nas spyan kun dka' raban banadas//de'i tshu ma durgya gdung/
238a2(mdo sde): ba'i lha nang na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas shes bya ba zhig yod de/de chos nyan pa'i phyir rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'an na//de nas phyis re shig na lha'i bu bsnyen gnas g.yog lnga ba rtsa
238a3(mdo sde): bcas pa/bcom ldan 'das sprul bdor sa'i ste byin nas/bcom ldan 'odas kyi dpas ma mgo bos phyag 'tshamo te/chos nyin pa'i phyir dathugs gcig tu 'jug/de nas bcom ldan
238a4(mdo sde): 'dus kyis lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyi bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang //bems dang /rang bzhin thug suM chud nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs pa'i 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan/
238a5(mdo sde): de thos nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas kyi 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/des bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig
238a6(mdo sde): lan brjod de/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag go khrag dang mchil ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /rus pa ro la bskal ba/ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad pa dang /mtho ras dang par
238a7(mdo sde): ba'i sgo rnams bye ba dang /bdag lde dang mi rnams kyi nang du bzhag pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma
238b1(mdo sde): bgyis/nang mi dang gnyen gyi chags rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lags//yang smras pa/nyes pa
238b2(mdo sde): mang por ldan pa'i ngan song lam//shin tu mi brdad khyod kyi ma thu yis bcad//des de nams ba ldan mtho ris 'gre /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thog/bdag gis de ri shes
238b3(mdo sde): pa spangs pa'i mig/shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thob//bdag ni sdug bsngal rgya mtsho ba reyi nal//'phags pa de myos pa'i ni ba'i go 'bang thob//mi mchog dbang po me dang ltas mchod
238b4(mdo sde): pa//skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa//srid pa stong du mthong bar dka' ba yi//thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod//de nas do shal 'phyang ba dag 'gyur te//btud cing
238b5(mdo sde): zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas//dag thub la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang //lha yul 'jig rten khas ltas la yul song //de nas lha'i bu bsnyen gnas chod pa khe spogs phyin pa
238b6(mdo sde): dang /zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa dang /dpa' bo ga yul las rgyal ba dang /nad pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi drod du 'ongs pa'i
238b7(mdo sde): 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu song ngo //de'i tshe dge slong dag srod dang tho rangs che nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed ma la gnas te/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen
239a1(mdo sde): po byung ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang the tsom skyes te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/mdang sum mi mjed
239a2(mdo sde): kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
239a3(mdo sde): stsal pa/dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la lta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin gyi/lha'i bu bsnyen gnas
239a4(mdo sde): g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas pa nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs te/ngas de la chos bstan nas bden pa mthong bar gyur te/rang gi gnasu song ngo //de nas dge slong dag the tsom ba skyes
239a5(mdo sde): te/the tsom thad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa lha'i bu bsnyen gnas ga las byung lags/ming ni tse las btags lags/bcom ldan 'daso kyis
239a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed nyan par 'dod dam/gsol pa/btsun pa nyan par 'tshal lags//bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'o na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shi ka
239a7(mdo sde): ngas bshad do//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
239b1(mdo sde): ngas rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/'dob gshegs pa/'jog rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul bya/ oM myu ba/blan med pa ltad mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
239b2(mdo sde): 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de grong khyer bar na sin drang srong slo ba ri ngogs kyi nagos ni rten cing bzhugs//phyis re zhig na rgya la ba k+shi kI bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen
239b3(mdo sde): bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo //de nas re shig ni bram ze gnyis drang srong sme ba'i don zhig la song ba dang /de gnyis kyis rgyal ba de/rgyal ba'i 'byor pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i mthu stobs chen po
239b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mthong ngo //de nas de gnyis rgyal srid la 'dod pa skyes nas/de gnyis kyis dge bsnyen zhig la dris pa/kye sangs rgyas kyi dge bsnyen las ci zhig byas na/de las tso bsags pa
239b5(mdo sde): dang ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes byas so//dge bsnyen gyis smras pa/gang gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa yong su dag par bsrungs pa de'i ni ci bsams pa dang /
239b6(mdo sde): ci 'dod pa de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya'o//de nas bram ze de gnyis kyis khyim bdag chu spyod las bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa blangs te bslangs//don gcig gis ni yongasu
239b7(mdo sde): dag par bsrungs te/de nas shi nas rgyal po kri kri'i bu skyes te/de'i ming legs skyes shos btags nas pa shi bi'i 'og tu de rgyal por bcugo/gcig shis kyis ni bsnyen gnas nyams par
240a1(mdo sde): byas te/de ni shi nas klu'i nang du skyes te/de'i steng du nyin cig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bye chen bab ste/des rus pa 'ba' shig lus par byed do//de nas de 'di
240a2(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/'di las gang gis 'bras bu yin/'di las gang gi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa yin na/des bdag gi 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong zhing 'dug snyam mo//
240a3(mdo sde): nas des bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag gis blangs pa las bslab pa lhod par byas pa des 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal bdag gis nyam su myong la/gang gis blangs te//
240a4(mdo sde): bsrungs pa des ni rgyal srid thob par gyur to snyam//yang de 'di snyam du sems ste/de yang bdag gis bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan par bsrung bar bya'o//'on tang
240a5(mdo sde): bdag klu'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur yang srid do snyam mo//de nas bram ze'i cha lugasu bdag nyid sprul nas/rgyal po'i thad du 'ongs te phyin nas rgyal po la rgyal bar gyur cig/
240a6(mdo sde): druchu tshe ring ba ro shog shig ces bstod nas smras pa/rgyal po chen po bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bdag la 'tshal gyis/lha bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa
240a7(mdo sde): betsal du gsol/gal te ma btsal ni gdon mi 'tshal par lha'i dbu chal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes byas nas/de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas rgyal po 'jigs
240b1(mdo sde): stug sgrom dga' la sgyu nga nas byas nas/gsor 'dum yod pa'i gnod rtul margyun ts+tshits+tsho mo la btags te/byadrug gi yul thams cad du sa bsgrag smra nas/swAng+ya
240b2(mdo sde): bAsbyin gnas yan lag brjid dang ldan pa sbyin pa de la gser 'dzum 'di sbyi no// chen pos kyang bkuran byan nus bsgo'o//de nas shigan shing mngon gyi bu mdud med na
240b3(mdo sde): zhig 'dug pa das rgyal po la ka ba zhig bstan te/sngon bdag gi pa rtag tu ga 'di la spos dang /bdug pa dang /me tog gis mchod pa brten na 'di byung ste gzigs shig ces byas so//
240b4(mdo sde): denus rgyal pos zhum rnying ba rnams la ka ba dI byung shig ces sgrar//de nas rgyal po zhi ma ri rnams kyis ka ba byung ba dang /de'i 'og nas bsnyen gnas yin lag rgyad dang ldan po dang /dge
240b5(mdo sde): bsnyen gyi bslab pa'i bzhi lnga dang /byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun gser gyi glegs bam zhig la bris pa zhig rnyed de//de nas rgyal pos klu de la bsnyen gnas yun
240b6(mdo sde): lag brgyad dang ldan pa zhig bris te byin no//drang srong sgrub gnas pa'i drang sro brinyis stong gis kyang byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon sum du byas//klu sa
240b7(mdo sde): kyang bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bsrungs nas thang la byung ste/lus bo nas de kha 'a chos te 'jug/de nas ni stog yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas te sum cu rgyo gsum pa'i lce
241a1(mdo sde): yul bzang por skyeso//dge slong dag bsnyen gnas ni de nas byung ste ming yang de las btag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de
