241a2(mdo sde): dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////dang pa zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po rnams
241a3(mdo sde): dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin
241a4(mdo sde): rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis/bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /
241a5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na
241a6(mdo sde): bza' dong /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal
241a7(mdo sde): byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rgyal po byed de/de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa
241b1(mdo sde): dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa dang /skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang /brtsod pa dang /'thab pa zhi ba dang /'khrug pa dang /nang 'khrug dang /chom rkun dang /mu ge
241b2(mdo sde): dang /nad rnams med pa dang /'bras sA lu dang /bu ram shing dang /ba lang dang /ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin
241b3(mdo sde): du rgyal srid bskyang so//phyis re shig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang /pan
241b4(mdo sde): tsa la'i rgyal pos ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la ngang pa lnga brgya skye su bskur te/gang gi tshe rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba de'i tshe/ngang pa lnga brgya po de dag phul lo//de nas rgyal
241b5(mdo sde): po gsal rgyal gyis ngang pa de dag la mi 'jigs pa byin te/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du gtang nas/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyan thos chen po'i 'khor dang bcas pa gshos
241b6(mdo sde): gsol zhing bzhugs pa de'i tshe/ngang ba de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro la/bcom ldan 'das dang nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang de rnams la khyod ma byin te/de dag gis
241b7(mdo sde): zos nas tshim zhing dbang po rtas te 'khod do//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/'khor bzhi po de dag la chos ston pa de'i tshe/ngang pa de dag
242a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du dong ste/chos nyan par byed do//de nas de dag tshe thung ste shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes//lha'i bu'i
242a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma len pa ni chos nyid kyis sems rnam pa gsum skye bar 'gyur te/gang nas shi 'phos/gang du skyes/las gang gis skyes snyamo//de nas dang bya
242a3(mdo sde): las shi 'phos pa dang //sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por smos pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la sems dgo' bar gyur pa de dag gis mthong ngo //de nas sngon
242a4(mdo sde): dang bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag zhog lon nas bzod bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin gyis/bdag
242a5(mdo sde): cag zhag sA lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snya mo//de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub bkor dag cing 'gul ba thogs pa/lus do shal dang
242a6(mdo sde): se mo dos brgyan pa/nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i cod pan can/lus gur kum dang /ta ma la'i lo ma dang /sgeg ka la sogs pas byugs pa de dag gis de
242a7(mdo sde): nyid kyi mtshan mo lha'i me tog ud pa li dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu ta dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /man da ra ba rnams kyi thub bkang ste/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshel thams cad 'od chen
242b1(mdo sde): bos snang bar byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor to//chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ston sdang par gyur/
242b2(mdo sde): ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyi bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thug su chud nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te//
242b3(mdo sde): de thos nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/de dag gi
242b4(mdo sde): bden pa mthong nas dga' ba'i tshig lan gsum brjod de/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho bskams pa dang /rus pa'i la bsgral ba dang /ngan song
242b5(mdo sde): gi sgro bcad pa dang /mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams phye ba dang /bdag cig lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du zhugs pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la phas kyang ma bgyis/mas kyang ma/
242b6(mdo sde): bgyis/rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/nang mi dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis/sngon gyi mtshun rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/dge sbyong dang
242b7(mdo sde): bram ze rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis lagaso//yang smras pa/nyes pa mang por ldan pa'i ngan song la mo//shin tu mi bzang khyod kyi mthu yis bcad//bsod nams rab ljon
243a1(mdo sde): mtho res 'gro ba bye//mya ngan 'das lam bdag cag rnams kyis thob//badrag cag de ring nyes pa spangs pa'i mig/shin tu rnam dag khyod la brten nas thog//
243a2(mdo sde): bdag cag sdug bsngal ba mtsho pha rol rgal//'phags pa dgyes pa'i zhi ba'i go 'phang thob//mi mchog dbang po mi dang lhas mchod pa//skye dang rga dang 'chi ba'i nad spangs pa/srid
243a3(mdo sde): bstod du mthong bar dkar ba yi//thub pa khyod ni deng mthong 'bras bu yod//de nas do shal 'phyang rnams dga' 'gyur te//btud cing zhabs gnyis la ni phyag 'tshal nas//dag thub
243a4(mdo sde): la ni bskor ba byas nas kyang //lha yi 'jig rten khas ltas lha yul song //de nas sngon ngang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams tshong pa khe spogs phyin pa dang /zhing pa 'bru rgyal bar gyur pa
243a5(mdo sde): dag dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba dang /nang pa nad thams cad las thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du lhags pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gan su/
243a6(mdo sde): drong ngo //de'i tshe dge slong srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar brtson pa lhur byed pa la gnas te/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang ba chen po byung ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang
243a7(mdo sde): the tsom skyes te/sangs rgyas bac+doMs la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'dra ci'i grwan dang su mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bcom
243b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du mchis lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/lha'i dbang po brgya byin
243b2(mdo sde): nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi nga la lta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ma yin no//dge slong dag ko sau la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ngang pa lnga brgya 'dir btang ba khyod kyis mthong ngam/btsun
243b3(mdo sde): pa mthong lags//bka' stsal pa/de dag nga la sems dga' bar gyur te/shi nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha yul bzang por skyes te/de dag mdang sum nga'i thad du lhags na
243b4(mdo sde): de dag la ngas chos bstan te/bden pa mthong bar gyur nas rang gi gan su dong ngo //de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
243b5(mdo sde): 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa sngon ngang phar gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las gang dag bgyis na/des ngang par skyes lags/las gang dag bgyis na/des lha'i nang du skyes te/
243b6(mdo sde): bden pa mthong lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis sngon cha rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dba' rgal bzhin du
243b7(mdo sde): 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/sngon dang par gyur pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su
244a1(mdo sde): myong bar gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /
244a2(mdo sde): rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/lha dge bad+ma/mi dge ba bya shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro//
244a3(mdo sde): lus can dag gis las rnas ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal
244a4(mdo sde): ba bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe nyis khri thub pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs
244a5(mdo sde): pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/
244a6(mdo sde): de grong khyer bA ra na son drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags ni rten cing bzhugaso//de'i tshe 'di dag rab tu byung ba las bslab pa la lhod par byas pa des ni ngang par skyes//ngal sems
244a7(mdo sde): dga' bor byas pa des ni lhar skyes so//bslab pa lhag ma rnams bsrungs pa des ni bden pa mthong bar gyur te/dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams
244b1(mdo sde): ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro//las gcig tu nges par dkar ba ni/rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro//las 'dren
244b2(mdo sde): ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro//dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/las cig tu nges
244b3(mdo sde): par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag

244b5(mdo sde): sdom ni/gser 'od dang ni dri zhim dang //byad bzangs stobs ldan sdug gu dang //pad+ma mig dang rnga sgra dang //bu dang nyi ma gyad pa dang //gser 'od ces bya ba ni//sangs
244b6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams

245a1(mdo sde): bstir byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod par byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /namakha' lding dang /mi 'am
245a2(mdo sde): dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan
245a3(mdo sde): dang /bsnyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe ser skra'i gnas na shAkya
245a4(mdo sde): phyug cing longs spyod che ba yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnams thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/rigs mnyam pa lase
245a5(mdo sde): chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu
245a6(mdo sde): len pa dang /bu byung ste/khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das lha'i kha dag ni ma thob pa 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog 'dra ba zhig
245a7(mdo sde): btsas te/de'i gser gyi 'od kyis grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad snang bar byaso//de nas pha ma dang /sems can gzhan dag gis de mthong nas ltad mo la lhags te/
245b1(mdo sde): sems can gyi khyad par 'di lta bu ga las 'ongs zhig gu zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas sems pa la zhugaso//de na de bcas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shing
245b2(mdo sde): ming 'dogs par byed de/nye du rnams nA re 'di bcas pa na/grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad gser gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pas ni/de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming gser 'od ces
245b3(mdo sde): gdagaso zhes zer ro//de nas khye'u gser 'od bang na 'tsho ba'i ma mo gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/
245b4(mdo sde): ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang tsog gis bskyed
245b5(mdo sde): bsrings te/mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to//de'ang mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang /dad pa dang ldan lo dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/bad ko dang
245b6(mdo sde): gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig go/phyes re shig na de na de byad gzugs kyi rgyags pas myos te/grong khyer gyi phyi rol na rtse zhing 'dug//
245b7(mdo sde): shAkya mang po dag cig kyang shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo //de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis mthong nas dris pa khyed gar 'dong /de dag gis smras pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
246a1(mdo sde): 'das la lta ba'i phyir shing n+ya glo da'i kun dga' ra bar 'gro'o//de nas khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas shes bya ba thos te/sngon ma thos pa'i mang zos nas
246a2(mdo sde): spu thams cad zing zhes byas te/mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ma la bdag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro gor ma chag snyam nas/de
246a3(mdo sde): 'ding shing n+ya glo da'i kun dga'ur bar song ba dang /khye'u gser 'od kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dang
246a4(mdo sde): byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu'i kun nas bzang ba mthong nas
246a5(mdo sde): mthong ma thag du byed gzugs kyis brgyags pa med par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug//
246a6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la chos bstan nas/de chos thos pa dang rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyur to//de nas re shig na pha ma la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad
246a7(mdo sde): du song te phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
246b1(mdo sde): gsol to//btsun pa dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'jo 'du rgyad na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi
246b2(mdo sde): zad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshalo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gi ser gyi kha dog can glang po che'i sna ltar 'dug pa brkyang nas/khye'u gser 'od la 'di skad ces bka'
246b3(mdo sde): sbru te//gzhon nu tshu ro shog tshangs par spyod cig/de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa'i mod la/sgra dang /bi spu bregs nas zhag bdun yon po tsam du gyur/spyod ma min bsnyen pa
246b4(mdo sde): rdzogs nas lo brgya min pa lta bur 'dug par gyur/lag na ni lhung bzed dang chu snod thogs par gyur to//'dir smras pa/de bzhi de gshegs ras tshur zhes bka' stsal pas/de ni mgo
246b5(mdo sde): bregs lus la snum sbyar gyon/sangs rgyas kyi ni dgongs pas gos bags nas/mod la dbang po rab tu zhi bar gnas/de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'dra
246b6(mdo sde): kyis de la yid la byed po'i lung phog ste/des brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/'du byed
246b7(mdo sde): kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par 'bor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
247a1(mdo sde): sum du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra
247a2(mdo sde): ba'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa
247a3(mdo sde): thob pa/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang /bkur bsti la mi lta ba/dbang po dang /nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnasu
247a4(mdo sde): gyur to//de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa gser 'od kyis las gang dag dgyes na//
247a5(mdo sde): des 'di ltar gzugs bzang zhing lta na ldog la mdzes pa dang /rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong
247a6(mdo sde): dag gser 'od nyid kyis mngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan to/dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas
247a7(mdo sde): shing bsags pas na/gser 'od nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhi na su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsogs
247b1(mdo sde): ba rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dgo
247b2(mdo sde): dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro//lus can dag gi las rnam
247b3(mdo sde): ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras du nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa dgu bcu
247b4(mdo sde): rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa//'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu
247b5(mdo sde): gdul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de rgyal po'i pho brang
247b6(mdo sde): gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/sangs rgyas kyi 'dzin las thams cad mdzad nas/shing zad pa
247b7(mdo sde): me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'daso//de nas rgyal po gnyan yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod pa
248a1(mdo sde): byas nas/rin po che sna bzhi la byas pa'i mchod rten khor khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/'phang du rgyung grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/mchod/
248a2(mdo sde): rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do//de nas re shig na khyim bdag cig mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der song ba las mchod rten de las gser gyi me long zhig lhung ba des mthong
248a3(mdo sde): nas des de'i rna ba'i gong rgyan du bcos nas mchod rten de la btags te/spos dang /bdug pa dang /me tog gis mchod nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/smon lam btab pa/
248a4(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang yon 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mi mnyes pa byed par ma gyur cig ces byas//bcom ldan 'das
248a5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u go ser 'od 'di yin te/des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
248a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur bsti byas pa des na 'di lta bur byad gzugs khyad par can du gyur te//smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom
248a7(mdo sde): pa mngon sum du byas so//dge slong dag de ltar na las tsog tu nges par gnag po rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur ro//las gcig tu
248b1(mdo sde): nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro//las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro//dge slong dag de bas na las
248b2(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /las 'dren ma spangs la/las gcig tu nges par dkar bu rnams 'ba' shig la gtang bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bsgrub
248b3(mdo sde): par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lo mngon par bstod do//dri zhim
248b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon
248b5(mdo sde): rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis//mtsho
248b6(mdo sde): cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzums rgyu dang /gdan dang /snyun gosas dang /sman zong
248b7(mdo sde): rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/yul ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas ni khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang
249a1(mdo sde): la longs spyod che ba/yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs
249a2(mdo sde): mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan gcig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/de zla
249a3(mdo sde): ba brgyad dam dgu ljon pa dang bu byung ste/khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig me'i kha dog las ni 'das lha'i kha dog no mo thob pa zhig btsas te/de'i kha nas me
249a4(mdo sde): trotog ud pA la'i dri 'byung ba lus thams cad nas ni tsan dan gyi dri byung ngo //de nas de'i btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par
249a5(mdo sde): byed de/de nye du rnams na re 'di'i kha nas ud pa la'i dri 'byung la/lus thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dri 'byung bas na/de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming dri zhim zhes gdag so zhes zer ro//
249a6(mdo sde): donas khye'u dri zhim pa na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/
249a7(mdo sde): dedam ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo //cog gis bskyed bsrings te/mtsho'i
249b1(mdo sde): nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to//de'ang sngon gyi rgyu stobs kyi shugs kyis dad pa dang ldan la/dge zhing bsam la bzang la/bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/snying rje
249b2(mdo sde): can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig ste/gang gi tshe khye'u dri zhim dpung rgyan dang /mgul pa'i do shal dang /gdu bus brgyan te/srang gi nang du zhugs pa de'i tshe/tsan du na gyi dri gsung
249b3(mdo sde): gis grong khyer thams cad khyab par gyur te/skye bo mang pos kyang lha'i spos kyi dri tshe re nas/mchog tu ya mtshan du 'dzin te/'di skad du skye ma bsod nams dag gi mthu zhes mdzer tI/
249b4(mdo sde): phyis re shig khye'u dri zhim shing n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra bar song ngo //de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/da
249b5(mdo sde): byad bzang po brgyad nus mdzes pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nang lnga mtho ba mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan
249b6(mdo sde): 'odas la sems dga' ba skyed do//dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom lda ni 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go//
249b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos
250a1(mdo sde): bstan te/de thos nas khye'u dri zhim gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon
250a2(mdo sde): sum du byas te/bden pa mthong nas phra ma la gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //des brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas pol mig lta ba
250a3(mdo sde): 'khor po'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can
250a4(mdo sde): yin par rtsad chod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/
250a5(mdo sde): gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dre ba'i sems dang ldan pa/tson don spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom
250a6(mdo sde): pa/rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang /bkur bstil mi lta ba/dbang po dang /
250a7(mdo sde): dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gan su gyur to//des nas dge slong dag the tsam skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa sarba
250b1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa dri zhim gyis las gang dag bgyis na/des 'di lta bu'i kha nas ni ud pa la'i dri 'byung la/lus thams cad nas ni tsan ngan
250b2(mdo sde): gyi dri 'byung bar gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dri zhim nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa'
250b3(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/dri zhim nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar
250b4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi
250b5(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa de rnams ni//zin po'i phung po dang /khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig
250b6(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal po brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong

251a2(mdo sde): par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/sangs
251a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/shing zod pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhab ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyi su yongasu mya ngan las 'daso//de nas rgyal po gnyen
251a4(mdo sde): yod kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kha ra khor yug tu dpag tshad cig yod la/'phang du
251a5(mdo sde): rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/mchod rten gyi dus ston yang lugs btod do//khyim po dgra gcig gis kyang de la dad pa skyes nas/spos dang /byug pa sna tshogs
251a6(mdo sde): phul te/bdug pa dang /me tog gis mchod nas smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dus na/bdag gis/
251a7(mdo sde): kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/sten pa 'di lta bu la mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mi mnyes par byed par mi gyur cig ces byas so//bcom ldan 'das
251b1(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dgu ji snyam du soms/de'i tshe de'i dus na/khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni khye'u dri zhim 'a yin te/des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
251b2(mdo sde): rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur bsti byas pa/des na 'di lta bur dri zhim par gyur to//smon lam btab de des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byaso///
251b3(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag po rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnig par 'gyuraro//las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa 'dren mar
251b4(mdo sde): 'gyur//las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro//dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang //
251b5(mdo sde): las 'dron ma rnams spangs la/las gcig tu nges par dkari ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis
251b6(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////bam po bco lte ba//byang
251b7(mdo sde): bzangs shes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams
252a1(mdo sde): dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci
252a2(mdo sde): rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha'
252a3(mdo sde): lding dang /mi 'am tsi dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /
252a4(mdo sde): gzims cha dang /gdan dang /skyon gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na
252a5(mdo sde): bzhug so//de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor ming la/longs spyod che ba/yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos bu'i
252a6(mdo sde): nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur
252a7(mdo sde): spyod pa las/chung ma la bu chags nas/de zla ba brgyad dam/dgu lon pa dang /bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na ldog la mdzes pa mi'i kha dog las ni 'das//
252b1(mdo sde): g+ha'i kha dog na mthong ba/lus byung da'i med la mdog 'jam pa/lus kyi mdun mtho bu/che ba glags pa zhig bcaso//de nas de bcas pa'i bcos ston byas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skang /
252b2(mdo sde): gdugs shes ming 'dogs par byed de/hUMdu rnams na pa 'di'i lus dab med bas na/dri'i phyir khye 'uru 'di'i ming byang bzla sa shes gdagaso zhes zer ro//de nas khye'u byeng bzungs pad+ma ma
252b3(mdo sde): 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu mo snun pa'i mi ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /tsA ba'i ma mo gan+d+his te/ma ma brgyad la btang nas/de ma mo brgyad kyi 'o ma dang /
252b4(mdo sde): dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzod cog gis bskyed bsrings te/mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to//de yang
252b5(mdo sde): da pa dang ldan la/dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/chos 'dod pa zhig ste/'jig rten thams cad dang tha na mi ma yin
252b6(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis kyang mchod cing rjes pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to//nges sa phyogs gang du gom pa bor ba de dag kyang gtsang mar gyur te/de ltar bsod nams dang ldan zhing che ba
252b7(mdo sde): grag so//phyis re shig na de shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe
253a1(mdo sde): byad bzang po brgyad nus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta du
253a2(mdo sde): kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do//dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/chos
253a3(mdo sde): nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyol ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thug su chud nas/
253a4(mdo sde): 'phagaso pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs 'i gyur ba de lta bu'i chas bstan te/de thos nas khye'u byung bzangs kyis 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i ro'i rtse mo mthon pa nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes
253a5(mdo sde): bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/des badren pa mthong nas pha ma la gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //des
253a6(mdo sde): brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil
253a7(mdo sde): ba dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid
253b1(mdo sde): mngon sum du d+has te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/gasbyor dang bong bar mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems
253b2(mdo sde): dang ldan+d+haH/na dan sbyangs pa lta bur ngasim par gyur pa/rig pas skye nga'i srungs bcom pa/rig pa dang/mngon par shes pa dang /seMs yang dag par rig pa thogs
253b3(mdo sde): srid de'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang /dgur bsti la myi lta ba/dbang po dang /nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gnas
253b4(mdo sde): gyur to//de nas dge slong rnams be com skyes te/the tsom dzad gcod pa//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bdun pa byed bzangs kyis las gang dag gi kyis
253b5(mdo sde): no/des 'di lta bu'i lus 'di lta bur gyur lo dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag byung bzangs nyid kyis sngon tshe rab
253b6(mdo sde): gzhan dag tu tshogs brnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/byad bzangs nyid kyis las
253b7(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhon ci zhig nyam su myang bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam por smin par mi 'gyur/
254a1(mdo sde): chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams
254a2(mdo sde): ni zan pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang
254a3(mdo sde): chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'dus pa'i dus na/bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de
254a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bIr gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i
254a5(mdo sde): kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen
254a6(mdo sde): ldan na rton cing bzhugs pa las re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las zad mdzad nas/shing zad pa'i me
254a7(mdo sde): bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu mya ngan las 'daso//de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la/sku
254b1(mdo sde): gdung gi mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug du dpag tshad gcig yod la/'phang du rgyung grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/
254b2(mdo sde): der rgyal po gnyen yod gnyen gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang /blon po'i tshogs kyis zhim ring byas pas/mchod rten gyi dus ston byas so//phyis re shig na nyi ma gcig
254b3(mdo sde): gcig mi dbul po zhig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song nas der me tog rnyis pa dag dang /mchod rten rdul gyis yog pa dag mthong ngo //de nas des sangs rgyas kyi ston
254b4(mdo sde): rjesu dran nas/dad pa skyes te/phyugs ma blangs nas mchod rten yang phyags/me tog rnyis pa yang bstsal to//de nas mchod rten la rdul med cing dri ma med pa mthong
254b5(mdo sde): nas dad pa skyes te/zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa 'dis na/bdag gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob
254b6(mdo sde): par gyur cig/ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur ces byas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag
254b7(mdo sde): ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na/mi dbul por gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/byed bzangs 'di yin te/des mchod rten la phyag dar byas pas na/byad gzugs bzang por
255a1(mdo sde): gyur to//smon lam btab pa des tshe 'di nyid la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas//dge slong dag de ltar las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams
255a2(mdo sde): ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur//las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro//
255a3(mdo sde): las 'dren mi rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro//dge slong dag de bas nA/las gcig tu nges pari gnag pa rnams dang /las 'dren ma rnams spang
255a4(mdo sde): la/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la btad par bya ste/dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
255a5(mdo sde): sbrul nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///stobs ldan zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas
255a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das le/rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon
255a7(mdo sde): rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po
255b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lta
255b2(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun
255b3(mdo sde): gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs//de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya
255b4(mdo sde): phyug cing nor mang la/longs spyod che ba/yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gonas pa des rigs
255b5(mdo sde): mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan gcig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyud dam dgu lon pa dang /bu byung ste/
255b6(mdo sde): khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa stobs kyi shugs gzhan las 'phags pa zhog btsaso//de nas de btsas pa'i bcos ston byas nas/khye'u 'di'i mong ji skad
255b7(mdo sde): bdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pas na/de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming stobs ldan zhes gdag so zhes zer ro//de nas
256a1(mdo sde): /'i stobs ldan pa na 'tsho ba'i ma ma ga sa dang /nam snyan pa'i sa ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'khrub 'o mam gnyis dang /rtse ba'i ma myug nyi sa/mam
256a2(mdo sde): bdud la gtad nas/de ma ma be rgyud kyi 'om dang /zho dang /mer dang /thun mar dang /mar g+hi nga bu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang cig gis bskyed
256a3(mdo sde): bsrings te/mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye dag par gyur to//de yang dad pa dang ldan la/dge zhing brisam pa bzang ba/bdag la bon pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la
256a4(mdo sde): zhugs pa/snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/chos 'dod pa zhig ga/de nas phyis re zhig na de shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
256a5(mdo sde): sku skyes du nI ba'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byud bzang po brgyad chos mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dam gang gis brgyan pa/lce ma sbying
256a6(mdo sde): zos lhag pa'i 'od mnga' bo/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang po mthong nas/mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do//dag
256a7(mdo sde): ba bskyed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam
256b1(mdo sde): pa dang /bgra la nyal ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos nas khye'u
256b2(mdo sde): stobs ldan gyis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/dris bden pa mthong nas
256b3(mdo sde): pha ma la gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/des brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas phol mig lnga'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo
256b4(mdo sde): zhing mi brtan par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par 'thar ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par brtsad chod de/nyon mongs
256b5(mdo sde): pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/
256b6(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ts+tshin dran spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/rigs pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/rig pa dang /mngon par shes
256b7(mdo sde): pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang /srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang /bkur bsti la mi lta ba dang /dbang po dang /nyes dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
257a1(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gan su gyur to//de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom
257a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa stobs ldan gyis las gang bgyis na/des 'di'i stobs dang ldan par gyur la/dogra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
257a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag stobs ldan nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las
257a4(mdo sde): de dag byas shing bsags pas na/stobs ldan nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni
257a5(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam por smin par 'gyur te/los dge ba dang /las mi dge ba
257a6(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal pa
257a7(mdo sde): brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa
257b1(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha
257b2(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba/'jig rten du byung ste/de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan
257b3(mdo sde): na/brten cing bzhugs pa las/re shig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/shing zad pa'i me bzhin
257b4(mdo sde): du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu mya ngan las 'daso//de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/rin po
257b5(mdo sde): tshe sna bzhi la byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad cig yod la/'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der skye bo phal po
257b6(mdo sde): ches glu blangaso gar byas pas mchod rten rdul gyi yog par gyur to//phyis re zhig ni khyim bdag cig mchod rten gyi 'khor sa'i nang du song ba dang /des mchod rten gyi 'khor rdul gyi
257b7(mdo sde): yog pa mthong ngo //de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas kyi ston rje su dran nas dad pa skyes te/spos kyi 'di gu til mar dang sbyar ba phul te/smon lam btab pa/bdag gis kyang
258a1(mdo sde): yon tan 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ston pa 'di lta bu drug mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mi gnyis par byed par ma gyur ces bya'o//bcom ldan
258a2(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni stobs ldan 'di yin te/des bcom ldan 'das rnam par
258a3(mdo sde): gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur bsti byas pa des na/stobs dang ldan par gyur to//smon lam btab pa des ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byasngo//dge slong dag de
258a4(mdo sde): ltar las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro//las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang
258a5(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro//las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro//dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /
258a6(mdo sde): las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis
258a7(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///sdug gu zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas
258b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams
258b2(mdo sde): dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byis bla mar byas/
258b3(mdo sde): ri mor byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /namakha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs
258b4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /shad na dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge
258b5(mdo sde): 'dun dang bcas pa/ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro nga'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na/shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/longs spyod che ba yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che
258b6(mdo sde): ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do//
258b7(mdo sde): de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam/dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa che bar grags pa
259a1(mdo sde): mthong na/dga' ba zhig bcas te/de bcas pa na grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad grags pas rgyas par gyur to//de nas de bcas pa'i bcas
259a2(mdo sde): ston byas/khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di btsas ma theg tu skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pas na/khye'u 'di'i
259a3(mdo sde): ming sdig gu zhes gdag so zhes zer ro//de nas khye'u sdug gu pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma sbun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtsa ba'i ma
259a4(mdo sde): ma gnyis te/ma mra brgyad la gtad nas/de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang
259a5(mdo sde): cog gis bskyed bsrings te/mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye grag par gyur to//de yang dad pa dang ldan la/dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan po dang /gzhan la
259a6(mdo sde): phan pa la zhugs pa/snying rje che ba/bdag nyid che ba/chos 'dod pa/gtong ba la sred pa/sbyin pa la dga' ba/rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/gtong ba
259a7(mdo sde): chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/des dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /bkren pa dang /sdug cing phongs pa la sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bas sdud par byed do//de nas
259b1(mdo sde): phyis re shig na khye'u sdug gu shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /des spangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par
259b2(mdo sde): brgyan pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi me stong pas lhog pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu
259b3(mdo sde): kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/mthong ma thag tu dos bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do//dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal
259b4(mdo sde): te/chos nyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin
259b5(mdo sde): thugasu chung nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bston te/de thos nas khye'u sdug gus 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye
259b6(mdo sde): shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/des badren pa mthong nas phyi ma l-i gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byu
259b7(mdo sde): ngo//des brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas phal mgo lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thade rnyil
260a1(mdo sde): ba dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par chad tshad de/nyan mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa
260a2(mdo sde): nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/nam mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems
260a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/can don spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom nas/rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa//
260a4(mdo sde): srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang /bkur bsti la mi lta ba/dbang po dang /nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to//
260a5(mdo sde): de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa sdug gus las gang dag bgyis ra/des 'di
260a6(mdo sde): grags pa chen po dang ldan pa dang /sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
260a7(mdo sde): dge slong dag sdug gu nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgal bzhin du byung la/gdon mi zar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing
260b1(mdo sde): bsags pas na/sdug gu nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyamasu myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol
260b2(mdo sde): gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/las dge ba dang /las mi dge
260b3(mdo sde): ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal
260b4(mdo sde): po brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dgo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa
260b5(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa dang /'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha
260b6(mdo sde): lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na
260b7(mdo sde): rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzegs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i
261a1(mdo sde): lhag ma med pa'i mya dran las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'daso//de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung
261a2(mdo sde): gi mchod pa byas nas/rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor khar yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtseg so//de nas
261a3(mdo sde): phyis re zhig na dpyid kyi dus su shing rnams me tog rgyas te/me tog rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba na/khyim bdag gcig cig gis rgyal po la gsol to//bdag ni lha dang lhan
261a4(mdo sde): cig tu bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog gdags par 'tshalo//rgyal pos smras pa/de ltar gyis shig/de nas khyim bdag de dang /rgyal po dang //
261a5(mdo sde): blon po dang /zhabs 'bying ba rnams kyis dril bsgrags te/me tog rnam pa sna tshogs sta gon byas nas/bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la me tog bdags te der
261a6(mdo sde): srog chags 'bum phrag du mas sems dga' ba bskyed nas/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag por bskyed do//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam
261a7(mdo sde): du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na/khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sdug gu 'di yin te/des skyo bo phal po che dang lhan gcig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa des ni/skye bo
261b1(mdo sde): phal po che'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur la/rgyu de nyid kyis na blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur la/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//dge slong dag de ltar na
261b2(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gi nag par 'gyuraro//las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges
261b3(mdo sde): par dkar bar 'gyuraro//las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur ro//dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /las 'dren ma
261b4(mdo sde): rnams spangs la/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
261b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas/dge sbyong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////pad+ma'i mig ces bya ba ni/sangs rgyas
261b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /
261b7(mdo sde): lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis
262a1(mdo sde): bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am
262a2(mdo sde): ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /
262a3(mdo sde): gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro de'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe ser skya'i
262a4(mdo sde): gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/longs spyod che ba/yongasu 'dzin pa yang shing brgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyis bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnos
262a5(mdo sde): pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/chung ma la bu chags
262a6(mdo sde): nas/de zla ba brgyad dam/dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/mig pad+ma sngon po 'dra ba/mgo bo la lha'i nor bu rin po che mthon
262a7(mdo sde): ka thogs pa zhig btsas te/des grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad nor bu mthon ka'i kha dog can du byaso//de nas di btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/khye'u 'di'i ming
262b1(mdo sde): ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/nye du rnams na re khye'u 'di'i mig pad+ma 'dra bas na/de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming pad+ma'i mig ces gdag so zhes zer ro//de nas khye'u
262b2(mdo sde): pad+ma'i mig pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'i ma mo gnyis dang /dri mo 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/de ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/da
262b3(mdo sde): mam brgyad kyi 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzong cog gis bskyed bsrings te/'tsho'i nang gi pad+ma
262b4(mdo sde): bzhin du skye drag par gyur to//de yang dad pa dang ldan la/dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/
262b5(mdo sde): chos 'dod pa gtong ba la sred pa/sbyin pa la dga' ba/rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig ste/de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der lha dang mi
262b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis mchod cing rjed do//de nas phyi zhig na khye'u pad+ma'i mog shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
262b7(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan po/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po
263a1(mdo sde): tshe'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyod do//dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcar
263a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /ngag la nyal dang //
263a3(mdo sde): khams dang /rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos nas khye'u pad+ma'i mig gis 'jig tshogs la blta ba'i
263a4(mdo sde): ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/des bden pa mthong nas/sbyin pa dang /rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/
263a5(mdo sde): dge sbyong dang bram ze dang /bkren pa dang /sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/pha mo la gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/des brtson
263a6(mdo sde): pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /ltung ba
263a7(mdo sde): dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod te/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra
263b1(mdo sde): bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/gser drang bong bar mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/tsun dan
263b2(mdo sde): spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/rig pas sgo nga'i sgribs bcom pa/rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/sred pa'i rnyed pa
263b3(mdo sde): dang /chags pa dang /bkur sti la mi lta ba/dbang po dang /nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyi mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to//de nas re zhig
263b4(mdo sde): na de bsod snyoms la song ba dang /skye bo phal po ches de la bltas na ngo tsha bar gyur to//de nas pad+ma'i mig bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/bcom ldan 'das la
263b5(mdo sde): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po che ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bu 'di ni las las skyes
263b6(mdo sde): pa yin pas na med par bya mi nus so//de lta mod kyi ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/ma dad pa rnams kyis mi mthong bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'dres
263b7(mdo sde): kyis de bzhin du mdzad do//de nas dge slong de dag the tsom skyes te/the tsam thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa pad+mo'i mig
264a1(mdo sde): gis las gang dag bgyis na/des 'di che bar grags pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/pad+ma'i mig
264a2(mdo sde): nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/
264a3(mdo sde): pad+ma'i mig nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan dag su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams
264a4(mdo sde): la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa
264a5(mdo sde): rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//
264a6(mdo sde): chags shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la/de bzhin gshegs
264a7(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bad bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/
264b1(mdo sde): lhadang /mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa la/ro zhig+sa
264b2(mdo sde): na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i srungs rgyas rnam par gzigs/sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/med pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
264b3(mdo sde): suyongasu mya ngan las 'daso//de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis/bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten khor
264b4(mdo sde): khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/des b+hag chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur bsti byas nas/mtho ris dang thar par
264b5(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyuraro//de nas re zhig na ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru'i don grub ste/phyir 'ongs nas/des de'i nang nas nor bu chen po mthon ka chen po zhig khyer te 'ongs te/de nas
264b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod rten mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rje su dran te/nor bu rin po che de bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi char khab la btags
264b7(mdo sde): nas/de'i mthus phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams thams cad mthon ka'i kha dog lta bu 'dug par byas//me tog pad+ma dag gis kyang mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa/bdag
265a1(mdo sde): gis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dgra thob par gyur cig/ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mig nyis par byed par ma gyur cig ces bya'o//bcom
265a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na/ded dpon du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pad+ma'i mig yon te/des bcom ldan 'das rnam par
265a3(mdo sde): gzigs kyi mchod rten la nor bu rin po che btags pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di'i mgo bo las nor bu rin po che byung //pad+ma sngon po dag gis mchod pa byas pa des ni//mig pad+ma
265a4(mdo sde): sngon po lta bur gyur to//smon lam btab pa des ni tshe 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byaso//dge slong dag de ltar ni las gcig tu nges par gnog pa rnams ni rnam par smin
265a5(mdo sde): pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro//las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro//lngas 'dren ma rnams ni/rnam
265a6(mdo sde): par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro//dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams
265a7(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom
265b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///rnga sgra zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/rgyal po rnams dang /blon po che po rnams dang /
265b2(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin
265b3(mdo sde): rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu
265b4(mdo sde): dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'om ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod
265b5(mdo sde): nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
265b6(mdo sde): bcas pa/ser skya'i gnas na shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la/longs spyod che ba/yongasu 'dzin pa yangs
265b7(mdo sde): shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing
266a1(mdo sde): dga' la dga' mgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/de zla ba brgyad dam/dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/
266a2(mdo sde): khye'u gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa/che bar grags pa/byakas ping kA ltar skad snyan pa/rnga sgra ltar gadrangs snyan pa zhig btsas so//de nas de btsos pa'i
266a3(mdo sde): bcas ston byas nas/khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/nye du rnams ni re khye'u 'di rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs dang ldan pas na/de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming
266a4(mdo sde): rngasgra zhes gdag so zhes zer ro//de nas khye'u rnga sgra bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtse ba'i mi ma gnyis te/
266a5(mdo sde): ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad bzang cog gis bskyed bsrings te/
266a6(mdo sde): mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag lnga gyur to//de yang dad pa dang ldan la/dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs po/snying rje can
266a7(mdo sde): bdag nyid che ba/chos 'dod pa/gtong ba la sred pa/sbyin pa la dga' ba/rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go//de nas phyi zhig
266b1(mdo sde): na khye'u rnga sgra shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang
266b2(mdo sde): po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ngo bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/mthong ma
266b3(mdo sde): thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba skyed do//dga' ba bskyed nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
266b4(mdo sde): sngar 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /bag lo nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur
266b5(mdo sde): ge/de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/de nas khye'u rnga sgras 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon su
266b6(mdo sde): du byas te/des bden pa mthong nas/sbyin pa dang /rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /bkren pa dang /sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas
266b7(mdo sde): pha ma la gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //des brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo
267a1(mdo sde): zhing mi bstan par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin
267a2(mdo sde): par chad chod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral nas//
267a3(mdo sde): gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom
267a4(mdo sde): pa/rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang /bkur bsti la mi blta ba/dbang po dang /
267a5(mdo sde): nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to//de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sa
267a6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa rnga sgras las ci bgyis na/des 'di gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob par
267a7(mdo sde): gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnga sgra nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dba' rgal bzhin du 'byung
267b1(mdo sde): la/gdon mi za ba 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/rnga sgra nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa/de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag
267b2(mdo sde): las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/
267b3(mdo sde): las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//lus can dag gi las
267b4(mdo sde): rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa dgu
267b5(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu
267b6(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de rgyal po'i pho brang gi nyan
267b7(mdo sde): ldan na/bzhugs pa la re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag
268a1(mdo sde): ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'daso//de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi
268a2(mdo sde): mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bzhi la byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad cig yod la/'phang du rgyang glags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs/der srog chags 'bum
268a3(mdo sde): phrag du mas bkur bsti byas nas/mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyuraro//de nas re zhig na khyim bdag gcig gis rol mo'i cha spyad rnam pa sna tshogs dang /mi lus rol mo
268a4(mdo sde): bslabs te/mchod rten de la phul nas/de dgra mchod rten de la nyin cig bzhin du rol mo'i sgra khyad par dag gis bkur bsti byed do//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i
268a5(mdo sde): dus na khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rnga sgra 'di yin te/des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rol mo'i sgra'i cha spyad rnam pa sna tshogs phul ba des na
268a6(mdo sde): rnga sgra lta bu'i gdangs can du gyur la/rgyu de nyid kyis na da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byaso//dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni
268a7(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro//las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro//las
268b1(mdo sde): 'dren ma rnams ni/rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro//dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/las gcig tu
268b2(mdo sde): nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/dge sbyong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag
268b3(mdo sde): rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lo mngon par bstod do///bu zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon
268b4(mdo sde): po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin
268b5(mdo sde): rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byis/ri mo byas/mchod
268b6(mdo sde): pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
268b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang /na bza'i dang /zhal zas dang /gzims chad dade/gdan dang /snyan gsos da /spyan zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi go 'dun dang /
269a1(mdo sde): bcas pa/ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/yongs
269a2(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas po des/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan
269a3(mdo sde): gcig tu rtse zhing dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma las bu chags nas/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon te/bu btsas nas sha snag bu chen po zhig byung ste/pha ma dang /khyim de na
269a4(mdo sde): gnas pa'i gzhan dag dang /g.yog 'khor dang nye du rnams kyis de mthong nas/'di lta bu btsas pa ci yin zhes mi dga' bar gyur to//de nas re zhig na khyim bdag de mya ngan
269a5(mdo sde): gyi khang bur zhugs te/lag pa la oM tshugs bcas nas/sems khongasu chud cing 'dug ste/'di ci yin su la bsnyad par bya shes pa su yod snyamo//de nas de'i blo skyes
269a6(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa/thams cad gzigs pa yin te/des mkhyen kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyad par bya'o//
269a7(mdo sde): snyam nas/de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la zhus so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag khyod ma
269b1(mdo sde): 'jigs shig/ma 'jigs shig/shA snag bu de ras bral legs par rmal ba'i nang du chug la/zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin cig kyang dus gsum gsum du lag
269b2(mdo sde): pa brams te/'o mas yang dang yang du gtor cig dang /de'i 'og tu rdol te/bu brgya 'byung bar 'gyur la/de dag thams cad chen po che'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de na
269b3(mdo sde): khyim bdag des de thos nas mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/bsam pa bdag gis bu de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par brnyed do snyam nas des de bzhin
269b4(mdo sde): du byas pa dang /zhag bdun lon pa dang sha snag bu de rdol nas bu brgyu byung ste/thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad
269b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan pa shi stag go//de nas re zhig na mthar gyis bskyed bsrings nas cher skyes pa dang /de dag thams cad byad gzugs dang /lang mtsho'i
269b6(mdo sde): rgyags pas dregs te/phan tshun 'khyam pa las shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
269b7(mdo sde): gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pos lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin
270a1(mdo sde): po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/mthong ma thag tu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do//dga' ba bskyed na
270a2(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bsam pa dang /bag
270a3(mdo sde): la nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtags par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad de/de thos nas thaMd kyis 'jig
270a4(mdo sde): tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/de dag gis bden pa mthong nas/pha ma la
270a5(mdo sde): gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung //de dag thams cad kyis brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di
270a6(mdo sde): nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad
270a7(mdo sde): tshachod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser
270b1(mdo sde): dang dong bar mnyam pa/namakha' dang lag 'thil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsrel bar gyur pa/rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/rig pa
270b2(mdo sde): dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang /bkur bsti la mi lta ba/dbang po dang /nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
270b3(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to//de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
270b4(mdo sde): btsun pa gzhon nu brgya po 'di dag gis las gang dag bgyis na/des spun du gyur la chen po che'i stobs dang ldan par gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di
270b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/de
270b6(mdo sde): dag gzhan su zhig gis nyamasu myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang //
270b7(mdo sde): me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched
271a1(mdo sde): rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/
271a2(mdo sde): 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
271a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs
271a4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las/re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
271a5(mdo sde): rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan
271a6(mdo sde): las 'daso//de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug
271a7(mdo sde): tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig brtsigs te/der srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bkur bsti byas nas/mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar
271b1(mdo sde): gyuro/de nas re zhig na 'da' bde bo brgya phyi rol du byung ba dang /de dag gis mchod rten de mthong nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyon rjesu dran te/de dag tu lhan cig tu
271b2(mdo sde): til mar spos can gyis byugs nas/me tog dang /me tog phreng dang /mar me dbul ba dag gis bsnyen bkur byas nas/lhan cig tu smon lam btab pa/bdag cag gang
271b3(mdo sde): dang gang du skyes pa de dang der spun du gyur te/lhan cig tu lto cog kho na nas byung bar gyur cig/chen po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob pa dang /byad gzugs dang ldan par gyur
271b4(mdo sde): cig/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas//dge slong dag ji snyam du
271b5(mdo sde): sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na/mdza' sde bor gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni chen po che 'di dag yin te/de dag gis lhan cig tu mchod rten la/bkur bsti byas pa des na/'a
271b6(mdo sde): ltar lhan cig tu skyes te/chen po che'i stobs kyi shugs thob par gyur to//smon lam btab pa des ni gcig tu 'thun par rab tu byung bar rab tu byung nas/dgra bcom pa nyid
271b7(mdo sde): thob par gyur to//dge slong dag de ltar na/las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro//las gcig tu nges
272a1(mdo sde): par dkar ba rnams ni/rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro//las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro//
272a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag de bas na/las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/las gcig tu nges par dkar bri rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad
272a3(mdo sde): par bya ste/dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pas/dge slong dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis
272a4(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////bam po bcu drug pa//nyi ma zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen
272a5(mdo sde): po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams
272a6(mdo sde): dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa
