272a7(mdo sde): byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas
272b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdun dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan
272b2(mdo sde): thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/yul sir skya'i gnas na shing n+ya glo da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya'i bu phyug cing nor mang la/longs
272b3(mdo sde): spyod che ba/yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya chepo/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran po zhig gnas pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma
272b4(mdo sde): bloblangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la draga' mgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu chags nas/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon
272b5(mdo sde): pa dang /bu byung ste/khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs pa zhig btsas nas/de las kho rare khor yug tu nyi ma'i 'od zer lta bu
272b6(mdo sde): 'phro ste/de'i snang bas mtshan ma grong khyer ser skya'i gnas thams cad khyab par gyur pas nyin mo bzhin du snang bar byaso//de nas pha ma dang /khyim do na gnas pa'i g.yog
272b7(mdo sde): 'khor rnams dang /nye du rnams dang /ser skyo'i gnas na 'khod pa'i shAkya rnams kyis de mthong nas yi mtshan du gyur te dga' bas rgyas so//de nas de btsas pa'i
273a1(mdo sde): btsos ston byas nas/khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdugs shos ming 'dogs par byed de/nye du rnams na ro khye'u 'di bcas ma thag tu grong khyer sor skya'o//
273a2(mdo sde): gnas thams cad nyi ma bzhin du gsal bas na/de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming nyi ma zhes gdag so zer ro//de'i khye'u nyi ma pad na 'tsho ba'i ma mu gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'i
273a3(mdo sde): ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'khru bo'i mya ma gnyis dang /rtsi ba'o ma ma gnyis te/ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/do ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /
273a4(mdo sde): mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang po cog gis bskyed bsrings te/mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to//de yang dad pa dang ldan la/dge
273a5(mdo sde): zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs po/snying rje can bdag nyid che ba/ches 'dod po/skye dgu la byams pa/gtong ba la srid pa/sbyin
273a6(mdo sde): pa la dga' ba/rab tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba/gtong ba chen po la gnas pa zhig go//de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u nyi ma shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /des songs
273a7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis leg pa brgyan pa/dang byang bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/
273b1(mdo sde): ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzung ba mthong nas mthong ma thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' ba bskyed do//dga' ba bskyed//
273b2(mdo sde): nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsum pa dang /bgro
273b3(mdo sde): la nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugasu chud nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/des khye'u nyi mas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
273b4(mdo sde): ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/des bden pa mthong nas/sbyin pa dang /rab tu sbyin pa dag byin te/
273b5(mdo sde): dge slong dang /bram ze dang /bkren pa dang /sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/pha ma la gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //de
273b6(mdo sde): brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /ltung
273b7(mdo sde): ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra
274a1(mdo sde): bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan
274a2(mdo sde): dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /
274a3(mdo sde): chags pa dang /bkur bsti la mi lta ba dbang po dang /nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gan su gyur to//de nas gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan
274a4(mdo sde): pa nyi ma bsod snyoms la 'gro ba de'i tshe bram ze dang /khyim bdag ma dad pa rnams 'phyang zhing smod la/lkog 'phyas byed de/'di ltar nor bu rin po che mgo bo la thogs nas/lam po
274a5(mdo sde): cha dang /srang dang /bzhi mdo dang /sum mdo dag tu 'khyam pa las ni/shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig pa'o//bram ze'i tshul ni tshig pa'o zhes 'dzer to//
274a6(mdo sde): de nas de shin tu ngo tsha bar gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das go la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
274a7(mdo sde): to//bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ci nas bdag gi nor bu rin po cho ma mchis par mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bu 'di ni las las skyes pa yin pas
274b1(mdo sde): na/med par byar mi nus so//de lta mod kyi ci nas dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni mthong la/ma dad pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin du mdzad do//
274b2(mdo sde): de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa nyi mas las gang dag bgyis na/des 'di che bar grags pa
274b3(mdo sde): dang /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nyi ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgal
274b4(mdo sde): bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas nyi ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su dag gis nyamasu myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong
274b5(mdo sde): dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las
274b6(mdo sde): dge ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang //khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyuraro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni///
274b7(mdo sde): bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa
275a1(mdo sde): la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/
275a2(mdo sde): skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de rgyal po'i
275a3(mdo sde): pho brang gnyen ldan na rten ci ngo bzhugs pa las/re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/shing
275a4(mdo sde): zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'daso//de nas rgyal po gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung gi
275a5(mdo sde): mchod pa byas nas/rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig yod la/'phang du rgyang grags gcig yod pa zhig birtags te/der srog
275a6(mdo sde): chags 'bum phrag du mas bkuri bsti byas nas/mtho ris dang thar par 'gro bar 'gyur ro//de nas mchod rten de'i mchod pa la bab pa na/bram ze dang /khyim bdag dad pa
275a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams kyis spos dang /me tog 'phrang dang byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /rol mo'i sgra rnams kyis mchod pa byed do//de nas re
275b1(mdo sde): zhig na mi zhig rgyal po dang /rgyan pos rtses nas skyugasu nor bu rin po che me shel zhig thob bo//de nas de dad pa skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten gyi
275b2(mdo sde): char kheb la btags te/zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyod pa dang /sbyin par bye ba'i chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis na/bdag
275b3(mdo sde): gis kyang 'di lta bu'i ston dag thob par gyur cig/ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mi mnyes por byed par ma gyur cig/nor bu rin po che 'di lta bu yang spyi bo la
275b4(mdo sde): thogs bzhin du ma'i lto nas 'byung bar gyur cig ces byaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na/tsha lo la dor sgro byed pa
275b5(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni nyi ma 'di nyid yin te/de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la bkur bsti byas pa dang /nor bu rin po che gtags pa des na/de'i mgo bo las
275b6(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che byung la/rgyu de nyid kyis gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur te/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas//dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig/
275b7(mdo sde): tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro//las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par
276a1(mdo sde): dkar bar 'gyur ro//las 'dren ma rnams ni//rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro//dge slong dag de bas na/las gcig tu nges par
276a2(mdo sde): gnag pa rnams dang /las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par
276a3(mdo sde): bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///
276a4(mdo sde): gyad kyi ba dan zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug pa rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang
276a5(mdo sde): tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi
276a6(mdo sde): 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin
276a7(mdo sde): dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza'
276b1(mdo sde): dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /spyan zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/yul ser skya'i gnas na
276b2(mdo sde): shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so//de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas na shAkya phyug cing nir mang la/longs spyod tshu ba/yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang
276b3(mdo sde): ldan po/rnam thas kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa dos/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig tu badz+re zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do//de rtse zhing
276b4(mdo sde): dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/chung ma la bu chags nas/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu len pa dang /bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ma'i kha dog las ni
276b5(mdo sde): 'das/lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa zhig btses te/gang gi tshe khye'u de bcas pa de'i tshe lha rnams kyis khor khor yug nos lha'i ba dan dag bsgreng ngo //lha'i rol mo'i cha byad dag kyang brdung
276b6(mdo sde): so//lha'i me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po rnams kyis kyang gtor to//ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer thams cad du grags pas rgyas par gyur to//
276b7(mdo sde): khyim thams cad du yang de'i phyir ba dan bsgreng ngo //de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas nas/khye'u 'di'i mi ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/nye du rnams na ra
277a1(mdo sde): khye'u 'dri btsas pa ni 'jig rten thams cad glags pas rgyas pas na/de'i phyir khye'u 'dri'i ming snyan grags shes gdag so zhes zer ro//de nas khye'u
277a2(mdo sde): snyan grags pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'im ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'khru bo'i mo ma gnyis dang /rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/
277a3(mdo sde): de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang cog gis bskyed bsrings te/mtsho'i
277a4(mdo sde): nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye grag par gyur to//de yang dad pa dang ldan la/dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba bdag la phan pa dang gzhan la phan pa la zhugs pa/snying rje can
277a5(mdo sde): bdag nyid che ba/tshes 'dod pa zhig go/de nas phyis re zhig na khye'u snyan grags shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra bar song ba dang /der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes
277a6(mdo sde): bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis degs por brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyud cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis rgyan pa/nyi me steng bas lhog
277a7(mdo sde): ba'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong nas/mthong mi thag tu des bcom ldan 'das la sems dga' bo bskyed do//dga' ba bskyed
277b1(mdo sde): nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /bag la
277b2(mdo sde): nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thug su chud nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan to//de nas khye'u snyan grags kyis 'jig tshogs la lta
277b3(mdo sde): ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/des bden pa mthong nas/sbyin pa dang /rab tu sbyin pa dge sbyin te/dge sbyong dang bram ze
277b4(mdo sde): dang /bkren pa dang /sdug cing phongs pa rnams tshim par byas nas/pha ma la gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi bsten pa lo rab tu byung //des brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad
277b5(mdo sde): pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil pa dang /ltung ba dang /rnam pa 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig
277b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags thams cad dang
277b7(mdo sde): bral bar gyur nas/gser dang bong ba'am/na mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dre ba'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/rig pas spong
278a1(mdo sde): sbubs bcom pa/rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang /bkur bsti
278a2(mdo sde): la mi lta ba/dbang po dang /nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to//de yang gsol ba btab ste/phul ba'i gos
278a3(mdo sde): spyod do//gsol ba btab ste/phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung ngu spyod do//gsol ba btab ste/phul ba'i zas dang /mal cha dang /stan dang /nad gsos dang /sman zong
278a4(mdo sde): spyod de/gsol ba btab ste/phul ba ma yin pa ni nyung ngu spyod do//de nas dge slong dag the tsom skyes ste/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
278a5(mdo sde): zhus pa/btsun pa snyan grags kyis las gang dag bgyis ni/des btsas ma thag tu lha rnams kyis ba dan bsgreng nas/'jig rten du grags pas rgyas par gyur la/rab tu
278a6(mdo sde): byung nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag snyen grags nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag du tshogs rnyed cing
278a7(mdo sde): rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas/snyan grags nyid kyis las byas shing bsags
278b1(mdo sde): pa de dag gzhan su zhig gi nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams
278b2(mdo sde): dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/las dge ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye
278b3(mdo sde): mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu
278b4(mdo sde): nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
278b5(mdo sde): rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bco
278b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de rgyal po'i pho brang ginyen ldan na rten cing bzhugs pa las re zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par
278b7(mdo sde): gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyi 'drin las thams cad mdzad nas shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lkog ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings yongasu mya ngan las 'daso//de nas
279a1(mdo sde): rgyal blo gnyen yod kyis bcom ldan la sa de'i sgra gdung la/sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas/rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i mchod myur
279a2(mdo sde): yug tu dpag tshad gcog yod la/'phang du rgyud grags glucig yod pa zhig bcigs te/der srog tshogs 'brum phrag du mis bkur bsti byas nas/mtho ngas dang thar
279a3(mdo sde): par 'gro bar 'gyur//de nas re zhig na rgyal po gnyin yod kyis mchod rten de la dus ston byas nas/mchod rten gyi dus ston byed pa der gyad 'gyed pa rnams kyi bla dan dag
279a4(mdo sde): bsgreng ngo //de nas re zhig na rgyal po'i gyad gcig gis kyad gcig non po dang /des gyad kyi bdan thob nas/des de blangs te srog chags 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor
279a5(mdo sde): dang bcas pa rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs len cing /bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi yon dran
279a6(mdo sde): par byas te/ba dan don tshad rten gyi snying gi sgrog shing la btags nas/smon lam btab ba/bdag gis byung ston+da 'di lta bu dag thob par gyur cig/ston pa'i
279a7(mdo sde): lta bu bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mi mnyos par byed par mi gyur cig ces byas so//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na/gyang du
279b1(mdo sde): gyur ba gad yon pad+mon rgyun glags da yin tu/de bcom ldan 'das rnam pa ga /sa kyi/mchod rten la basbyin /byas pa des na/'khon pa'i bde ba many+dzu' yas myong /
279b2(mdo sde): dzor gyur la/nyid kyi de ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du mo//dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/rnam par smin pa ya
279b3(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur//las gcig tu nges par dka bo rnams ni/rnam par sbyin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur//las 'dren mi rnams ni
279b4(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyuraro//dge slong dag de bas na/las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/las gcig tu nges par
279b5(mdo sde): dkang ba rnams 'ba' zhig la gtad par bya ste/dge slong khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs
279b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//gang po la sogs pa rtogs pa brjod pa brgya pa las/rtogs pa brjod pa sna tshogs
279b7(mdo sde): shes bya ba ste/rjem gyi tshig su rjod pa bdun rdzogs s+ho//sdom ni/'di bzang ma dang bsgrug sa//dkar ma ba ud pa la//mdzes sprin mi dang
280a1(mdo sde): tig dang //ka tsang ga la bde byed ma//mi sdug sde tshan bcad de bstan//'od bzang ma zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/
280a2(mdo sde): rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pheM b+h+ring 'khor gyi mi rnam hA dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lce rnams dang /klu
280a3(mdo sde): rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/
280a4(mdo sde): mur byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod
280a5(mdo sde): cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /skyon gsos dang /sman skyong
280a6(mdo sde): rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa ni/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//de'i
280a7(mdo sde): tshe mnyan du yod pa na/tshong dpon phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/yong su 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nar dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran
280b1(mdo sde): pa zhig gnas pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las chung ma la bu
280b2(mdo sde): chags nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste/bu mo gzugs bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes pa lha'i rgyun gyis klubs pa/nor bu rin po che mgul no thogs pa zhig btsas te/
280b3(mdo sde): de nas 'od byung ba des mnyan du yod pa thams cad snang bar byaso//de nas de btsas pa'i bcos ston byas nas/bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/nye du rnams
280b4(mdo sde): na re bu mo 'di btsas ma thag tu nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis mnyan du yod pa tha~Md snang bar byas na/dor phyir bu mo 'di'i ming 'od bzang mo zhes gdag so zhes zer ro//de nas bu mo 'od
280b5(mdo sde): bzang ma bang na mche ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'khru ba'i ma mgonyis dang /rtse ba'i mA ma gnyis te/ma ma brgyad la gtad de/ma mA brgyad kyi
280b6(mdo sde): 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/mu tsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye
280b7(mdo sde): drag par gyur to//bu mo de yang dad pa dang ldan la/dge zhing bsam pa 'azang ba/bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan po la zhugs pa zhig ste/de la blong bi su dang su 'ongs
281a1(mdo sde): kyang rung ba de dang de dag la mgul nas/rgyan bkrol te sbyin par byed do//byin nas kyang yang brgyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de nas gang gi tshe bu mo de mthar gyis
281a2(mdo sde): chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/rgyal po'i bu rnams dang /blon po'i bu rnams dang /tshong dpon gyi bu mang po dag de slong du 'ong ngo //de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/de'i
281a3(mdo sde): pha lag pa la sbom tshugs bcas te bsam pa/gal te gcig la byin na ni/gzhan rnams bdag gi dgrar 'gyuraro snyam nas sems khongasu chud cing 'dug/de nas re zhig
281a4(mdo sde): na bu mo des pa sems khongasu chud pa mthong nas smras pa/yab ci zhig gis sems khongasu chud cing bzhugs/des de'i don rgyas par bsnyad//de nas phyis bu mo de na re yab thugs
281a5(mdo sde): ngan ma mdzad cig dang /de ste zhag bdun na bdag nyid kyis khyim thab 'dam par 'tshalo zhes zero//de nas tshong dpon des rgyal po gsal rgyal lo gsol pa/mnyan du
281a6(mdo sde): yod par dril bsgrags te/da ste zhag bdun na bu mo 'od zang ma rang nyid kyi khyim thab 'dam par chad kyis khyed kyi bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces byaso//de nas zhag bdun
281a7(mdo sde): yod pa dang /bu mo 'od bzang ma shing rta la zhon te/chos gos tshon can gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ri mor bris te bstod pa 'don
281b1(mdo sde): cing srang du zhugaso//de nas der rgyal po'i bu rnams dang /blon po'i bu rnams dang /tshong dpon gyi bu rnams de la yid smon byed cing lta ba de dag la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shad
281b2(mdo sde): kyis byang bar bshad/bdag gis khyed la gang gi sgo nas kyang sku brnyas ni mi 'tshal na yong ye bdag 'dod pa rnams la den du gnyer ba ma lags pa kho na bas so//bdag ni sangs
281b3(mdo sde): rgyas la skyabasu song ste/de'i thad du rab tu 'byung zhes byas nas de dag phyir log/'od bzang ma yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
281b4(mdo sde): 'tshal to/chos mnyan pa'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin
281b5(mdo sde): thugasu chud nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos nas bu mo 'od bzang mos 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes
281b6(mdo sde): rdo rjes btsem nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/de nas bden pa mthong nas mngon par shes pa yang bsgrag so//de nas bu mo 'od bzang ma stan las langs te/blo gos
281b7(mdo sde): phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
282a1(mdo sde): gsol to//btsun pa bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bstan par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob du rung
282a2(mdo sde): na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshalo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di la gdul bar bya ba mang po dag des 'dren par 'gyur bar zhugs
282a3(mdo sde): su chud nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/bu mo song la 'khor rnams kyang ltos shig/de nas bu mi 'od bzang ma rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas byung ste/mang po 'dus
282a4(mdo sde): pa'i nang du song ba dang /der so so nas bsams pa 'di mthus dbrog par bya'o snyam ste/de dag gis de bzung bar bya'o//de nas bu mo 'od bzang mo de dag gis bsnyags pa dang /ngang
282a5(mdo sde): paba'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba bzhin du na mkha' la mngon par 'phags s+ho/cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to//so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de/de
282a6(mdo sde): nas de dag gis lha dang /mi rnams dad par byed pa'i cho 'phrul de mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang spu zing zhes byas nas sdong po rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal
282a7(mdo sde): nas gsol ba btab pa sru mar skyon mar spyon/khyod kyis chos 'di lta bu mngon du byas pa las na/khyod 'dod pa spyod pa 'di ni mi srid do zhes byas//de nas bu mo 'od bzang
282b1(mdo sde): man mkha' las babs nas/skye bo phal po che'i gung la 'dug ste/gang thos pas srog chags 'bum phrag du mas bden pa mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to//de nas
282b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la gtad de/des de rab tu phyung ste/bsnyen par rdzogs par byaso//de nas des brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas phol

282b4(mdo sde): par rtsad chod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser

283a2(mdo sde): tu byung nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/dge slong dag 'od bzang ma nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu

283a7(mdo sde): shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dge sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dag

283b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad nas/shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i

284a1(mdo sde): rgyal po gnyen yod kyi btsun mo dam par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'od bzang ma 'di yin te/des bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la rgyan rnam pa

288a2(mdo sde): bos lan gnyi su bran mor byar ci yod kyis/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol gar ma chag snyam mo//de nas des gsad pa dang /bcing ba dang /brdeg pa dang /

288b4(mdo sde): na bdag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub po'i gsung rab la rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig ces bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/
288b5(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo mngagu bzhug mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rab sdug ma 'di yin te/deso bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la zhal zas phul ba des na phyug po'i rig su skyes te gzugs
288b6(mdo sde): bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /skye bo thams cad kyis bkur bar gyur to//smon lam btab pa de ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas//dge slong dag de ltar
288b7(mdo sde): las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gcig par 'gyur//las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni/rnam par smin pa yang
289a1(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro//las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren mar 'gyur//dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par
289a2(mdo sde): gnag pa rnams dang /las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'bar shig le gtad par bya ste/dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//
289a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///dkar
289a4(mdo sde): mo zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon
289a5(mdo sde): rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha mayin rnams dang /nam mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams
289a6(mdo sde): dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mo byas/mchod pa byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha'
289a7(mdo sde): lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang
289b1(mdo sde): gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyas pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ser sgra'i gnas na shing n+ya gro da'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
289b2(mdo sde): so//de'i shAkya rnams kyi nang na/shAkya snar ma zhes byi ba phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/yongasu 'dzin pa yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nar dang ldan pa/rnam
289b3(mdo sde): thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan gcig rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyad do//de de dang rtse zhing dga' la
289b4(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyod kyang /bu yang med/bu mo yang med de/lag pa om tsugs bcas nas bsams pa/bdag gi khyim bdag nor du ma dang ldan du zin kyang /dadag la bu yang
289b5(mdo sde): med/bu mo yong med pas bdag 'das pa'i 'og tu ni bu med pa'i phyir ci bdog pa thad rgyal po dbang bar 'gyu ro snyam ste/sems khongasu chud cing 'dug/de nas dge sbyong dang bram ze
289b6(mdo sde): dang /ltas mkhan dang /mdza' bo dang /gnyen dang /rtsa log gzhan dag gis lha la gsol ba thab shig ces de la sgo'o//de nas de bud med de/bu 'dod pas gu lang
289b7(mdo sde): dang /chu lha dang /ku be ra dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa dang /lha'i khyad par gzhan dag la yang gsol ba 'debs te/'di lta ste/kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang
290a1(mdo sde): nags tshal gyi lha dang /lam gyi bzhi mdo'i lha dang /sum mdo'i lha dang /gtor ma len pa ji lha dang /lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang /chos 'thun
290a2(mdo sde): pabya dang /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lha rnams la yang gsol ba 'deb so//'jig rten na yang gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gad+hAm
290a3(mdo sde): yod med kyi/de yang de lta na mu yin te/gal te gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus bu dang du ma skyo bar 'gyur du zin na/'khor lo myur ba'i rgyal pa bzhin du re re la yang bu stong
290a4(mdo sde): stong yod par 'gyur ba'i rig so//yin gnas gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bor 'gyur te/gsum gang zhe na/pha mu gnyis 'dod chags langs te phrang po dang
290a5(mdo sde): ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /dri za 'ongs pa ste/gnas 'di gsum tshogs pa las bu dang bu mo skye bar 'gyur ro//de nas de yang gsol bya 'debs
290a6(mdo sde): palhur byed cing 'dug la/sems can zhig kyang sen gyi ris shig na shi 'phos te/de'i chung ma'i ltor zhugs naso/des khyim thab la sbran to//de nas khyimatha
290a7(mdo sde): gyimi smras pa/bzang mo gal te'u khye'u zhig bcas na ni legs/de ma yin te bu ma zhig btsas na ni/de nyid dang bcas te khyod khyim nas bskyed de gtang ngo //de nas
290b1(mdo sde): re shog na de zla ba brgyud dam dgu lon pa dang bu byu ste/bu mo gzugs bzang zhing bsnun stug la mdzes pa mo'i kha dog lus ni 'das/lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa/gos dkar ngo
290b2(mdo sde): gyon pa mngal gyi dri mas ma gos pa zhig btsas so//de nas re sh+log na shAkya sbyar me sa khyod kyi chung ma la bu byung ste/bu mo zhig btsa so//zhes thos pa dang /de khros te nang du
290b3(mdo sde): song ngo //de nas de'i chung mas lha'i gos gyon pa'i bu mo phul lo//de nas shAkya snar mas bu me mthong naso//mchog tu ye mtshan du gyur nas/de btsas pa'i bcos ston byas
290b4(mdo sde): nas/bu mo'i ming ji skad gladags zhes ming 'dogs par byed de/nye du rnams ni ro 'di gos dkar mo gyon bzhin du btsas pas na/de'i phyir bu mi 'di'i ming dkar mor gdagaso
290b5(mdo sde): zhes zer ro//de nas bu mo dkar mo pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ma ma
290b6(mdo sde): brgyad la gtad nas/dem ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang /zho dang mar dang /zhun mer ding /mar g+hi sIH khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad k+Shi khyad par bzang gcog gis bskyed bsrings te/
290b7(mdo sde): mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to//bu mo dkar mo ji tsam du skye ba de tsam du gos de tsam du gos de dag kyang skye ste/dri ma can du yang mi 'gyur la/de'i lus la/
291a1(mdo sde): /yang dri mas gos par mi 'gyuraro//de nas gang gi tshe bu mo dkar mo mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe/rgyal po'i bu rnams dang /blon po rnams dang /tshong
291a2(mdo sde): dpon gyi bu mang po de dag de slong du 'ong ngo //de nas de dag gis gnod par gyur nas/de'i pha lag pa la oM tshugs bcas te bsams pa/gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams
291a3(mdo sde): bdag gi dgrar 'gyuraro snyam nas sems khongasu chud cing 'dug/de nas re shig na bu mo des pa sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa mthong nas smras pa/yab ci zhig gis sems khangs
291a4(mdo sde): su chud cing bzhugs/de nas de'i don rgyas par brnyed do//de nas bu mo na re yab thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/bdag ni 'dod pa la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das
291a5(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung gis/yab kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/de nas re shig na nges pha ma gnyis la gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la
291a6(mdo sde): rab tu byung ste/gos gang dag gyon te btsas pa de dag nyid chos gos lnga tshang bar gyur to//de nas des brtson pa dang /sbyor ba dang /'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i
291a7(mdo sde): 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin
291b1(mdo sde): par cang rjod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas to//dgra bcom khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/
291b2(mdo sde): gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/namakha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/tson dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/rig pas sgo de'i sbubs btsam pa/rig
291b3(mdo sde): bAdang mngon par shes pa dang /sos yang dgu par rig pa thothob/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang /bkur bsti la mi bsgrub/dbang po dang /nye dbang bicas pa'i lha rnams
291b4(mdo sde): kyimi mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra ba'i gnas gyur to//de nas dag /slong dag the tshom smras te/the tsom thams cad gtsang pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/
291b5(mdo sde): btsun pa dkar mos las gang dag bgyis na de phyug pa'i rigasu skyes te/gzugs bzang zhing postan sdug la mdzes pa dang /gos dkar ma gyon pa dang /rab tu byung nas dgra be com sa
291b6(mdo sde): nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' stsal pa/dge slong dag dkar me nyid kyis sngon cha rabs gzhan dag tu chags rnyed cing rkyen grub po dang ldan te/dpa'
291b7(mdo sde): rgal bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi mar 'ang ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/dag ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myang bar 'gyur
292a1(mdo sde): te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsngags pa du na phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi
292a2(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur to//las dge ba dang mi dge 'byos shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig 'i rnam
292a3(mdo sde): par smin par 'gyuraro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal po brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong
292a4(mdo sde): dag sten byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskul ba bzang po 'di nyid la/skye dgu'i gyi ma nyi khri thub pa na/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhib su ldan pa/bde bar
292a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha mo sbyor ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di srung zhes bya bya
292a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten du byung ste/de grong khyor bA ra ni son/drang srong smra ba'i dgos kyi nags ni rten cing bzhugs//de nas re shig na tshong dpon gyi chung ma dad pa dang ldan li/dge zhing
292a7(mdo sde): bsam pa 'azong zhing 'dug pa de na zhig la drang srong smra bar song ngo //de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs pa
292b1(mdo sde): brgyan pa//dpe byung bzang po brgyad nus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ga/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas
292b2(mdo sde): bzang ba mthong nas/mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'odas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das khyod
292b3(mdo sde): srung gis de la chos bstan nas des dad pa rnyed de/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gyi nang du bshes gsol nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos
292b4(mdo sde): spyiskye brkyang phul lo//de nas mthar gyis pha ma la gsol te/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus ni/tshong dpon
292b5(mdo sde): gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma dkar mo 'od yin te/des dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos sra brgyad phul ba des na/gos dkar mo gyon bzhin du bcaso//tshang
292b6(mdo sde): par spyod pa'i gnas bsrungs pa des ni cha 'di la dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas//dge slong dag de ltar nu las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang
292b7(mdo sde): gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro//las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyuraro//las 'dren ma rnams ni rnam par
293a1(mdo sde): smin pa yang 'dres mar 'gyuraro//dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /las 'dren ma rnams spangs la/las gcig tu
293a2(mdo sde): nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la gtad par bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslabs par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong
293a3(mdo sde): de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///zla ba zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/rgyal po rnam
293a4(mdo sde): dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod
293a5(mdo sde): sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /nam mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas//
293a6(mdo sde): mchod pa byas te/lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchechod cing shes pa'i sangs
293a7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa
293b1(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mnyan du yod pa na/rgyal bu rgya la byed kyi chol khyim bdag mgon med nas byin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs//de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/
293b2(mdo sde): bram ze phyug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba/yongasu 'dzin pa yangaso shing rgya che bo/rnam thos kyi bu'i nar dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas//
293b3(mdo sde): yang rigs byed gsum gyi mthar phyin te/ming gi rnam grangs dang /shes gsal dang bcas pa dang /yi ge'i rab tu dbye ba dang /lnga pa ste/gtam rgyud dang bcas pa rnam
293b4(mdo sde): tshig re re nas brda' spyod nus pa zhig go/de nas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya/bram ze'i sngags 'don pa'i slob dpon byed do//de nas des bu dgos pa'i phyir rigs mnyam
293b5(mdo sde): las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan gcig tu rtse zhing dga' dgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/chung ma la bu chags nas/de zla ba brgyad dam
293b6(mdo sde): dgu len pa dang /bu byung ste/bu mo gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa lta na sdug pa yan lag dang nying lag thad dang ljon pa zhig bcos//de nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston byas
293b7(mdo sde): nas/bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do//nye du rnams na re bdag cag gi bu tsha phal cher zla ba zhes 'dogs pas na/de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming zla ba
294a1(mdo sde): zhes gdag so zhes zer ro//de nas bu mo zla ba pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtse ba'i
294a2(mdo sde): mA ma gnyis te/ma ma brgyad la gtad nas/de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang cog
294a3(mdo sde): gis bskyed bsrings te/mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to//de nas bu mo zla ba mthar gyis chen mor gyur pa dang /de mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa dang /
294a4(mdo sde): bya ba la gsal ba dang /dran pa dang ldan pa dang /thos pa 'jig par gyur to//de nas re shig na de'i pha bram ze'i khye'u rnams slob pa na de thos pa tsam gyis lob so//thos nas
294a5(mdo sde): kyang bstan chos de dag lta 'og dang sbyor zhing 'chad nus so//de nas de'i grags pas mnyan du yod pa thams cad rgyas par gyur to//mu stegs can dag kyang nyin gcig bzhin du
294a6(mdo sde): de la lte ba'i phyir 'ongs te/de dang lhan cig tu gtan la 'bebs par byed do//de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
294a7(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/mnyan du yod par gshegs nas mkhas pa rnams dang mkhas par bgrang ba de dag las phal cher bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir der dong bar byed//
294b1(mdo sde): de nas de dag mi snang nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/kye ci'i phyir de bstan chos shes pa dag mi 'ong ba 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod/de dag gis smras pa/bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa
294b2(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa 'dir gshegs te/de dag thams cad de lo gzhol bar gyur to//de nas sang+yas shes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma byung thos nas/de spu thams cad zing zhes byaso//de nas bu mo zla
294b3(mdo sde): bas sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra thos nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo //de nas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis legs
294b4(mdo sde): par brgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bu kun nas
294b5(mdo sde): bzang ba mthong ba nas/mthong ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo
294b6(mdo sde): zla ba'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang rang bzhin thugasu chud nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos
294b7(mdo sde): nas bu mo zla bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/des bden pa mthong nas skye dgu'i
295a1(mdo sde): bdag mo chen mo'i thad du rab tu byung //de nas des brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas rol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan
295a2(mdo sde): par rig nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par chad chod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad
295a3(mdo sde): spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/na mkha' dang
295a4(mdo sde): lag mthil du 'dre ba'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa dang /rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so
295a5(mdo sde): so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang /bkur bsti la mi lta ba/dbang po dang /nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /
295a6(mdo sde): gus par smra ba'i gnasu gyur to//de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dge slong dag khyed cag gis zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo bshad pa gdon
295a7(mdo sde): par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /de'i tshe skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dpog tu gsol/bde bar gshegs
295b1(mdo sde): pas so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dbog tu gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni dge slong ma la tshig re
295b2(mdo sde): renas chos kyi lung 'jog par mi mdzad de/gal te khyed las lan cig smras pas 'dzin nus pa 'ga' zhig yod na ni/ngas lung dpog go//de nas de'i tshe dge slong ma zla ba 'khor de nyid du
295b3(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur te 'dug/de nas dge slong ma zla ba bstan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba bdud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
295b4(mdo sde): to//lan cig bka' stsal pas/bdag gis bzung bar 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das kyis so sor thar pa'i mdo lung dpog du gsol/bde bar gshegs pa so sor thar pa'i mdo
295b5(mdo sde): lung dbog du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas par lung dpog par mdzad nas/lan cig bka' stsal pas dge slong ma zla bas lob so//der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
295b6(mdo sde): skroslong rnams la bka' stsal pa/nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong ma mang du thos pa rnams dang /thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'di lta ste/dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin no//de nas dge
295b7(mdo sde): slong dag the tshom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa dge slong ma zla bas las gang dag bgyis shing bsags pa des na
296a1(mdo sde): phyug pa'i rig su skyes te/gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /thos pa 'dzin par gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge
296a2(mdo sde): /slong dag zla ba nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas
296a3(mdo sde): na/zla ba nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam
296a4(mdo sde): par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur to/las dge ba dang mi dge bo byas shing bsags pa rnams
296a5(mdo sde): ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za//tshogs
296a6(mdo sde): shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/yang
296a7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhib su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang me rnams
296b1(mdo sde): kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de grong khyer b.rAn si na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na rten cing bzhug so//de nas re zhig na
296b2(mdo sde): bram ze'i bu mo zhig bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //des de la lung mnos te/bslabs nas/kha ton byas te phung po la mkhas pa dang /khams la
296b3(mdo sde): mkhas pa dang /skye mched la mkhas pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byaso//mthar thug pa'i ye shes
296b4(mdo sde): ni skyed ma nus so//de mkhan mo gang las rab tu byung ba de ni/bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi rdos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to//de nas dge slong ma de 'chi ba'i
296b5(mdo sde): tshe smon lam btab pa/ji ltar bdag gis mkhan mo thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du/bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis
296b6(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar
296b7(mdo sde): 'bru ro zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bdag thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan/
297a1(mdo sde): par gyur cig ces byaste//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na/bram ze'i bu mor gyur/
297a2(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de ni/dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin te/des smon lam btab pa des na/thos pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to//des dror lung mnos te bslabs nas
297a3(mdo sde): kha don du byas pa des na/da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byis//dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par
297a4(mdo sde): gnag par 'gyur ro//las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur ro//las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dres mar
297a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu nges par gnag pa rnams dang /las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'ba' shig la
297a6(mdo sde): gtad par bya ste/dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sprul nas/dge slong de dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das
297a7(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do////ud pa la zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /
297b1(mdo sde): phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /tshong dpon rnams dang /ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams
297b2(mdo sde): dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod par byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod
297b3(mdo sde): sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan
297b4(mdo sde): /na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzims chu dang /gudan dang /skyon gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang cas pa rgyal po'i khab na 'de
297b5(mdo sde): ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na rten cing bzhug so//de'i tshe rgyal po'i khob kyi grong khyer na/klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /yid 'ong gnyis phrad par zhes bya ba'i dus ston byung ste/der
297b6(mdo sde): grong khyer chen po drug po thams cad nas/skye bo mang po 'du'o//de nas re zhig na lho phyogs nas zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongs pa de'i bu mo ud pa la zhes bya ba gzugs
297b7(mdo sde): bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/yan lag dang /nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/lang tsho dang nad med pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa zhig yod de/de gang gi cha ltad
298a1(mdo sde): mo'i nang du 'ongs pa de'i tshe/ltad mo ba thams cad kyis yid smon byed cing lta bar byed do//gang so sor rtog pa'i shas chung ba de dag gi yid 'phrog par byed do//
298a2(mdo sde): der gang gi tshe dus ston byung ba de'i tshe/rdzogs byed la sogs pa/ston pa drug kyang 'ong ngo //de nas bu mo ud pa las skye bo mang po la smras pa/kye rgyal ba'i khab kyi grong
298a3(mdo sde): khyer na mir gyur pa'i nang na bdag dang byad gzugs kyis mnyam pa 'am khyad par du 'phags pa de lta bu 'ga' lta yod dam/skye bo mang pos smras pa dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'khor dang
298a4(mdo sde): bcas pa yod do//ud pa las smras pa ci de ma yin nam 'on te lha yin/skye bo mang pos smras pa/mi ni yin mod kyi/de ni thams cad mkhyen po yino//de nas tshig
298a5(mdo sde): de thos nas/ud pa la rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ngo //song nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'dug ste/gar byed cing glu
298a6(mdo sde): len rol mo byed do//bud med kyi mtshan ma rnams dang /bud med kyi rtags rnams dang /bud med kyi brda' rnams dang /bud med kyi rtsed mo rnams kyang ston par byed do//der
298a7(mdo sde): dge slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba gang yin pa de dag ni des ci bya gtol med par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dod chags kyi shas che ba rnams gdul ba dang
298b1(mdo sde): ud pa la'i byad gzugs lang 'tsho'i rgyags pa bstsal ba'i phyir/rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gis ud pa la rgas shing 'khogs la mgo skye ba dang /so rdo zhing byam dgu po
298b2(mdo sde): ltar sgur bur 'gyur ba de lta bur rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do//de nas de ltar sprul pa'i mod la ud pa las bdag nyid mi sdug par mthong nas/byad gzugs dang long chos
298b3(mdo sde): rgyags pa de med par gyur to//dge slong 'dod chags kyi shas che ba rnams kyang skye bar gyur to//de nas ud pa la rgyag pa med par gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
298b4(mdo sde): 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ci nas rnag can gyi lus 'di las tshegs chung ngus yongasu grol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos
298b5(mdo sde): bstan tu gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ud pa la dang /dge slong 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de dag gi bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams dang /rang bzhin thugasu chud
298b6(mdo sde): nas/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan te/de thos nas kha cig gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/
298b7(mdo sde): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so//kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so//kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum
299a1(mdo sde): du byas so//kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste/nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas//ud pa la yang dad nga/
299a2(mdo sde): rnyed nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/des brtson pa dang /bsgrub pa dang /'bad pas phol mig lnga pa'i 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di nyid g.yo zhing mi brtan par rig
299a3(mdo sde): nas/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad rnyil ba dang /ltung ba dang /rnam par 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/
299a4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag 'thil
299a5(mdo sde): du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/rigs pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang
299a6(mdo sde): dag par rig pa thob pa rnyed pa dang /grags pa dang /bkur bsti la mi lta ba dang /dbang po dang /nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang /gus par smra
299a7(mdo sde): ba'i gan su gyur to//zlos gar mkhan de dag kyang skyo bar gyur pa de nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so//de nas dge
299b1(mdo sde): slong dag the tsom skyes te/the tsom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zlos gar mkhan gyi bu mo ud pa la byed
299b2(mdo sde): gzugs dang /lang chos rgyags pa las rga bas skyo bar mdzad nas gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dag tu gzhag pa ni ngo mtshar lagaso//bcom ldan
299b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar ngo 'dod chags dang bral ba/zhe sdang dang bral ba/gti mug dang bral ba/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan
299b4(mdo sde): dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams las yongasu grol ba/thams cad mkhyen pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes dang
299b5(mdo sde): shes bya thams cad la dbang thob zin pa'i tshe bu mo ud pa la byad gzugs dang lang 'tsho'i rgyags pas dregs pas las rga bas skyo bar byas nas/gzha' gsang gi mthar thug pa/mya
299b6(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bzhag pa 'di lta la ngo mtshar che ba tsa med de/'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas pa/zhe sdang bcas pa/gti mug dang bcas pa/skye ba dang //
299b7(mdo sde): rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams las yongasu ma grol ba na yod/ngas
300a1(mdo sde): bu mo ud pa la rga bas skyo bar byas nas brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /ngas bshad do//dge slong
300a2(mdo sde): dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/grong khyer bA ra na si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo
300a3(mdo sde): legs pa dang /skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang pa/rtsod pa dang /'thab pa zhi ba dang /'khrug po dang /nang 'khrug dang /chom rkun dang /mu ge dang /nad rnams
300a4(mdo sde): med pa dang /'bras sa lu dang /bu ram shing dang /ba lang dang /ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin du rgyal srid
300a5(mdo sde): bskyangaso//de nas re zhig na rgyal po de btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' dgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las phyis btsun mo la bu chags nas/de zla
300a6(mdo sde): ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa dang bu byung ste khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes la/mdog bzang po/gser gyi kha dog can/mgo bo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/lag pa
300a7(mdo sde): ring ba/bral ba'i dbyes che ba/sna mtho ba/sna legs pa/smin ma stug pa/yan lag dang /nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsaso//de nas de btsas pa'i btsas
300b1(mdo sde): ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do//nye du rnams na re 'di'i yab yul ka shi'i rgyal po yin la 'di yang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pas
300b2(mdo sde): node'i phyir khyi'u 'di'i ming klu shi mdzes ldan zhes gdag so zhes zer ro//de nas khye'u ka shi mdzes ldan pa na 'tsha ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma lad+g+ha
300b3(mdo sde): ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ma ma brgyud la gtad nas/de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang ma
300b4(mdo sde): byad kyi khyad par bzang cog gis bskyed bsrings te/mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to//de nas gang gi tshe de cher skyes pa de'i tshe rgyal tshab du dbang bskur to//de nas de rgyal po
300b5(mdo sde): byed pa ni nyes pa du ma dang ldan zhing gnod pa du ma'i rtsa ba yin par rig nas/drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo //de yang gangs kyi sul zhig na gnas te 'bras bu dang /rtsa ba dang /chus
300b6(mdo sde): 'tshe zhing /ri dwags kyi g.yang gzhi dang /shing shun gyon la me'i sbyin bsreg byed do//phyis re shig na 'bras bu dang /rtsa ba'i phyir ri'i sul zhig du song ba dang /re zhig na der mi 'am
300b7(mdo sde): ci'i bu mo zhig gis drang srong gzhon nu de mthong nas/chags par gyur te/gor byed cing glu lan la rol mo byed do//bud med kyi mtshon ma rnams dang /bud med kyi rtags rnams dang /bung
301a1(mdo sde): med kyi brda' rnams dang /bud mod kyi rtsed mo rnams kyang ston par byed do//de nas re shig na drang srong ka shrI mdzes ldan gyis bu mo de la chos bshad de/che zhe
301a2(mdo sde): khyod rgas te khyod kyi nga ro dang po ni snyan cing mnyen la 'jug ni ra ra bor gyur to zhes byas so//de nas chos de lta bu bstan te/de thos nas mi 'am ci'i bu mo'i byad gzugs kyi rgyags pa de med
301a3(mdo sde): por gyur to//de nas de dad pa skyes nas smon lam btab pa gang gi tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/bdag khyod kyi
301a4(mdo sde): slob mar gyur cig ces byaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus na/drang srong gzhon nur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nga yino///
301a5(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i bu mo de ni ud pa la 'di nyid yin//de nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhus pa/btsun pa ud pa las las gang dag bgyis na/des gzugs
301a6(mdo sde): bzung zhing blta na sdug la mdzes par gyur pa lags/las gang dag bgyis na/des dgra bcom pa nyid mngon su du bgros lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
301a7(mdo sde): dge slong dag ud pa la nyid kyis sngon tshe rabs gzhan dag tu tshogs rnyed cing rkyen grub pa dang ldan te/dpa' rgal bzhin du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing
301b1(mdo sde): bsags pas na/ud pa la nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyamasu myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i/
301b2(mdo sde): khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la rnam par smon par mi 'gyur te/las dag pa dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags
301b3(mdo sde): pa rnams ni/zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams 'ba' shig la rnam par smin par 'gyur//lus can dag gi las rnams ni//bskal pa brgyar yang chud
301b4(mdo sde): miza//tshogs shing dus la bab pa na//'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur//dge slong nga gi sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo dzini
301b5(mdo sde): khri thub pa na/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhib su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/
301b6(mdo sde): lce dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de rgyal po'i pho brang modzes ldan na rten cing bzhu gso//de nas re
301b7(mdo sde): zheg na lho phyogs nas zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig 'ongaso//der gang gi tshe rgyal po mdzes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa mthong bar mdzad pa de'i tshe zlos gar mkhan
302a1(mdo sde): gyi slob dpon la sgo ba nga'i mdun du sangs rgyas kyi zlos kar gyi gar thabs gyis shig ces byas nas/de dag gis rgyal po'i bka' spyi bos mnos te/lha dka'/
302a2(mdo sde): bzhin 'tshalo zhes byas so//de nas sangs rgyas kyi zlas gar sbyar te/legs par sbyangs nas/rgyal po'i blon po'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i mdun du zlos gar gyi gar thabs byaso///
302a3(mdo sde): de nas de zlos gar mkhan gyi gar gyi slob dpon nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi tshe lugs kyis nang du 'ongaso//zlos gar mkhan gzhan rnams ni/dge slong gi cha lugs kyis nang du 'ongaso//de na
302a4(mdo sde): rgyal po dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' nas/zlos gar mkhan gyi slob dpon la sogs pa zlos gar mkhan gyi tshogs rnams la nor gyi phung po chen po byin no//de nas de dag bcom ldan
302a5(mdo sde): 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas/sbyin pa dang /rab tu sbyin pa dag sbyin nas/yang dag pa'i smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang /sbyin par bya ba'i
302a6(mdo sde): chos yongasu gtong ba 'dis na/bdag cag kyang ma 'ongs po'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig/ces byas so//dge
302a7(mdo sde): slong dag ji snyam du sems/zlos gar mkhan gang yin pa de dag ni ut+pa la sogs pa 'di dag yin te/'di dag gis der smon lam btab pa des na/da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid
302b1(mdo sde): mngon sum du byas s+ho//dge slong dag de ltar na las cig tu nges par gnag pa rnams ni/rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyuraro//las gcig tu nges par dkar
302b2(mdo sde): pa rnams ni rnam por smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar bar 'gyur//las 'dres ma rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma 'gyur to//dge slong dag de dus na las gcig tu nges
302b3(mdo sde): par gnag pa rnams dang /las 'dres ma rnams spangs la/las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams 'di' shig la gtad par bya ste/dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//
302b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///bam po
302b5(mdo sde): bdun pa////mdzes ldan ma zhes bya ba ni/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /blon po chen po rnams dang /phyug po rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi rlung tshang
302b6(mdo sde): nam ded dpon rnams dang /lha rnams dang /klu rnams dang /gni sbyin rnams dang /lha ma yin rnams dang /na mkha' lding rnams dang /mi 'am NI rnams dang /lto 'phye chen
302b7(mdo sde): ngo rnams kyis bkur bsti byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod po byas te/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lte ma yin dang /na mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /
303a1(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mchod cing shes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa/na bza' dang /zhal zas dang /gzis
303a2(mdo sde): cha dang /gdan dang /snyun gsos dang /sman zong rnams brnyes pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/bA ra na si na drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na bzhug so//de'i
303a3(mdo sde): tshe grong khyer bA ra na sen rgyal po tshangs pas byin rgyal po byed de/de'i ring la 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa dang /skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang ba/
303a4(mdo sde): dang /rtsod pa dang /'thab bzhi pa dang /'khrug pa dang /nang 'khrug dang /chom rkun dang /mu ge dang /nad rnams med pa dang /'bras sA lu dang /bu ram shing dang /

303a6(mdo sde): btsun mo dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do//de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/phye sa btsun mo la buM chags nas/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu

303b1(mdo sde): /nas/bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed de/nye du rnams na re bu mo 'di ka shI'i rgyal po'i bu mo yin la byad gzugs kyang bzang bas de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming ka shi/
303b2(mdo sde): mdzes ldan ma zhes gdag so zhes zer ro//de nas bu mo kA shau mdzes ldan ma pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtse ba'i
303b3(mdo sde): ma ma gnyis te/ma mra brgyad lnga gtad nas/de ma ma brgyad kyi 'o ma dang /zho dang /myur dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis
303b4(mdo sde): skyed srings te/mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to//de nas gang gri tshe bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe nyi 'og gi rgyal po drug glos rgyal po tshangs pas byin
303b5(mdo sde): lo pho nya btang te/khyod kyi bu mo btsas shos bdag gis thos kyis gzhan la mi sbyin par bdag gi bu la byin cig ces spring ngo //de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin mya ngan gyi khang du zhugs
303b6(mdo sde): nas/lhug pa la oM ma tshugs bcas te bsams pa/gal te gcig la byin na ni gzhan rnams ni bdag gi dgrar 'gyu ro snyam nas/sems khongasu chud cing 'dug/de nas re zhig na
303b7(mdo sde): bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te pha'i thad du song ba dang /des pha mya ngan gyi non pa 'theng nas dris pa/yab ci'i slad du mya ngan mdzad/de nas phas kyang de la ji ltar
304a1(mdo sde): gyur pa bsnyed do//de nas bu me ka shi mdzes ldan mas pha la smras pa/yab nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams la da ste zhag bdun na bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma rang nyid kyi
304a2(mdo sde): khyim thab 'dam phar chad kyis khyed kyi bya ba gang yin pa de gyis shig ces pho nya btang du gsol zhes byas so//de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang /nye 'og gi rgyal po drug rnams 'dus
304a3(mdo sde): bu mo ka shi mdzes ldan ma yang shing rta la zhon te/chos gos tshon can gyi bdun bsgreng nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs lag na thogs te/rgyal po 'dus pa'i nang
304a4(mdo sde): du sang nas smras pa/kye nyi 'og gi rgyal po rnams gson gcig/bdag ni khyed kyi gzugs dang lang tsho dang rigs dang /longs spyod dang /dbang phyug la mi sems kyi bdag
304a5(mdo sde): ni 'dod pa rnams la don du gnyer ba ma lags te/bdag ni ras 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs bris pa gang yin po de'i slob ma lags te/de'i bstan pa la
304a6(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung zhes byas nas/drang srong smra bar song te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag
304a7(mdo sde): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po thob tu rung na/bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par

304b3(mdo sde): 'thor ba dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can yin par rtsad chod de/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom pa khams gsum

304b5(mdo sde): sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa'i rnyed pa dang /chags pa dang /bkur bsti la mi lta ba/dbang po dang nye

304b7(mdo sde): nas/'dod chags kyi rgyags myos te/rab tu 'byung bzhin du yang gsol ba 'di bso//de nas de dag gis gsol ba btab nas/ngang pa'i rgyal po mdab ma brkyang ba bzhin du
305a1(mdo sde): na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan to//so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par byed de/de nas rgyal po'i bu

305b1(mdo sde): dag gzhan su zhig gi nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams

308b1(mdo sde): du 'byung la/gdon mi za bar 'ong ba'i las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/mu tim nyid kyi sku las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyam su myong bar 'gyur te/

308b7(mdo sde): grong khyer bA ra na sa na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nag son rten cing bzhug so//de nas re zhig na/ded dpon zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang bu zhugs pa las nye zho med par gru'i don grub ste/

309a2(mdo sde): ste/des de'i mgo bo la btag so//de nas des bA ra na si na khyim bdag dad pa dang ldan la/dge zhing bsam pa bzang ba/bdag la phan pa dang /gzhan la phan pa la zhugs
309a3(mdo sde): pa/snying rje can bdag nyid che ba chos 'dod pa zhig gnas pa de'i blo skyes pa/ma la bdag gis dad pa bsdus la/bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa lo lnga pa'i dus ston bya

309a6(mdo sde): bsdud par byed do//de nas re zhig na ded dpon gyi chung mas mu tig gi 'phreng ba mgo bo la phog nas dad pa sdud pa la phul lo//de nas re zhig na ded dpon 'ongs pa dang /mu tig
309a7(mdo sde): gi 'phreng ba mgo bo la phog par mthong nas/bzang mo mu tig gi phreng ba de ga re zhes dris so//de nas des smras pa/jo bo bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa sdud pa la
309b1(mdo sde): dul gyis dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/dad pa bskyed du gsol//zhes byas so//de nas re zhig na ded dpon gyis rin po ches phyir brus nas chung ma de nyid la byin na/de phyir len du

309b3(mdo sde): nas me tog mang po sogs te/spos dang /me tog 'phreng la sogs pa yang khyer nas dring srong smra bar song ngo //de nas dri gtsang khang spos kyis byugs nas/me tog gis gtor te/
309b4(mdo sde): mu tig phreng ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu la bor nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi dbu la gnas par gyur to//de nas dad pa skyes te smon lam btab pa/bdag gis kyang ljon ljid lta
309b5(mdo sde): bu dag thob par gyur cig/ston pa 'di kho na lta bu mnyes par byed par gyur cig/mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byaso//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i
309b6(mdo sde): dus na ded dpon gyi chung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mu tig 'di yin te/des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la bkur bsti byas pa des na gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa
309b7(mdo sde): dang /de'i mgo la yang mu tig gi phreng ba byung bar gyur to//rgyu de nyid kyis na da ltar yang dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byaso//dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu nges par gnas pa
310a1(mdo sde): rnams ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par gnag par 'gyur//las gcig tu nges par dkar ba rnams na rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nges par dkar
