426a7(mdo sde): khye'u shis ldan gyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs dang /rdzu 'phrul dang /cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de 'dra ba mthong nas/mgu zhing dag pa nas/yid
426b1(mdo sde): bde ba skyes pa'i bar du gyur nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
426b2(mdo sde): chub tu bsngo ste/dge bo'i rtsa ba des na/bdag da ltar gyi bcom ldan 'das bzhin du/sangs rgyasu gyur cig/chos ston par yang gyur cig/dge 'dun yongasu skyong bar
426b3(mdo sde): yang gyur cig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u shes ldan gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugasu tshud/'dzum pa mdzad pa nas/spyi gtsug gi nang du nub pa'i bar du mdzad
426b4(mdo sde): ba/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mthong ste/don med pa mi mjed do snyam pa'i bar du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan po kun dga' bo la tshig su bcad de slar
426b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo/'di lta shes ldan gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pas na//bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu dag tu log par ltung bar mi 'gyur la//de nas
426b6(mdo sde): de ma thag tu rnam par 'dren par nye bar skye 'gyur te//mtshan ni mkhyen gtso rgyal po zhes bya sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur//sangs rgyas kyi ni rtogs pa brjod pas
426b7(mdo sde): mkhas rnams yang dag dga' byed cing /mi'i mkhas pa gang giso thos nas dge ba mang po byed 'gyur te//rgya mtsho mthas gtugs dpag mod lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs
427a1(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas la//rab tu dang bas yon+da rnams phul ba'i 'bras bu chung bar mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
427a2(mdo sde): stsal nas/khye'u shes ldan dang /dge slong de dag dang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///
427a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa brjod pa shes ldan gyi mdo rdzogs so///rgyu gar gyi mkhan po bid bya kA ra sing ha dang /sarbadany+dza de ba dang /zhu chen gyi lo
427a4(mdo sde): ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa///rgya gar skad du/sU ka ri ka ba dA na nA ma su tra/bod skad du/phrag mo'i rtag pa brjod pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/
427a5(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dag/
427a6(mdo sde): rab na bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dge lha'i bu'i 'chi 'phro'i chos kyi snga ltos rnam pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te//lnga
427a7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/gos rnams sngon dri ma mi chags pa las dri ma 'chags pa dang /me tog 'phreng rnams sngon mi rnyis pa las rnyis pa dang /mtshan khung gnyis nas rdul 'byung ba dang /
427b1(mdo sde): lus las dri mi zhim pa 'byung ba dang /lha'i bu'i 'chi 'pho'i chos ni rang gi stan la dga' ba mi thob pa'o//dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu zhig 'chi 'pho'i chos kyis sa la 'gro ldog ste brang rdung
427b2(mdo sde): shizhing du la snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don te/kyi hud dal gyis 'bab pa/kyi hud rdzing /kyi hud rdzing bu/kyi hud shing rta sna tshogs can gyi tshal/kyi hud rtsub 'gyur gyi
427b3(mdo sde): tshal/kyi hud dga' ba'i cha le/kyi hud 'dres pa'i tshal/kyi hud yongs su 'du/kyi hud sdug pa kyi hud a ra mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb/kyi hud lha'i mdun sa/kyai hud blta
427b4(mdo sde): na sdug pa zhes/snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don to//lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu de shin tu sa la 'gre ldog cing snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don pa mthong te mthong
427b5(mdo sde): nas kyang /lha'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas lha'i bu de la 'di skad ces smras so//grogs po khyod ci'i phyir shin tu se la 'gro ldog cing snying rje rje'i skad du smre sngags 'don
427b6(mdo sde): te/kyi hud dal gyis 'bab pa/kyai hud rdzing /kyi hud rdzing bu/kyi hud shing rta sna tshogs can g+h+r-i tshul/kyi hud rtsub 'gyur gyi tshul/kyi hud dge' ba'i
427b7(mdo sde): tshal/kyi hud 'dres pa'i tshal/kye hud yongs su 'du/kyi hud sdug pa/kyi hud yir mo nig lta bu'i rdo leb/kyi hud lha'i 'dun sa/kyi hud blta na sdug pa zhes snying rje rje/
428a1(mdo sde): skad du smre sngags 'don par byed/de skad ces smras pa dang /lha'i dbang po brgyu byin la/lha'i bu des 'di skad ces smra'o//klo'u sha ka bdag ni 'dir lha'i bdod
428a2(mdo sde): dang bral te zhag bdun na 'di nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por phag mo'i mngal du skye bor 'gyur te/bdag ni der lo mang po zhig tu phyi so dang gcin 'tshal bar 'gyur
428a3(mdo sde): bas/de'i slad du bdag de skad mchi'o//grogs po chur shog/khyod rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabasu song shig/'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog/
428a4(mdo sde): chos la skyabasu song shig/tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabasu song shig/des 'di skad ces smras//grogs pho bdag ni rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgya
428a5(mdo sde): la skyabasu mchi'o//'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabasu mchi'o//tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi'o//de nas lha'i bu des skyabs
428a6(mdo sde): gsum bzung ste/'chi 'pho'i dus byas nas/dga' ldan gyi lha'i risu skyes//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu de bltas pa/ci lha'i bu de phag mo'i mngal du
428a7(mdo sde): skyes sam ma skyes shes bltas na yod ma skyes/sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gan su skyes sam ma skyes shes bltas na yang ma skyes te/lha rnams ni chos
428b1(mdo sde): nyid kyis 'og ma la shes pa dang mthong ba 'jug gi/gong ma la ni ma yin no//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin the tshom skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom
428b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs lo mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das lo 'di skad ces
428b3(mdo sde): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'di ni lha'i bu zhig 'chi 'pho'i chos byung nas/dog sa la 'gre ldog cing /snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'don te/kyi hud dal gyis 'bab pa/kyi dud
428b4(mdo sde): NIrdzing /kyi hung rdzing bu/kyi hud shing rta sna tshogs tsan gyi tshal/kyi hud rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal/kyi hud dga' ba'i tshal/kyi hud 'dres pa'i tshal/kyi hud yongasu 'du/kyi hud ar mo
428b5(mdo sde): nig lta bu'i rdo lebA/kyi hud lha'i 'dun sa/kyi hud blta na sdug pa zhes snying rje rje skad du smre sngags 'dren pa mthong ste/bdag der mchi nas/'di skad ces bgyiso//grogs po khyod
428b6(mdo sde): ci'i phyir brang rdung zhing du la mya ngan byed de ngu zhing smre sngags 'dron/des smras pa/bdag ni 'dir lci'i bde ba dang bral te/zhag bdun na 'di nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen
428b7(mdo sde): po bgo mo'i mngal du skye bar 'gyur/bdag ni der lo mang zhig tu phyi sa dang gcin 'tshal bar 'gyur bas/de'i slad du bdag de skad mchi'o//grogs po chur shog/khyod rkang
429a1(mdo sde): gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyabasu song shig/'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabasu song shig/tshogs rnams kyi mchog
429a2(mdo sde): dge 'dun la skyabasu song shig/de nas lha'i bu de dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs shing skrag/'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag ste/de 'di skad ces mchi'o//grogs po
429a3(mdo sde): bdag ni 'di ltar rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog sangs rgyas la skyobasu mchi'o//'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabasu mchi'o//tshogs rnams kyi mtsho/
429a4(mdo sde): dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi'o//de nas lha'i bu des skyabs gsum bzung nas 'chi 'pho'i dus bgyis pa de/bcom ldan 'das gang du skyes lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis//
429a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal ba/ke'u shi ka lha'i bu de ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris der skyes te/lha'i 'dod pa thams cad phun sum tshogaso//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin tshim zhing mgu ste/
429a6(mdo sde): rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/dbang po chem nas/de'i tshe tshigasu bcad de gsol pa/gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mtsho ba//de dag ngan 'gro
429a7(mdo sde): mi 'chi ste//mi'i lus rnams spangs na su//de dag lha lus thob par 'gyur//gang dag chos la skyabs mchi ba//de dag ngani 'groro mi mchi ste//mi'i lus rnams
429b1(mdo sde): spangs nas//de dag lta lus thob par 'gyur/gang dag dge 'dun skyabs mchi ba/de dag dran 'gror mo mchi ste//mi'i lus rnams spangs nas//de dag lha lus thob par 'gyur/
429b2(mdo sde): gang dag nyan mtshan rtag par yang //sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang //gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa//mi de dag gi rnyed pa che//gang dag nyin mtshan rtag par yang //chos ni rje su
429b3(mdo sde): dran pa dang //gang dag chos la skyabs mchis pa//mi de dag ni rnyed pa che//gang dag nyin mtshan rtag par yang //dge 'dun rje su dran pa dang //gang dag dge 'dun skyabs mchis
429b4(mdo sde): ba/mi de dag ni rnyed pa che//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis//lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rje su 'thun par brjod pa'i tshig su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/ko'u shi ka de bzhin te/
429b5(mdo sde): de de bzhin no//gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs dong ba//de dag ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste//mi'i lus rnams spangs na su//de dag lha lus thob par 'gyur//gang dag chos la skyabs
429b6(mdo sde): dro pa/de dag ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste//mi'i lus rnams spangs na su//de dge lce lus thob par 'gyur//gang dag dge 'dun skyabs dong ba//de dag ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste//
429b7(mdo sde): mi'i lus rnams spangs na su//de dag lha lus thob par 'gyur//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dge'i nas/bcom
430a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das la lag pa thal mo sbyar nas/lan gsum bskor ba byas te/de nyid du mi snang bar
430a2(mdo sde): gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/dge slong dag yid rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///
430a3(mdo sde): phag mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i mdo rdzogaso////rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi dra dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
430a4(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/su ma ga d+ha a ba dA na ma/bod skad du/ma ga d+ha bzang mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
430a5(mdo sde): 'tshalo//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ro ba na bzhugs te/de nas de'i tshe mnyan yod
430a6(mdo sde): na/mgon med rnaMs sbyin gyi bu mo mA ga d+hA bzang mo zhes bya ba dad pa dang ldan pa/rang bzhin bzang ba/bsum pa dge ba/bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir zhugs
430a7(mdo sde): ba zhig gnaso//ji tsa mo ne bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i grong khyer na tsheng dpon gzhan zhig gnas la/de'i su khyu mchog byin zhes bya'o//de yang gzhan mu stegs
430b1(mdo sde): bstan pas/gcer bu pa rnams la mngon par dad pa zhig gnas pa dang gang gi tshe/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshwa 'phrul chen po rnam par bstan pa de'i tshe/mu stegs pa rnams mtha'
430b2(mdo sde): 'khorar tu kun tu gnas te/la la ni grong khyer bzung byed ces bya ba na'o//la la ni mung gi ro ka zhes bya ba'i yul na'o//la la ni bu rim shing 'phre zhe bya baM grong khyer na gnas//
430b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na/khyu mchog byin de'i bar du khyim ma byas po dang /de la gcer bu pa rnams kyis smras pa/mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu mo ma ga te bzang mo zhes bya ba/gzugs
430b4(mdo sde): bzang ba/blta na sdug pa/mdzes pa/ske bo dam pa rnams dang /'dra ba zhig yod do//ji sid des thos pa dang /bdag nyid gcer bu pa'i cha byad du byas te/mnyan yod
430b5(mdo sde): du song ngo //ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon mod zas sbyin gyi khyim du slong ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang /des bu mo de mthong ngo //mthong ba'i mod kho na lo bu mo de la kun tu chags
430b6(mdo sde): bar gyur la/de der bslangs pa'i phye zha' nang du blangs//de nas bu mo des log par spyod pa de mthong ba dang /'di ni shes med par slongs mo len to/zhes pa rgal to//de
430b7(mdo sde): nas khyu mchog byin de ngo tsha bar gyur pa dang /bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer du song ste/pha la smras nas/des bu mo de bslangs//mgon med zas sbyin gyis btsem
431a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la zhus pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzhan du na gang gi tshe ma gu d+ha bzang mo 'di bu ram shing 'phel du song na rab tu byung
431a2(mdo sde): ba rnams kyi bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi bye ba byed par 'gyu ro//yang ji srid cig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis nye du rnams la yang glo bar byas nas byin pa dang
431a3(mdo sde): bu rim shing 'phel du khyer ro//ji tsa mo na dus gzhan zhig gi tshe khyim de na gcer bu pa rnams zan za ba dang /de la sgyug mos smras pa/de ring bdag cag go khyim na
431a4(mdo sde): mchod gnas rnams bai shos gsol gyis chur shog/mchod gnas rnams la ltos shig/ma ga d+ha bzang mos de thos pa dang /dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang
431a5(mdo sde): rangs pa dang /yid bde ba skyes te bsams pa nges par btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'am/mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams byon par gyur to
431a6(mdo sde): snyam nas/de yid rab tu dga' ba dang /'jigs pa med par song ba dang /gcer bu nags kyi ma he 'dra ba/sgra rnams btogs pa/phug ron gyi phru gu 'dra ba'i
431a7(mdo sde): gcer bu rnams mthong ngo //mthong ba dang /de'i mod la ma ga d+ha bzang mo ngo tsha ste/de gdong gzhan du bltas pa dang /de la sgyug mo nges smras pa/bu mo khyad ci'i
431b1(mdo sde): byi yi mug par gyur/des smras pa/gang 'di lta bu mchod gnas yin nam yin pa go ji lta bu zhig yod par 'gyur de la smras pa/bu mo khyod la 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags
431b2(mdo sde): pa'i ston pa 'ga' zhig yod dam/bu mos smras pa/bdag gi pha'i gtsug lag khang rgyal byed kyi tshal na sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i ston pa bzhugs te/de ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu
431b3(mdo sde): ba'i 'jig rten gyi mchod gnas yin no//khyod kyi ston pa de ci 'dra ba zhig/smras po/bdag gi ston pa tsam po'i tshogaso ltar ser//bcom gser ltar shin tu dri
431b4(mdo sde): ma med//tshul khrims rnam dag shes rab shin tu dag/'jig rten gsum na mnyam med 'gro las 'phags/de thos ma thag tu sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/bu
431b5(mdo sde): mo dred cag rnams la bcom ldan 'das de sang bstan par nus sam/ma ga d+ha bzang mos smras pa/bshos gtsang rnams sbyor cig dang //sang bcom ldan 'das
431b6(mdo sde): spyan drang bar bya'o//ci tsam na de rnams kyis smras pa/ba shos gtsang rnams sbyar gyis khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das sang skyon drongs shig/de nas ma ga d+ha bzang mos khang
431b7(mdo sde): po'i yang rtog gi steng du mngon par 'dzegs nas/phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'dom bzhugs pa'i sa de nga thal mo sbyar te/phyag byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi ston
432a1(mdo sde): rje su dAn te/me tog rnams 'thor zhing spyos kyang gtul nas/gser gyi bum pa'i chus bcom ldan 'das spyan drang ba'i phyir/gser gyi bum pa'i chu
432a2(mdo sde): yang sbrengaso//snying rje ba'i tshig 'di skad ces smras te/bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/bdag ni ri dgas dang 'od bar gyur cing mtha' 'khob na mchis twa/
432a3(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum dang bral bar gyur pa la rjesu bzung bar mdzad cing /dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas par 'dir gshegs par mdzad du gsol/yang 'di
432a4(mdo sde): skad ces kyang smras te/tshul khrims rnam dag shes rab shin tu dag/dad ldan snying po nyan thos che rnams kyis//mgon med gyur pa bdag la rjes bzung ba'i//don
432a5(mdo sde): mdzad thugs rjes gshegs par mdzad du gsol//ji tsam na me tog dang /spos dang /gser gyi bum pa'i chu'ang na mkha' las 'phags par gyur to//bcom ldan
432a6(mdo sde): 'das kyang de'i tshe nang du yang dag 'jog pas bzhengs nas/'khor rnam pa bzhi la chos ston to//gser gyi bum pa'i chu de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bai DUr+ya'i
432a7(mdo sde): sdong bu bzhin du rnam par gnaso//me tog de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi na mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa bzhin du gnas so//dri dang spos kyang sprin brtsegs pa bzhin
432b1(mdo sde): phu gnas par gyur to//de nas de mthong ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das spyan 'dren pa'i dag las mchis/bac+doMs/
432b2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo dpag ched brgya drug cu rtsa gsum na bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer yod pa nas 'ongaso//kun dga' bo grong khyer de ni mu stegs pa rnams kyis
432b3(mdo sde): bzung ba yin pas/rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas 'gro bar bya'o zhes dge slong rnams la tshul shing brims shig/ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgan pa'i gnas
432b4(mdo sde): mtha' nas zug nas tshul shing brims te/'di skad ces smras te/sang bu ram shing 'phel gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar bya ste/grong khyer de ni mu stegs pa rnams kyis yongasu bzung
432b5(mdo sde): bas/khyed cag rnams las gde rdzu 'phrul thob pa des tshul shing long shing //ji srid cig na rgan po'i mtha' nas tshul shing len par brtsams//yang de na b+hur na kun da ud pa
432b6(mdo sde): da na zhes bya ba'i gnas brtan yod do/der yang rdzu 'phrul ma thob par lag pa bskyang ste/tshul shing len par brtsams pa dang /de la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa dang /
432b7(mdo sde): gnas brtan mgon med zos sbyin gyi khyim du 'jug pa mi yin gyi/gzhan du na dopag tshad brgya drug cu rtsa gsum na bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i gnas yad de der 'gro dgos
433a1(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du sems te/ngas ni thog ma med pa'i dus na/goms pa'i nyon mongs ni spangs na/mu stegs pa rnams dang /thun mong du gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul lta
433a2(mdo sde): zhing /dka' ba ci zhig yod nas bskyed par mi bya snyam nas/des kyang dus de nyid du rdzu 'phrul bskyed pa dang /ji srid du tshul shing gnyis pa ma bris pa de srid du/des glang
433a3(mdo sde): po che'i sna 'dra ba'i lag pa brgyad ste tshul shing blangs//ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgan pa'i mtha' logasu 'dug ste/smras pa/gang gi rdzu 'phrul gang thob pa
433a4(mdo sde): des bu ram shing 'phel zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du 'gro bar bya'o//de nas nyi ma gnyis pa la nam nangs te/dge slong rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas yang dag par
433a5(mdo sde): cha so//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi yang mnyan yod gang na ba der mngon par lta bar semaso//ci tsam na bar skabs der kun shes ko'u di n+ya zhes bya ba rta'i shing rta la zhon
433a6(mdo sde): te/glog 'gyur ba'i snang ba ston cing dal bus char rab tu 'babs te/de lta bu'i rang gi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston cing 'ong ngo //de nas ma gau d+ha bzang mo'i bdag pos de
433a7(mdo sde): mthong ba dang dris pa//ma gaM d+ha bzang mo 'di khyod kyi ston pa de yin na ma/des smras pa/'di ni kun shes ko'u di n+ya zhes bya ba yin te/'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis
433b1(mdo sde): chos kyis 'khor lo dang po bskor ba na 'dis thog mar bdag med pa mngon sum du byas pa de thog mar 'ongs pa 'di yino//bar skabs der gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos brag gi
433b2(mdo sde): ri chen po shing sna tshogs pa rnam pa brgyas khyab pa/bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab pa/me tog sna tshogs yang dag par khebs pa/g.ya' chu sna tshogs kyi nye bar mdzes par byas pa/

433b5(mdo sde): bzang mo skye bo dge ba rnams dang mtshungs pa dang /dbyig dang gser mang po mchil mi'i thal ba bzhin spangs nas/mngon par byung ste/rab tu byung ba de ni 'ong ba 'di yin no///

434a1(mdo sde): shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan bdun nA/'das mangs du zhugs rnam+ba gyis/'jam bu gling thams cad kyi spyod bar smra ba rnams/
434a2(mdo sde): lus rgyal bar gyur to//'di ni ston pa gnyis pa/mchog gnyis pa chos kyi ded dpon/chos kyi 'khor lo rjesu sbyor ba de ni seng ge'i shing rtas 'ongs pa 'di sbyin no//

440b3(mdo sde): no//rgyal po chen po khyod kyis kun dga' ra ba phun sum tshogs pa ma byin par len pa rnams kyis phrogs pa rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de nyid kyi nyan thos lus
440b4(mdo sde): me bsnams pa/sems ma bsdams pa/tshul khrims ma bsdams pa/shes rab ma bsdams pa/rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/de rnams dge 'dun rnams
440b5(mdo sde): kyi me tog mchog dang /'bras bu'i mchog rnams 'tshe ba'i phyir dge 'dun la bcad nas khyim pa rnams la skyer bar 'gyur te/de'i snga ltas ni de yin no//rgyal
440b6(mdo sde): po chen po khyod kyis glang po phru gus spos kyi glang po 'jigs par byed pa rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de nyid kyi nyan thos rnams tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos
440b7(mdo sde): can de rnams gang dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa/dge ba'i chos can rnams zil gyis gnon par byed par 'gyur te/de'i snga ltas de yin no//rgyal po chen po
441a1(mdo sde): khyod kyi spre'u mi gtsang bas gos pas gzhan la skud par rmi lam du mthong ba gang yin pa 'di ni de nyid kyi nyan thos rnams tshul khrims 'chal pa/sdig par
441a2(mdo sde): chos can rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/de rnams kyis tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la skur pa 'dabs par 'gyur te/de'i snga lta sde yin no//rgyal po chen po khyod kyis spre'u
441a3(mdo sde): rgyal por dbang por dbang bskur bar mthong ba gang yin pa de ni dus de'i tshe/rmongs pa rnams rgyal por dbang bskur bar 'gyur te/de'i snga ltas yin no//rgyal po chen po/
441a4(mdo sde): khyod kyis ras cig mi bco brgyad kyi drangs kyang ma ral bar rmi lam mthong ba gang yin pa de ni/de nyid kyi bstan pa sde bco brgyad du gyes par gyur kyang /rnam par grol
441a5(mdo sde): ba'i ras ni ral bar mi nus par 'gyur te/de'i snga ltas yin no//rgyal po chen po gcig tu 'dus nas/'theb pa dang /rtsod pa dang /g.yul 'gyed pa dang /
441a6(mdo sde): mtshang 'dru bar rmi lam mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de nyid kyi bstan pa rtsod phra nub par 'gyur te/de'i sde ltas yin no//rgyal po chen po de ltar mi bzad pa rnams ma
441a7(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la yang rgyal po
441b1(mdo sde): kri kri dang /gser 'breng can gyis thar pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa yin no//dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe na gser 'breng can gang yin pa de ni
441b2(mdo sde): ma ga d+ha bzang mo 'di nyid yin to//de'i tshe yang 'dis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas te/da ltar yang 'di 'ongs nas sangs rgyab kyi bya ba byas so//yang dge slong rnams the tsom skyes
441b3(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa gser 'phrong can gyis las ci zhig bgyis nas gser gyi 'phrong ba btags par skyes bcom ldan
441b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//dge slong drug 'di nyid kyis las byas pa yod de/sngon byung ba na zhing pa gzhan zhig gi chung mar gyur te/rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten
441b5(mdo sde): la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i me tog rnams kyis phreng ba byas nas btogs te/las de'i rnam par smin pas gser gyi phreng ba brtags par skyes so//de bas na dge slong
441b6(mdo sde): dag las gcig tu gnag po rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/cig tu dkar ba rnams kyis rnam par smin po ni gcig tu dkar ba yin te/
441b7(mdo sde): 'dres ma rnams kyis rnam par smin pa ni 'dres ma'o//dge slong dag de bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dres ma rnams spangs la/las cig tu
442a1(mdo sde): rubya/dkar ba rnams la mngon par brtson par bya ste/dge slong dag khyed rnams kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de
442a2(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do///ma ga d+hA bzang mo'i
442a3(mdo sde): rtogs pa brjod pa/rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI b+ha dra dang /zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong tshul khrims yon
442a4(mdo sde): tan gyis bsgyur sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba chen po/dge slong rin chen bzang pos bcas te/gtan la phab pa//yang zhus dag
